CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AccountCombination_sh]
	@COMBINATION_ID int,
	@SEGMENT1 varchar(4),
	@SEGMENT2 varchar(3),
	@SEGMENT3 varchar(6),
	@SEGMENT4 varchar(4),
	@Active bit,
	@Type int
AS
BEGIN
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Insert into ACCOUNT_COMBINATION(
		SEGMENT1,
		SEGMENT2,
		SEGMENT3,
		SEGMENT4,
		ACTIVE
		)
		Select @SEGMENT1,
		@SEGMENT2,
		@SEGMENT3,
		@SEGMENT4,
		@Active

	Select SCOPE_IDENTITY()
	END
	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		iF EXISTS(
			Select COMBINATION_ID from ACCOUNT_COMBINATION
			Where COMBINATION_ID = @COMBINATION_ID
		) 
		BEGIN
			Update ACCOUNT_COMBINATION
			Set SEGMENT1 = @SEGMENT1,
				SEGMENT2 = @SEGMENT2,
				SEGMENT3 = @SEGMENT3,
				SEGMENT4 = @SEGMENT4,
				ACTIVE = @Active
			
			Select @COMBINATION_ID
		END
		
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Select * from ACCOUNT_COMBINATION 
		Where SEGMENT1 = @SEGMENT1 and SEGMENT2 = @SEGMENT2 and
		SEGMENT3 = @SEGMENT3 and SEGMENT4 = @SEGMENT4
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AccountLedgerReport_sh](@m_Fr_Segment1 Varchar(4), @m_Fr_Segment2 Varchar(3), @m_Fr_Segment3 Varchar(6), @m_Fr_Segment4 Varchar(4), @m_To_Segment1 Varchar(4), @m_To_Segment2 Varchar(3), @m_To_Segment3 Varchar(6), @m_To_Segment4 Varchar(4), @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@Fr_Segment1 Varchar(4) ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_Segment2 Varchar(3) ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_Segment3 Varchar(6) ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_Segment4 Varchar(4) ;

	DECLARE	@To_Segment1 Varchar(4) ;
	DECLARE	@To_Segment2 Varchar(3) ;
	DECLARE	@To_Segment3 Varchar(6) ;
	DECLARE	@To_Segment4 Varchar(4) ;

	DECLARE	@Segment1 NVARCHAR(MAX) ;
	DECLARE	@Segment2 NVARCHAR(MAX) ;
	DECLARE	@Segment3 NVARCHAR(MAX) ;
	DECLARE	@Segment4 NVARCHAR(MAX) ;


	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;
	DECLARE @OP_DATE VARCHAR(25);

	SET @Fr_Segment1 = @m_Fr_Segment1
	SET @Fr_Segment2 = @m_Fr_Segment2
	SET @Fr_Segment3 = @m_Fr_Segment3
	SET @Fr_Segment4 = @m_Fr_Segment4

	SET @To_Segment1 = CASE WHEN LEN(@m_To_Segment1) = 0  THEN @Fr_Segment1 ELSE @m_To_Segment1 END
	SET @To_Segment2 = CASE WHEN LEN(@m_To_Segment2) = 0  THEN @Fr_Segment2 ELSE @m_To_Segment2 END
	SET @To_Segment3 = CASE WHEN LEN(@m_To_Segment3) = 0  THEN @Fr_Segment3 ELSE @m_To_Segment3 END
	SET @To_Segment4 = CASE WHEN LEN(@m_To_Segment4) = 0  THEN @Fr_Segment4 ELSE @m_To_Segment4 END

	SET @Segment1 = CASE WHEN LEN(@Fr_Segment1) > 0 THEN ' AND SEGMENT1 BETWEEN ''' + @Fr_Segment1 + ''' AND ''' + @To_Segment1 + '''' ELSE '' END
	SET @Segment2 = CASE WHEN LEN(@Fr_Segment2) > 0 THEN ' AND SEGMENT2 BETWEEN ''' + @Fr_Segment2 + ''' AND ''' + @To_Segment2 + '''' ELSE '' END
	SET @Segment3 = CASE WHEN LEN(@Fr_Segment3) > 0 THEN ' AND SEGMENT3 BETWEEN ''' + @Fr_Segment3 + ''' AND ''' + @To_Segment3 + '''' ELSE '' END
	SET @Segment4 = CASE WHEN LEN(@Fr_Segment4) > 0 THEN ' AND SEGMENT4 BETWEEN ''' + @Fr_Segment4 + ''' AND ''' + @To_Segment4 + '''' ELSE '' END

	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_4 NVARCHAR(MAX);

	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = @Segment1 + @Segment2 + @Segment3 + @Segment4

	SET @OP_DATE = DATEADD(day,-1,@FDate)   


	--SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT CODE_COMBINATION AS CODE,''' +  @OP_DATE + ''' AS TRANS_DATE, 0 AS JV_NO, 
	--SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) AS DEBIT, 
	--SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) AS CREDIT, ' +
	--'''Opening Balance B/F ....'''+' AS REMARKS, NAME_COMBINATION AS DESCR,'+''''' AS JE_NAME
	--FROM PRE_LEDGER_V WHERE 1 = 1 
	--AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),JE_DATE,121) < ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''') ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
	--GROUP BY CODE_COMBINATION, NAME_COMBINATION
	--union all 
	--SELECT CODE_COMBINATION AS CODE, JE_DATE AS TRANS_DATE, JE_VOUCHER_NO AS JV_NO, JE_ENTERED_DR AS DEBIT, JE_ENTERED_CR AS CREDIT, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE AS REMARKS, NAME_COMBINATION AS DESCR,JE_NAME
	--FROM PRE_LEDGER_V WHERE 1 = 1
	--AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),JE_DATE,121)
	--	BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''') ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
	--ORDER BY 1, 2, 3 '


				SET @QUERY_S_1 = 
					'SELECT 
						CODE_COMBINATION AS CODE, 
						''' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @OP_DATE, 120) + ''' AS TRANS_DATE, 
						0 AS JV_NO, 
						SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) AS DEBIT, 
						SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) AS CREDIT, 
						''Opening Balance B/F ....'' AS REMARKS, 
						NAME_COMBINATION AS DESCR, 
						'''' AS JE_NAME
					 FROM PRE_LEDGER_V 
					 WHERE JE_DATE < ''' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @FDate, 120) + ''' ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
					 GROUP BY CODE_COMBINATION, NAME_COMBINATION

					 UNION ALL 

					 SELECT 
						CODE_COMBINATION AS CODE, 
						JE_DATE AS TRANS_DATE, 
						JE_VOUCHER_NO AS JV_NO, 
						JE_ENTERED_DR AS DEBIT, 
						JE_ENTERED_CR AS CREDIT, 
						JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE AS REMARKS, 
						NAME_COMBINATION AS DESCR, 
						JE_NAME
					 FROM PRE_LEDGER_V 
					 WHERE JE_DATE BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @FDate, 120) + ''' AND ''' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), @TDate, 120) + ''' ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
					 ORDER BY CODE, TRANS_DATE, JV_NO';





	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	--SELECT @Segment1, @Segment2, @Segment3, @Segment4

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AP_Ageing_Report_sh] (@m_AI_AS_ID INT, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@AI_AS_ID INT ;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);

	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @AI_AS_ID = @m_AI_AS_ID

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN @AI_AS_ID > 0 THEN ' AND AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_AS_ID  = ' + STR(@AI_AS_ID) + ''  ELSE '' END

	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate


	--SELECT dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO, MIN(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
	--SUM(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.ORG_AMT) AS AI_AMT, SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.PEN_AMT, 0)) AS AI_ADJUST,
	--dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_AS_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_SUPPLIER_Name 
	--FROM dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V INNER JOIN dbo.Ap_SUPPLIER_V ON dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_AS_ID = dbo.Ap_SUPPLIER_V.AS_ID 
	--where dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_v.AI_DATE<='2023-05-11' 
	--GROUP BY dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO, dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_AS_ID, dbo.Ap_supplier_V.AS_SUPPLIER_Name 
	--Having (ROUND(SUM(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.PEN_AMT),0) <> 0) 
	--ORDER BY dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_SUPPLIER_Name,dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO


	SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO, MIN(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
						SUM(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.ORG_AMT) AS AI_AMT, SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.PEN_AMT, 0)) AS AI_ADJUST,
						dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_AS_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_SUPPLIER_Name,
						(SELECT DISTINCT AI_SUPPLIER_REF FROM AP_INVOICE WHERE AI_NO = dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO) AS AI_SUPPLIER_REF
						FROM dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V INNER JOIN dbo.Ap_SUPPLIER_V ON dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_AS_ID = dbo.Ap_SUPPLIER_V.AS_ID  
						WHERE 1 = 1 
						AND AI_DATE <= ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' '
						+ @QUERY_W_2 + '
						GROUP BY dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO, dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_AS_ID, dbo.Ap_supplier_V.AS_SUPPLIER_Name 
						Having (ROUND(SUM(dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.PEN_AMT),0) <> 0) 
						ORDER BY dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_SUPPLIER_Name,dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO '


	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AP_Debit_Note_sh]
	@Type int,
	@ACN_NO bigint,
    @ACN_DATE datetime,
    @ACN_AI_NO bigint,
    @ACN_NAME varchar(50), 
    @ACN_CC_ID int,
    @ACN_AMOUNT float,
    @ACN_TYPE varchar(50),
    @ACN_AS_ID bigint,
    @ACN_TM_ID int,
	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)

AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN	
		Insert into AP_Debit_Note (ACN_NO,ACN_DATE,ACN_AI_NO,ACN_NAME,ACN_CC_ID,ACN_AMOUNT,
		ACN_TYPE, ACN_AS_ID, ACN_TM_ID)
		Values (@ACN_NO, @ACN_DATE, @ACN_AI_NO, @ACN_NAME, @ACN_CC_ID, @ACN_AMOUNT,
		@ACN_TYPE, @ACN_AS_ID, @ACN_TM_ID)

		Select @ACN_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(ACN_NO) as lastInvoiceId from AP_Debit_Note 
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		select distinct ACN_NO,ACN_DATE,ACN_AI_NO,ACN_NAME,ACN_CC_ID,ACN_AMOUNT,
		ACN_TYPE, ACN_AS_ID, ACN_TM_ID, ACN_POST, ACN_INV_GL from AP_Debit_Note_V
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		select ACN_NO,ACN_DATE,ACN_AI_NO,ACN_NAME,ACN_CC_ID,ACN_AMOUNT,
		ACN_TYPE, ACN_AS_ID, ACN_TM_ID, ACN_POST, ACN_INV_GL 
		from AP_Debit_Note_V 
		Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
	END
	--IF(@Type = 5)
	--BEGIN
	--	IF EXISTS(
	--		Select ACN_NO from AP_Debit_Note_V
	--		Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
	--	)
	--	BEGIN
	--		Update AP_Debit_Note Set AI_CANCEL = 1, AI_CANCEL_DATE = GETDATE() Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
	--		Select @AI_NO
	--	END
	--END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			select distinct *
			from AP_Debit_Note_V Where ACN_NO = Cast(@SearchValue as int) order by ACN_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			select distinct *
			from AP_Debit_Note_V where ACN_AS_ID = @SearchValue order by ACN_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select ACN_NO from AP_Debit_Note
			Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AP_Debit_Note
			Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
		END
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_sh] (
	@m_Type int,
	@m_Tbl_Type int,

	@m_APR_NO bigint,
	@m_APR_DATE datetime,
	@m_APR_DESCRIPTION varchar(100),
	@m_APR_AS_ID int,
	@m_APR_BANK_ID int,
	@m_APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT float,
	@m_APR_CHQ_NO varchar(100),

	@m_AAI_APR_NO bigint,
	@m_AAI_AI_NO bigint,
	@m_AAI_AI_DATE datetime,
	@m_AAI_AI_AMOUNT float,
	@m_AAI_PEN_AMOUNT float,
	@m_AAI_ADJUST float,
	@m_AAI_AS_ID int,

	@m_APT_APR_NO bigint,
	@m_APT_TD_ID int,
	@m_APT_TAX_AMOUNT float,

	@m_SearchType int,
	@m_SearchValue varchar(100))

AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Type int;
	DECLARE @Tbl_Type int;

	DECLARE @APR_NO bigint;
	DECLARE @APR_DATE datetime;
	DECLARE @APR_DESCRIPTION varchar(100);
	DECLARE @APR_AS_ID int;
	DECLARE @APR_BANK_ID int;
	DECLARE @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT float;
	DECLARE @APR_CHQ_NO varchar(50);

	DECLARE @AAI_APR_NO bigint;
	DECLARE @AAI_AI_NO bigint;
	DECLARE @AAI_AI_DATE datetime;
	DECLARE @AAI_AI_AMOUNT float;
	DECLARE @AAI_PEN_AMOUNT float;
	DECLARE @AAI_ADJUST float;
	DECLARE @AAI_AS_ID int;

	DECLARE @APT_APR_NO bigint;
	DECLARE @APT_TD_ID int;
	DECLARE @APT_TAX_AMOUNT float;

	DECLARE @SearchType int;
	DECLARE @SearchValue varchar(100);

	SET @Type = @m_Type
	SET @Tbl_Type = @m_Tbl_Type

	SET @APR_NO = @m_APR_NO
	SET @APR_DATE = @m_APR_DATE
	SET @APR_DESCRIPTION = @m_APR_DESCRIPTION
	SET @APR_AS_ID = @m_APR_AS_ID
	SET @APR_BANK_ID = @m_APR_BANK_ID
	SET @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT = @m_APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT
	SET @APR_CHQ_NO = @m_APR_CHQ_NO

	SET @AAI_APR_NO = @m_AAI_APR_NO
	SET @AAI_AI_NO = @m_AAI_AI_NO
	SET @AAI_AI_DATE = @m_AAI_AI_DATE
	SET @AAI_AI_AMOUNT = @m_AAI_AI_AMOUNT
	SET @AAI_PEN_AMOUNT = @m_AAI_PEN_AMOUNT
	SET @AAI_ADJUST = @m_AAI_ADJUST
	SET @AAI_AS_ID = @m_AAI_AS_ID

	SET @APT_APR_NO = @m_APT_APR_NO
	SET @APT_TD_ID = @m_APT_TD_ID
	SET @APT_TAX_AMOUNT = @m_APT_TAX_AMOUNT

	SET @SearchType = @m_SearchType
	SET @SearchValue = @m_SearchValue

	IF(@Type = 1)
		BEGIN	
			IF(@Tbl_Type = 1)
				BEGIN	
					Insert Into AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT (APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_AS_ID, APR_BANK_ID, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, APR_CHQ_NO) 
					Values (@APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_AS_ID, @APR_BANK_ID, @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, @APR_CHQ_NO)
			
					Select @APR_NO
				END

			IF(@Tbl_Type = 2)
				BEGIN	
					Insert Into AP_ADJUST_INVOICE (AAI_APR_NO, AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST, AAI_AS_ID) 
					Values (@AAI_APR_NO, @AAI_AI_NO, @AAI_AI_DATE, @AAI_AI_AMOUNT, @AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, @AAI_ADJUST, @AAI_AS_ID)
						
					Select @APR_NO
				END

			IF(@Tbl_Type = 3)
				BEGIN	
					Insert Into AP_PAYMENT_TAX (APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT)
					Values (@APT_APR_NO, @APT_TD_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT)
			
					Select @APR_NO
				END
		END



	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(APR_NO) as lastInvoiceId from AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT 
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 1)
			BEGIN	
				SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_AS_ID, APR_BANK_ID, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, APR_POST,	APR_GL,	
				AS_Supplier_Name, BANK_NAME, BANK_AC_ID, AS_AC_ID, APR_Cancel, apr_Can_date, apr_can_GL, APR_CHQ_NO
				FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V order by APR_NO
			END

		IF(@Tbl_Type = 2)
			BEGIN	
				SELECT AAI_ID, AAI_APR_NO, AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST, AAI_AS_ID, APR_DATE
				FROM AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
			END

		IF(@Tbl_Type = 3)
			BEGIN	
				SELECT APT_ID, APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT, TD_DESCRIPTION, TD_AC_ID,	AS_AC_ID
				FROM AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V 
			END
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 1)
			BEGIN	
				SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_AS_ID, APR_BANK_ID, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, APR_POST,	APR_GL,	
				AS_Supplier_Name, BANK_NAME, BANK_AC_ID, AS_AC_ID, APR_Cancel, apr_Can_date, apr_can_GL, APR_CHQ_NO
				FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
				WHERE APR_NO = @APR_NO
			END

		IF(@Tbl_Type = 2)
			BEGIN	
				SELECT AAI_ID, AAI_APR_NO, AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT, 
				AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST, AAI_AS_ID, APR_DATE,
				(SELECT DISTINCT AI_SUPPLIER_REF FROM AP_INVOICE 
				WHERE AI_NO = AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_NO) AS SUP_REF
				FROM AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
				WHERE AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO
			END

		IF(@Tbl_Type = 3)
			BEGIN	
				SELECT APT_ID, APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT, TD_DESCRIPTION, TD_AC_ID,	AS_AC_ID
				FROM AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V
				WHERE APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO
			END
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select APR_NO from AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
			Where APR_NO = @APR_NO
		)
		BEGIN
		Delete From AP_Adjust_Invoice Where AAI_APR_No = @APR_NO 

		Update AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT Set APR_CANCEL = 1, APR_CAN_DATE = GETDATE() Where APR_NO = @APR_NO
		Select @APR_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_AS_ID, AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, APR_CHQ_NO, 
			APR_POST, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, APR_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME
			FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 

			WHERE APR_NO = Cast(@SearchValue as INT) ORDER BY APR_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_AS_ID, AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, APR_CHQ_NO, 
			APR_POST, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, APR_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME
			FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
			WHERE APR_DESCRIPTION like @SearchValue ORDER BY APR_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_AS_ID, AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, APR_CHQ_NO, 
			APR_POST, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, APR_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME
			FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
			WHERE APR_DATE = Cast(@SearchValue as datetime) ORDER BY APR_NO 
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select APR_NO from AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
			Where APR_No = @APR_NO 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
			Where APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Delete from AP_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Delete from AP_PAYMENT_TAX
			Where APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Select @APR_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 8)
	BEGIN
		Select * from AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
		Where APR_NO = @APR_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 9)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select AAI_APR_NO from AP_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AP_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO
		END

		Select AI_NO as AAI_AI_NO,
		(Select DISTINCT AI_DATE FROM AP_INVOICE WHERE AP_INVOICE.AI_NO = ap_invoice_ageing_v.AI_NO) AS AAI_AI_DATE,
		(SELECT DISTINCT AI_SUPPLIER_REF FROM AP_INVOICE WHERE AI_NO = ap_invoice_ageing_v.AI_NO) AS SUP_REF, 
		SUM(ORG_AMT) AS AAI_AI_AMOUNT,SUM(isnull(PEN_AMT,0)) AS AAI_PEN_AMOUNT 
		from ap_invoice_ageing_v 
		where ai_AS_id= @m_APR_AS_ID 
		GROUP BY AI_NO 
		HAVING Round(SUM(isnull(PEN_AMT,0)),2) <>0 
		--HAVING SUM(PEN_AMT) <> 0 
		ORDER BY AI_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 10)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select APR_NO from AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
			Where APR_No = @APR_NO 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AP_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Select @APR_NO
		END
	END
END

--MODELS
--AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT

--Public bigint APR_NO {get; set;}
--Public datetime APR_DATE {get; set;}
--Public varchar(100) APR_DESCRIPTION {get; set;}
--Public int APR_AS_ID {get; set;}
--Public int APR_BANK_ID {get; set;}
--Public float APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT {get; set;}

--AP_ADJUST_INVOICE

--Public bigint AAI_APR_NO {get; set;}
--Public bigint AAI_AI_NO {get; set;}
--Public datetime AAI_AI_DATE {get; set;}
--Public float AAI_AI_AMOUNT {get; set;}
--Public float AAI_PEN_AMOUNT {get; set;}
--Public float AAI_ADJUST {get; set;}
--Public int AAI_AS_ID {get; set;}

--AP_PAYMENT_TAX

--Public bigint APT_APR_NO {get; set;}
--Public int APT_TD_ID {get; set;}
--Public float APT_TAX_AMOUNT {get; set;}

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AP_Payment_Receipt_With_WO_Inv_sh](@m_Rpt_Type INT, @m_APR_AS_ID INT, @m_Fr_APR_NO INT, @m_To_APR_NO INT, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Rpt_Type INT ;
	DECLARE	@APR_AS_ID INT ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_APR_NO INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_APR_NO INT ;

	DECLARE	@Fr_APR_NO_1 INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_APR_NO_1 INT ;

	DECLARE @By_APR_AS_ID NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_APR_NO NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_APR_DATE NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @Rpt_Type = @m_Rpt_Type
	SET @APR_AS_ID = @m_APR_AS_ID
	SET @Fr_APR_NO = @m_Fr_APR_NO
	SET @TO_APR_NO = @m_TO_APR_NO

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	SET @TO_APR_NO = CASE WHEN @TO_APR_NO > 0 THEN @TO_APR_NO ELSE @Fr_APR_NO END

	SET @TDate = CASE WHEN LEN(@TDate) > 0 THEN @TDate ELSE @FDate END

	SET @By_APR_AS_ID = CASE WHEN (@APR_AS_ID > 0 AND @Fr_APR_NO = 0)  THEN ' AND AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_AS_ID =  ' + CAST(@APR_AS_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
									
	SET @By_APR_NO = CASE WHEN @Fr_APR_NO > 0  THEN ' AND APR_NO BETWEEN ' + CAST(@Fr_APR_NO AS varchar)  + ' AND ' + CAST(@TO_APR_NO AS varchar) + ' ' ELSE '' END

	SET @By_APR_DATE = CASE WHEN (@FDate <> '1900-01-01' AND @Fr_APR_NO = 0) THEN ' AND AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE
		BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + ' '  ELSE '' END


	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_4 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_G_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);


	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_APR_NO) > 0 THEN @By_APR_NO ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_3 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_APR_DATE) > 0 THEN @By_APR_DATE ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_4 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_APR_AS_ID) > 0 THEN @By_APR_AS_ID ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_O_1 = 'ORDER BY AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO '

	IF @Rpt_Type = 1
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_G_1 = 'GROUP BY AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CHQ_NO, 
								AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DESCRIPTION, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_AS_ID '


			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CHQ_NO, 
								AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DESCRIPTION,AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_AS_ID, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, 
								MAX(AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, 
								SUM(AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT) AS APT_TAX_AMOUNT   
								FROM  AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V LEFT JOIN AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V ON AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO
								WHERE 1 = 1 '
		END

	IF @Rpt_Type = 2
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_G_1 = 'GROUP BY AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CHQ_NO,  
								AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DESCRIPTION,  AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.AS_SUPPLIER_NAME,  AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_AS_ID,  
								AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_NO,  AP_INVOICE_V.ai_date,  AP_INVOICE_V.AI_SUPPLIER_REF '

			SET @QUERY_S_1 ='SELECT AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CHQ_NO,  
								AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_AS_ID, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DESCRIPTION,AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, 
								SUM(AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT) AS APT_TAX_AMOUNT,  
								MAX(AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT) AS APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_NO,   
								AP_INVOICE_V.ai_date, MAX(AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.aai_adjust) AS AAI_ADJUST,   AP_INVOICE_V.AI_SUPPLIER_REF   
								FROM  AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V LEFT JOIN AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V ON AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO 
								LEFT JOIN   AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V ON AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO = AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_APR_NO 
								LEFT JOIN   AP_INVOICE_V ON AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_NO = AP_INVOICE_V.AI_NO 
								WHERE 1 = 1 '
		END




	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 + @QUERY_W_3 + @QUERY_W_4 + @QUERY_G_1 + @QUERY_O_1

	--SELECT @Fr_APR_NO, @TO_APR_NO, @m_FDate, @m_TDate, @By_APR_NO, @By_APR_DATE

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AP_Payment_ReceiptPosting_sh]
	@Type int,
	@APR_No int
AS 
BEGIN
	if(@Type = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT APR_NO,APR_Date, AS_SUPPLIER_Name, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.BANK_NAME, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, 
			ISNULL((SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) 
			FROM AP_PAYMENT_TAX 
			WHERE APT_APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO), 0) AS TAX_AMOUNT 
			FROM dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
			WHERE (APR_POST IS NULL) OR (APR_POST = 0) 
			ORDER BY APR_NO
		END

	if(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Update AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT Set APR_POST = 1 Where APR_NO = @APR_NO
	END
	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[AP_SUPPLIER_sh]
	@Type int,
	@ASID int,
	@ASSupplierName Varchar(200),
	@ASstrno varchar(50),
	@ASntnno varchar(50),
	@ASCRDays int,
	@ASaddress varchar(250),
	@ASopbalr Float,
	@CCID varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @ComId AS VARCHAR(100)
	set @ComId = (Select COMBINATION_ID from CODE_COMBINATION_V where CODE_COMBINATION = @CCID)
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO AP_SUPPLIER(
					 AS_Supplier_Name,
					 AS_AC_ID,
					 AS_strno,
					 AS_ntnno,
					 AS_address,
					 AS_opbal_r,
					 CRDays
		)
		SELECT	@ASSupplierName,
				@ComId,
				@ASstrno,
				@ASntnno,
				@ASaddress,
				@ASopbalr,
				@ASCRDays

		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		SELECT AS_ID FROM AP_SUPPLIER
		WHERE AS_ID = @ASID
		)
		BEGIN
			UPDATE AP_SUPPLIER
			SET 
					AS_Supplier_Name = @ASSupplierName,
					AS_AC_ID = @ComId,
					AS_strno = @ASstrno,
					AS_ntnno = @ASntnno,
					AS_address = @ASaddress,
					AS_opbal_r = @ASopbalr,
					CRDays = @ASCRDays
				WHERE AS_ID = @ASID

			SELECT @ASID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT AS_ID
					  ,AS_Supplier_Name
					  ,AS_AC_ID
					  ,AS_strno
					  ,AS_ntnno
					  ,AS_address
					  ,AS_opbal_r
					  ,CRDays
					  ,CODE_COMBINATION
					  ,NAME_COMBINATION

		  FROM AP_SUPPLIER_V
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT AS_ID
					  ,AS_Supplier_Name
					  ,AS_AC_ID
					  ,AS_strno
					  ,AS_ntnno
					  ,AS_address
					  ,AS_opbal_r
					  ,CRDays
					  ,CODE_COMBINATION
					  ,NAME_COMBINATION
		  FROM AP_SUPPLIER_V
		WHERE AS_ID = @ASID
	END	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_Ageing_Report_sh] (@m_AI_CO_ID INT, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@AI_CO_ID INT ;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);

	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @AI_CO_ID = @m_AI_CO_ID

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN @AI_CO_ID > 0 THEN ' AND AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_CO_ID  = ' + STR(@AI_CO_ID) + ''  ELSE '' END

	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	--SELECT dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO, MAX(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
	--SUM(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.ORG_AMT) AS AI_AMT,
	--SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.PEN_AMT, 0)) AS AI_ADJUST, 
	--dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name,MAX(VEHICLE_ENGINENO) as EngineNO,
	--MAX(VEHICLE_DOI) as DOI, (Select Top 1 AI_AO_NO FROM AR_INVOICE WHERE AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO) AS AO_NO 
	--FROM dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING INNER JOIN dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_CO_ID = dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_ID 
	--where dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_DATE<='2023-05-15' 
	---- and (dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_CO_ID = 2726) 
	--GROUP BY  dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name , dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO
	--Having (round(SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.PEN_AMT, 0)),0) <> 0) 
	--ORDER BY  dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name , dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO




	SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO, MAX(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
						SUM(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.ORG_AMT) AS AI_AMT,
						SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.PEN_AMT, 0)) AS AI_ADJUST, 
						dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name,MAX(VEHICLE_ENGINENO) as EngineNO,
						MAX(VEHICLE_DOI) as DOI, (Select Top 1 AI_AO_NO FROM AR_INVOICE WHERE AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO) AS AO_NO 
						FROM dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING INNER JOIN dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_CO_ID = dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_ID 
						WHERE 1 = 1 
						AND  AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_DATE <= ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' '
						+ @QUERY_W_2 + '
						GROUP BY dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name , dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO
						Having (round(SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.PEN_AMT, 0)),0) <> 0) 
						ORDER BY  dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name , dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING.AI_NO '


	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_AP_LedgerReport_sh](@m_Type INT, @m_Fr_ID BIGINT, @m_To_ID BIGINT, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Type INT;
	DECLARE	@Fr_ID INT ;
	DECLARE	@To_ID INT ;

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	DECLARE @OP_DATE VARCHAR(25);

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_4 NVARCHAR(MAX);

	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @Type = @m_Type
	SET @Fr_ID = @m_Fr_ID
	SET @To_ID = @m_To_ID

	SET @To_ID = CASE WHEN @To_ID = 0  THEN @Fr_ID ELSE @To_ID END



	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	SET @OP_DATE = DATEADD(day,-1,@FDate)   

	IF @Type = 1
		BEGIN
			SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN @Fr_ID != 0 THEN ' AND AS_ID BETWEEN ' + STR(@Fr_ID) + ' AND ' + STR(@To_ID) ELSE ' ' END 

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT AS_ID AS CODE,''' +  @OP_DATE + ''' AS TRANS_DATE, 0 AS JV_NO, 
			SUM(Amount) AS DEBIT, 
			0 AS CREDIT, ' +
			'''Opening Balance B/F ....'''+' AS REMARKS, 
			(SELECT as_supplier_name FROM AP_Supplier WHERE as_id=ap_pre_ledger_v.as_id) AS DESCR, ' +
			'''-'''+' AS APR_CHQ_NO
			FROM ap_pre_ledger_v  WHERE 1 = 1 
			AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),MM,121) < ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''') ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
			GROUP BY AS_ID
			UNION ALL 
			SELECT AS_ID AS CODE, TRANS_DATE, JV_NO, DEBIT, CREDIT, REMARKS, DESCR, APR_CHQ_NO
			FROM ap_ledger_Trans_v WHERE 1 = 1
			AND  Trans_date
				BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
			ORDER BY 1, 2, 3 '
		END

	IF @Type = 2
		BEGIN
			SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN @Fr_ID != 0 THEN ' AND CO_ID BETWEEN ' + STR(@Fr_ID) + ' AND ' + STR(@To_ID) ELSE ' ' END 

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT CO_ID AS CODE,''' +  @OP_DATE + ''' AS TRANS_DATE, 0 AS JV_NO, 
			SUM(Amount) AS DEBIT, 
			0 AS CREDIT, ' +
			'''Opening Balance B/F ....'''+' AS REMARKS, 
			(SELECT CO_COMPANY_NAME FROM AR_COMPANIES WHERE CO_ID = AR_PRE_LEDGER_V.CO_ID) AS DESCR
			FROM AR_PRE_LEDGER_V  WHERE 1 = 1 
			AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),MM,121) < ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''') ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
			GROUP BY CO_ID
			UNION ALL 
			SELECT CO_ID AS CODE, TRANS_DATE, JV_NO, DEBIT, CREDIT, REMARKS, DESCR
			FROM AR_LEDGER_TRANS_V WHERE 1 = 1
			AND  Trans_date
				BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + @QUERY_W_2 + '
			ORDER BY 1, 2, 3 '
		END


	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY, @QUERY_S_1

	--SELECT @Segment1, @Segment2, @Segment3, @Segment4

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

--EXEC AR_AP_Payment_Receipt_Voucher_sh
--@m_RptType = 1, 
--@m_CO_ID = 0,
--@m_Fr_APR_NO = 0, 
--@m_To_APR_NO = 0,
--@m_FDate = '2022-07-01',
--@m_TDate = '2023-09-25' 

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_AP_Payment_Receipt_Voucher_sh](@m_RptType INT, @m_CO_ID INT, @m_Fr_APR_NO INT, @m_To_APR_NO INT, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@RptType INT ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_APR_NO INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_APR_NO INT ;
	DECLARE	@CO_ID INT ;

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	DECLARE	@Fr_APR_NO_1 INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_APR_NO_1 INT ;

	SET @RptType = @m_RptType
	SET @CO_ID = @m_CO_ID
	SET @Fr_APR_NO = @m_Fr_APR_NO
	SET @TO_APR_NO = @m_TO_APR_NO
	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	--SET @OP_DATE = DATEADD(day,-1,@FDate)   

	DECLARE @By_APR_NO NVARCHAR(MAX) ;
	DECLARE @By_DATE NVARCHAR(MAX) ;
	DECLARE @By_CO_ID NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @TO_APR_NO = CASE WHEN @TO_APR_NO > 0 THEN @TO_APR_NO ELSE @Fr_APR_NO END
								
	SET @By_APR_NO = CASE WHEN @Fr_APR_NO > 0  THEN ' AND APR_NO BETWEEN ' + STR(@Fr_APR_NO)  + ' AND ' + STR(@TO_APR_NO) +' ' ELSE '' END
	
	SET @By_DATE = CASE WHEN (@FDate <> '1900-01-01' AND @Fr_APR_NO = 0)  THEN ' AND  APR_DATE
		BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' '  ELSE '' END
    
	SET @By_CO_ID = CASE WHEN (@CO_ID > 0 AND @Fr_APR_NO = 0) THEN ' AND CO_ID =  ' + CAST(@CO_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
	

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_4 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);


	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_APR_NO) > 0 THEN @By_APR_NO ELSE '' END
	SET @QUERY_W_3 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_DATE) > 0 THEN @By_DATE ELSE '' END
	SET @QUERY_W_4 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_CO_ID) > 0 THEN @By_CO_ID ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_O_1 = ' ORDER BY APR_NO '

	IF @RptType = 1
		Begin
										--SELECT STRING_AGG(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(max),AAI_AI_NO),',' )
			----SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT *, (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(max),AAI_AI_NO), ' + ''',''' + ') 
			----								FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE 
			----								WHERE AAI_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V.APR_NO GROUP by AAI_APR_NO)  as INV_Detail
			----					FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V WHERE 1 = 1 AND APR_NO > 0  '

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT *, (SELECT STUFF(
													   (SELECT '', '' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), AAI_AI_NO)
														FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE
														WHERE AAI_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V.APR_NO
														FOR XML PATH(''''), TYPE).value(''.'', ''NVARCHAR(MAX)''), 
													   1, 1, '''') 
												   ) AS INV_Detail
								FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V WHERE 1 = 1 AND APR_NO > 0  '




		End

	IF @RptType = 2
		Begin	

			--SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, CO_ID AS APR_CO_ID, Company_name AS CO_COMPANY_NAME, 
			--					co_address,	APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME, apr_receipt_amount, APT_TD_ID, TM_DESCRIPTION, APT_TAX_AMOUNT,
			--					APR_CHQ_NO, '''' AS PostedBy, (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(max),AAI_AI_NO), ' + ''',''' + ') FROM AP_ADJUST_INVOICE WHERE AAI_APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V.APR_NO GROUP by AAI_APR_NO)  as INV_Detail
			--			select *		FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V WHERE 1 = 1 AND APR_NO > 0  '
		
			  ----SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, CO_ID AS APR_CO_ID, Company_name AS CO_COMPANY_NAME, 
					----			co_address,	APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME, apr_receipt_amount, APT_TD_ID, TM_DESCRIPTION, APT_TAX_AMOUNT,
					----			APR_CHQ_NO, '''' AS PostedBy, (SELECT STRING_AGG(CONVERT(NVARCHAR(max), AAI_AI_NO), '','') 
					----		    FROM AP_ADJUST_INVOICE 
					----		    WHERE AAI_APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V.APR_NO 
					----		    GROUP BY AAI_APR_NO) AS INV_Detail
					----			FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V
					----			WHERE 1 = 1 AND APR_NO > 0 '


			  SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, CO_ID AS APR_CO_ID, Company_name AS CO_COMPANY_NAME, 
								co_address,	APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME, apr_receipt_amount, APT_TD_ID, TM_DESCRIPTION, APT_TAX_AMOUNT,
								APR_CHQ_NO, '''' AS PostedBy, (SELECT STUFF(
													   (SELECT '', '' + CONVERT(NVARCHAR(MAX), AAI_AI_NO)
														FROM AP_ADJUST_INVOICE
														WHERE AAI_APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V.APR_NO
														FOR XML PATH(''''), TYPE).value(''.'', ''NVARCHAR(MAX)''), 
													   1, 1, '''') 
												   ) AS INV_Detail
								FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V
								WHERE 1 = 1 AND APR_NO > 0 '
		
		End

	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 + @QUERY_W_3 + @QUERY_W_4 + @QUERY_O_1

	--SELECT @Fr_APR_NO, @TO_APR_NO, @m_FDate, @m_TDate, @By_APR_NO, @By_AI_Date

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_BillsPosting_sh]
	@Type int,
	@AI_NO BIGINT,
	@COID int,
	@Start_Date varchar(100),
	@End_Date varchar(100),
	@AI_NO_EngNo varchar(50)
	--@Status varchar(15)
AS 
BEGIN

	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Declare @queryData nvarchar(MAX);
		SET @queryData = 
		--'
		--select status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_BILL_POST, AI_TYPE, sum(Invoice_amount) as AI_AMT
		--from 
		--(SELECT ''Invoice'' AS Status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_BILL_POST, AI_TYPE,
		--CASE WHEN td_age IS NULL THEN ai_amount ELSE ai_amount + ROUND((ai_amount * (td_Age / 100)), 0) END AS Invoice_amount, 0 AS ACN_AI_NO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI,
		--CASE WHEN ai_no = inv1 THEN ''Fresh'' ELSE ''Renewal'' END AS Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID
		--FROM   dbo.AR_INVOICE_V WITH (NOLOCK)
		--WHERE (AI_CANCEL IS NULL)) as abc
		--Where AI_BILL_POST is null' 


	'
	SELECT status,ai_no,ai_date,ai_type,CO_COMPANY_NAME,SUM(INVOICE_AMOUNT) AS AI_AMT 
	FROM AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V 
	WHERE AI_POST IS NULL
	'


		
		SET @queryData = @queryData + 
		CASE WHEN @AI_NO != 0 THEN ' AND AI_NO = ' + str(@AI_NO) ELSE '' END +
		CASE WHEN @COID != 0 THEN ' AND AI_CO_ID = ' + str(@COID) ELSE '' END +
		CASE WHEN @Start_Date != '' AND @End_Date != '' THEN ' AND AI_DATE BETWEEN CAST(''' + @Start_Date + ''' AS DATETIME) AND CAST(''' + @End_Date + ''' AS DATETIME)' ELSE '' END;
		
		--SET @queryData = @queryData + ' group by status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_BILL_POST, AI_TYPE';


			SET @queryData = @queryData + ' 
											GROUP BY [status],ai_no,ai_date,ai_type,CO_COMPANY_NAME 
											HAVING SUM(INVOICE_AMOUNT) <> 0
											ORDER BY ai_no
											'


	--select @queryData
		EXEC sp_executesql @queryData;
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Update AR_INVOICE Set AI_BILL_POST = 1, AI_POST = 1 Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_BILL_POST, AI_TYPE, SUM(Invoice_amount) AS AI_AMT
	FROM (
    SELECT 'Invoice' AS Status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_BILL_POST, AI_TYPE,
           CASE WHEN td_age IS NULL THEN ai_amount ELSE ai_amount + ROUND((ai_amount * (td_Age / 100)), 0) END AS Invoice_amount,
           0 AS ACN_AI_NO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI,
           CASE WHEN ai_no = inv1 THEN 'Fresh' ELSE 'Renewal' END AS Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID
    FROM dbo.AR_INVOICE_V WITH (NOLOCK)
    WHERE AI_CANCEL IS NULL
	) AS abc
	WHERE AI_BILL_POST IS NULL
	AND (
		(@AI_NO = 0 OR AI_NO = @AI_NO)
		AND (@COID = 0 OR AI_CO_ID = @COID)
		AND (@Start_Date = '' OR @End_Date = '' OR AI_DATE BETWEEN CAST(@Start_Date AS DATETIME) AND CAST(@End_Date AS DATETIME))
	)
	GROUP BY status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_BILL_POST, AI_TYPE;

	END

	IF(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		SELECT distinct AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name FROM AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V
		Where AI_POST is null
	END

	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		IF (LEN(@AI_NO_EngNo) > 0 )
			BEGIN
				SELECT Distinct  AI_NO, AI_AO_NO,AI_VEHICLE_MAKE,AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO 
				FROM AR_INVOICE_V with (nolock)
				where not AI_NO is null 
				--and ai_date >= '2024-01-01'
				and (CAST(AI_AO_NO as varchar) = @AI_NO_EngNo 
				OR  AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO = @AI_NO_EngNo
				OR AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = @AI_NO_EngNo) --263853
				ORDER BY AI_NO DESC
			END

				SELECT DISTINCT	AI.AI_NO, AI.AI_AO_NO, AI.AI_vehicle_make, AI.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO
				FROM     AR_INVOICE_V AI,  Update_AR_INVOICE_INFO_SELECTED AII
				WHERE 1 = 1 
				AND (CAST(AI.AI_AO_NO AS VARCHAR) = cast(AII.AI_AO_NO as varchar) 
				OR AI.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO = cast(AII.AI_AO_NO as varchar) 
				OR AI.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = cast(AII.AI_AO_NO as varchar)
				OR AI.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO = cast(AII.AI_AO_NO as varchar))				
				ORDER BY AI.AI_AO_NO DESC
	END

	IF(@Type = 6)
		BEGIN
			--DELETE FROM Update_AR_INVOICE_INFO_SELECTED;
			INSERT INTO Update_AR_INVOICE_INFO_SELECTED (AI_AO_NO) VALUES (@AI_NO_EngNo);
		END

	IF(@Type = 7)
		BEGIN
			TRUNCATE TABLE Update_AR_INVOICE_INFO_SELECTED;
			
		END


END	


--EXEC AR_BillsPosting_sh
--	@Type  = 5,
--	@AI_NO  = 0,
--	@COID  = 0,
--	@Start_Date ='',
--	@End_Date = '',
--	@AI_NO_EngNo = ''

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[AR_Companies_sh]
	@Type int,
	@COID int,
	@CRDAYS int,
	@COCompanyID int,
	@COCompanyName Varchar(200),
	@COACID varchar(50),
	@COstrno varchar(50),
	@COntnno varchar(50),
	@COaddress varchar(250),
	@COopbalr Float,
	@CCID varchar(50)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @ComId AS VARCHAR(100)
	set @ComId = (Select COMBINATION_ID from CODE_COMBINATION_V where CODE_COMBINATION = @CCID)
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO AR_Companies(
					CRDays,
					CO_Company_Id,
					CO_Company_Name,
					CO_AC_ID,
					co_strno,
					co_ntnno,
					co_address,
					co_opbal_r
		)
		SELECT		@CRDAYS,
					@COCompanyID,
					@COCompanyName,
					@ComId,
					@COstrno,
					@COntnno,
					@COaddress,
					@COopbalr

		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		SELECT CO_ID FROM AR_Companies
		WHERE CO_ID = @COID
		)
		BEGIN
			UPDATE AR_Companies
			SET
				CRDays = @CRDAYS,
				CO_Company_Id = @COCompanyID,
				CO_Company_Name = @COCompanyName,
				CO_AC_ID = @ComId,
				co_strno = @COstrno,
				co_ntnno = @COntnno,
				co_address = @COaddress,
				co_opbal_r = @COopbalr
			WHERE CO_ID = @COID

			SELECT @COID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT CO_ID,
			  CRDays,
			  CO_Company_Id,
			  CO_Company_Name,
			  CO_AC_ID,
			  co_strno,
			  co_ntnno,
			  co_address,
			  co_opbal_r,
			  CODE_COMBINATION,
			  NAME_COMBINATION
		  FROM AR_COMPANIES_V
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT CO_ID,
			  CRDays,
			  CO_Company_Id,
			  CO_Company_Name,
			  CO_AC_ID,
			  co_strno,
			  co_ntnno,
			  co_address,
			  co_opbal_r,
			  CODE_COMBINATION,
			  NAME_COMBINATION
		  FROM AR_COMPANIES_V
		WHERE CO_ID = @COID
	END	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[AR_Entries_Transfer_To_GL_sh] 
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE @CNT AS INT

	DECLARE @MJVNO AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER cursor
	DECLARE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES cursor

	DECLARE @AI_NO AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @AI_DATE AS DATETIME

	DECLARE @AI_REMARKS AS VARCHAR(255)

	DECLARE @AI_IM_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @TM_DESCRIPTION AS VARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @IM_AC_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @IM_DESCRIPTION AS VARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @CO_COMPANY_NAME AS VARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @AI_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @CO_AC_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @TD_AC_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @AI_AC_ID AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @LAST_NO AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @mTNo AS VARCHAR(4)

	DECLARE @mRmks AS VARCHAR(255)

	DECLARE @TD_AGE AS FLOAT

	DECLARE @mTax AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @mCR FLOAT
	DECLARE @mDR FLOAT

	DECLARE @MHID AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER cursor
	DECLARE @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES cursor

	DECLARE @APR_NO AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @APT_APR_NO AS BIGINT
	
	DECLARE @APR_DATE AS DATETIME
	DECLARE @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @APR_DESCRIPTION AS VARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @BANK_AC_ID AS BIGINT 
	DECLARE @APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @mAMOUNT AS FLOAT

	DECLARE @mENTRYTYPEID AS INT
    DECLARE @mENTRYNO AS INT

	DECLARE @mUE_CNT AS INT

	DECLARE @ACN_NO AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @ACN_DATE AS DATETIME
	DECLARE @ACN_NAME AS VARCHAR(50)
	DECLARE @ACN_AMOUNT AS FLOAT

	DECLARE @mDRAdj AS FLOAT
    DECLARE @mCRAdj AS FLOAT
    DECLARE @mTotDRAdj AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @mBalCRAdj AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @CNT_CHK_ADJ AS INT
	DECLARE @IM_AC_ID_UE AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @ACN_IM_ID AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @APR_BANK_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @APR_TAX_CNT AS INT
	DECLARE @APT_TD_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @TD_DESCRIPTION AS VARCHAR(255)

--==================================================--
--------------	01 - AR INVOICE POSTING	--------------
--==================================================--
	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(AI_NO) FROM AR_Invoice_V WHERE AI_POST = 1 AND AI_INV_GL IS NULL)	
	--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
											SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO, AI_DATE
											From AR_INVOICE_V 
											Where AI_POST  = 1 AND AI_INV_GL IS NULL
											ORDER BY AI_NO
			OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------
				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@AI_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Against Invoice No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@AI_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Receivable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

				--SELECT @MHID, @mTNo, @MJVNO, @mRmks, @AI_NO, @AI_DATE  --, @AI_REMARKS, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @CNT, @AI_AMOUNT, @CO_COMPANY_NAME

		--------------------------------------------------

		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------
				SET @AI_No_Cursor_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
				SELECT AI_NO, AI_DATE, CO_COMPANY_NAME, IM_DESCRIPTION, AI_AMOUNT, TD_AC_ID, 
				TD_AGE, CO_AC_ID, @IM_AC_ID, @TM_DESCRIPTION, @AI_IM_ID
				From AR_Invoice_V 
				Where AI_NO  = @AI_NO AND AI_POST  = 1 AND  AI_INV_GL IS NULL 
				ORDER BY AI_NO	
										
				OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, 
				@TD_AGE, @CO_AC_ID, @IM_AC_ID, @TM_DESCRIPTION, @AI_IM_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Debit to Company
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ',@IM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)

					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN
							SET @mDR = ROUND(@AI_AMOUNT+(@AI_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)	
						END
					ELSE
						BEGIN
							SET @mDR = @AI_AMOUNT
						END

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @CO_AC_ID)

		--	Credit To Elements

					SET @mCR = @AI_AMOUNT
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mCR, @IM_AC_ID)
          
		--	 Credit to Taxes
					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN        
							SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ', @TM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
							SET @mCR = ROUND((@AI_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)							

							Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
							(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
							VALUES 
							(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mCR, @TD_AC_ID)						
						END

		--	Saving Invoice In Un Earned For Earned Data

					SET @mENTRYTYPEID = 1
					SET @mENTRYNO = 0
					SET @mUE_CNT = (SELECT COUNT(IM_ID_UE) FROM AR_UE_ELEMENTS WHERE IM_ID_UE =  @AI_IM_ID)
					IF (@mUE_CNT > 0)
						BEGIN
						INSERT INTO AR_UE_MSTR (ENTRYTYPEID,ENTRYNO,JE_HEADER_ID, AI_NO,AI_DATE,VCHSTATUS,
									AI_IM_ID,JE_AC_ID,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR) 
						VALUES (@mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO,@MHID, @AI_NO,@AI_DATE, 'Invoice', @AI_IM_ID, @IM_ac_id, 0,@AI_AMOUNT)

						END
						FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE,@AI_REMARKS, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @TD_AC_ID, @TD_AGE, @AI_AC_ID
					END
					Close @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES

					UPDATE AR_Invoice set AI_INV_GL = 1 WHERE AI_NO =  @AI_NO AND AI_POST = 1 and AI_INV_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

--==================================================--
---------	02 - AR CANCEL INVOICE POSTING	----------
--==================================================--
	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(AI_NO) FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_CANCEL = 1 AND AI_CAN_GL IS NULL)
		--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
			SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO, AI_DATE
			FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
			WHERE AI_CANCEL = 1 AND AI_CAN_GL IS NULL
			ORDER BY AI_NO

			OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------
				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@AI_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Reversal of Invoice No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@AI_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Receivable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

				--SELECT @MHID, @mTNo, @MJVNO, @mRmks, @AI_NO, @AI_DATE  --, @AI_REMARKS, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @CNT, @AI_AMOUNT, @CO_COMPANY_NAME

		-------------------------------

		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------
				SET @AI_No_Cursor_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
				SELECT AI_NO, AI_DATE, CO_COMPANY_NAME, IM_DESCRIPTION, AI_AMOUNT, TD_AC_ID, 
				TD_AGE, CO_AC_ID, @IM_AC_ID, @TM_DESCRIPTION, @AI_IM_ID
				From AR_Invoice_V 
				Where AI_NO = @AI_NO AND AI_POST  = 1 AND AI_CANCEL = 1 AND AI_CAN_GL IS NULL 
				ORDER BY AI_NO	
										
				OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, 
				@TD_AGE, @CO_AC_ID, @IM_AC_ID, @TM_DESCRIPTION, @AI_IM_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Debit to Company
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ',@IM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)

					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN
							SET @mCR = ROUND(@AI_AMOUNT+(@AI_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)	
						END
					ELSE
						BEGIN
							SET @mCR = @AI_AMOUNT
						END

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mCR, @CO_AC_ID)

		--	Credit To Elements

					SET @mDR = @AI_AMOUNT
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @IM_AC_ID)
          
		--	 Credit to Taxes
					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN        
							SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ', @TM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
							SET @mDR = ROUND((@AI_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)							

							Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
							(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
							VALUES 
							(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @TD_AC_ID)						
						END

		--	Saving Invoice In Un Earned For Earned Data

					SET @mENTRYTYPEID = 1
					SET @mENTRYNO = 0
					SET @mUE_CNT = (SELECT COUNT(IM_ID_UE) FROM AR_UE_ELEMENTS WHERE IM_ID_UE =  @AI_IM_ID)
					IF (@mUE_CNT > 0)
						BEGIN
						INSERT INTO AR_UE_MSTR (ENTRYTYPEID,ENTRYNO,JE_HEADER_ID, AI_NO,AI_DATE,VCHSTATUS,
									AI_IM_ID,JE_AC_ID,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR) 
						VALUES (@mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO,@MHID, @AI_NO,@AI_DATE, 'Invoice Cancel', @AI_IM_ID, @IM_ac_id,@AI_AMOUNT, 0)

						END
						FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE,@AI_REMARKS, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @TD_AC_ID, @TD_AGE, @AI_AC_ID
					END
					Close @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES

					UPDATE AR_Invoice set AI_CAN_GL = 1 WHERE AI_NO =  @AI_NO AND AI_CANCEL = 1 and AI_CAN_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

--==================================================--
--------------	03 - AR Debit / Credit Memo	--------------
--==================================================--

	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(ACN_NO) FROM AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V WHERE ACN_POST = 1 AND ACN_INV_GL IS NULL)	
	--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
			SELECT DISTINCT ACN_NO, ACN_DATE, ACN_NAME
			From AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V
			Where ACN_POST = 1 AND ACN_INV_GL IS NULL
			ORDER BY ACN_NO

			OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER

			FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @ACN_NO, @ACN_DATE, @ACN_NAME

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN

		--		Debit GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------
				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@AI_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Against Memo No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@AI_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Receivable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

				--SELECT @MHID, @mTNo, @MJVNO, @mRmks, @AI_NO, @AI_DATE  --, @AI_REMARKS, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @CNT, @AI_AMOUNT, @CO_COMPANY_NAME

		--------------------------------------------------

		--		Debit GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------
				SET @AI_No_Cursor_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
				SELECT ACN_NO, ACN_DATE, CO_COMPANY_NAME, IM_DESCRIPTION, ACN_AMOUNT, TD_AC_ID, 
				TD_AGE, CO_AC_ID, IM_AC_ID, TM_DESCRIPTION, ACN_IM_ID
				From AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V 
				Where ACN_NO  = @ACN_NO AND ACN_POST  = 1 AND  ACN_INV_GL IS NULL 
				ORDER BY ACN_NO	
										
				OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @ACN_NO, @ACN_DATE, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @ACN_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, 
				@TD_AGE, @CO_AC_ID, @IM_AC_ID, @TM_DESCRIPTION, @ACN_IM_ID
				
				IF (@ACN_NAME = 'Debit Memo')
				BEGIN
					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Debit to Company
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ',@IM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On DM No : ', @ACN_NO)

					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN
							SET @mDR = ROUND(@ACN_AMOUNT+(@ACN_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)	
						END
					ELSE
						BEGIN
							SET @mDR = @ACN_AMOUNT
						END

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @CO_AC_ID)

		--	Credit To Elements

					SET @mCR = @ACN_AMOUNT
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mCR, @IM_AC_ID)
          
		--	 Credit to Taxes
					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN        
							SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ', @TM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On DM No : ', @ACN_NO)
							SET @mCR = ROUND((@ACN_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)							

							Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
							(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
							VALUES 
							(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mCR, @TD_AC_ID)						
						END

		--	Saving Invoice In Un Earned For Earned Data

					SET @mENTRYTYPEID = 1
					SET @mENTRYNO = 0
					SET @mUE_CNT = (SELECT COUNT(IM_ID_UE) FROM AR_UE_ELEMENTS WHERE IM_ID_UE =  @ACN_IM_ID)
					IF (@mUE_CNT > 0)
						BEGIN
						INSERT INTO AR_UE_MSTR (ENTRYTYPEID,ENTRYNO,JE_HEADER_ID, AI_NO,AI_DATE,VCHSTATUS,
									AI_IM_ID,JE_AC_ID,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR) 
						VALUES (@mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO,@MHID, @ACN_NO,@ACN_DATE, 'Debit Memo', @ACN_IM_ID, @IM_ac_id, 0,@ACN_AMOUNT)

						END
						FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO  @ACN_NO, @ACN_DATE, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @ACN_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, 
				@TD_AGE, @CO_AC_ID, @IM_AC_ID, @TM_DESCRIPTION, @ACN_IM_ID
					END
					Close @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
				END	

				ELSE
			--=====================	      Credit Memo		===========================
				BEGIN
					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Credit to Company
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ',@IM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On CM No : ', @ACN_NO)

					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN
							SET @mCR = ROUND(@ACN_AMOUNT+(@ACN_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)	
						END
					ELSE
						BEGIN
							SET @mCR = @ACN_AMOUNT
						END

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mCR, @CO_AC_ID)

		--	Debit To Elements

					SET @mDR = @ACN_AMOUNT
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @IM_AC_ID)
          
		--	 Debit to Taxes
					IF (@TD_AGE IS NOT NULL) 
						BEGIN        
							SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@CO_COMPANY_NAME, ' - ', @TM_DESCRIPTION, ' - ', ' On CM No : ', @ACN_NO)
							SET @mDR = ROUND((@ACN_AMOUNT*((@TD_AGE/100))),0)							

							Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
							(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
							VALUES 
							(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @TD_AC_ID)						
						END

		--Un Earned Check Adjustment For Credit Memo

		DECLARE @UN_EARNED_CHK_ADJ_CM AS CURSOR

		SET @mDR = @ACN_AMOUNT

		SET @UN_EARNED_CHK_ADJ_CM = CURSOR FOR 
		SELECT COUNT(AI_NO) AS CNT_CHK_ADJ, AI_NO, AI_IM_ID, SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) AS DR, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) AS CR  FROM dbo.AR_UE_MSTR
        Where AI_NO = @ACN_NO And AI_IM_ID = @AI_IM_ID
        GROUP BY AI_NO, AI_IM_ID

		OPEN @UN_EARNED_CHK_ADJ_CM
		FETCH NEXT FROM @UN_EARNED_CHK_ADJ_CM INTO @CNT_CHK_ADJ,@AI_NO, @AI_IM_ID, @mDRAdj, @mCRAdj
		SET @mTotDRAdj = @mDR + @mDRAdj

		IF (@CNT_CHK_ADJ > 0)
			BEGIN
				IF (@mCRAdj - @mTotDRAdj) > 0 Or (@mCRAdj - @mTotDRAdj) = 0 
					BEGIN
						Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
						(JE_HEADER_ID,JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR,JE_AC_ID) 
						VALUES 
						(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @IM_AC_ID)
					END
					If (@mCRAdj - @mTotDRAdj) < 0 
					BEGIN
						Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
						(JE_HEADER_ID,JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR,JE_AC_ID) 
						VALUES 
						(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @IM_AC_ID)
					
						SET @mBalCRAdj = @mTotDRAdj - @mCRAdj

						Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
						(JE_HEADER_ID,JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR,JE_AC_ID) 
						VALUES 
						(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mBalCRAdj, @IM_AC_ID)

                        SET @IM_AC_ID_UE = (SELECT DISTINCT IM_AC_ID_UE From AR_UE_ELEMENTS Where IM_ID_UE = @AI_IM_ID)
						
						IF (@IM_AC_ID_UE > 0)
						BEGIN
							Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
							(JE_HEADER_ID,JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR,JE_AC_ID) 
							VALUES 
							(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mBalCRAdj, @IM_AC_ID_UE)
						END
					END
			END
			ELSE
			BEGIN
				Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
				(JE_HEADER_ID,JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR,JE_AC_ID) 
				VALUES 
				(@MHID, @mRmks, @mBalCRAdj, 0, @IM_AC_ID)
			END

		FETCH NEXT FROM @UN_EARNED_CHK_ADJ_CM INTO @AI_NO, @AI_IM_ID, @mDRAdj, @mCRAdj

		Close @UN_EARNED_CHK_ADJ_CM
		DEALLOCATE @UN_EARNED_CHK_ADJ_CM

		--	Saving Invoice In Un Earned For Earned Data

					SET @mENTRYTYPEID = 1
					SET @mENTRYNO = 0
					SET @mUE_CNT = (SELECT COUNT(IM_ID_UE) FROM AR_UE_ELEMENTS WHERE IM_ID_UE =  @AI_IM_ID)
					IF (@mUE_CNT > 0)
						BEGIN
						INSERT INTO AR_UE_MSTR (ENTRYTYPEID,ENTRYNO,JE_HEADER_ID, AI_NO,AI_DATE,VCHSTATUS,
									AI_IM_ID,JE_AC_ID,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR) 
						VALUES (@mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO,@MHID, @ACN_NO,@ACN_DATE, 'Credit Memo', @ACN_IM_ID, @IM_ac_id, 0,@ACN_AMOUNT)

                    If (@mCRAdj - @mTotDRAdj) < 0 
					BEGIN
					Insert Into AR_UE_MSTR (ENTRYTYPEID,ENTRYNO,JE_HEADER_ID, AI_NO,AI_DATE,VCHSTATUS,AI_IM_ID,JE_AC_ID,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR) 
					VALUES (@mENTRYTYPEID,@mENTRYNO,@MHID,@ACN_NO, @ACN_DATE, 'Credit Memo Adj',@ACN_IM_ID, @IM_ac_id, 0, @mBalCRAdj)
					END

						END
						FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO  @ACN_NO, @ACN_DATE, @CO_COMPANY_NAME, @ACN_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, 
				@TD_AGE, @CO_AC_ID, @IM_AC_ID, @TM_DESCRIPTION, @ACN_IM_ID
					END
					Close @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
				END


					UPDATE AR_CREDIT_NOTE set ACN_INV_GL = 1 WHERE ACN_NO =  @ACN_NO AND ACN_POST = 1 and ACN_INV_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE, @ACN_NAME
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER

		END
--==================================================--
---------	04 - AR PAYMENT RECEIPT POSTING	----------
--==================================================--

	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(APR_NO) FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE APR_POST = 1 AND APR_GL IS NULL)
		--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, CO_AC_ID, APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, Bank_ac_id, APR_BANK_ID
												FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
												WHERE APR_POST  = 1 AND APR_GL IS NULL
												ORDER BY APR_NO	
			OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @CO_AC_ID, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, @Bank_ac_id, @APR_BANK_ID

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------

				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@APR_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@APR_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Payment Receipt No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@APR_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Receivable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

					
		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------

		--   Debit to Customer

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, 0, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, @CO_AC_ID)

		--   Credit In Bank
            
					Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0, @BANK_AC_ID)


		--------------------------------------------------

		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL FOR TAX
		--		------------------------------

		SET @APR_TAX_CNT = (SELECT COUNT(APT_APR_NO) FROM AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V WHERE APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO)
		
		IF (@APR_TAX_CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
				SET @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT, TD_DESCRIPTION, TD_AC_ID
												FROM AR_Payment_Tax_V
												WHERE APT_APR_NO  = @APR_NO
												ORDER BY APT_APR_NO
										
				 OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
				 FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TD_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_DESCRIPTION, @TD_AC_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN					
		--   Debit to Tax

				IF (@APT_TAX_AMOUNT > 0)
				BEGIN
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 0, @TD_AC_ID)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @TD_DESCRIPTION, 0, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @CO_AC_ID)
				END
				ELSE
				BEGIN
		--   Credit to Supplier          
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, 0, ABS(@APT_TAX_AMOUNT), @TD_AC_ID)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @TD_DESCRIPTION, ABS(@APT_TAX_AMOUNT), 0, @CO_AC_ID)
				END
						FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TD_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_DESCRIPTION, @TD_AC_ID
					END
					Close @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
			END
				UPDATE AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT set APR_GL = 1 WHERE APR_NO =  @APR_NO AND APR_POST = 1 AND APR_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @CO_AC_ID, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, @Bank_ac_id, @APR_BANK_ID
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

--==========================================================--
---------	05 - Payment Receipt (REVERSE) POSTING	----------
--==========================================================--

	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(APR_NO) FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE apr_cancel=1 and apr_can_gl is null)
		--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, CO_AC_ID, APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, Bank_ac_id, APR_BANK_ID
												FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
												WHERE apr_cancel=1 and apr_can_gl is null
												ORDER BY APR_NO	
			OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @CO_AC_ID, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, @Bank_ac_id, @APR_BANK_ID

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------

				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@APR_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@APR_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Reversal of Receipt No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@APR_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Receivable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

					
		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------

		--   Debit to Customer

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, CONCAT('CANCEL',@APR_DESCRIPTION), @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0, @CO_AC_ID)

		--   Credit In Bank
            
					Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, CONCAT('CANCEL', @APR_DESCRIPTION), 0, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, @BANK_AC_ID)

		--------------------------------------
		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL FOR TAX
		--		------------------------------

		SET @APR_TAX_CNT = (SELECT COUNT(APT_APR_NO) FROM AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V WHERE APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO)
		
		IF (@APR_TAX_CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
				SET @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT, TD_DESCRIPTION, TD_AC_ID
												FROM AR_Payment_Tax_V
												WHERE APT_APR_NO  = @APR_NO
												ORDER BY APT_APR_NO
										
				 OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
				 FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TD_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_DESCRIPTION, @TD_AC_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN					
		--   Debit to Tax

				IF (@APT_TAX_AMOUNT > 0)
					BEGIN
						INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
						(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
						VALUES 
						(@MHID, CONCAT('CANCEL',@APR_DESCRIPTION), @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 0, @TD_AC_ID)

						INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
						(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
						VALUES 
						(@MHID, CONCAT('CANCEL',@TD_DESCRIPTION), 0, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @CO_AC_ID)
					END
				ELSE
					BEGIN
			--   Credit to Supplier          
						INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
						(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
						VALUES 
						(@MHID, CONCAT('CANCEL',@APR_DESCRIPTION), ABS(@APT_TAX_AMOUNT), 0, @TD_AC_ID)

						INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
						(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
						VALUES 
						(@MHID, CONCAT('CANCEL',@TD_DESCRIPTION), 0, ABS(@APT_TAX_AMOUNT), @CO_AC_ID)
					END
						FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TD_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_DESCRIPTION, @TD_AC_ID
					END
					Close @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
			END 
			
				UPDATE AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT set apr_can_gl = 1 WHERE APR_NO =  @APR_NO AND apr_cancel=1 and apr_can_gl IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @CO_AC_ID, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, @Bank_ac_id, @APR_BANK_ID
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_Invoice_DM_CM_Voucher_sh](@m_Rpt_Type INT, @m_CO_ID INT, @m_Fr_Vch_No INT, @m_To_Vch_No INT, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Rpt_Type INT ;
	DECLARE	@CO_ID INT ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_Vch_No INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_Vch_No INT ;

	DECLARE	@Fr_Vch_No_1 INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_Vch_No_1 INT ;

	DECLARE @By_CO_ID NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_Vch_No NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_Vch_Date NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @Rpt_Type = @m_Rpt_Type
	SET @CO_ID = @m_CO_ID
	SET @Fr_Vch_No = @m_Fr_Vch_No
	SET @TO_Vch_No = @m_TO_Vch_No

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	IF @Rpt_Type = 1
		BEGIN

			SET @TO_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @TO_Vch_No > 0 THEN @TO_Vch_No ELSE @Fr_Vch_No END

			SET @TDate = CASE WHEN LEN(@TDate) > 0 THEN @TDate ELSE @FDate END

			SET @By_CO_ID = CASE WHEN (@CO_ID > 0 AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0)  THEN ' AND AI_CO_ID =  ' + CAST(@CO_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
									
			SET @By_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @Fr_Vch_No > 0  THEN ' AND AI_No BETWEEN ' + CAST(@Fr_Vch_No AS varchar)  + ' AND ' + CAST(@TO_Vch_No AS varchar) + ' ' ELSE '' END

			SET @By_Vch_Date = CASE WHEN (@FDate <> '1900-01-01' AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0) THEN ' AND  AI_Date
				BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + ' '  ELSE '' END
		END


	IF (@Rpt_Type = 2)
		BEGIN

			SET @TO_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @TO_Vch_No > 0 THEN @TO_Vch_No ELSE @Fr_Vch_No END

			SET @TDate = CASE WHEN LEN(@TDate) > 0 THEN @TDate ELSE @FDate END

			SET @By_CO_ID = CASE WHEN (@CO_ID > 0 AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0)  THEN ' AND ACN_CO_ID =  ' + CAST(@CO_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
									
			SET @By_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @Fr_Vch_No > 0  THEN ' AND ACN_NO BETWEEN ' + CAST(@Fr_Vch_No AS varchar)  + ' AND ' + CAST(@TO_Vch_No AS varchar) + ' ' ELSE '' END

			SET @By_Vch_Date = CASE WHEN (@FDate <> '1900-01-01' AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0)  THEN ' AND  ACN_Date
				BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + ' '  ELSE '' END
		END

	
	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_4 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);


	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_Vch_No) > 0 THEN @By_Vch_No ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_3 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_Vch_Date) > 0 THEN @By_Vch_Date ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_4 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_CO_ID) > 0 THEN @By_CO_ID ELSE '' END



	IF @Rpt_Type = 1
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'Select ARIV.*, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 
								from AR_Invoice_V ARIV, CRMVehiclesDetails_V CRMVDV With (NoLock)
								 WHERE 1 = 1 AND ARIV.AI_NO > 0 AND ARIV.AO_VEHICLE_ID = CRMVDV.VEHICLE_ID '

			SET @QUERY_O_1 = 'ORDER BY ARIV.AI_NO '
		END

	IF @Rpt_Type = 2
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'Select * from AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V With (NoLock)           
								WHERE 1 = 1 AND ACN_NO > 0  '

			SET @QUERY_O_1 = 'ORDER BY ACN_NO '
		END

	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 + @QUERY_W_3 + @QUERY_W_4  + @QUERY_O_1

	--SELECT @Fr_Vch_No, @TO_Vch_No, @m_FDate, @m_TDate, @By_Vch_No, @By_Vch_Date

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS_sh]
	@Type int,
	@IMID int,
	@IMDescription Varchar(200),
	@IMEXPDays int,
	@TMID int,
	@IMEXPON varchar(100),
	@CCID varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @ComId AS VARCHAR(100)
	set @ComId = (Select COMBINATION_ID from CODE_COMBINATION_V where CODE_COMBINATION = @CCID)
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS(
					 IM_DESCRIPTION,
					 IM_AC_ID,
					 IM_TM_ID,
					 IM_EXP_DAYS,
					 IM_EXP_ON
		)
		SELECT	@IMDescription,
				@ComId,
				@TMID,
				@IMEXPDays,
				@IMEXPON

		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		SELECT IM_ID FROM AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS
		WHERE IM_ID = @IMID
		)
		BEGIN
			UPDATE AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS
			SET 
					IM_DESCRIPTION = @IMDescription,
					IM_AC_ID = @ComId,
					IM_TM_ID = @TMID,
					IM_EXP_DAYS = @IMEXPDays,
					IM_EXP_ON = @IMEXPON
				WHERE IM_ID = @IMID

			SELECT @IMID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT		
			IM_ID,
			IM_DESCRIPTION,
			IM_AC_ID,
			IM_TM_ID,
			IM_EXP_DAYS, 
			IM_EXP_ON
		  FROM AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ie
		  inner join CODE_COMBINATION_V cc on cc.COMBINATION_ID = ie.IM_AC_ID
		  inner join TAX_MASTER tm on tm.TM_ID = ie.IM_TM_ID
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		 SELECT DISTINCT		
			IM_ID,
			IM_DESCRIPTION,
			IM_AC_ID,
			IM_TM_ID,
			IM_EXP_DAYS, 
			IM_EXP_ON,
			tm.TM_DESCRIPTION,
			tm.TM_ID,
			cc.CODE_COMBINATION,
			cc.NAME_COMBINATION
		  FROM AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ie
		  inner join CODE_COMBINATION_V cc on cc.COMBINATION_ID = ie.IM_AC_ID
		  inner join TAX_MASTER tm on tm.TM_ID = ie.IM_TM_ID
		WHERE IM_ID = @IMID
	END	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_ManualInvoice_sh]
	@AI_NO int,
	@AI_DATE datetime,
	@AI_CO_ID int,
	@AI_AO_NO int,
	@AI_PACKAGE_NAME varchar(100),
	@AI_IM_ID int,
	@AI_AMOUNT float,
	@AI_vehicle_make varchar(200),
	@AI_vehicle_model varchar(100),
	@AI_vehicle_engineno varchar(100),
	@AI_vehicle_chasisno varchar(100),
	@AI_vehicle_registrationno varchar(100),
	@AI_vehicle_pono varchar(100),
	@AI_customer_name varchar(100),
	@AI_TYPE varchar(100),
	@AI_VEHICLE_DOI datetime, 
	@AI_BookingCat varchar(100),
	@Type int,
	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		select distinct CO_ID, CO_Company_Name from	AR_Companies 
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct Vehicle_Id, CustomerName, Vehicle_Make, Vehicle_Model, Vehicle_EngineNo, 
		Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, Vehicle_PONo  from CRMVehiclesDetails_V
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		select distinct AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,
		AI_TYPE, AI_AMOUNT, AI_IM_ID, IM_DESCRIPTION, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_PACKAGE_NAME, AO_BookingCat,
		AI_DATE, AO_VEHICLE_ID from AR_Invoice_V
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		IF(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			Select AI_NO, AI_AO_NO ,CO_Company_Name, IM_DESCRIPTION, td_age, TM_DESCRIPTION, AI_DATE, AI_PACKAGE_NAME,
			AI_TYPE ,AI_POST, AI_CANCEL, AI_IM_ID, AI_AMOUNT, AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AI_VEHICLE_PONO, AO_BookingCat, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_CO_ID
			from  AR_Invoice_V Where AI_NO = @SearchValue
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			Select AI_NO, AI_AO_NO,CO_Company_Name, AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, IM_DESCRIPTION, td_age, TM_DESCRIPTION, AI_DATE, AI_PACKAGE_NAME,
			AI_TYPE ,AI_POST, AI_CANCEL, AI_IM_ID, AI_AMOUNT, AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_PONO, AO_BookingCat, AO_VEHICLE_ID, TM_DESCRIPTION, IM_TM_ID, AI_CO_ID
			from  AR_Invoice_V Where AI_CO_ID = @SearchValue
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		Insert into AR_INVOICE (AI_NO,AI_DATE,AI_CO_ID,AI_AO_NO,AI_PACKAGE_NAME,AI_IM_ID,AI_AMOUNT,
		AI_vehicle_make,AI_vehicle_model,AI_vehicle_engineno,AI_vehicle_chasisno,AI_vehicle_registrationno,
		AI_vehicle_pono,AI_customer_name,AI_TYPE,AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_BookingCat)
		Values (@AI_NO,@AI_DATE,@AI_CO_ID,@AI_AO_NO,@AI_PACKAGE_NAME,@AI_IM_ID,@AI_AMOUNT,
		@AI_vehicle_make,@AI_vehicle_model,@AI_vehicle_engineno,@AI_vehicle_chasisno,@AI_vehicle_registrationno,
		@AI_vehicle_pono,@AI_customer_name,@AI_TYPE,@AI_VEHICLE_DOI, @AI_BookingCat)

		Select @AI_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN

SELECT DISTINCT AIE.*, (SELECT TD_Description
                       FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_2 WITH (NOLOCK)
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1 WITH (NOLOCK)
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = AIE.IM_TM_ID) ))) AS TD_Description,
											 (SELECT TD_Age
											  FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_2 WITH (NOLOCK)
											  WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1 WITH (NOLOCK)
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = AIE.IM_TM_ID) ))) AS TD_Age

FROM AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS AIE


		--SELECT DISTINCT ie.*, td.TD_DESCRIPTION, td.TD_AGE FROM AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ie  
		--inner join TAX_DETAIL_V td on ie.IM_TM_ID = td.TD_ID
	END
	if(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS (
			Select * from AR_INVOICE
			Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
		)
		BEGIN	
			Delete from  AR_Invoice Where AI_NO = @AI_NO

			Select @AI_NO
		END
	END

	IF(@Type = 8)
	BEGIN
		SELECT Distinct Top (50) ai_no,ai_ao_no,ai_VEHICLE_MAKE,ai_VEHICLE_MODEL,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO 
		FROM AR_INVOICE_V with (nolock)
		where not AI_NO is null 
		order by AI_NO DESC
	END

	IF(@Type = 9)	
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(AI_NO) from AR_INVOICE
	END

	IF(@Type = 10)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select AI_NO from AR_INVOICE
			Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
		)
		BEGIN
			Declare @mCnt as Int
			SET @mCnt = (SELECT COUNT(AAI_AI_NO) FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE WHERE AAI_AI_NO =  STR(@AI_NO))
			--SELECT @mCnt

			IF (@mCnt = 0) 
				BEGIN
					Update AR_INVOICE Set AI_CANCEL = 1, AI_CANCEL_DATE = GETDATE() Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
					Select @AI_NO
				END
			ELSE
				BEGIN
					SET @AI_NO = 999999
					SELECT @AI_NO
				END
		END
	END

END

--select * from AR_INVOICE_V
--select AI_NO,AI_DATE,AI_CO_ID,AI_AO_NO,AI_PACKAGE_NAME,AI_IM_ID,AI_AMOUNT,
--		AI_vehicle_make,AI_vehicle_model,AI_vehicle_engineno,AI_vehicle_chasisno,AI_vehicle_registrationno,
--		AI_vehicle_pono,AI_customer_name,AI_TYPE,AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_BookingCat
--		from AR_INVOICE_V where CO_Company_Name = '101 Group'

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_Order_Invoice_DM_CM_Detail_sh](@m_Rpt_Type INT, @m_CO_ID INT, @m_Fr_Vch_No INT, @m_To_Vch_No INT, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Rpt_Type INT ;
	DECLARE	@CO_ID INT ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_Vch_No INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_Vch_No INT ;

	DECLARE	@Fr_Vch_No_1 INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_Vch_No_1 INT ;

	DECLARE @By_CO_ID NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_Vch_No NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_Vch_Date NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @Rpt_Type = @m_Rpt_Type
	SET @CO_ID = @m_CO_ID
	SET @Fr_Vch_No = @m_Fr_Vch_No
	SET @TO_Vch_No = @m_TO_Vch_No

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
