	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	IF @Rpt_Type = 1
		BEGIN

			SET @TO_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @TO_Vch_No > 0 THEN @TO_Vch_No ELSE @Fr_Vch_No END

			SET @TDate = CASE WHEN LEN(@TDate) > 0 THEN @TDate ELSE @FDate END

			SET @By_CO_ID = CASE WHEN (@CO_ID > 0 AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0) THEN ' AND AO_CO_ID =  ' + CAST(@CO_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
									
			SET @By_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @Fr_Vch_No > 0  THEN ' AND AO_No BETWEEN ' + CAST(@Fr_Vch_No AS varchar)  + ' AND ' + CAST(@TO_Vch_No AS varchar) + ' ' ELSE '' END

			SET @By_Vch_Date = CASE WHEN (@FDate <> '1900-01-01' AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0)  THEN ' AND  AO_Date
				BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + ' '  ELSE '' END
		END


	IF (@Rpt_Type = 2 OR @Rpt_Type = 3)
		BEGIN

			SET @TO_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @TO_Vch_No > 0 THEN @TO_Vch_No ELSE @Fr_Vch_No END

			SET @TDate = CASE WHEN LEN(@TDate) > 0 THEN @TDate ELSE @FDate END

			SET @By_CO_ID = CASE WHEN (@CO_ID > 0 AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0)  THEN ' AND AI_CO_ID =  ' + CAST(@CO_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
									
			SET @By_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @Fr_Vch_No > 0  THEN ' AND AI_No BETWEEN ' + CAST(@Fr_Vch_No AS varchar)  + ' AND ' + CAST(@TO_Vch_No AS varchar) + ' ' ELSE '' END

			SET @By_Vch_Date = CASE WHEN (@FDate <> '1900-01-01' AND @Fr_Vch_No = 0) THEN ' AND  AI_Date
				BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + ' '  ELSE '' END
		END

	--IF @Rpt_Type = 3
	--	BEGIN

	--		SET @TO_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @TO_Vch_No > 0 THEN @TO_Vch_No ELSE @Fr_Vch_No END

	--		SET @TDate = CASE WHEN LEN(@TDate) > 0 THEN @TDate ELSE @FDate END

	--		SET @By_CO_ID = CASE WHEN @CO_ID > 0  THEN ' AND AI_CO_ID =  ' + CAST(@CO_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
									
	--		SET @By_Vch_No = CASE WHEN @Fr_Vch_No > 0  THEN ' AND AI_No BETWEEN ' + CAST(@Fr_Vch_No AS varchar)  + ' AND ' + CAST(@TO_Vch_No AS varchar) + ' ' ELSE '' END

	--		SET @By_Vch_Date = CASE WHEN @FDate <> '1900-01-01'  THEN ' AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),AI_Date,121)
	--			BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''') ' + ' '  ELSE '' END
	--	END

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_4 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);


	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_Vch_No) > 0 THEN @By_Vch_No ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_3 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_Vch_Date) > 0 THEN @By_Vch_Date ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_4 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_CO_ID) > 0 THEN @By_CO_ID ELSE '' END



	IF @Rpt_Type = 1
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'Select * from AR_Order_V With (NoLock) 
								WHERE 1 = 1 AND AO_ID > 0 '

			SET @QUERY_O_1 = 'ORDER BY AO_CO_ID, AO_NO '
		END

	IF @Rpt_Type = 2
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'Select * from AR_INVOICE_V With (NoLock) 
								WHERE 1 = 1 AND AI_NO > 0 '

			SET @QUERY_O_1 = 'ORDER BY AI_CO_ID, AI_NO '
		END

	IF @Rpt_Type = 3
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'Select * from AR_INV_DM_CM_DTL With (NoLock) 
								WHERE 1 = 1 AND AI_NO > 0 '

			SET @QUERY_O_1 = 'ORDER BY ETYPE, AI_CO_ID, AI_NO '
		END




	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 + @QUERY_W_3 + @QUERY_W_4  + @QUERY_O_1

	--SELECT @Fr_Vch_No, @TO_Vch_No, @m_FDate, @m_TDate, @By_Vch_No, @By_Vch_Date

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_Payment_Receipt_With_WO_Inv_sh](@m_Rpt_Type INT, @m_APR_CO_ID INT, @m_Fr_APR_NO INT, @m_To_APR_NO INT, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @Rpt_Type INT ;
	DECLARE	@APR_CO_ID INT ;
	DECLARE	@Fr_APR_NO INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_APR_NO INT ;

	DECLARE	@Fr_APR_NO_1 INT ;
	DECLARE	@TO_APR_NO_1 INT ;

	DECLARE @By_APR_CO_ID NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_APR_NO NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @By_APR_DATE NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @Rpt_Type = @m_Rpt_Type
	SET @APR_CO_ID = @m_APR_CO_ID
	SET @Fr_APR_NO = @m_Fr_APR_NO
	SET @TO_APR_NO = @m_TO_APR_NO

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	SET @TO_APR_NO = CASE WHEN @TO_APR_NO > 0 THEN @TO_APR_NO ELSE @Fr_APR_NO END

	SET @TDate = CASE WHEN LEN(@TDate) > 0 THEN @TDate ELSE @FDate END

	SET @By_APR_CO_ID = CASE WHEN (@APR_CO_ID > 0 AND @Fr_APR_NO = 0)  THEN ' AND AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CO_ID =  ' + CAST(@APR_CO_ID AS VARCHAR)  + ' ' ELSE ' ' END
									
	SET @By_APR_NO = CASE WHEN @Fr_APR_NO > 0  THEN ' AND APR_NO BETWEEN ' + CAST(@Fr_APR_NO AS varchar)  + ' AND ' + CAST(@TO_APR_NO AS varchar) + ' ' ELSE '' END

	SET @By_APR_DATE = CASE WHEN (@FDate <> '1900-01-01' AND @Fr_APR_NO = 0) THEN ' AND  AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE
		BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''' ' + ' '  ELSE '' END


	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_4 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);


	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @QUERY_W_2 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_APR_NO) > 0 THEN @By_APR_NO ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_3 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_APR_DATE) > 0 THEN @By_APR_DATE ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_W_4 = CASE WHEN LEN(@By_APR_CO_ID) > 0 THEN @By_APR_CO_ID ELSE '' END

	SET @QUERY_O_1 = 'ORDER BY AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.CO_COMPANY_NAME, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO '

	IF @Rpt_Type = 1
		BEGIN


			SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CHQ_NO, 
								AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DESCRIPTION, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.CO_Company_Name, AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 
								AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_NO, AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_Date AS AI_Date,
								AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_ADJUST, 
								(select dbo.Get_EngineNo(AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_NO)) AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO  
								FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V WITH (NOLOCK) RIGHT OUTER JOIN AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WITH (NOLOCK) 
								ON AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO 
								LEFT OUTER JOIN AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V WITH (NOLOCK) ON AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO  
								Where 1 = 1     '
		END


	IF @Rpt_Type = 2
		BEGIN

			SET @QUERY_S_1 ='SELECT AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CHQ_NO, 
								AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DESCRIPTION, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CO_ID, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.CO_COMPANY_NAME, AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 
								AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT   
								FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V WITH (NOLOCK) ON 
								AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO    
								Where 1 = 1   '
		END

			   
	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 + @QUERY_W_3 + @QUERY_W_4 + @QUERY_O_1

	--SELECT @Fr_APR_NO, @TO_APR_NO, @m_FDate, @m_TDate, @By_APR_NO, @By_APR_DATE

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_PaymentReceipt_sh]
	@Type int,
	@Tbl_Type int,
	@APR_NO int, 
	@APR_DATE datetime, 
	@APR_CHQ_NO int, 
	@APR_DESCRIPTION varchar(200), 
	@APR_CO_ID int, 
	@APR_BANK_ID int, 
	@APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT float,
	@APT_APR_NO int, 
	@APT_TD_ID int, 
	@APT_TAX_AMOUNT decimal,
	@AAI_APR_NO int, 
	@AAI_AI_NO int, 
	@AAI_AI_DATE datetime, 
	@AAI_AI_AMOUNT float, 
	@AAI_PEN_AMOUNT float, 
	@AAI_ADJUST int, 
	@AAI_CO_ID int,
	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 1)
		BEGIN
			Insert into AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT (APR_NO,APR_DATE,APR_CHQ_NO, APR_DESCRIPTION,APR_CO_ID,APR_BANK_ID,APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) 
			Values (@APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_CHQ_NO, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_CO_ID, @APR_BANK_ID, @APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) 
		
			Select @APR_NO
		END
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 2)
		BEGIN
			Insert into AR_PAYMENT_TAX (APT_APR_NO,APT_TD_ID,APT_TAX_AMOUNT) 
			Values (@APT_APR_NO, @APT_TD_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT) 
			
			Select @APT_APR_NO
		END	
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 3)
		BEGIN
			Insert into AR_ADJUST_INVOICE (AAI_APR_NO,AAI_AI_NO,AAI_AI_DATE,AAI_AI_AMOUNT,AAI_PEN_AMOUNT,AAI_ADJUST,AAI_CO_ID) 
			Values (@AAI_APR_NO, @AAI_AI_NO, @AAI_AI_DATE, @AAI_AI_AMOUNT, @AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, @AAI_ADJUST, @AAI_CO_ID) 
		
			Select @AAI_APR_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_CO_ID, APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME,
			APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, CO_Company_Name, APR_POST, APR_GL, APR_Cancel FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
			WHERE APR_NO = Cast(@SearchValue as INT) ORDER BY APR_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_CO_ID, APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME,
			APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, CO_Company_Name, APR_POST, APR_GL, APR_Cancel FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
			WHERE APR_DESCRIPTION like @SearchValue ORDER BY APR_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_CO_ID, APR_BANK_ID, BANK_NAME,
			APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, CO_Company_Name, APR_POST, APR_GL, APR_Cancel FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
			WHERE APR_DATE = Cast(@SearchValue as datetime) ORDER BY APR_NO 
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Exec sp_getPendingInvoices @coid = @APR_CO_ID
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Select * from AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V 
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(APR_NO) as lastInvoiceId from AR_Payment_Receipt 
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select APR_NO from AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
			Where APR_No = @APR_NO 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
			Where APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Delete from AR_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Delete from AR_PAYMENT_TAX
			Where APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Select @APR_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		Select * from AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
		Where APR_NO = @APR_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 8)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select AAI_APR_NO from AR_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AR_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO
			--select * from AR_ADJUST_INVOICE
		END
		Select AI_NO as AAI_AI_NO,MIN(AI_DATE) AS AAI_AI_DATE,
		--(SELECT DISTINCT AI_SUPPLIER_REF FROM AR_INVOICE 
		--WHERE AI_NO = AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO) AS SUP_REF, 
		SUM(ORG_AMT) AS AAI_AI_AMOUNT,SUM(isnull(PEN_AMT,0)) AS AAI_PEN_AMOUNT 
		From AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V --from ap_invoice_ageing_v
		where AI_CO_ID = @APR_CO_ID 
		GROUP BY AI_NO HAVING SUM(PEN_AMT)<>0 
		ORDER BY AI_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 9)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select APR_NO from AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
			Where APR_No = @APR_NO 
		)
		BEGIN 
			Delete from AR_ADJUST_INVOICE
			Where AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO

			Select @APR_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 10)
	BEGIN
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 1)
		BEGIN	
			SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_CO_ID, APR_BANK_ID, APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, APR_POST,	APR_GL,	
			CO_Company_Name, BANK_NAME, BANK_AC_ID, APR_Cancel, apr_Can_date, apr_can_GL, APR_CHQ_NO
			FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
			WHERE APR_NO = @APR_NO
		END
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 2)
		BEGIN	
			SELECT AAI_ID, AAI_APR_NO, AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, 
			AAI_ADJUST, AAI_CO_ID, APR_DATE,
			(Select distinct AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO from AR_INVOICE Where AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = AAI_AI_NO) as EngineNo
			FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
			WHERE AAI_APR_NO = @APR_NO
		END
		IF(@Tbl_Type = 3)
		BEGIN	
			SELECT APT_ID, APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT, TD_DESCRIPTION, TD_AC_ID
			FROM AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V
			WHERE APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 11)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct CO_ID, CO_Company_Name from AR_Companies
	END
	IF(@Type = 12)
	BEGIN

		Delete From AR_Adjust_Invoice Where AAI_APR_No = @APR_NO 

		update AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT set apr_cancel=1 where apr_no = @APR_NO
		Select @APR_NO
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_PaymentReceiptPosting_sh]
	@Type int,
	@APR_NO int,
	@COID int,
	@Start_Date varchar(100),
	@End_Date varchar(100)	
	--@SearchType int,
	--@SearchValue int
AS
BEGIN
	--IF(@Type = 1)
	--BEGIN
	--	 IF(@SearchType = 1)
	--	 BEGIN
	--		SELECT APR_NO, APR_Date, CO_Company_Name, BANK_NAME,  APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 
	--		 ISNULL((SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) From AR_PAYMENT_TAX 
	--		 WHERE APT_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEI(APR_POST IS NULL) OR (APR_POST = 0)PT_V.APR_NO), 0) AS TAX_AMOUNT 
	--		 From dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE (APR_POST IS NULL) OR (APR_POST = 0)
	--	 END
	--	 IF(@SearchType = 2)
	--	 BEGIN
	--		SELECT APR_NO, APR_Date, CO_Company_Name, BANK_NAME,  APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 
	--		 ISNULL((SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) From AR_PAYMENT_TAX 
	--		 WHERE APT_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO), 0) AS TAX_AMOUNT 
	--		 From dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE (APR_POST IS NULL) OR (APR_POST = 0)
	--		 AND APR_NO = @SearchValue
	--	 END
	--	 IF(@SearchType = 3)
	--	 BEGIN
	--		SELECT APR_NO, APR_Date, CO_Company_Name, BANK_NAME,  APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 
	--		 ISNULL((SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) From AR_PAYMENT_TAX 
	--		 WHERE APT_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO), 0) AS TAX_AMOUNT 
	--		 From dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE (APR_POST IS NULL) OR (APR_POST = 0)
	--		 AND APR_CO_ID = @SearchValue
	--	 END
	--END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		SELECT distinct APR_CO_ID, CO_COMPANY_NAME FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
		WHERE APR_POST IS NULL OR (APR_POST = 0) order by CO_COMPANY_NAME
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
	--select * from AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT
		update AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT set APR_POST=1 where APR_NO= @APR_NO
		Select @APR_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		SELECT APR_NO, APR_Date, CO_Company_Name, BANK_NAME,  APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 
		ISNULL((SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) From AR_PAYMENT_TAX 
		WHERE APT_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO), 0) AS TAX_AMOUNT 
		From dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE ((APR_POST IS NULL) OR (APR_POST = 0)) 
		--CASE
		--WHEN @APR_NO = 0 AND @COID = 0 THEN 
		--WHEN @APR_NO = 0 THEN APR_NO = @APR_NO 
		--WHEN @COID = 0 THEN APR_CO_ID = @COID
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		IF (@Start_Date IS NULL AND @End_Date IS NULL)
			BEGIN
				SET @Start_Date = ''
				SET @End_Date  = ''
			END
			--select @APR_NO, @COID, @Start_Date, @End_Date
		IF (@End_Date != '')
		BEGIN
			SET @End_Date = @Start_Date 
		END

		SELECT 
		APR_NO, 
		APR_Date, 
		APR_CO_ID,
		CO_Company_Name, 
		BANK_NAME, 
		APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 
		ISNULL(
			(SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) 
			FROM AR_PAYMENT_TAX 
			WHERE APT_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO), 0
		) AS TAX_AMOUNT 
		FROM dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
		WHERE 
		((APR_POST IS NULL) OR (APR_POST = 0))		
		AND
		(
		(@APR_NO = 0 AND @COID = 0 AND @Start_Date = '' AND @End_Date = '' )
		OR
		(@APR_NO != 0 AND APR_NO = @APR_NO)
		OR
		(@COID != 0 AND APR_CO_ID = @COID)
		OR
		(@Start_Date != '' AND APR_Date Between @Start_Date And @End_Date)		
		)
		Order by APR_Date;
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AR_VehicleBooking_sh]
	@Type int,
	@AO_NO bigint, 
	@AO_Date datetime,
	@AO_Description varchar(200),
	@AO_COID int,
	@AO_VehicleID bigint,
	@AO_PackageName varchar(50),
	@AO_DEACTIVE_DATE date,
	@AO_MAFD bit,
	@AO_IM_ID int,
	@AO_BookingCat varchar(30),
	@AO_Price1 float,
	@AO_Price2 float,
	@AO_Price3 float,
	@AO_Price4 float,
	@AO_Price5 float,
	@AO_Price6 float,
	@AO_Price7 float,
	@AO_Price8 float,
	@AO_Price9 float,
	@AO_Price10 float,
	@AO_Price11 float,
	@AO_Price12 float,
	@AO_INV1_ID float,
	@AO_INV2_ID float,
	@AO_INV3_ID float,
	@AO_INV4_ID float,
	@AO_INV5_ID float,
	@AO_INV6_ID float,
	@AO_INV7_ID float,
	@AO_INV8_ID float,
	@AO_INV9_ID float,
	@AO_INV10_ID float,
	@AO_INV11_ID float,
	@AO_INV12_ID float,
	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @mVehID_1 bigint
	DECLARE @mVehID bigint
	DECLARE @mAO_NO bigint
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		SELECT Distinct CO_ID,CO_COMPANY_NAME FROM AR_Companies	where CO_ID>0 order by CO_ID Desc 
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN

			SET @mVehID = (SELECT Distinct vehid	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) 
					where vehid = @SearchValue and vehid in (select DISTINCT ao_vehicle_id from ar_order where ao_deactive_date is null)
					)
			IF (@mVehID IS NULL) 
				BEGIN
					SELECT Distinct vehid,VEHICLE_MAKE,VEHICLE_MODEL,VEHICLE_ENGINENO,VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					CustomerName, Address1, Vehicle_PONo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) where vehid = @SearchValue 
					--	and vehid not in (select ao_vehicle_id from ar_order)
					order by vehID	
				END
			ELSE
				BEGIN
					SELECT DISTINCT MAX(AO_NO) AS VEHID, 
					'' AS VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS VEHICLE_MODEL, '' AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS VEHICLE_CHASISNO, '' AS VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					'' AS CustomerName, '' AS Address1, '' AS Vehicle_PONo, '1900-01-01' AS Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 					
					FROM AR_ORDER WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = @SearchValue 
					--and ao_deactive_date is null	
				END
		END	
		IF(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN

			SET @mVehID_1 = (SELECT Distinct vehid	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) 
					where VEHICLE_ENGINENO = @SearchValue 
					)
			--SELECT @mVehID_1

			SET @mVehID = (SELECT Distinct vehid	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) 
					where vehid = @mVehID_1 and vehid in (select DISTINCT ao_vehicle_id from ar_order where ao_deactive_date is null)
					)
			--SELECT @mVehID 
			IF (@mVehID IS NULL) 
				BEGIN
					SELECT Distinct vehid,VEHICLE_MAKE,VEHICLE_MODEL,VEHICLE_ENGINENO,VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					CustomerName, Address1, Vehicle_PONo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) where vehid = @mVehID_1 
					order by vehID	
				END
			ELSE
				BEGIN
					SELECT DISTINCT MAX(AO_NO) AS VEHID, 
					'' AS VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS VEHICLE_MODEL, '' AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS VEHICLE_CHASISNO, '' AS VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					'' AS CustomerName, '' AS Address1, '' AS Vehicle_PONo,  '1900-01-01' AS Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 					
					FROM AR_ORDER WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = @mVehID_1 
				END
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			--SELECT Distinct vehid,VEHICLE_MAKE,VEHICLE_MODEL,VEHICLE_ENGINENO,VEHICLE_CHASISNO,VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
			--CustomerName, Address1, Vehicle_PONo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation
			--FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V with (nolock) where Vehicle_ChasisNo = @SearchValue and vehid not in (select ao_vehicle_id from ar_order)
			--order by vehID

			SET @mVehID_1 = (SELECT Distinct vehid	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) 
					where Vehicle_ChasisNo = @SearchValue 
					)
			--SELECT @mVehID_1

			SET @mVehID = (SELECT Distinct vehid	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) 
					where vehid = @mVehID_1 and vehid in (select DISTINCT ao_vehicle_id from ar_order where ao_deactive_date is null)
					)
			--SELECT @mVehID 
			IF (@mVehID IS NULL) 
				BEGIN
					SELECT Distinct vehid,VEHICLE_MAKE,VEHICLE_MODEL,VEHICLE_ENGINENO,VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					CustomerName, Address1, Vehicle_PONo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) where vehid = @mVehID_1 
					order by vehID	
				END
			ELSE
				BEGIN
					SELECT DISTINCT MAX(AO_NO) AS VEHID, 
					'' AS VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS VEHICLE_MODEL, '' AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS VEHICLE_CHASISNO, '' AS VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					'' AS CustomerName, '' AS Address1, '' AS Vehicle_PONo,  '1900-01-01' AS Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 					
					FROM AR_ORDER WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = @mVehID_1 
				END
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 4)
		BEGIN
			--SELECT Distinct vehid,VEHICLE_MAKE,VEHICLE_MODEL,VEHICLE_ENGINENO,VEHICLE_CHASISNO,VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
			--CustomerName, Address1 ,Vehicle_PONo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation
			--FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V with (nolock) where Vehicle_RegistrationNo = @SearchValue and vehid not in (select ao_vehicle_id from ar_order)
			--order by vehID
			SET @mVehID_1 = (SELECT Distinct vehid	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) 
					where Vehicle_RegistrationNo = @SearchValue 
					)
			--SELECT @mVehID_1

			SET @mVehID = (SELECT Distinct vehid	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) 
					where vehid = @mVehID_1 and vehid in (select DISTINCT ao_vehicle_id from ar_order where ao_deactive_date is null)
					)
			--SELECT @mVehID 
			IF (@mVehID IS NULL) 
				BEGIN
					SELECT Distinct vehid,VEHICLE_MAKE,VEHICLE_MODEL,VEHICLE_ENGINENO,VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					CustomerName, Address1, Vehicle_PONo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 	
					FROM CRMVehiclesDetails_V  with (nolock) where vehid = @mVehID_1 
					order by vehID	
				END
			ELSE
				BEGIN
					SELECT DISTINCT MAX(AO_NO) AS VEHID, 
					'' AS VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS VEHICLE_MODEL, '' AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS VEHICLE_CHASISNO, '' AS VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
					'' AS CustomerName, '' AS Address1, '' AS Vehicle_PONo,  '1900-01-01' AS Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 					
					FROM AR_ORDER WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = @mVehID_1 
				END
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		--select distinct AO_NO, AO_DATE, CO_Company_Name, AO_CO_ID, Vehicle_Id, Vehicle_EngineNo, 
		--Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_RegistrationNo from AR_ORDER_V  
		--where ao_vehicle_id='" & vehicleid & "' and ao_deactive_date is null
		IF(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			select AO_NO, AO_DATE, CO_Company_Name, AO_CO_ID, Vehicle_Id, 
			Vehicle_EngineNo, Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_RegistrationNo
			from AR_ORDER_V with (nolock) where vehid = @SearchValue order by AO_NO
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			select distinct AO_NO, AO_DATE, CO_Company_Name, AO_CO_ID, Vehicle_Id, 
			Vehicle_EngineNo, Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_RegistrationNo
			from AR_ORDER_V with (nolock) where Vehicle_EngineNo = @SearchValue order by AO_NO
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			select AO_NO, AO_DATE, CO_Company_Name, AO_CO_ID, Vehicle_Id, 
			Vehicle_EngineNo, Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_RegistrationNo
			from AR_ORDER_V with (nolock) where Vehicle_ChasisNo = @SearchValue order by AO_NO
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 4)
		BEGIN
			select AO_NO, AO_DATE, CO_Company_Name, AO_CO_ID, Vehicle_Id, 
		Vehicle_EngineNo, Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_RegistrationNo
		from AR_ORDER_V where Vehicle_RegistrationNo = @SearchValue order by AO_NO
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 5)
		BEGIN
			select AO_NO, AO_DATE, CO_Company_Name, AO_CO_ID, Vehicle_Id, 
			Vehicle_EngineNo, Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_RegistrationNo
			from AR_ORDER_V with (nolock) where AO_NO = @SearchValue order by AO_NO
		END
		IF(@SearchType = 6)
		BEGIN
			select Top (1) AO_NO 
			from AR_ORDER with (nolock) ORDER BY AO_NO DESC
			SELECT @AO_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Insert into AR_ORDER 
		(AO_NO,
		AO_DESCRIPTION,
		AO_DATE,
		AO_BOOKINGCAT, 
		AO_CO_ID,
		AO_VEHICLE_ID,
		AO_PACKAGE_NAME,
		AO_MAFD, 
		AO_IM_ID,
		AO_PRICE1,
		AO_PRICE2,
		AO_PRICE3,
		AO_PRICE4,
		AO_PRICE5,
		AO_PRICE6,
		AO_PRICE7,
		AO_PRICE8,
		AO_PRICE9,
		AO_PRICE10,
		AO_PRICE11,
		AO_PRICE12		
		)
		Values (
			@AO_NO, 
			@AO_Description, 
			@AO_Date, 
			@AO_BookingCat,
			@AO_COID,
			@AO_VehicleID,
			@AO_PackageName,
			@AO_MAFD,
			@AO_IM_ID,
			@AO_Price1, 
			@AO_Price2, 
			@AO_Price3, 
			@AO_Price4, 
			@AO_Price5, 
			@AO_Price6, 
			@AO_Price7, 
			@AO_Price8, 
			@AO_Price9, 
			@AO_Price10,
			@AO_Price11,
			@AO_Price12
		)
		SELECT @AO_NO
		--BEGIN
		--	IF 
		--END
		BEGIN
			If ISNULL(@AO_INV1_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV1_ID = @AO_INV1_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV2_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV2_ID = @AO_INV2_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV3_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV3_ID = @AO_INV3_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV4_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV4_ID = @AO_INV4_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV5_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV5_ID = @AO_INV5_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV6_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV6_ID = @AO_INV6_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV7_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV7_ID = @AO_INV7_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV8_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV8_ID = @AO_INV8_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV9_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV9_ID = @AO_INV9_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV10_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV10_ID = @AO_INV10_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV11_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV11_ID = @AO_INV11_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO

			If ISNULL(@AO_INV12_ID,0) > 0 
				Update AR_Order set AO_INV12_ID = @AO_INV12_ID WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO
		END

		BEGIN
			IF (@AO_DEACTIVE_DATE  != '1900/01/01')
				Update AR_Order set AO_DEACTIVE_DATE = @AO_DEACTIVE_DATE WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO
		END

		--SELECT SCOPE_IDENTITY() AS LastInsertedID;
		SELECT @AO_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)	
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(AO_NO) from AR_ORDER
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS (
			Select AO_NO From AR_ORDER Where AO_NO = @AO_NO
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete From AR_ORDER Where AO_NO = @AO_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		Select * From AR_ORDER_V WHERE AO_NO = @AO_NO Order By AO_IM_ID
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[ARDebitNote_sh]
	@Type int,
	@ACN_NO bigint,
    @ACN_DATE datetime,
    @ACN_AI_NO bigint,
    @ACN_NAME varchar(50), 
    @ACN_AMOUNT decimal,
    @ACN_TYPE varchar(50),
    @ACN_CO_ID int,
    @ACN_TM_ID int,
	@ACN_IM_ID int,
	@AI_NO int,
	@ACN_DESCR varchar(200),
	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)

AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Insert into AR_Credit_Note (ACN_NO,ACN_DATE,ACN_CO_ID,ACN_AI_NO,ACN_NAME,ACN_IM_ID,ACN_AMOUNT,ACN_TYPE,ACN_DESCR)
		Values (@ACN_NO,@ACN_DATE,@ACN_CO_ID,@ACN_AI_NO,@ACN_NAME,@ACN_IM_ID,@ACN_AMOUNT,@ACN_TYPE,@ACN_DESCR)

		Select @ACN_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(ACN_NO) as lastInvoiceId from AR_Credit_Note 
	END
	--IF(@Type = 3)
	--BEGIN
	--	select distinct ACN_NO,ACN_DATE,ACN_AI_NO,ACN_NAME,ACN_CC_ID,ACN_AMOUNT,
	--	ACN_TYPE, ACN_AS_ID, ACN_TM_ID, ACN_POST, ACN_INV_GL from AR_Credit_Note_V
	--END
	--IF(@Type = 4)
	--BEGIN
	--	select ACN_NO,ACN_DATE,ACN_AI_NO,ACN_NAME,ACN_CC_ID,ACN_AMOUNT,
	--	ACN_TYPE, ACN_AS_ID, ACN_TM_ID, ACN_POST, ACN_INV_GL 
	--	from AR_Credit_Note_V 
	--	Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
	--END
	--IF(@Type = 5)
	--BEGIN
	--	IF EXISTS(
	--		Select ACN_NO from AP_Debit_Note_V
	--		Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
	--	)
	--	BEGIN
	--		Update AP_Debit_Note Set AI_CANCEL = 1, AI_CANCEL_DATE = GETDATE() Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
	--		Select @AI_NO
	--	END
	--END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			select distinct *
			from AR_Credit_Note_V Where ACN_NO = Cast(@SearchValue as int) order by ACN_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			select distinct *
			from AR_Credit_Note_V where ACN_CO_ID = @SearchValue order by ACN_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select ACN_NO from AR_CREDIT_NOTE
			Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AR_CREDIT_NOTE
			Where ACN_NO = @ACN_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 8)
	BEGIN
		select AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name from AR_INVOICE_V
		Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[AuditTrialReport_sh](@m_FDate date, @m_TDate date)
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;

	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);

	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	--SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT dbo.je_detail_v.*, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION 
	--				FROM   dbo.je_detail_v INNER JOIN
	--				dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.je_detail_v.JE_ac_id =dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID  
	--				WHERE 1 = 1 
	--				AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),JE_DATE,121)
	--				BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''') 
	--				AND JE_POST_FLAG = 0 
	--				ORDER BY je_date, je_voucher_no,je_line_id '


					SET @QUERY_S_1 = 
						'SELECT dbo.je_detail_v.*, 
								dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, 
								dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION 
						 FROM dbo.je_detail_v 
						 INNER JOIN dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V 
						 ON dbo.je_detail_v.JE_ac_id = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID  
						 WHERE 1 = 1 
						 AND JE_DATE BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @FDate, 120) + ''' 
										AND ''' + CONVERT(VARCHAR, @TDate, 120) + ''' 
						 AND JE_POST_FLAG = 0 
						 ORDER BY je_date, je_voucher_no, je_line_id';


	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 

	--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY, @FDate AS FDATE, @TDate AS TDATE

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[BankMaster_sh]
	@Type int,
	@BankID int,
	@BankName varchar(50),
	@CCID varchar(50)
As
BEGIN
	DECLARE @ComId AS VARCHAR(100)
	set @ComId = (Select COMBINATION_ID from CODE_COMBINATION_V where CODE_COMBINATION = @CCID)
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Insert into Bank_Master(
	    BANK_NAME,
		BANK_AC_ID
		)
		Select (@BankName),
			   @ComId
		
		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		Select BANK_ID from Bank_Master
		where BANK_ID = @BankID
		)
		BEGIN
			Update Bank_Master
				Set BANK_NAME = (@BankName),
				BANK_AC_ID = @ComId
				where BANK_ID = @BankID
			Select @BankID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct bm.BANK_ID, bm.BANK_NAME, bm.BANK_AC_ID, bm.BANK_GL_NAME, cc.CODE_COMBINATION, cc.NAME_COMBINATION
		from Bank_Master_v bm inner join CODE_COMBINATION_V cc on cc.COMBINATION_ID = bm.BANK_AC_ID
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct BANK_ID, BANK_NAME, BANK_AC_ID, BANK_GL_NAME from Bank_Master_v
		Where BANK_ID = @BankID
	END	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[CostCenter_sh]
	@Type int,
	@CCID varchar(50),
	@CCName varchar(50)
As
BEGIN
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Insert into COST_CENTER(
		CC_ID,
		CC_NAME
		)
		Select @CCID,
			   @CCName

		select @CCID
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		Select CC_ID from COST_CENTER
		where CC_ID = @CCID
		)
		BEGIN
			Update COST_CENTER
			Set CC_ID = @CCID,
				CC_NAME = @CCName
				where CC_ID = @CCID
			Select @CCID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Select CC_ID, CC_NAME from COST_CENTER
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Select * from COST_CENTER
		Where CC_ID = @CCID
	END	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[CRM_ATS_PRI_RECEIVING_CHECK]
	@Type int,
	@Search_Value VARCHAR(50)


AS
BEGIN

	IF(@Type = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS INV_AMOUNT, SUM(AAI_ADJUST) AS INV_ADJUST_AMT
			FROM (
				SELECT  '1-ATS-INVOICE' AS DATA_STATUS, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, '' AS APR_NO, '' APR_DATE, Round(((AI_AMOUNT + ( AI_AMOUNT * (CASE WHEN TD_AGE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TD_AGE END))/100)),0) AS AI_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
				WHERE AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO = @Search_Value
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '2-ATS-PR-ADJUSTMENT' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, APR_DATE, 0 AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO = @Search_Value)
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '3-DATA EXIST FOR PRI VIEW' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
				AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO = @Search_Value)
				) AS ABC
GROUP BY DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE				
ORDER BY  AI_NO, DATA_STATUS, APR_NO
		END

	IF(@Type = 2)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS INV_AMOUNT, SUM(AAI_ADJUST) AS INV_ADJUST_AMT
			FROM (
				SELECT  '1-ATS-INVOICE' AS DATA_STATUS, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, '' AS APR_NO, '' APR_DATE, Round(((AI_AMOUNT + ( AI_AMOUNT * (CASE WHEN TD_AGE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TD_AGE END))/100)),0) AS AI_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
				WHERE AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO = @Search_Value
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '2-ATS-PR-ADJUSTMENT' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, APR_DATE, 0 AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO = @Search_Value)
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '3-DATA EXIST FOR PRI VIEW' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
				AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO = @Search_Value)
				) AS ABC
GROUP BY DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE				
ORDER BY  AI_NO, DATA_STATUS, APR_NO
		END

	IF(@Type = 3)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS INV_AMOUNT, SUM(AAI_ADJUST) AS INV_ADJUST_AMT
			FROM (
				SELECT  '1-ATS-INVOICE' AS DATA_STATUS, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, '' AS APR_NO, '' APR_DATE, Round(((AI_AMOUNT + ( AI_AMOUNT * (CASE WHEN TD_AGE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TD_AGE END))/100)),0) AS AI_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
				WHERE AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = @Search_Value
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '2-ATS-PR-ADJUSTMENT' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, APR_DATE, 0 AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = @Search_Value)
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '3-DATA EXIST FOR PRI VIEW' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
				AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = @Search_Value)
				) AS ABC
GROUP BY DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE				
ORDER BY  AI_NO, DATA_STATUS, APR_NO
		END
	IF(@Type = 4)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS INV_AMOUNT, SUM(AAI_ADJUST) AS INV_ADJUST_AMT
			FROM (
				SELECT  '1-ATS-INVOICE' AS DATA_STATUS, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, '' AS APR_NO, '' APR_DATE, Round(((AI_AMOUNT + ( AI_AMOUNT * (CASE WHEN TD_AGE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TD_AGE END))/100)),0) AS AI_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
				WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = CAST(@Search_Value AS BIGINT)
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '2-ATS-PR-ADJUSTMENT' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, APR_DATE, 0 AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = CAST(@Search_Value AS BIGINT))
				UNION ALL
				SELECT  '3-DATA EXIST FOR PRI VIEW' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
				AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
				AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
				FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  
				WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = CAST(@Search_Value AS BIGINT))
				) AS ABC
GROUP BY DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE				
ORDER BY  AI_NO, DATA_STATUS, APR_NO
			
			
			--SELECT DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			--AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE
			--FROM (
			--	SELECT DISTINCT '1-ATS-INVOICE' AS DATA_STATUS, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			--	AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, '' AS APR_NO, '' APR_DATE
			--	FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
			--	WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = CAST(@Search_Value AS BIGINT)
			--	UNION ALL
			--	SELECT DISTINCT '2-ATS-PR-ADJUSTMENT' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO,  '' AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO,
			--	'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			--	'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, APR_DATE
			--	FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
			--	WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID = CAST(@Search_Value AS BIGINT))
			--	UNION ALL
			--	SELECT DISTINCT '3-DATA EXIST FOR PRI VIEW' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, '' AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, 
			--	AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			--	AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE
			--	FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  
			--	WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN (SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE  AO_VEHICLE_ID = CAST(@Search_Value AS BIGINT))
			--	) AS ABC
			--	ORDER BY  AI_NO, DATA_STATUS, APR_NO
		END

	IF(@Type = 5)
		BEGIN
			SET @Search_Value = '%' + @Search_Value +'%'
			
			SELECT DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS INV_AMOUNT, SUM(AAI_ADJUST) AS INV_ADJUST_AMT
			FROM (
			SELECT DISTINCT '1-ATS-INVOICE' AS DATA_STATUS, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, '' AS APR_NO, '' APR_DATE, Round(((AI_AMOUNT + ( AI_AMOUNT * (CASE WHEN TD_AGE IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE TD_AGE END))/100)),0) AS AI_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST
			FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
			WHERE (AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO +' - '+ AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO + ' - ' + AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO + ' - ' + STR(AO_VEHICLE_ID)) like @Search_Value
			UNION ALL
			SELECT DISTINCT '2-ATS-PR-ADJUSTMENT' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,
			'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, APR_DATE, 0 AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
			FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
			WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN 
			(SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
			WHERE (AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO +' - '+ AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO + ' - ' + AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO + ' - ' + STR(AO_VEHICLE_ID)) like @Search_Value)
			UNION ALL
			SELECT DISTINCT '3-DATA EXIST FOR PRI VIEW' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
			AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST
			FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  
			WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN 
			(SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
			WHERE (AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO +' - '+ AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO + ' - ' + AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO + ' - ' + STR(AO_VEHICLE_ID)) like @Search_Value)
				) AS ABC
GROUP BY DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_MAKE, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE	
				ORDER BY  AI_NO, DATA_STATUS, APR_NO

			--SELECT DATA_STATUS,	AI_NO, AI_DATE,	AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,	
			--AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE
			--FROM (
			--SELECT DISTINCT '1-ATS-INVOICE' AS DATA_STATUS, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			--AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, '' AS APR_NO, '' APR_DATE
			--FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
			--WHERE (AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO +' - '+ AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO + ' - ' + AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO + ' - ' + STR(AO_VEHICLE_ID)) like @Search_Value
			--UNION ALL
			--SELECT DISTINCT '2-ATS-PR-ADJUSTMENT' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO,  '' AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO,
			--'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			--'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, APR_DATE
			--FROM AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
			--WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN 
			--(SELECT AI_NO FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
			--WHERE (AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO +' - '+ AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO + ' - ' + AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO + ' - ' + STR(AO_VEHICLE_ID)) like @Search_Value)
			--UNION ALL
			--SELECT DISTINCT '3-DATA EXIST FOR PRI VIEW' AS DATA_STATUS, AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, '' AS AI_DATE, '' AS AI_AO_NO, 
			--AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
			--AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, APR_NO, APR_DATE
			--FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V  
			--WHERE AAI_AI_NO IN

			--	) AS ABC
			--	ORDER BY  AI_NO, DATA_STATUS, APR_NO
		END
END

CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.cursor_AR_UE_MSTR_BAL
AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @AI_NO int


DECLARE cursor_AR_UE_MSTR_BAL CURSOR FOR

SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO FROM (
SELECT   AI_NO, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID, SUM(DR) AS DR1, SUM(CR) AS CR1, (SUM(CR) - SUM(DR)) AS Bal 
FROM 
	(SELECT  Count([ENTRYTYPEID]) as cnt
		  ,[AI_NO]
		  ,[AI_IM_ID]
		  ,[JE_AC_ID]
		  ,Sum([JE_ENTERED_DR]) as DR
		  ,Sum([JE_ENTERED_CR]) as CR
	  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_UE_MSTR]   
	  WHERE [ENTRYTYPEID] = 1 AND [ENTRYNO] = 0
	  GROUP BY  [AI_NO], [AI_IM_ID] ,[JE_AC_ID]
	  UNION ALL
	  SELECT  Count([ENTRYTYPEID]) as cnt
		  ,[AI_NO]
		  ,[AI_IM_ID]
		  ,[JE_AC_ID]
		  ,Sum([JE_ENTERED_DR]) as DR
		  ,Sum([JE_ENTERED_CR]) as CR
	  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_UE_MSTR]   
	  WHERE [ENTRYTYPEID] = 2 AND [ENTRYNO] <> 0
	  GROUP BY  [AI_NO], [AI_IM_ID] ,[JE_AC_ID]) AS ABC 
	  
	  WHERE 1 = 1
	  GROUP BY  AI_NO, [AI_IM_ID] ,[JE_AC_ID]
	  HAVING (SUM(CR) - SUM(DR)) > 0
	) AS ABC1
  order by [AI_NO]


OPEN cursor_AR_UE_MSTR_BAL
FETCH NEXT FROM cursor_AR_UE_MSTR_BAL INTO @AI_NO
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS=0
BEGIN
	SELECT * FROM AR_UE_MSTR WHERE AI_NO = @AI_NO ORDER BY ENTRYTYPEID, ENTRYNO, AI_DATE
	FETCH NEXT FROM cursor_AR_UE_MSTR_BAL INTO @AI_NO
END
CLOSE cursor_AR_UE_MSTR_BAL
DEALLOCATE cursor_AR_UE_MSTR_BAL
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Get_AR_Invoice_Reports]
    @type NVARCHAR(10),
	@fin_year NVARCHAR(10) = NULL
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    IF @type = 'days'
    BEGIN
        -- Last 7 Days Invoice Summary (Datewise)
        SELECT top 7
            CAST(AIDATE AS DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
            SUM(InvAmt) AS TotInvAmt,  
            SUM(IncTaxAMT) AS TotalIncTaxAmt 
        FROM ( 
            SELECT  
                AI_NO, 
                MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
                SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS InvAmt, 
                SUM(ROUND((AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * td_age / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT 
            FROM AR_Invoice_V 
            GROUP BY AI_NO
        ) AS ABC
        WHERE AIDATE >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
        GROUP BY CAST(AIDATE AS DATE)
        ORDER BY CAST(AIDATE AS DATE);
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'month'
    BEGIN
        -- Monthly Invoice Summary

		DECLARE @Current_Period Varchar(9)
		SET @Current_Period = CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                  ELSE CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) 
                  AS VARCHAR(4)) END
        
		IF @fin_year IS NOT NULL
		BEGIN
			SET @Current_Period = @fin_year;
		END

		SELECT 
            FORMAT(AIDATE, 'yyyy-MM') AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records, 
            SUM(InvAmt) AS TotInvAmt,  
            SUM(IncTaxAMT) AS TotalIncTaxAmt 
        FROM ( 
            SELECT  
                AI_NO, 
                MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
                SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS InvAmt, 
                SUM(ROUND((AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * td_age / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT,
					CASE WHEN MONTH(MAX(AI_DATE)) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                  ELSE CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(MAX(AI_DATE)) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) 
                  AS VARCHAR(4)) END AS FY_Period				
            FROM AR_Invoice_V 
            GROUP BY AI_NO
        ) AS ABC
		WHERE FY_PERIOD = @Current_Period
        GROUP BY FORMAT(AIDATE, 'yyyy-MM')
        ORDER BY FORMAT(AIDATE, 'yyyy-MM');
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'year'
    BEGIN
        -- Yearly Invoice Summary
        SELECT 
            YEAR(AI_DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records, 
            SUM(InvAmt) AS TotInvAmt,  
            SUM(IncTaxAMT) AS TotalIncTaxAmt 
        FROM (
            SELECT  
                AI_NO, 
                MAX(AI_DATE) AS AI_DATE, 
                SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS InvAmt, 
                SUM(ROUND((AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * td_age / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT,
					CASE WHEN MONTH(MAX(AI_DATE)) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                  ELSE CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(MAX(AI_DATE)) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(MAX(AI_DATE)) 
                  AS VARCHAR(4)) END AS FY_Period
            FROM AR_Invoice_V 
            GROUP BY AI_NO
        ) AS ABC
		Where YEAR(AI_DATE) BETWEEN 2018 AND YEAR(GETDATE())
        GROUP BY YEAR(AI_DATE)
        ORDER BY YEAR(AI_DATE);
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'today'
    BEGIN
        -- Today's Invoice Summary
        SELECT 
            CAST(AIDATE AS DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
            SUM(InvAmt) AS TotInvAmt,  
            SUM(IncTaxAMT) AS TotalIncTaxAmt 
        FROM ( 
            SELECT  
                AI_NO, 
                MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
                SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS InvAmt, 
                SUM(ROUND((AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * td_age / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT 
            FROM AR_Invoice_V 
            GROUP BY AI_NO
        ) AS ABC
        WHERE CAST(AIDATE AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
        GROUP BY CAST(AIDATE AS DATE)
        ORDER BY CAST(AIDATE AS DATE);
    END

    ELSE
    BEGIN
        RAISERROR('Invalid type specified. Use ''days'', ''month'', ''year'', or ''today''.', 16, 1);
    END
END;

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Get_AR_OrderBooking_Reports]
    @type NVARCHAR(10),
	@fin_year NVARCHAR(10) = NULL  
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    IF @type = 'days'
    BEGIN
        -- Last 7 Days Order Bookings (Datewise)
        SELECT Top 7
            CAST(AO_Date AS DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records
        FROM (
            SELECT DISTINCT AO_NO, AO_DATE FROM AR_ORDER
        ) AS ABC
        WHERE AO_Date >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
        GROUP BY CAST(AO_Date AS DATE)
        ORDER BY CAST(AO_Date AS DATE);
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'month'
    BEGIN
		DECLARE @Current_Period Varchar(9)
		SET @Current_Period = CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                  ELSE CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) 
                  AS VARCHAR(4)) END

		IF @fin_year IS NOT NULL
		BEGIN
			SET @Current_Period = @fin_year;
		END

        -- Monthly Order Bookings
        SELECT 
            FORMAT(AO_Date, 'yyyy-MM') AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records 
        FROM (
            SELECT DISTINCT AO_NO, AO_DATE,
					CASE WHEN MONTH(AO_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(AO_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                  ELSE CAST(YEAR(AO_DATE) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(AO_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(AO_DATE) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(AO_DATE) 
                  AS VARCHAR(4)) END AS FY_Period FROM AR_ORDER
        ) AS ABC
		WHERE FY_PERIOD = @Current_Period
        GROUP BY FORMAT(AO_Date, 'yyyy-MM')
        ORDER BY FORMAT(AO_Date, 'yyyy-MM');
		--select @fin_year
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'year'
    BEGIN
        -- Yearly Order Bookings
        SELECT 
            YEAR(AO_Date) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records 
        FROM (
            SELECT DISTINCT AO_NO, AO_DATE FROM AR_ORDER
        ) AS ABC
		Where YEAR(AO_Date) BETWEEN 2018 AND YEAR(GETDATE())
        GROUP BY YEAR(AO_Date)
        ORDER BY YEAR(AO_Date);
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'today'
    BEGIN
        -- Today's Order Bookings
        SELECT 
            CAST(AO_Date AS DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records 
        FROM (
            SELECT DISTINCT AO_NO, AO_DATE FROM AR_ORDER
        ) AS ABC
        WHERE CAST(AO_Date AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
        GROUP BY CAST(AO_Date AS DATE)
        ORDER BY CAST(AO_Date AS DATE);
    END

    ELSE
    BEGIN
        RAISERROR('Invalid type specified. Use ''days'', ''month'', ''year'', or ''today''.', 16, 1);
    END
END;

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Get_AR_Receipt_Reports]
    @type NVARCHAR(10),
	@fin_year NVARCHAR(10) = NULL  
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

	IF @type = 'today'
    BEGIN
        SELECT 
            CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records, 
            SUM(RAmt) AS TotReceiptAmt 
        FROM (
            SELECT  
                APR_NO, 
                MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
                SUM(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) AS RAmt 
            FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
            GROUP BY APR_NO
        ) AS ABC
		WHERE CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
        GROUP BY CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE)
        ORDER BY CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE);
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'days'
    BEGIN
        SELECT top 7
            CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records, 
            SUM(RAmt) AS TotReceiptAmt 
        FROM (
            SELECT  
                APR_NO, 
                MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
                SUM(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) AS RAmt 
            FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
            GROUP BY APR_NO
        ) AS ABC
        WHERE APR_DATE >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, GETDATE())
        GROUP BY CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE)
        ORDER BY CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE);
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'month'
    BEGIN

		DECLARE @Current_Period Varchar(9)
		SET @Current_Period = CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                  ELSE CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(GETDATE()) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(GETDATE()) 
                  AS VARCHAR(4)) END

		IF @fin_year IS NOT NULL
			BEGIN
				SET @Current_Period = @fin_year;
			END
		ELSE
			BEGIN
				SET @Current_Period = '2024-2025';
			END

        SELECT 
            FORMAT(APR_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records, 
            SUM(RAmt) AS TotReceiptAmt 
        FROM (
            SELECT  
                APR_NO, 
                MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
                SUM(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) AS RAmt,
					CASE WHEN MONTH(MAX(APR_DATE)) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(MAX(APR_DATE)) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                  ELSE CAST(YEAR(MAX(APR_DATE)) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(MAX(APR_DATE)) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(MAX(APR_DATE)) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(MAX(APR_DATE)) 
                  AS VARCHAR(4)) END AS FY_Period
            FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
            GROUP BY APR_NO
        ) AS ABC
		WHERE FY_PERIOD = @Current_Period
        GROUP BY FORMAT(APR_DATE, 'yyyy-MM')
        ORDER BY FORMAT(APR_DATE, 'yyyy-MM');
    END

    ELSE IF @type = 'year'
    BEGIN
        SELECT 
            YEAR(APR_DATE) AS record_date, 
            COUNT(*) AS no_of_records, 
            SUM(RAmt) AS TotReceiptAmt 
        FROM (
            SELECT  
                APR_NO, 
                MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
                SUM(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) AS RAmt 
            FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
            GROUP BY APR_NO
        ) AS ABC
		Where YEAR(APR_Date) BETWEEN 2018 AND YEAR(GETDATE())
        GROUP BY YEAR(APR_DATE)
        ORDER BY YEAR(APR_DATE);
    END

    ELSE
    BEGIN
        RAISERROR('Invalid type specified. Use ''days'', ''month'', or ''year''.', 16, 1);
    END
END;

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[GET_DETAIL_FOR_DASHBOARD] (@filter varchar(256), @date as date) 
AS
BEGIN
	IF @filter = 'Posted'
	BEGIN
		SELECT *
		FROM (
			SELECT 
				FORMAT(ATS_Date, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) as ATS_Date, 
				CO_Company_Name AS Customer, 
				SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt) AS Total_Amt 
			FROM dbo.DashboardSummaryMasterData
			WHERE ATS_Date = @date
			AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
			GROUP BY ATS_Date, CO_Company_Name
			UNION ALL
			SELECT 
				FORMAT(@date, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) AS ATS_Date,
				'Grand Total' AS Customer, 
				SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt) AS Total_Amt 
			FROM dbo.DashboardSummaryMasterData
			WHERE ATS_Date = @date
			AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
		) AS CombinedResult
		ORDER BY CASE WHEN Customer = 'Grand Total' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, Customer;
	END

	IF @filter = 'Logged'
	BEGIN
		SELECT *
		FROM (
			SELECT 
				FORMAT(LOG_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) as ATS_Date, 
				CO_Company_Name AS Customer, 
				SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt) AS Total_Amt 
			FROM dbo.DashboardSummaryMasterData
			WHERE LOG_DATE = @date
			AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
			GROUP BY LOG_DATE, CO_Company_Name
			UNION ALL
			SELECT 
				FORMAT(@date, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) AS ATS_Date,
				'Grand Total' AS Customer, 
				SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt) AS Total_Amt 
			FROM dbo.DashboardSummaryMasterData
			WHERE LOG_DATE = @date
			AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
		) AS CombinedResult
		ORDER BY CASE WHEN Customer = 'Grand Total' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END, Customer;
	END


END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[GET_SUMMARY_FOR_DASHBOARD] 
    @filter VARCHAR(256), 
    @log VARCHAR(256), 
    @type VARCHAR(256)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @dateFrom DATETIME;
    DECLARE @dateTo DATETIME;

    --IF @log = 'Previous'
    --BEGIN
    --    SET @dateFrom = DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()) - 1, 1);
    --    SET @dateTo = EOMONTH(GETDATE(), -1);
    --END
	--IF @log = 'Current'
    --BEGIN
    --    SET @dateFrom = DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1);
    --    SET @dateTo = DATEADD(DAY, 1, GETDATE());  -- GETDATE() + 1 is invalid syntax
    --END

	IF @log = 'Previous'
	BEGIN
		SET @dateFrom = DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()) - 1, 0);
		SET @dateTo   = DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0);
	END

    
	IF @log = 'Current'
	BEGIN
		SET @dateFrom = DATEADD(MONTH, DATEDIFF(MONTH, 0, GETDATE()), 0);
		SET @dateTo   = DATEADD(DAY, 1, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE));
	END
    IF @filter = 'Posted'
    BEGIN
        IF @type = 'Summary'
        BEGIN
            SELECT 
                ATS_Date,
                ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) AS [Bank Islami Pakistan Limited],
                ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) AS [Dubai Islamic Bank Limited],
                ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS [Meezan Bank Limited],
                ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) 
              + ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) 
              + ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS Total
            FROM (
                SELECT 
                    FORMAT(ATS_Date, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) AS ATS_Date, 
                    BANK_NAME, 
                    ISNULL(Tot_Receipt_Amt, 0) AS Tot_Receipt_Amt
                FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[DashboardSummaryMasterData]
                WHERE ATS_DATE >= @dateFrom 
                  AND ATS_DATE <= @dateTo
                  AND BANK_NAME IN (
                        'Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 
                        'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 
                        'Meezan Bank Limited'
                  )
				  AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
            ) AS SourceData
            PIVOT (
                SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt)
                FOR BANK_NAME IN (
                    [Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 
                    [Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 
                    [Meezan Bank Limited]
                )
            ) AS PivotTable
            ORDER BY ATS_Date DESC;
        END

        IF @type = 'Total'
        BEGIN
            SELECT 
				ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) AS [Bank Islami Pakistan Limited],
				ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) AS [Dubai Islamic Bank Limited],
				ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS [Meezan Bank Limited],
				ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) 
					+ ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) 
					+ ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS Total
			FROM (
				SELECT 
					BANK_NAME, 
					ISNULL(Tot_Receipt_Amt, 0) AS Tot_Receipt_Amt
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[DashboardSummaryMasterData]
				WHERE ATS_Date >= @dateFrom  
					AND ATS_Date <= @dateTo
					AND BANK_NAME IN (
						'Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 
						'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 
						'Meezan Bank Limited'
					)
					AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
			) AS SourceData
			PIVOT (
				SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt)
				FOR BANK_NAME IN (
					[Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 
					[Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 
					[Meezan Bank Limited]
				)
			) AS PivotTable;
        END
    END

    IF @filter = 'Logged'
    BEGIN
        IF @type = 'Summary'
        BEGIN
            SELECT 
                ATS_Date,
                ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) AS [Bank Islami Pakistan Limited],
                ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) AS [Dubai Islamic Bank Limited],
                ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS [Meezan Bank Limited],
                ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) 
              + ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) 
              + ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS Total	
            FROM (
                SELECT 
                    FORMAT(LOG_DATE, 'yyyy-MM-dd' ) AS ATS_Date, 
                    BANK_NAME, 
                    ISNULL(Tot_Receipt_Amt, 0) AS Tot_Receipt_Amt
                FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[DashboardSummaryMasterData]
                WHERE LOG_DATE >= @dateFrom  
                  AND LOG_DATE <= @dateTo
                  AND BANK_NAME IN (
                        'Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 
                        'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 
                        'Meezan Bank Limited'
                  )
				  AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
            ) AS SourceData
            PIVOT (
                SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt)
                FOR BANK_NAME IN (
                    [Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 
                    [Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 
                    [Meezan Bank Limited]
                )
            ) AS PivotTable
            ORDER BY ATS_Date DESC;
        END

        IF @type = 'Total'
        BEGIN
            SELECT 
				ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) AS [Bank Islami Pakistan Limited],
				ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) AS [Dubai Islamic Bank Limited],
				ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS [Meezan Bank Limited],
				ISNULL([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 0) 
					+ ISNULL([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 0) 
					+ ISNULL([Meezan Bank Limited], 0) AS Total
			FROM (
				SELECT 
					BANK_NAME, 
					ISNULL(Tot_Receipt_Amt, 0) AS Tot_Receipt_Amt
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[DashboardSummaryMasterData]
				WHERE LOG_DATE >= @dateFrom  
					AND LOG_DATE <= @dateTo
					AND BANK_NAME IN (
						'Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 
						'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 
						'Meezan Bank Limited'
					)
					 AND Tot_Receipt_Amt IS NOT NULL
			) AS SourceData
			PIVOT (
				SUM(Tot_Receipt_Amt)
				FOR BANK_NAME IN (
					[Bank Islami Pakistan Limited], 
					[Dubai Islamic Bank Limited], 
					[Meezan Bank Limited]
				)
			) AS PivotTable;
        END
    END
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[GET_TOTAL_FROM_SUMMARIES] (@fitler varchar(256))
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @cols NVARCHAR(MAX),
    @sql NVARCHAR(MAX);
	IF @fitler ='Current'
	BEGIN
		-- Step 1: Build column list (excluding ATS_Date)
		SELECT @cols = STUFF((
			SELECT DISTINCT ', SUM(' + QUOTENAME(name) + ') AS ' + QUOTENAME(name)
			FROM sys.columns
			WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.CurrentMonthSummary')
			  AND name <> 'ATS_Date'
			FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

		-- Step 2: Build the query
		SET @sql = '
		SELECT ' + @cols + '
		FROM dbo.CurrentMonthSummary;';

		-- Step 3: Execute it
		EXEC sp_executesql @sql;
	END

	IF @fitler ='Previous'
	BEGIN
		-- Step 1: Build column list (excluding ATS_Date)
		SELECT @cols = STUFF((
			SELECT DISTINCT ', SUM(' + QUOTENAME(name) + ') AS ' + QUOTENAME(name)
			FROM sys.columns
			WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.LastMonthSummary')
			  AND name <> 'ATS_Date'
			FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

		-- Step 2: Build the query
		SET @sql = '
		SELECT ' + @cols + '
		FROM dbo.LastMonthSummary;';

		-- Step 3: Execute it
		EXEC sp_executesql @sql;
	END
	IF @fitler ='List'
	BEGIN
		SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), CAST([ATS_Date] AS DATE), 120) as  [ATS_Date]
			   --ISNULL(FORMAT( [ATS_Date], 'dd-MMM-yyyy' ),'-') as  [ATS_Date]
			  ,[Bank Islami Pakistan Limited]
			  ,[Dubai Islamic Bank Limited]
			  ,[Meezan Bank Limited]
			  ,[Total]
		  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[CurrentMonthSummary]

		UNION ALL

		SELECT 'Grand Total' as  [ATS_Date]
			  ,SUM([Bank Islami Pakistan Limited]) as [Bank Islami Pakistan Limited]
			  ,SUM([Dubai Islamic Bank Limited]) as [Dubai Islamic Bank Limited]
			  ,SUM([Meezan Bank Limited]) [Meezan Bank Limited]
			  ,SUM([Total]) as [Total]
		  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[CurrentMonthSummary]

		  order by  [ATS_Date] desc
	END
END

					CAST(SRC.APR_DATE AS DATE) AS ATS_Date,

					SRC.BANK_NAME,

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[INV_ApprovalRequest_sh]
	@Type int,
	@AR_ID int,
	@AR_Title varchar(100),
	@AR_Descr varchar(250)
AS
BEGIN
	IF @Type = 1
	BEGIN
		Select AR_ID, AR_Title, AR_Descr From INV_ApprovalRequest
	END
	IF @Type = 2
	BEGIN
		Select AR_ID, AR_Title, AR_Descr From INV_ApprovalRequest 
		WHERE AR_ID = @AR_ID
	END
	IF @Type = 3
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO INV_ApprovalRequest (AR_Title, AR_Descr) VALUES (@AR_Title ,@AR_Descr)
	END
	IF @Type = 4
	BEGIN
		UPDATE INV_ApprovalRequest SET AR_Descr = @AR_Descr, AR_Title = @AR_Title 
		WHERE AR_ID = @AR_ID
	END
	IF @Type = 5
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM INV_ApprovalRequest WHERE AR_ID = @AR_ID
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[INV_Item_Mstr_sh]
	@Type int,
	@Item_Combination_ID int,
	@IC_ID int,
	@IC_Descr varchar(50),
	@ISC_Comb_ID int,
	@Item_ID int,
	@Item_Code varchar(10),
	@Item_Descr varchar(200),
	@CCID varchar(50)

AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @IC_AC_ID AS INT

	IF @Type = 1
	BEGIN
		SELECT INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.ISC_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Sub_Category.IC_ID, 
				INV_Item_Sub_Category.IC_Descr, INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_ID, INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_Descr, 
				INV_Item_Mstr.Item_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
				INV_Item_Mstr.IC_AC_ID, CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME
		FROM     INV_Item_Sub_Category INNER JOIN
						  INV_Item_Mstr ON INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.ISC_Combination_ID INNER JOIN
						  CODE_COMBINATION_V ON INV_Item_Mstr.IC_AC_ID = CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID
		ORDER BY INV_Item_Sub_Category.IC_ID, INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code
	END
	IF @Type = 2
	BEGIN
		SELECT INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.ISC_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Sub_Category.IC_ID, 
				INV_Item_Sub_Category.IC_Descr, INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_ID, INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_Descr, 
				INV_Item_Mstr.Item_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
				INV_Item_Mstr.IC_AC_ID, CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME
		FROM     INV_Item_Sub_Category INNER JOIN
						  INV_Item_Mstr ON INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.ISC_Combination_ID INNER JOIN
						  CODE_COMBINATION_V ON INV_Item_Mstr.IC_AC_ID = CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID
		WHERE INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID = @Item_Combination_ID
		ORDER BY INV_Item_Sub_Category.IC_ID, INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code
	END
	IF @Type = 3				
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @Max_Item_ID AS INT
		DECLARE @ISC_ID AS INT
		SET @ISC_ID = (Select ISC_ID From INV_Item_Sub_Category Where ISC_Combination_ID = @ISC_Comb_ID)

		SET @Max_Item_ID = (SELECT (ISNULL(MAX(Item_ID),0) + 1) 
		FROM INV_Item_Mstr 
		WHERE IC_ID = @IC_ID And ISC_ID = @ISC_ID);

		SET @Item_Code = Format(@IC_ID,'00') + '-' + Format(@ISC_ID,'00') + '-' + Format(@Max_Item_ID,'0000')

		SET @IC_AC_ID =  (Select COMBINATION_ID from CODE_COMBINATION_V where CODE_COMBINATION = @CCID)

		INSERT INTO INV_Item_Mstr (ISC_Combination_ID, IC_ID, ISC_ID, Item_ID, Item_Code, Item_Descr, IC_AC_ID) 
				VALUES 
				(@ISC_Comb_ID, @IC_ID, @ISC_ID, @Max_Item_ID, @Item_Code, @Item_Descr, @IC_AC_ID)
	END
	IF @Type = 4
		BEGIN
			--SET @ISC_Combination_ID = (Select ISC_Combination_ID From INV_Item_Sub_Category Where IC_ID = @IC_ID And ISC_ID = @ISC_ID)
			--SET @Item_ID = (Select Item_ID From INV_Item_Mstr Where IC_ID = @IC_ID And ISC_ID = @ISC_ID)
			SET @IC_AC_ID =  (Select COMBINATION_ID from CODE_COMBINATION_V where CODE_COMBINATION = @CCID)



			UPDATE INV_Item_Mstr SET 
				--ISC_Combination_ID = @ISC_Combination_ID,
				--IC_ID = @IC_ID,
				--ISC_ID = @ISC_ID,
				--Item_ID = @Item_ID,
				--Item_Code = @Item_Code,
				Item_Descr = @Item_Descr,
				IC_AC_ID = @IC_AC_ID
			WHERE Item_Combination_ID = @Item_Combination_ID
		END
	IF @Type = 5
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM INV_Item_Mstr WHERE Item_Combination_ID = @Item_Combination_ID
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[INV_ItemCategory_sh]
	@Type int,
	@IC_ID int,
	@IC_Descr varchar(50),
	@Cat_Type varchar(50)
AS
BEGIN
	IF @Type = 1
	BEGIN
		Select IC_ID, IC_Descr, Cat_Type From INV_Item_Category
	END
	IF @Type = 2
	BEGIN
		Select IC_ID, IC_Descr, Cat_Type From INV_Item_Category 
		WHERE IC_ID = @IC_ID
	END
	IF @Type = 3
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO INV_Item_Category (IC_Descr, Cat_Type) VALUES (@IC_Descr, @Cat_Type)
	END
	IF @Type = 4
	BEGIN
		UPDATE INV_Item_Category SET IC_Descr = @IC_Descr,
									Cat_Type =  @Cat_Type
		WHERE IC_ID = @IC_ID
	END
	IF @Type = 5
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM INV_Item_Category WHERE IC_ID = @IC_ID
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[INV_ItemSubCategory_sh]
	@Type int,
	@ISC_Combination_ID int,
	@IC_ID int,
	@IC_Descr varchar(100),
	@ISC_ID int,
	@ISC_Descr varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN

	IF @Type = 1
	BEGIN
		SELECT *
		FROM     INV_Item_Sub_Category
		ORDER BY INV_Item_Sub_Category.IC_ID, INV_Item_Sub_Category.ISC_ID
	END
	IF @Type = 2
	BEGIN
		SELECT *
		FROM     INV_Item_Sub_Category
		WHERE ISC_ID = @ISC_ID
	END
	IF @Type = 3				
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @Max_ISC_ID AS INT
		SET @Max_ISC_ID = (SELECT (MAX(ISC_ID) + 1) 
		FROM INV_Item_Sub_Category 
		WHERE IC_ID = @IC_ID);

		INSERT INTO INV_Item_Sub_Category (IC_ID, IC_DESCR, ISC_ID, ISC_Descr) 
				VALUES 
				(@IC_ID, @IC_DESCR, @MAX_ISC_ID, @ISC_Descr)
	END
	IF @Type = 4
	BEGIN
		UPDATE INV_Item_Sub_Category SET 
			IC_ID = @IC_ID,
			IC_DESCR = @IC_DESCR,
			ISC_ID = @ISC_ID,
			ISC_Descr = @ISC_Descr 
		WHERE ISC_Combination_ID = @ISC_Combination_ID
	END
	IF @Type = 5
	BEGIN
		DELETE FROM INV_Item_Sub_Category WHERE ISC_Combination_ID = @ISC_Combination_ID
	END
END
