CREATE Procedure [dbo].[JournalLedgerPosting_sh]
	@Type int,
	@SubType int,
	@JE_VoucherNo bigint,
	@FDate datetime,
	@TDate datetime,
	@JE_Type varchar(20)
AS 
BEGIN
	if(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct JE_TYPE from GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
	END
	if(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		if(@SubType = 0)
		BEGIN
		Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) as 'JE_ENTERED_CR', SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) as 'JE_ENTERED_DR'
		from je_detail_v Where (JE_POST_FLAG is null or JE_POST_FLAG = 0) AND JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo AND JE_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND JE_TYPE = @JE_Type
		group by JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE
		END
		if(@SubType = 1)
		BEGIN
		Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) as 'JE_ENTERED_CR', SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) as 'JE_ENTERED_DR'
		from je_detail_v Where (JE_POST_FLAG is null or JE_POST_FLAG = 0) AND JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo
		group by JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE
		END
		if(@SubType = 2)
		BEGIN
		Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) as 'JE_ENTERED_CR', SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) as 'JE_ENTERED_DR'
		from je_detail_v Where (JE_POST_FLAG is null or JE_POST_FLAG = 0) AND JE_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
		group by JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE
		END
		if(@SubType = 3)
		BEGIN
		Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) as 'JE_ENTERED_CR', SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) as 'JE_ENTERED_DR'
		from je_detail_v Where (JE_POST_FLAG is null or JE_POST_FLAG = 0) AND JE_TYPE = @JE_Type
		group by JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE
		END
		if(@SubType = 4)
		BEGIN
		Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) as 'JE_ENTERED_CR', SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) as 'JE_ENTERED_DR'
		from je_detail_v Where (JE_POST_FLAG is null or JE_POST_FLAG = 0) AND JE_TYPE = @JE_Type AND JE_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
		group by JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE
		END
		if(@SubType = 5)
		BEGIN
		Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) as 'JE_ENTERED_CR', SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) as 'JE_ENTERED_DR'
		from je_detail_v Where (JE_POST_FLAG is null or JE_POST_FLAG = 0) group by JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE
		END
	END
	if(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) as 'JE_ENTERED_CR', SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) as 'JE_ENTERED_DR' from je_detail_v 
		Where (JE_POST_FLAG is null or JE_POST_FLAG = 0) group by JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_TYPE order by JE_VOUCHER_NO
	END
	if(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Update GL_JE_HEADER_ALL Set JE_POST_FLAG = 1 Where JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo
	END
	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[JournalVoucher_sh]
	@Type int,
	@JE_HeaderID int,
	@JE_VoucherNo bigint,
	@JE_Description varchar(255),
	@JE_Name varchar(50),
	@JE_Date datetime,
	@JE_ACID int,
	@JE_EnteredCR decimal,
	@JE_EnteredDR decimal,
	@JE_Type varchar(15),
	@JE_POSTFLAG bit,
	@SearchValue varchar(100),
	@SearchType int,
	@VoucherMonth int,
	@VoucherYear int
AS
BEGIN
	if(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Select je.*, cc.CODE_COMBINATION, cc.NAME_COMBINATION from JE_DETAIL_V je 
		inner join CODE_COMBINATION_V cc on cc.COMBINATION_ID = je.JE_AC_ID where JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo
		order by je.JE_LINE_ID
	END
	if(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_NAME, JE_TYPE, JE_DATE, JE_POST_FLAG from GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
		    where JE_TYPE != 'Adjust UE' AND JE_VOUCHER_NO = @SearchValue order by JE_VOUCHER_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_NAME, JE_TYPE, JE_DATE, JE_POST_FLAG from GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
			where JE_TYPE != 'Adjust UE' AND JE_DESCRIPTION like @SearchValue order by JE_VOUCHER_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			Select JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_NAME, JE_TYPE, JE_DATE, JE_POST_FLAG from GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
			where JE_TYPE != 'Adjust UE' AND JE_DATE = Cast(@SearchValue as datetime) order by JE_VOUCHER_NO
		END
	END
	if(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SET @JE_POSTFLAG = (CASE WHEN @JE_POSTFLAG IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE @JE_POSTFLAG END);

		Insert into GL_JE_HEADER_ALL (JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_NAME, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG ) 
		Values (@JE_VoucherNo, @JE_Date, @JE_Name, @JE_Description, @JE_Type, @JE_POSTFLAG)

		Select @JE_VoucherNo
	End
	if(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		SET @JE_HeaderID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo)
		Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL (JE_HEADER_ID, JE_AC_ID, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE)
		Values (@JE_HeaderID, @JE_ACID, @JE_EnteredDR, @JE_EnteredCR, @JE_Description)

		Select @JE_VoucherNo
	END
	if(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		SELECT (CASE WHEN (MAX(CONVERT(BIGINT,RIGHT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,6))) IS NULL) THEN 1 
					WHEN MAX(CONVERT(BIGINT,RIGHT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,6))) IS NOT NULL 
					THEN (MAX(CONVERT(BIGINT,RIGHT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,6))) + 1) 
					END) AS VCHNO		 
		FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL	
		WHERE MONTH(JE_DATE) = @VoucherMonth AND YEAR(JE_DATE) = @VoucherYear
	END
	if(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS (
			Select * from GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
			Where JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo
		)
		BEGIN
		--Update GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
		--SET	JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo,
		--	JE_DATE = @JE_Date,
		--	JE_NAME = @JE_Name,
		--	JE_DESCRIPTION = @JE_Description,
		--	JE_TYPE = @JE_Type,
		--	JE_POST_FLAG = @JE_POSTFLAG
		--Where JE_HEADER_ID = @JE_HeaderID
		SET @JE_HeaderID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @JE_VoucherNo)

		Delete from GL_JE_HEADER_ALL Where JE_HEADER_ID = @JE_HeaderID
		Delete from GL_JE_LINES_ALL Where JE_HEADER_ID = @JE_HeaderID
		
		Select @JE_VoucherNo
		END
	END


	if(@Type = 9)
	BEGIN
		Exec sp_GL_Expenes_Pivot_Table	@Type  = 1,	@FY_Period = @SearchValue
	END

	if(@Type = 10)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT FY_PERIOD FROM JE_EXP_DETAIL_V ORDER BY FY_PERIOD DESC
	END

	if(@Type = 11)
	BEGIN
		Exec sp_AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_Pivot_Table @Amount_Range_Type = @SearchValue
	END

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[JVPrintOutReport_sh](@m_FDate date, @m_TDate date, @m_FvoucherNo bigint, @m_TvoucherNo bigint)
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;
	DECLARE @FvoucherNo bigint;
	DECLARE @TvoucherNo bigint;

	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate
	SET	@FvoucherNo = @m_FvoucherNo
	SET	@TvoucherNo = @m_TvoucherNo

	IF (@FDate IS NULL OR @TDate IS NULL)
		BEGIN
			SET	@FDate = '1900-01-01'
			SET	@TDate = '1900-01-01'
		END

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);

	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);

	SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT dbo.je_detail_v.*, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION        
					FROM  dbo.je_detail_v INNER JOIN        
					dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.je_detail_v.JE_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID          
					WHERE 1 = 1 AND JE_VOUCHER_NO > 0 ';
					IF(@FvoucherNo != 0)
					BEGIN
						IF(@TvoucherNo = 0)
							BEGIN
								SET @TvoucherNo = @FvoucherNo;
							END
						SET @QUERY_S_1 += ' AND JE_VOUCHER_NO BETWEEN ' + CAST(@FvoucherNo as nvarchar(24)) + ' AND ' + CAST(@TvoucherNo as nvarchar(24)) 
					END

					IF(YEAR(@FDate) != 1900)
					BEGIN
						IF(YEAR(@TDate) = 1900)
							BEGIN
								SET @TDate = @FDate;
							END
						SET @QUERY_S_1 += ' AND JE_DATE BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND '''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''''
					END
					SET @QUERY_S_1 += ' ORDER BY JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_LINE_ID '


	SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 

	--SELECT @QUERY_S_1

	EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[NaturalAccount_sh]
	@Type int,
	@NAID varchar(50),
	@NAName varchar(50)
As
BEGIN
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Insert into NATURAL_ACCOUNT(
		NA_ID,
		NA_NAME
		)
		Select @NAID,
			   @NAName

		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		Select NA_ID from NATURAL_ACCOUNT
		where NA_ID = @NAID
		)
		BEGIN
			Update NATURAL_ACCOUNT
			Set NA_ID = @NAID,
				NA_NAME = @NAName
				where NA_ID = @NAID
			Select @NAID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct NA_ID, NA_NAME from NATURAL_ACCOUNT
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct NA_ID, NA_NAME from NATURAL_ACCOUNT
		Where NA_ID = @NAID
	END	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[Organization_sh]
	@Type int,
	@ORGID varchar(50),
	@ORGName varchar(50)
As
BEGIN
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Insert into Organizational_Unit(
		ORG_ID,
		ORG_NAME
		)
		Select @ORGID,
			   @ORGName

		select @ORGID
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		Select ORG_ID from Organizational_Unit
		where ORG_ID = @ORGID
		)
		BEGIN
			Update Organizational_Unit
			Set ORG_ID = @ORGID,
				ORG_NAME = @ORGName
				where ORG_ID = @ORGID
			Select @ORGID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct ORG_ID, ORG_NAME from Organizational_Unit
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct ORG_ID, ORG_NAME from Organizational_Unit
		Where ORG_ID = @ORGID
	END	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PendingInvoices_KJN]
	@Type int,
	@Skip int,
	@Take int,
	@FDate date,
	@TDate date,
	@CoID int,
	@ATSCRMTYPE varchar(10)

AS
BEGIN

	if(@Type = 3 )
		IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
			BEGIN
				--DECLARE @FDate date = '2000-01-01';
				--DECLARE @TDate date = '2023-12-31';
				
				SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
					SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
					, SUM(ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
					FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
					WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
					GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
				UNION ALL
					SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
					, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM(ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS CRM_AMT
					FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
					WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
						GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
					) AS ABC
			GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END

		IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
			BEGIN
				--DECLARE @FDate date = '2000-01-01';
				--DECLARE @TDate date = '2023-12-31';

				SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
					SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
					, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
					FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
					WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
					GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
				) AS ABC
				GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
				ORDER BY YR, MNTH
			END

		IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
			BEGIN
				--DECLARE @FDate date = '2000-01-01';
				--DECLARE @TDate date = '2023-12-31';

				SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
					SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
					, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
					FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
					WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
						GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
				) AS ABC
				GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
				ORDER BY YR, MNTH
			END

	if(@Type = 33 )
		BEGIN
			SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
				GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
				) AS ABC
			GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END
	if(@Type = 333 )
		BEGIN
			SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
					GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
					) AS ABC
			GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PendingInvoices_sh]
	@Type int,
	@Skip int,
	@Take int,
	@FDate date,
	@TDate date,
	@CoID int,
	@ATSCRMTYPE varchar(10)

AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
	  SELECT [AAI_AI_NO]
      ,[AAI_AI_DATE]
      ,[AAI_AI_AMOUNT]
      ,[AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]
      ,[AAI_ADJUST]
      ,[AAI_CO_ID]
      ,[CO_Company_Name]
      ,[AO_VEHICLE_ID]
      ,[AI_vehicle_make]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_MODEL]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_DOI]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO]
	   FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1]
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
	  SELECT *  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1] Order By AAI_AI_NO
	  OFFSET @Skip ROWS FETCH NEXT @Take ROWS ONLY
	END
	if(@Type = 3 AND @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
		BEGIN
			SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
				GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
				UNION ALL
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
					GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
					) AS ABC

	--			where  type in (@ATSCRMTYPE)

				--WHERE TYPE IN (CASE WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS' THEN 'ATS' 
				--				   WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM' THEN 'CRM' 
				--				   WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL' THEN SET @ATSCRMTYPE = CONCAT('ATS',',','CRM')
				--			  END )

			GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END
	if(@Type = 3 AND (@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS' OR @ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM'))
		BEGIN
			SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
				GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
				UNION ALL
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
					GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
					) AS ABC

	--			where  type in (@ATSCRMTYPE)

				WHERE TYPE = @ATSCRMTYPE

			GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END
	if(@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		SELECT MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
			SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
			, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
			FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
			WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
			  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name  
			  UNION ALL
			  SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
			  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
			FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
			WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
			  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
			  ) AS ABC
			GROUP BY MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
	END

	IF(@TYPE = 5)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT [TYPE], [AAI_CO_ID], [CO_Company_Name]
			FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V]
			ORDER BY AAI_CO_ID
		END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PendingInvoices_sh2]
	@Type int,
	@Skip int,
	@Take int,
	@FDate date,
	@TDate date,
	@CoID int,
	@ATSCRMTYPE varchar(10)

AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
	  SELECT [AAI_AI_NO]
      ,[AAI_AI_DATE]
      ,[AAI_AI_AMOUNT]
      ,[AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]
      ,[AAI_ADJUST]
      ,[AAI_CO_ID]
      ,[CO_Company_Name]
      ,[AO_VEHICLE_ID]
      ,[AI_vehicle_make]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_MODEL]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_DOI]
      ,[AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO]
	   FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1]
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
	  SELECT *  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1] Order By AAI_AI_NO
	  OFFSET @Skip ROWS FETCH NEXT @Take ROWS ONLY
	END
	if(@Type = 3 AND @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
		BEGIN
			SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
				GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
				UNION ALL
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
					GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
					) AS ABC

	--			where  type in (@ATSCRMTYPE)

				--WHERE TYPE IN (CASE WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS' THEN 'ATS' 
				--				   WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM' THEN 'CRM' 
				--				   WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL' THEN SET @ATSCRMTYPE = CONCAT('ATS',',','CRM')
				--			  END )

			GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END
	if(@Type = 3 AND (@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS' OR @ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM'))
		BEGIN
			SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
				GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
				UNION ALL
				SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
				, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
				FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
				WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
					GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
					) AS ABC

	--			where  type in (@ATSCRMTYPE)

				WHERE TYPE = @ATSCRMTYPE

			GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END
	if(@Type = 4 AND (@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS' OR @ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM'))
	BEGIN
		SELECT MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
			SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
			, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
			FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
			WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' 
			  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name  
			  UNION ALL
			  SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
			  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
			FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
			WHERE TYPE = 'CRM'
			  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
			  ) AS ABC
			GROUP BY MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
	END
	if(@Type = 4 AND @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL' AND @CoID = 0)
	BEGIN
		SELECT MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
			SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
			, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
			FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
			WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
			  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name  
			  UNION ALL
			  SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
			  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
			FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
			WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
			  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
			  ) AS ABC
			GROUP BY MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
			ORDER BY YR, MNTH
	END
	IF(@TYPE = 5)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT [TYPE], [AAI_CO_ID], [CO_Company_Name]
			FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V]
			ORDER BY AAI_CO_ID
		END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PI_Invoice_sh]
	@Type int,
	@PI_NO bigint,
	@PI_DATE datetime,
	@PI_Pur_Type varchar(50),
	@PI_PAY_TO varchar(50),
	@PI_REMARKS varchar(100),
	@PI_SUPPLIER_REF varchar(50),
	@PI_AS_ID int,
	@PI_TYPE varchar(50),
	@PI_Item_Combination_ID int,
	@PI_RMKS varchar(200), 
	@PI_QTY FLOAT,
	@PI_RATE FLOAT,
	@PI_AMOUNT float,
	@PI_GST INT,
	@PI_AST INT,
	@PI_NET_AMOUNT float,

	@Item_Type varchar(50),
	@D_Serial_No varchar(50),
	@D_IMEI_No varchar(50),
	@S_SIM_No varchar(50),
	@S_IMEI_No varchar(50),
	@S_ICCID_No varchar(50),
	@S_MSISDN_No varchar(50),
	@PIID bigint,

	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)

AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN	
		
		--SELECT @PI_NO,@PI_DATE,@PI_PAY_TO,@PI_REMARKS,@PI_SUPPLIER_REF,@PI_AS_ID,@PI_TYPE,@PI_Item_Combination_ID,
		--	   @PI_RMKS,@PI_QTY,@PI_RATE,@PI_AMOUNT,@PI_GST,@PI_AST,@PI_NET_AMOUNT,
		--	   @Item_Type, @D_Serial_No, @D_IMEI_No, @S_SIM_No, @S_IMEI_No, @S_ICCID_No, @S_MSISDN_No

		
		Insert into PI_INVOICE (PI_NO,PI_DATE,PI_Pur_Type, PI_PAY_TO,PI_REMARKS,PI_SUPPLIER_REF,PI_AS_ID,PI_TYPE,PI_Item_Combination_ID,
								PI_RMKS,PI_QTY,PI_RATE,PI_AMOUNT,PI_GST,PI_AST,PI_NET_AMOUNT)
		Values (@PI_NO,@PI_DATE, @PI_Pur_Type,@PI_PAY_TO,@PI_REMARKS,@PI_SUPPLIER_REF,@PI_AS_ID,@PI_TYPE,@PI_Item_Combination_ID,
								@PI_RMKS,@PI_QTY,@PI_RATE,@PI_AMOUNT,@PI_GST,@PI_AST,@PI_NET_AMOUNT)

		Select @PI_NO		

		--Insert into PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos(PI_NO, PI_Item_Combination_ID,Item_Type, D_Serial_No, 
		--			D_IMEI_No, S_SIM_No, S_IMEI_No, S_ICCID_No, S_MSISDN_No)
		--Values(@PI_NO, @PI_Item_Combination_ID, @Item_Type, @D_Serial_No, @D_IMEI_No, @S_SIM_No, @S_IMEI_No, @S_ICCID_No, @S_MSISDN_No)

		--SELECT * FROM PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos

	END

	IF(@Type = 22)
	BEGIN
		Insert into PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos(PI_NO, PI_Item_Combination_ID,Item_Type, D_Serial_No, 
					D_IMEI_No, S_SIM_No, S_IMEI_No, S_ICCID_No, S_MSISDN_No)
		Values(@PI_NO, @PI_Item_Combination_ID, @Item_Type, @D_Serial_No, @D_IMEI_No, @S_SIM_No, @S_IMEI_No, @S_ICCID_No, @S_MSISDN_No)
	END

	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(PI_NO) as lastInvoiceId from PI_INVOICE 
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		select distinct PI_NO,PI_DATE,PI_AS_ID,PI_REMARKS,PI_supplier_ref,PI_RMKS, 
		PI_AMOUNT,PI_TYPE,PI_PAY_TO, AS_Supplier_Name, PI_POST from PI_INVOICE_V
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
		BEGIN
			SELECT *	
			FROM PI_INVOICE_V Where PI_NO = @PI_No
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select PI_NO from PI_INVOICE
			Where PI_NO = @PI_NO
		)
		BEGIN
		Update PI_INVOICE Set PI_CANCEL = 1, PI_CANCEL_DATE = GETDATE() Where PI_NO = @PI_NO
		Select @PI_NO
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT PI_NO, PI_DATE, PI_PUR_TYPE, PI_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, PI_REMARKS, PI_POST, PI_SUPPLIER_REF, PI_POST 
			from PI_INVOICE_V Where PI_NO = Cast(@SearchValue as int) order by PI_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT PI_NO, PI_DATE, PI_PUR_TYPE, PI_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, PI_REMARKS, PI_POST, PI_SUPPLIER_REF, PI_POST 
			from PI_INVOICE_V where PI_REMARKS like @SearchValue order by PI_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT PI_NO, PI_DATE, PI_PUR_TYPE, PI_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, PI_REMARKS, PI_POST, PI_SUPPLIER_REF, PI_POST 
			from PI_INVOICE_V where PI_DATE = Cast(@SearchValue as datetime) order by PI_NO 
		END
		if(@SearchType = 4)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT PI_NO, PI_DATE, PI_PUR_TYPE, PI_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, PI_REMARKS, PI_POST, PI_SUPPLIER_REF, PI_POST 
			from PI_INVOICE_V where 1 = 1 order by PI_NO 
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select PI_NO from PI_INVOICE
			Where PI_No = @PI_NO 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from PI_INVOICE
			Where PI_NO = @PI_NO

			Delete from PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos
			Where PI_NO = @PI_NO
		END
	END


	IF(@Type = 8)
	BEGIN
		SELECT PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_NO, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.Item_Type, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.D_Serial_No, 
						  PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.D_IMEI_No, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.S_SIM_No, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.S_IMEI_No, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.S_ICCID_No, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.S_MSISDN_No, 
						  PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PIID
		FROM     PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos INNER JOIN
						  INV_Item_Mstr ON PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID
		WHERE PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_NO = @PI_NO
		--AND PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = 1
		ORDER BY PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PIID

		--SELECT * FROM PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos WHERE PI_NO = @PI_NO ORDER BY PIID
	END

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PI_Issuance_Diag_sh]
	@Type int,
	@IDSRM_No bigint,
	@IDSRM_Date datetime,
	@Item_TYPE varchar(50),
	@IDSRM_Remarks varchar(100),
	@PI_Item_Combination_ID int,
	@Iss_Qty FLOAT,

	@IDSRM_TYPE varchar(50),
	@Iss_Dtl_Qty FLOAT,
	@DS_No varchar(50),

	@D_Serial_No varchar(50),
	@S_SIM_No varchar(50),

	@IDSRM_ID bigint,

	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue nvarchar(MAX)



AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @FormattedSearchValue NVARCHAR(MAX);
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN	
		
		Insert into PI_Issuance_Diag (IDSRM_No,IDSRM_Date,Item_TYPE,IDSRM_Remarks,PI_Item_Combination_ID,Iss_Qty)
		Values (@IDSRM_No,@IDSRM_Date,@Item_TYPE,@IDSRM_Remarks,@PI_Item_Combination_ID, @Iss_Qty)

		Select @IDSRM_No		

		--Insert into PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos(IDSRM_No, PI_Item_Combination_ID,Item_Type, D_Serial_No, 
		--			DS_No, S_SIM_No, S_IMEI_No, S_ICCID_No, S_MSISDN_No)
		--Values(@IDSRM_No, @PI_Item_Combination_ID, @Item_Type, @D_Serial_No, @DS_No, @S_SIM_No, @S_IMEI_No, @S_ICCID_No, @S_MSISDN_No)

		--SELECT * FROM PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos

	END

	IF(@Type = 22)
	BEGIN
		Insert into PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos(IDSRM_No, PI_Item_Combination_ID,IDSRM_TYPE, Iss_Dtl_Qty, DS_No)
		Values(@IDSRM_No, @PI_Item_Combination_ID, @IDSRM_TYPE, @Iss_Dtl_Qty, @DS_No)
	END

	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(IDSRM_No) as lastInvoiceId from PI_Issuance_Diag 
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post FROM PI_Issuance_Diag_V
		ORDER BY IDSRM_No
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
		BEGIN
			SELECT *	
			FROM PI_Issuance_Diag_V Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select IDSRM_No from PI_Issuance_Diag
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		)
		BEGIN
		Update PI_Issuance_Diag Set IDSRM_CANCEL = 1 Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		Select @IDSRM_No
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel
			from PI_Issuance_Diag_V Where IDSRM_No = Cast(@SearchValue as int) order by IDSRM_No
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel 
			from PI_Issuance_Diag_V where IDSRM_Remarks like @SearchValue order by IDSRM_No
		END
		if(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel 
			from PI_Issuance_Diag_V where IDSRM_Date = Cast(@SearchValue as datetime) order by IDSRM_No 
		END
		if(@SearchType = 4)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel
			from PI_Issuance_Diag_V where 1 = 1 order by IDSRM_No 
		END
	END

	IF(@Type = 66)
	BEGIN
		Declare @SSql Nvarchar(MAX);
		Declare @SSql_0 Nvarchar(MAX);
		Declare @SSql_1 Nvarchar(MAX);

		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
			PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.Item_Type, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.D_Serial_No AS DS_NO
			FROM PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos INNER JOIN
			INV_Item_Mstr ON PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID
			WHERE (PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.D_Serial_No) =  @SearchValue
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
			PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.Item_Type, PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.S_SIM_No AS DS_NO
			FROM PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos INNER JOIN
			INV_Item_Mstr ON PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID
			WHERE (PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.S_SIM_No) =  @SearchValue  --'860579041914683' --
		END 
		IF(@SearchType = 3)
			BEGIN
				SET @FormattedSearchValue = '''' + REPLACE(@SearchValue, ',', ''',''') + ''''
        
				-- Remove unnecessary spaces
				SET @FormattedSearchValue = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(@FormattedSearchValue, '   ', ''), '  ', ''), ' ', '')

				-- Construct the SQL query

				SET @SSql = N'
				SELECT PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
					   PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.Item_Type, Count(PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID) as Iss_Dtl_Qty
				FROM PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos INNER JOIN
					 INV_Item_Mstr ON PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID
				WHERE PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.D_Serial_No IN (' + @FormattedSearchValue + N')
				GROUP BY PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, 
						 INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
						 PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.Item_Type'
        
				-- Execute the dynamic SQL query
				EXEC sp_executesql @SSql
			END

		if(@SearchType = 4)
		BEGIN
			
			SET @FormattedSearchValue = '''' + REPLACE(@SearchValue, ',', ''',''') + ''''
        
			-- Remove unnecessary spaces
			SET @FormattedSearchValue = REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(@FormattedSearchValue, '   ', ''), '  ', ''), ' ', '')

			-- Construct the SQL query

			SET @SSql = N'
			SELECT PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
				   PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.Item_Type, Count(PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID) as Iss_Dtl_Qty
			FROM PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos INNER JOIN
				 INV_Item_Mstr ON PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID
			WHERE PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.S_SIM_No IN (' + @FormattedSearchValue + N')
			GROUP BY PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, 
					 INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
					 PI_Invoice_Item_Serial_Nos.Item_Type'
        
			-- Execute the dynamic SQL query
			EXEC sp_executesql @SSql
		END

	END


	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select IDSRM_No from PI_Issuance_Diag
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from PI_Issuance_Diag
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No

			Delete from PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		END
	END


	IF(@Type = 8)
	BEGIN
		SELECT PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_No, PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, 
		INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_Type,Iss_Dtl_Qty, 
		PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.DS_No,  PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_ID
		FROM     PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos INNER JOIN
						  INV_Item_Mstr ON PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID
		WHERE PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		--AND PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = 1
		ORDER BY PI_Issuance_Diag_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_ID
	END

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PI_Issuance_sh]
	@Type int,
	@IDSRM_No bigint,
	@IDSRM_Date datetime,
	@Item_TYPE varchar(50),
	@IDSRM_Remarks varchar(100),
	@PI_Item_Combination_ID int,
	@Iss_Qty FLOAT,

	@IDSRM_TYPE varchar(50),
	@Iss_Dtl_Qty FLOAT,
	@DS_No varchar(50),
	@IDSRM_ID bigint,

	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)

AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN	
		
		Insert into PI_ISSUANCE (IDSRM_No,IDSRM_Date,Item_TYPE,IDSRM_Remarks,PI_Item_Combination_ID,Iss_Qty)
		Values (@IDSRM_No,@IDSRM_Date,@Item_TYPE,@IDSRM_Remarks,@PI_Item_Combination_ID, @Iss_Qty)

		Select @IDSRM_No		

		--Insert into PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos(IDSRM_No, PI_Item_Combination_ID,Item_Type, D_Serial_No, 
		--			DS_No, S_SIM_No, S_IMEI_No, S_ICCID_No, S_MSISDN_No)
		--Values(@IDSRM_No, @PI_Item_Combination_ID, @Item_Type, @D_Serial_No, @DS_No, @S_SIM_No, @S_IMEI_No, @S_ICCID_No, @S_MSISDN_No)

		--SELECT * FROM PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos

	END

	IF(@Type = 22)
	BEGIN
		Insert into PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos(IDSRM_No, PI_Item_Combination_ID,IDSRM_TYPE, Iss_Dtl_Qty, DS_No)
		Values(@IDSRM_No, @PI_Item_Combination_ID, @IDSRM_TYPE, @Iss_Dtl_Qty, @DS_No)
	END

	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(IDSRM_No) as lastInvoiceId from PI_ISSUANCE 
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post FROM PI_ISSUANCE_V
		ORDER BY IDSRM_No
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
		BEGIN
			SELECT *	
			FROM PI_ISSUANCE_V Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
	END
	IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select IDSRM_No from PI_ISSUANCE
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		)
		BEGIN
		Update PI_ISSUANCE Set IDSRM_CANCEL = 1 Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		Select @IDSRM_No
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel
			from PI_ISSUANCE_V Where IDSRM_No = Cast(@SearchValue as int) order by IDSRM_No
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel 
			from PI_ISSUANCE_V where IDSRM_Remarks like @SearchValue order by IDSRM_No
		END
		if(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel 
			from PI_ISSUANCE_V where IDSRM_Date = Cast(@SearchValue as datetime) order by IDSRM_No 
		END
		if(@SearchType = 4)
		BEGIN
			SELECT DISTINCT IDSRM_No, IDSRM_Date, Item_Type, IDSRM_Remarks, IDSRM_Post, IDSRM_Cancel
			from PI_ISSUANCE_V where 1 = 1 order by IDSRM_No 
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select IDSRM_No from PI_ISSUANCE
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from PI_ISSUANCE
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No

			Delete from PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos
			Where IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		END
	END


	IF(@Type = 8)
	BEGIN
		SELECT PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_No, PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID, 
		INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_Type,Iss_Dtl_Qty, 
		PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.DS_No,  PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_ID
		FROM     PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos INNER JOIN
						  INV_Item_Mstr ON PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID
		WHERE PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_No = @IDSRM_No
		--AND PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.PI_Item_Combination_ID = 1
		ORDER BY PI_ISSUANCE_Item_Serial_Nos.IDSRM_ID
	END

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PurchaseInvoice_sh]
	@Type int,
	@AI_NO bigint,
	@AI_DATE datetime,
	@AI_AS_ID int,
	@AI_REMARKS varchar(100),
	@ai_supplier_ref varchar(50),
	@AI_AC_ID int,
	@AI_RMKS varchar(200), 
	@AI_AMOUNT float,
	@AI_TYPE varchar(50),
	@AI_TM_ID int,
	@AI_PAY_TO varchar(50),
	--@PdfFilePath varchar(300),
	@SearchType int,
	@SearchValue varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN	
		Insert into AP_INVOICE (AI_NO,AI_DATE,AI_AS_ID,AI_REMARKS,ai_supplier_ref,AI_AC_ID,
		AI_RMKS, AI_AMOUNT,	AI_TYPE,AI_TM_ID,AI_PAY_TO --, PdfFilePath
		)
		Values (@AI_NO,@AI_DATE,@AI_AS_ID,@AI_REMARKS, @ai_supplier_ref, @AI_AC_ID,
		@AI_RMKS, @AI_AMOUNT, @AI_TYPE, @AI_TM_ID, @AI_PAY_TO --, @PdfFilePath
		)

		Select @AI_NO
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		Select MAX(AI_NO) as lastInvoiceId from AP_INVOICE 
	END
	IF(@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		select distinct AI_NO,AI_DATE,AI_AS_ID,AI_REMARKS,ai_supplier_ref,AI_AC_ID,AI_RMKS, 
		AI_AMOUNT,AI_TYPE,AI_TM_ID,AI_PAY_TO, AS_Supplier_Name, AI_POST --, PdfFilePath 
		from AP_INVOICE_V
	END
	IF(@Type = 4)
		BEGIN
			select AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, AI_REMARKS, ai_supplier_ref, AI_AC_ID,
			AI_RMKS, AI_AMOUNT, AI_TYPE, AI_TM_ID, AI_PAY_TO, TM_DESCRIPTION, NA_NAME,
			CODE_COMBINATION, AI_POST, CODE_COMBINATION, NAME_COMBINATION, AI_CANCEL, AI_CANCEL_DATE --, PdfFilePath	
			from AP_INVOICE_V Where AI_NO = @AI_No
	END
IF(@Type = 5)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select AI_NO from AP_INVOICE
			Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
		)
		BEGIN
			Declare @mCnt as Int
			SET @mCnt = (SELECT COUNT(AAI_AI_NO) FROM AP_ADJUST_INVOICE WHERE AAI_AI_NO =  STR(@AI_NO))
			--SELECT @mCnt

			IF (@mCnt = 0) 
				BEGIN
					Update AP_INVOICE Set AI_CANCEL = 1, AI_CANCEL_DATE = GETDATE() Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
					Select @AI_NO
				END
			ELSE
				BEGIN
					SET @AI_NO = 999999
					SELECT @AI_NO
				END
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 6)
	BEGIN
		if(@SearchType = 1)
		BEGIN
			select distinct AI_NO, AI_REMARKS, AI_POST, AI_DATE, AI_SUPPLIER_REF, AI_AS_ID, 
			AS_Supplier_Name, AI_POST from AP_INVOICE_V Where AI_NO = Cast(@SearchValue as int) order by AI_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 2)
		BEGIN
			select distinct AI_NO, AI_REMARKS, AI_POST, AI_DATE, AI_SUPPLIER_REF, AI_AS_ID, 
			AS_Supplier_Name, AI_POST from AP_INVOICE_V where AI_REMARKS like @SearchValue order by AI_NO
		END
		if(@SearchType = 3)
		BEGIN
			select distinct AI_NO, AI_REMARKS, AI_POST, AI_DATE, AI_SUPPLIER_REF, AI_AS_ID, 
			AS_Supplier_Name, AI_POST from AP_INVOICE_V where AI_DATE = Cast(@SearchValue as datetime) order by AI_NO 
		END
		if(@SearchType = 4)
		BEGIN
			select distinct AI_NO, AI_REMARKS, AI_POST, AI_DATE, AI_SUPPLIER_REF, AI_AS_ID, 
			AS_Supplier_Name, AI_POST from AP_INVOICE_V where 1 = 1 order by AI_NO 
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 7)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
			Select AI_NO from AP_INVOICE
			Where AI_No = @AI_NO 
		)
		BEGIN
			Delete from AP_INVOICE
			Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
		END
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[PurchaseInvoicePosting_sh]
	@Type int,
	@AI_NO BIGINT,
	@Status varchar(15)
AS 
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		SELECT status,AI_NO,AI_DATE,AI_TYPE,AS_SUPPLIER_NAME,SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS AI_AMT 
		FROM AP_INVOICE_DETAIL_V 
		WHERE (AI_POST IS NULL OR AI_POST = 0)
		GROUP by status,AI_NO,AI_DATE,AI_TYPE,AS_SUPPLIER_NAME
		ORDER BY ai_no
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF @Status = 'Invoice'
			Begin
				Update AP_INVOICE Set AI_POST = 1 Where AI_NO = @AI_NO
			End
		IF @Status = 'Debit Memo'
			Begin
				Update AP_Debit_Note Set ACN_POST = 1 Where ACN_NO = @AI_NO
			End
	END
	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[Report_sh]
	@Type int,
	@ParamType int,
	@COID int,
	@FromNo int,
	@ToNo int,
	@FromDate datetime,
	@ToDate datetime
AS
BEGIN
	IF(@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		IF(@ParamType = 1)
		BEGIN
			Select * from AR_INVOICE_V 
			Where AI_NO BETWEEN @FromNo AND @ToNo Order by AI_NO
		END
		IF(@ParamType = 2)
		BEGIN
			Select * from AR_INVOICE_V 
			Where AI_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate Order by AI_NO
		END	
		IF(@ParamType = 3)
		BEGIN
			Select * from AR_INVOICE_V 
			Where AI_CO_ID = @COID
		END
	END
	IF(@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF(@ParamType = 1)
		BEGIN
			Select * from AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V 
			Where ACN_NO BETWEEN @FromNo AND @ToNo Order by ACN_NO
		END
		IF(@ParamType = 2)
		BEGIN
			Select * from AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V 
			Where ACN_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate Order by ACN_NO
		END
		IF(@ParamType = 2)
		BEGIN
			Select * from AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V 
			Where ACN_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate Order by ACN_NO
		END
	END
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_AcrualDetails] --'2011-05-01 00:00:00', '2011-05-07 23:59:59'
@FD datetime ,
@TD datetime

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

	SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
						  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, UPPER(dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME) AS AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, 
						  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, 
						  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, SUM(dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT) AS AI_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO,
						  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE LEFT OUTER JOIN
						  CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails INNER JOIN
						  CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN
						  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id ON 
						  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo
	WHERE     (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE IS NULL) 
	AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO NOT IN (SELECT AAI_AI_NO FROM dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE))
	AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= CONVERT(DATETIME, @FD, 102))
	AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE <= CONVERT(DATETIME, @TD, 102))
	GROUP BY dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
						  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, 
						  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, 
						  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	ORDER BY CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch

END
