-- =============================================

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_Acruals] --'2011-05-01 00:00:00', '2011-05-07 23:59:59'
@FD datetime,
@TD datetime

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

	SELECT CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, 
		SUM(dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT) AS AI_AMOUNT, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	FROM dbo.AR_INVOICE LEFT OUTER JOIN
		CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails INNER JOIN
		CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN
		CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id ON 
		dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo
	WHERE (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE IS NULL) 
	AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO NOT IN (SELECT AAI_AI_NO	FROM dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE))
	AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= CONVERT(DATETIME, @FD, 102))
	AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE <= CONVERT(DATETIME, @TD, 102))
	GROUP BY CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	ORDER BY CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[sp_ADJ_AR_UE_TO_GL]
	@INV_Type INT,
	@dtTO DATETIME

AS
BEGIN
	IF (@INV_Type = 3)
		BEGIN
			DECLARE @cursorIDList CURSOR 
			DECLARE @cursorIDList_1 CURSOR 

			DECLARE @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID VARCHAR(20)
			DECLARE @AI_NO BIGINT
			DECLARE @AIDT DATETIME
			DECLARE @AI_IM_ID INT
			DECLARE @JE_AC_ID INT
			DECLARE @DR FLOAT
			DECLARE @CR FLOAT
			DECLARE @AMT FLOAT

			DECLARE @mPOST INT

			DECLARE @DATA_EXIST AS INT

			SET @cursorIDList = CURSOR FOR SELECT  CONCAT(AI_NO,'-', AI_IM_ID, '-', JE_AC_ID) AS AINO_AIIMID_JEACID, AI_NO, 
			MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDT, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID, SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) AS DR, SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) AS CR, 
			(SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) - SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR)) AS AMT
			From AR_UE_MSTR
			WHERE  AI_NO = 84901 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR, AI_DATE, 23) <= CONVERT(VARCHAR, @dtTO, 12) 
			AND (Close_Flag is null OR Close_Flag = 0)
			AND CONCAT(AI_NO,'-', AI_IM_ID, '-', JE_AC_ID) NOT IN
			(SELECT AINO_AIIMID_JEACID FROM AR_UE_MSTR_PENDING_ADJUST_V
			WHERE MONTH(AI_DATE) =  MONTH(@dtTO) AND YEAR(AI_DATE) = YEAR(@dtTO))
			GROUP BY  AI_NO, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID
			Having (Sum(JE_ENTERED_CR) - Sum(JE_ENTERED_DR)) > 0	
			ORDER BY AI_NO, AI_IM_ID

			OPEN @cursorIDList

			FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList INTO @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID,	@AI_NO,	@AIDT, @AI_IM_ID, @JE_AC_ID, @DR, @CR, @AMT

			While @@fetch_status = 0
				Begin

					--SELECT 'FETCH-1', @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID,	@AI_NO,	@AIDT, @AI_IM_ID, @JE_AC_ID, @DR, @CR, @AMT
					DECLARE @mAINO_1 BIGINT
					DECLARE @mAI_IM_ID_1 INT
					DECLARE @mJE_AC_ID_1 INT

					DECLARE @mAmt_1 FLOAT

					SET @mAINO_1 = @AI_NO
					SET @mAI_IM_ID_1 = @AI_IM_ID
					SET @mJE_AC_ID_1 = @JE_AC_ID
					SET @mAmt_1 = @AMT


					SET @mPOST = 0
					SET @DATA_EXIST = (SELECT Count(AI_NO)   
					From AR_UE_MSTR
					WHERE AI_NO = @mAINO_1 AND AI_IM_ID  = @mAI_IM_ID_1 AND JE_AC_ID = @mJE_AC_ID_1 AND ENTRYTYPEID = 2 
					AND MONTH(AI_DATE) =  MONTH(@dtTO) AND YEAR(AI_DATE) = YEAR(@dtTO))

					IF (@DATA_EXIST > 0)
						BEGIN
							SET @mPOST = 1
						END

					IF (@AMT > 0 AND @mPOST = 0)
						BEGIN
							DECLARE @AI_NO_1 BIGINT
							DECLARE @AI_IM_ID_1 INT
							DECLARE @JE_AC_ID_1 INT
							DECLARE @DR_1 FLOAT
							DECLARE @CR_1 FLOAT
							DECLARE @CNT_1 INT

							DECLARE @mDR FLOAT
							DECLARE @mENTRYTYPEID INT
							DECLARE @mENTRYNO INT
							DECLARE @mBal FLOAT
							DECLARE @mCNT INT

							DECLARE @mDR_2 FLOAT
							DECLARE @mCNT_2 FLOAT

							DECLARE @AO_BookingCat VARCHAR(20)

							DECLARE @mOBCMonth INT

							DECLARE @IM_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(255)

							SET @mDR = 0
							SET @mENTRYTYPEID = 2
							SET @mENTRYNO = 0
							SET @mBal = 0
							SET @mCNT = 0


							SET @cursorIDList_1 = CURSOR FOR 
							SELECT AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO, AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID, AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION, AR_UE_MSTR.JE_AC_ID, SUM(AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_DR) AS DR, 
							SUM(AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_CR) AS CR, COUNT(*) - 1 AS CNT
							FROM     AR_UE_MSTR INNER JOIN
											  AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID = AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID
							WHERE  (AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO = @AI_NO) AND (AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID = @AI_IM_ID) AND (AR_UE_MSTR.JE_AC_ID = @JE_AC_ID)
							GROUP BY AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO, AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID, AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION, AR_UE_MSTR.JE_AC_ID
							HAVING (COUNT(*) > 0)
							ORDER BY AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO, AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID, AR_UE_MSTR.JE_AC_ID

							OPEN @cursorIDList_1

							FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList_1 INTO @AI_NO_1, @AI_IM_ID_1, @IM_DESCRIPTION, @JE_AC_ID_1, @DR_1, @CR_1, @CNT_1

							While @@fetch_status = 0
								Begin									
									IF (@CNT_1 > 0)
										BEGIN
											SET @mDR_2 = @CR_1 - @DR_1
											SET @mCNT_2 = @CNT_1
										END
										SET @AO_BookingCat = (Select Distinct AO_BookingCat FROM AR_Invoice WHERE AI_NO = @AI_NO_1)

										IF (LEN(@AO_BookingCat) > 0)
											BEGIN
												IF (@AO_BookingCat = 'Yearly')
													BEGIN
														SET @mOBCMonth = 12
													END
												IF (@AO_BookingCat = 'Half Yearly')
													BEGIN
														SET @mOBCMonth = 6
													END
												IF (@AO_BookingCat = 'Quarterly')
													BEGIN
														SET @mOBCMonth = 3
													END
												IF (@AO_BookingCat = 'Monthly')
													BEGIN
														SET @mOBCMonth = 1
													END
											END

										If @mCNT_2 >= 0 And @mCNT_2 < (@mOBCMonth - 1) And @mDR_2 > 0 
											BEGIN
												SET @mENTRYNO = @mCNT_2 + 1
												SET @mBal = @mAmt_1
                    
												SET @mCNT = @mOBCMonth - @mCNT_2

												If (@mBal > 0)
													BEGIN
														SET @mDR = ROUND((@mBal / @mCNT),0)
													END
												Else
													BEGIN
														SET @mDR = 0
													END
											END
										Else
											BEGIN
												SET @mENTRYTYPEID = 2
												SET @mENTRYNO = 1
                
												SET @mDR = Round(@mAmt_1 / @mOBCMonth, 0)
											END

									If (@mDR > 0)
										
										BEGIN
											DECLARE @AIDATE DATETIME
											DECLARE @mAINO_2 BIGINT
											DECLARE @mTNo AS VARCHAR(4)
											DECLARE @MJVNO AS INT
											DECLARE @mRmks AS VARCHAR(255)
											DECLARE @MHID AS BIGINT
											DECLARE @IM_AC_ID_E INT

											SET @mAINO_2 = 0

											SET @AIDATE = @dtTO
											IF @mAINO_1 <> @mAINO_2
												BEGIN
											--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
											--		-----------------------

													
													SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@AIDATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@AIDATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
													SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
																			(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
																			FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
																			WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '00001'
																			ELSE
																			(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
																			FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
																			WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

													--SELECT @AIDATE, @mTNo, @MJVNO


										
													SET @mRmks = 'Un-Earned Adjust for ' + @IM_Description + 'and Against Invoice No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@AI_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

													INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
													(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
													VALUES 
													(@MJVNO, @AIDATE, @mRmks, 'Adjust UE', 0, '')

													--SELECT @MJVNO, @AIDATE, @mRmks, 'Adjust UE', 0, '', 'HEADER'

													SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)
													SET @mAINO_2 = @mAINO_1
												END

											SET @mRmks = 'Un-Earned Adjust for ' + @IM_Description + 'and Against Invoice No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@AI_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)
                               
											Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL (JE_HEADER_ID,JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR,JE_AC_ID) VALUES (
												@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @mJE_AC_ID_1)

											--SELECT @MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @mJE_AC_ID_1, 'LINE-1'

											SET @IM_AC_ID_E = (Select IM_AC_ID_E From AR_UE_ELEMENTS Where IM_ID_UE = @mAI_IM_ID_1)
							
											Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL (JE_HEADER_ID,JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR,JE_AC_ID) VALUES (
													@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mDR, @IM_AC_ID_E)

											--SELECT @MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mDR, @IM_AC_ID_E, 'LINE-2'

											Insert Into AR_UE_MSTR (ENTRYTYPEID, ENTRYNO, JE_HEADER_ID, AI_NO,AI_DATE, VCHSTATUS, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR) VALUES (
												@mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO,@MHID, @mAINO_1,CONVERT(VARCHAR, @dtTO, 23), 'Adjust', @mAI_IM_ID_1, @mJE_AC_ID_1, @mDR, 0 )
											
											--SELECT @mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO,@MHID, @mAINO_1,CONVERT(VARCHAR, @dtTO, 23), 'Adjust', @mAI_IM_ID_1, @mJE_AC_ID_1, @mDR, 0, 'INSERT INTO AR_UE_MSTR'

										END  



										--SELECT 'FETCH-2', @AI_NO_1, @AI_IM_ID_1, @IM_DESCRIPTION, @JE_AC_ID_1, @DR_1, @CR_1, @CNT_1, @mOBCMonth, @mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO
								

									FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList_1 INTO @AI_NO_1, @AI_IM_ID_1, @IM_DESCRIPTION, @JE_AC_ID_1, @DR_1, @CR_1, @CNT_1
								END

							Close @cursorIDList_1;
							Deallocate @cursorIDList_1;
						END
					
					FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList INTO @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID,	@AI_NO,	@AIDT, @AI_IM_ID, @JE_AC_ID, @DR, @CR, @AMT
				END
			Close @cursorIDList;
			Deallocate @cursorIDList;
	END
END

-- ==================================================================================================================
-- Author:		Kamran Jamal Nasir
-- Create date: 26-Jun-2023
-- Description:	This procedure will Auto Create Posted Payables Records Into GL Entries From Payables.
-- ==================================================================================================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_AP_Entries_Transfer_To_GL_sh] 
AS
BEGIN
--		"01 - Transfer Invoices ...."

	DECLARE @CNT AS INT

	DECLARE @MJVNO AS INT

	DECLARE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER cursor
	DECLARE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES cursor

	DECLARE @AI_NO AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @AI_DATE AS DATETIME

	DECLARE @AI_REMARKS AS VARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @AS_SUPPLIER_NAME AS VARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @AI_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @AS_AC_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @TD_AC_ID AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @AI_AC_ID AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @LAST_NO AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @mTNo AS VARCHAR(4)

	DECLARE @mRmks AS VARCHAR(255)

	DECLARE @TD_AGE AS FLOAT

	DECLARE @mTax AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @mCR FLOAT
	DECLARE @mDR FLOAT

	DECLARE @MHID AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER cursor
	DECLARE @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES cursor

	DECLARE @APR_NO AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @APT_APR_NO AS BIGINT
	
	DECLARE @APR_DATE AS DATETIME
	DECLARE @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @APR_DESCRIPTION AS VARCHAR(255)
	DECLARE @BANK_AC_ID AS BIGINT 
	DECLARE @APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
	DECLARE @mAMOUNT AS FLOAT

--==================================================--
--------------	1 - AP INVOICE POSTING	--------------
--==================================================--
	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(AI_NO) FROM Ap_Invoice_V WHERE AI_POST = 1 AND AI_INV_GL IS NULL)	
	--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
											SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO, AI_DATE
											From AP_INVOICE_V 
											Where AI_POST  = 1 AND AI_INV_GL IS NULL
											ORDER BY AI_NO
			OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------

				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@AI_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Against Invoice No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@AI_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Payable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

				--SELECT @MHID, @mTNo, @MJVNO, @mRmks, @AI_NO, @AI_DATE  --, @AI_REMARKS, @AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, @CNT, @AI_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID

		--------------------------------------------------

		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------
				SET @AI_No_Cursor_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_REMARKS, AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, AI_AMOUNT, AS_AC_ID, TD_AC_ID, TD_AGE, AI_AC_ID
												From Ap_Invoice_V 
												Where AI_NO  = @AI_NO AND AI_POST  = 1 AND  AI_INV_GL IS NULL 
												ORDER BY AI_NO	
										
				 OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
				  FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE, @AI_REMARKS, @AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @TD_AC_ID, @TD_AGE, @AI_AC_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Credit to Supplier
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
					SET @mCR = @AI_AMOUNT

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mCR, @AS_AC_ID)

		--	Debit to S/Tax Account
					IF ((@TD_AC_ID IS NOT NULL) OR @TD_AC_ID <> 0) 
						BEGIN        
							SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
							SET @mDR = ROUND((@AI_AMOUNT/((@TD_AGE/100)+1)),0)							
							SET @mTax = @AI_AMOUNT - @mDR

							--SELECT @AI_AMOUNT, @TD_AGE, @mDR, @mTax, (@AI_AMOUNT - @mDR)

							Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
							(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
							VALUES 
							(@MHID, @mRmks, @mTax, 0, @TD_AC_ID)						
						END
					ELSE
					SET @mDR = @AI_AMOUNT
            
		--   Debit to Account
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
            
					Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @AI_AC_ID)

						FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE,@AI_REMARKS, @AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @TD_AC_ID, @TD_AGE, @AI_AC_ID
					END
					Close @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES

					UPDATE AP_Invoice set AI_INV_GL = 1 WHERE AI_NO =  @AI_NO AND AI_POST = 1 and AI_INV_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

--==================================================--
---------	2 - AP CANCEL INVOICE POSTING	----------
--==================================================--
	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(AI_NO) FROM AP_INVOICE_V WHERE AI_CANCEL = 1 AND AI_CAN_GL IS NULL)
		--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
											SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO, AI_DATE
											FROM AP_INVOICE_V 
											WHERE AI_CANCEL = 1 AND AI_CAN_GL IS NULL
											ORDER BY AI_NO
			OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------

				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@AI_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Reversal of Invoice No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@AI_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Payable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

				--SELECT @MHID, @mTNo, @MJVNO, @mRmks, @AI_NO, @AI_DATE  --, @AI_REMARKS, @AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, @CNT, @AI_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID

		--------------------------------------------------

		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------
				SET @AI_No_Cursor_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
												Select AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_REMARKS, AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, AI_AMOUNT, AS_AC_ID, TD_AC_ID, TD_AGE, AI_AC_ID
												From Ap_Invoice_V 
												Where AI_NO  = @AI_NO AND AI_POST  = 1 and AI_INV_GL is null 
												Order By AI_NO	
										
				 OPEN @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
				 FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE, @AI_REMARKS, @AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @TD_AC_ID, @TD_AGE, @AI_AC_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Debit to Supplier
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
					SET @mCR = @AI_AMOUNT

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, @mCR, 0, @AS_AC_ID)

		--	Credit to S/Tax Account
					IF ((@TD_AC_ID IS not NULL) OR @TD_AC_ID <> 0) 
						BEGIN        
							SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
							SET @mDR = ROUND((@AI_AMOUNT/((@TD_AGE/100)+1)),0)							
							SET @mTax = @AI_AMOUNT - @mDR

							--SELECT @AI_AMOUNT, @TD_AGE, @mDR, @mTax, (@AI_AMOUNT - @mDR)

							Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
							(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
							VALUES 
							(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mTax, @TD_AC_ID)						
						END
					ELSE
					SET @mDR = @AI_AMOUNT
            
		--   Debit to Account
					SET @mRmks = CONCAT(@AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, ' - ', ' On Inv No : ', @AI_NO)
            
					Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mDR, @AI_AC_ID)

						FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_LINES INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE,@AI_REMARKS, @AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, @AI_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @TD_AC_ID, @TD_AGE, @AI_AC_ID
					END
					Close @AI_No_Cursor_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_LINES

					UPDATE AP_Invoice set AI_CAN_GL = 1 WHERE AI_NO =  @AI_NO AND AI_CANCEL = 1 AND AI_CAN_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AI_NO, @AI_DATE
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

--==================================================--
---------	3 - AP SUPPLIER PAYMENT POSTING	----------
--==================================================--
	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(APR_NO) FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE APR_POST = 1 AND APR_GL IS NULL)
		--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, AS_AC_ID, BANK_AC_ID
												FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
												WHERE APR_POST  = 1 AND APR_GL IS NULL
												ORDER BY APR_NO	
			OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @BANK_AC_ID

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------

				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@APR_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@APR_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'Payment No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@APR_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Payable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

					
		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------

		--   Debit to Supplier

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @mAmount, 0, @AS_AC_ID)

		--   Credit In Bank
            
					Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, 0, @mAmount, @BANK_AC_ID)


		--------------------------------------------------

		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL FOR TAX
		--		------------------------------
				SET @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT, TD_DESCRIPTION, TD_AC_ID, AS_AC_ID
												FROM AP_Payment_Tax_V
												WHERE APT_APR_NO  = @APR_NO
												ORDER BY APT_APR_NO
										
				 OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
				 FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, @AS_AC_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Debit to Tax
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, 'Payment NO: ' & @APT_APR_NO, 0, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID)

            
		--   Credit to Supplier          
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, 'Payment NO: ' & @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 0, @AS_AC_ID)

						FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, @AS_AC_ID
					END
					Close @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES

					UPDATE AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT set APR_GL = 1 WHERE APR_NO =  @APR_NO AND APR_POST = 1 AND APR_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @BANK_AC_ID
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

--==========================================================--
---------	4 - AP CANCEL SUPPLIER PAYMENT POSTING	----------
--==========================================================--
	SET @CNT = 0
	SET @CNT = (SELECT COUNT(APR_NO) FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V WHERE APR_CANCEL = 1 AND APR_CAN_GL IS NULL)	
		--SELECT @CNT
	IF (@CNT > 0)
		BEGIN
			SET @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, AS_SUPPLIER_NAME, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, AS_AC_ID, BANK_AC_ID
												FROM AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V 
												WHERE APR_CANCEL = 1 AND APR_CAN_GL IS NULL
												ORDER BY APR_NO	
			OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER
			FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @BANK_AC_ID

			WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			BEGIN
		
		--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
		--		-----------------------

				SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@APR_DATE)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@APR_DATE) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
				SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '000001'
										ELSE
										(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
										FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
										WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

					SET @mRmks = 'REVERSAL OF Payment No : ' +  RIGHT('00000000'+CAST(@APR_NO AS VARCHAR(8)),8)

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
					(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
					VALUES 
					(@MJVNO, @AI_DATE, @mRmks, 'Payable', 0, '')

					SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)

					
		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL
		--		----------------------

		--   Credit to Supplier

					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, 0, @mAmount, @AS_AC_ID)

		--   Debit In Bank
            
					Insert into GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID) 
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @mAmount, 0, @BANK_AC_ID)


		--------------------------------------------------

		--		Create GL_JE_LINES_ALL FOR TAX
		--		------------------------------
				SET @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES = CURSOR FOR 
												SELECT APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, APT_TAX_AMOUNT, TD_DESCRIPTION, TD_AC_ID, AS_AC_ID
												FROM AP_Payment_Tax_V
												WHERE APT_APR_NO  = @APR_NO
												ORDER BY APT_APR_NO
										
				 OPEN @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
				 FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, @AS_AC_ID

					WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
					BEGIN
		--   Debit to Tax
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, 'CAN-Payment NO: ' & @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 0, @TD_AC_ID)

            
		--   Credit to Supplier          
					INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
					(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
					VALUES 
					(@MHID, 'CAN-Payment NO: ' & @APT_APR_NO, 0, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID)

						FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES INTO @APT_APR_NO, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @TD_AC_ID, @AS_AC_ID
					END
					Close @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES
					DEALLOCATE @APR_No_Cursor_TAX_LINES

					UPDATE AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT set APR_CAN_GL = 1 WHERE APR_NO =  @APR_NO AND APR_CANCEL = 1 AND APR_CAN_GL IS NULL
				FETCH NEXT FROM @APR_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @APR_NO, @APR_DATE, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, @AS_AC_ID, @BANK_AC_ID
			END
			Close @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
			DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor_HEADER
		END

END


--EXECUTE sp_AP_Entries_Transfer_To_GL_sh


--UPDATE AP_INVOICE SET AI_DATE = '2023-06-01' WHERE AI_NO = 3066

-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Author Name>
-- Create date: <Create Date>
-- Description:	<Description>
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_AR_Adj_AR_UE_To_GL] (@m_TDate DATE)
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);

    DECLARE @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID VARCHAR(50);
    DECLARE @AI_NO VARCHAR(50);
    DECLARE @AIDT DATE;
    DECLARE @AI_IM_ID INT;
    DECLARE @JE_AC_ID INT;
    DECLARE @DR FLOAT;
    DECLARE @CR FLOAT;
    DECLARE @AMT FLOAT;

	DECLARE @mElement INT
	SET @mElement = 0

    -- Build the query
    SET @QUERY_S_1 = '
        SELECT DISTINCT 
            CONCAT(AI_NO, ''-'', AI_IM_ID, ''-'', JE_AC_ID) AS AINO_AIIMID_JEACID,
            AI_NO, 
            MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDT, 
            AI_IM_ID, 
            JE_AC_ID, 
            SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR) AS DR, 
            SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) AS CR,
            (SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) - SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR)) AS AMT  
        FROM AR_UE_MSTR  
        WHERE (AI_DATE <= @m_TDate AND (Close_Flag IS NULL OR Close_Flag = 0)  
          AND CONCAT(AI_NO, ''-'', AI_IM_ID, ''-'', JE_AC_ID) NOT IN  
          (SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT(AI_NO, ''-'', AI_IM_ID, ''-'', JE_AC_ID)
           FROM AR_UE_MSTR_PENDING_ADJUST_V  
           WHERE MONTH(AI_DATE) = MONTH(@m_TDate) 
             AND YEAR(AI_DATE) = YEAR(@m_TDate))
        ) 
        GROUP BY AI_NO, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID 
        HAVING (SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) - SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR)) > 0 
        ORDER BY AI_NO, AI_IM_ID';

    -- Execute the query and store the results in a temporary table
    CREATE TABLE #Results (
        AINO_AIIMID_JEACID VARCHAR(50),
        AI_NO VARCHAR(50),
        AIDT DATE,
        AI_IM_ID INT,
        JE_AC_ID INT,
        DR FLOAT,
        CR FLOAT,
        AMT FLOAT
    );

    INSERT INTO #Results
    EXEC sp_executesql @QUERY_S_1, N'@m_TDate DATE', @m_TDate;

    -- Declare the cursor
    DECLARE AI_No_Cursor_HEADER CURSOR LOCAL FOR 
        SELECT AINO_AIIMID_JEACID, AI_NO, AIDT, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID, DR, CR, AMT
        FROM #Results ;

    OPEN AI_No_Cursor_HEADER;

    FETCH NEXT FROM AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID, @AI_NO, @AIDT, @AI_IM_ID, @JE_AC_ID, @DR, @CR, @AMT;

    WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
    BEGIN
		DECLARE @mCNT INT
		DECLARE @mPost INT
		DECLARE @mAINO_2 INT

		DECLARE @MJVNO AS INT
		DECLARE @mTNo AS VARCHAR(4)
		DECLARE @MHID AS INT



        SELECT @mCNT = ISNULL(COUNT(*),0)
        FROM AR_UE_MSTR
        WHERE AI_NO = @AI_NO 
          AND AI_IM_ID = @AI_IM_ID 
          AND JE_AC_ID = @JE_AC_ID 
          AND MONTH(AI_DATE) = MONTH(@m_TDate) 
          AND YEAR(AI_DATE) = YEAR(@m_TDate) 
          AND ENTRYTYPEID = 2;

		IF @mCNT = 0 
			BEGIN
				SET @mPost = 0
			END
		ELSE
			BEGIN
				SET @mPost = 1
			END

		IF @AMT > 0 AND @mPost = 0
			BEGIN
				SET @mElement = @mElement + 1
				DECLARE @mDr_2 Float
				DECLARE @mCNT_2 INT
				DECLARE @AO_BookingCat VARCHAR(10)
				DECLARE @mOBCMonth INT
				DECLARE @mENTRYTYPEID INT

				SET @mENTRYTYPEID = 2


				SELECT @mDr_2 = (SELECT (SUM(JE_ENTERED_CR) - SUM(JE_ENTERED_DR))
				FROM AR_UE_MSTR
				WHERE AI_NO = @AI_NO 
				  AND AI_IM_ID = @AI_IM_ID 
				  AND JE_AC_ID = @JE_AC_ID 
				  GROUP BY AI_NO, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID 
				  HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 
				  );

				SELECT @mCNT_2 = (SELECT (COUNT(*)-1)
				FROM AR_UE_MSTR
				WHERE AI_NO = @AI_NO 
				  AND AI_IM_ID = @AI_IM_ID 
				  AND JE_AC_ID = @JE_AC_ID 
				  GROUP BY AI_NO, AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID 
				  HAVING COUNT(*) > 0 
				  );


					SELECT @AO_BookingCat = (SELECT DISTINCT AO_BookingCat
					FROM AR_INVOICE
					WHERE AI_NO = @AI_NO) 


					IF @AO_BookingCat = 'Yearly'
						BEGIN
							SET @mOBCMonth = 12
						END

					IF @AO_BookingCat = 'Half Yearly'
						BEGIN
							SET @mOBCMonth = 6
						END

					IF @AO_BookingCat = 'Quarterly'
						BEGIN
							SET @mOBCMonth = 3
						END

					IF @AO_BookingCat = 'Monthly'
						BEGIN
							SET @mOBCMonth = 1
						END	


						If (@mCNT_2 >= 0 And @mCNT_2 < (@mOBCMonth - 1)) And @mDR_2 > 0 
							BEGIN

								DECLARE @mDR FLOAT
								
								DECLARE @mENTRYNO INT
								DECLARE @mBal FLOAT
								--DECLARE @mCNT INT

								SET @mDR = 0								
								SET @mENTRYNO = 0
								SET @mBal = 0
								SET @mCNT = 0
								BEGIN
									SET @mENTRYNO = @mCNT_2 + 1
									SET @mBal = @Amt
                                       
									SET @mCNT = @mOBCMonth - @mCNT_2
								END
								If @mBal > 0 
									BEGIN
										SET @mDR = Round(@mBal / @mCNT, 0)
									END
								Else
									BEGIN
										SET @mDR = 0
									END
							END
						Else
							BEGIN
								SET @mENTRYNO = @mCNT_2 + 1
								SET @mDR = @mDR_2

								--SELECT @mCNT_2, @mENTRYNO, @mDR
							END



				
				IF @mDR > 0

					DECLARE @mIM_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(200)
					DECLARE @mRmks NVARCHAR(MAX)
					DECLARE @mIM_AC_ID_E INT
					
					
					BEGIN

						IF @AI_NO <> ISNULL(@mAINO_2,0)
							BEGIN
								--SELECT 'Header' as abc, @mAINO_2, @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID
								--MHID = GetJEHeaderID(@m_TDate.Value, mAINO_1, mAI_IM_ID_1)

						--		Create GL_JE_HEADER_ALL
						--		-----------------------

								SET @mTNo = CAST(CONCAT((YEAR(@m_TDate)-2000),	RIGHT('00'+CAST(Month(@m_TDate) AS VARCHAR(2)),2)) AS VARCHAR(4))
								SET @MJVNO = CASE WHEN 
													(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
													FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
													WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) IS NULL THEN @mTNo + '00001'
													ELSE
													(SELECT (MAX(JE_VOUCHER_NO) + 1) 
													FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
													WHERE LEFT(JE_VOUCHER_NO,4) = @mTNo) END

								SET @mIM_DESCRIPTION = (Select IM_Description From AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS Where IM_ID = @AI_IM_ID)
								SET @mRmks = 'Un-Earned Adjust for ' + @mIM_DESCRIPTION + ' and Against Invoice No : ' + (Str(@AI_NO)) 

								INSERT INTO GL_JE_HEADER_ALL 
								(JE_VOUCHER_NO, JE_DATE, JE_DESCRIPTION, JE_TYPE, JE_POST_FLAG, JE_NAME) 
								VALUES 
								(@MJVNO, @m_TDate, @mRmks, 'Adjust UE', 0, '')

								SET @MHID = (SELECT JE_HEADER_ID FROM GL_JE_HEADER_ALL WHERE JE_VOUCHER_NO = @MJVNO)
								SET @mAINO_2 = @AI_NO
							END
						
							BEGIN
								----SELECT @mElement AS mElement, @mAINO_2, @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID
								INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
								(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
								VALUES 
								(@MHID, @mRmks, @mDR, 0, @JE_AC_ID)

								SET @mIM_AC_ID_E = (Select IM_AC_ID_E From AR_UE_ELEMENTS Where IM_ID_UE = @AI_IM_ID)

								INSERT INTO GL_JE_LINES_ALL 
								(JE_HEADER_ID, JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, JE_ENTERED_DR, JE_ENTERED_CR, JE_AC_ID)
								VALUES 
								(@MHID, @mRmks, 0, @mDR, @mIM_AC_ID_E)

								Insert Into AR_UE_MSTR (ENTRYTYPEID,ENTRYNO,JE_HEADER_ID, AI_NO,AI_DATE,VCHSTATUS,AI_IM_ID,JE_AC_ID,JE_ENTERED_DR,JE_ENTERED_CR) VALUES (
														@mENTRYTYPEID, @mENTRYNO, @MHID, @AI_NO, @m_TDate, 'Adjust', @AI_IM_ID, @JE_AC_ID, @mDR,0 )


							END

					


						
					END
						




			END

		----SELECT @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID AS AINO_AIIMID_JEACID, @AI_NO AS AI_NO, @AIDT ASAIDT, @AI_IM_ID AS AI_IM_ID, @JE_AC_ID AS JE_AC_ID,
		----@DR AS DR, @CR AS CR, @AMT AS AMT, @mPost AS mPost, @mDr_2 AS mDr_2, @mCNT_2 AS mCNT_2, @m_TDate AS m_TDate,
		----@AO_BookingCat AS AO_BookingCat,@mOBCMonth AS mOBCMonth, @mDR_2 AS mDR_2, @mENTRYNO AS mENTRYNO, @mDR AS mDR, @mBal AS mBal,
		----@mAINO_2 AS mAINO_2, @mTNo AS mTNO, @MJVNO AS MJVNO, @mIM_DESCRIPTION AS IM_DESCRIPTION, @mRmks AS mRmks, @mElement


        FETCH NEXT FROM AI_No_Cursor_HEADER INTO @AINO_AIIMID_JEACID, @AI_NO, @AIDT, @AI_IM_ID, @JE_AC_ID, @DR, @CR, @AMT;
    END

    CLOSE AI_No_Cursor_HEADER;
    DEALLOCATE AI_No_Cursor_HEADER;

    -- Clean up the temporary table
    DROP TABLE #Results;
END

--, @m_Product varchar(50), @m_Package_Type varchar(50)

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[SP_AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_sh](@m_Type int, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date,	@m_CoID int, @m_ATSCRMTYPE varchar(3))

AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@Type INT;
	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;
	DECLARE	@CoID  INT;
	DECLARE	@ATSCRMTYPE varchar(3);
	--DECLARE	@Product varchar(50)
	--DECLARE	@Package_Type varchar(50);

	SET @TYPE = @m_Type
	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate
	SET	@CoID = @m_CoID
	SET	@ATSCRMTYPE = @m_ATSCRMTYPE
	--SET @Product = @m_Product
	--SET @Package_Type = @m_Package_Type

	--DECLARE @CoID_m NVARCHAR(100);
	--DECLARE @ATSCRMTYPE_m NVARCHAR(100);
	--DECLARE	@Product_m NVARCHAR(100);
	--DECLARE	@Package_Type_m varchar(100);

	--DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	--DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	--DECLARE @QUERY_O_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);

	--DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);



	BEGIN
		IF(@Type = 1 )
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
   				   SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, (ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, (CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT 
				   ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID			   
				   FROM (SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 				
						UNION ALL
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, 0 AS ATS_AMT, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS CRM_AMT
							 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
							) AS ABC
					WHERE (ATS_AMT > 0 OR CRM_AMT > 0)
					ORDER BY YR, MNTH
				END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
   				   SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, (ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, (CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT 
				   ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID			   
				   FROM (SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 				
							) AS ABC
					WHERE (ATS_AMT > 0 OR CRM_AMT > 0)
					ORDER BY YR, MNTH
				END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
   					   SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, (ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, (CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT 
					   ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID			   
					   FROM (	SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
								, 0 AS ATS_AMT, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS CRM_AMT
								 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
								FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
								WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
								) AS ABC
						WHERE (ATS_AMT > 0 OR CRM_AMT > 0)
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
				END
			END
		IF(@Type = 3 )
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, SUM(ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
							GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
						UNION ALL
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM(ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
								GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
							) AS ABC
					GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
					ORDER BY YR, MNTH
				END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
							GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
						) AS ABC
						GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
								GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
						) AS ABC
						GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
			END
		IF(@Type = 4 AND @CoID = 0)
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name  
							  UNION ALL
							  SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name 
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
			END
		IF(@Type = 4 AND @CoID > 0)
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
	--DECLARE @FDATE DATE = '2018-01-01' ;
	--DECLARE @TDATE DATE = '2023-12-31' ;
	--DECLARE @CoID INT = 3 ;
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate 
							AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name  
							  UNION ALL
							  SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate 
							AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name 
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
			END
		IF(@TYPE = 555)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [TYPE], [AAI_CO_ID] AS AI_CO_ID, [CO_Company_Name]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V]
				ORDER BY AAI_CO_ID
			END
		IF(@Type = 6)
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
						SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period
							  ,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT])) AS ATS_CRM_AMT
							  ,SUM([ATS_INV_AMT]) AS [ATS_INV_AMT]
							  ,SUM([CRM_BOOK_AMT]) AS [CRM_BOOK_AMT]
							  ,SUM([ATS_ADJ_AMT]) AS [ATS_ADJ_AMT]
							  ,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT] + [ATS_ADJ_AMT])) AS [OutStanding_Amt]
						  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1]
						  WHERE CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
						  GROUP BY YR, MNTH, MNTH_NAME
						  ORDER BY YR, MNTH						
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period
							  ,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT])) AS ATS_CRM_AMT
							  ,SUM([ATS_INV_AMT]) AS [ATS_INV_AMT]
							  ,SUM([CRM_BOOK_AMT]) AS [CRM_BOOK_AMT]
							  ,SUM([ATS_ADJ_AMT]) AS [ATS_ADJ_AMT]
							  ,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT] + [ATS_ADJ_AMT])) AS [OutStanding_Amt]
						  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1]
						  WHERE  TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
						  GROUP BY YR, MNTH, MNTH_NAME
						  ORDER BY YR, MNTH	
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period
							  ,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT])) AS ATS_CRM_AMT
							  ,SUM([ATS_INV_AMT]) AS [ATS_INV_AMT]
							  ,SUM([CRM_BOOK_AMT]) AS [CRM_BOOK_AMT]
							  ,SUM([ATS_ADJ_AMT]) AS [ATS_ADJ_AMT]
							  ,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT] + [ATS_ADJ_AMT])) AS [OutStanding_Amt]
						  FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1]
						  WHERE  TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
						  GROUP BY YR, MNTH, MNTH_NAME
						  ORDER BY YR, MNTH	
					END
			END

		IF(@Type = 7 AND @CoID = 0)
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
						SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
								AI_NO,
								CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) AS AI_DATE,
								CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation,102) AS Vehicle_DateOfInstallation,
								Vehicle_EngineNo, 
								CustomerName,
								CO_Company_Name,
								PRODUCT, 
								PACKAGE_TYPE,
								FLEET_TYPE,
								TYPE,
								Fresh_Inv,
								Renewal_Inv,
								Debit_Memo,
								Credit_Memo,
								Payment_Receipt,
								Pending_Invoices,
								OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS
		 				FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
						WHERE CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
						ORDER BY Vehicle_EngineNo, AO_VEHICLE_ID					
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
								AI_NO,
								AI_DATE,
								Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
								Vehicle_EngineNo, 
								CustomerName,
								CO_Company_Name,
								PRODUCT, 
								PACKAGE_TYPE,
								FLEET_TYPE,
								TYPE,
								Fresh_Inv,
								Renewal_Inv,
								Debit_Memo,
								Credit_Memo,
								Payment_Receipt,
								Pending_Invoices,
								OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS
						FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
						WHERE  TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
						ORDER BY Vehicle_EngineNo, AO_VEHICLE_ID	
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
								AI_NO,
								AI_DATE,
								Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
								Vehicle_EngineNo, 
								CustomerName,
								CO_Company_Name,
								PRODUCT, 
								PACKAGE_TYPE,
								FLEET_TYPE,
								TYPE,
								Fresh_Inv,
								Renewal_Inv,
								Debit_Memo,
								Credit_Memo,
								Payment_Receipt,
								Pending_Invoices,
								OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS
						FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
						WHERE  TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
						ORDER BY Vehicle_EngineNo, AO_VEHICLE_ID
					END
			END

		IF(@Type = 7 AND @CoID > 0)
		BEGIN
			IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
				BEGIN
					SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
							AI_NO,
							CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) AS AI_DATE,
							CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation,102) AS Vehicle_DateOfInstallation,
							Vehicle_EngineNo, 
							CustomerName,
							CO_Company_Name,
							PRODUCT, 
							PACKAGE_TYPE,
							FLEET_TYPE,
							TYPE,
							Fresh_Inv,
							Renewal_Inv,
							Debit_Memo,
							Credit_Memo,
							Payment_Receipt,
							Pending_Invoices,
							OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS
						FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
					WHERE CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) 
					between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102) AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
					AND AI_CO_ID = @COID
					ORDER BY Vehicle_EngineNo, AO_VEHICLE_ID					
				END

			IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
				BEGIN
					SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
							AI_NO,
							AI_DATE,
							Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
							Vehicle_EngineNo, 
							CustomerName,
							CO_Company_Name,
							PRODUCT, 
							PACKAGE_TYPE,
							FLEET_TYPE,
							TYPE,
							Fresh_Inv,
							Renewal_Inv,
							Debit_Memo,
							Credit_Memo,
							Payment_Receipt,
							Pending_Invoices,
							OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS
					FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
					WHERE  TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) 
					between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
					AND AI_CO_ID = @COID
					ORDER BY Vehicle_EngineNo, AO_VEHICLE_ID	
				END

			IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
				BEGIN
					SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
							AI_NO,
							AI_DATE,
							Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
							Vehicle_EngineNo, 
							CustomerName,
							CO_Company_Name,
							PRODUCT, 
							PACKAGE_TYPE,
							FLEET_TYPE,
							TYPE,
							Fresh_Inv,
							Renewal_Inv,
							Debit_Memo,
							Credit_Memo,
							Payment_Receipt,
							Pending_Invoices,
							OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS
					FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
					WHERE  TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AI_DATE,102) 
					between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102)
					AND AI_CO_ID = @COID
					ORDER BY Vehicle_EngineNo, AO_VEHICLE_ID
				END
		END

		IF(@TYPE = 5)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [TYPE], [AI_CO_ID], [CO_Company_Name]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
				ORDER BY AI_CO_ID
			END
		IF(@TYPE = 9)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [PRODUCT]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
				ORDER BY [PRODUCT]
			END
		IF(@TYPE = 10)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [PACKAGE_TYPE]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
				ORDER BY [PACKAGE_TYPE]
			END		
	END
END

--, @m_Product varchar(50), @m_Package_Type varchar(50)

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[SP_AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_sh_New](@m_Type int, @m_FDate date, @m_TDate date,	@m_CoID int, @m_ATSCRMTYPE varchar(3), @m_Product varchar(50), @m_Package_Type varchar(50), @m_ReceiptStatus int, @m_Veh_Status int, @m_Skip int, @m_Take int)

AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@Type INT;
	DECLARE	@FDate date;
	DECLARE	@TDate date;
	DECLARE	@CoID  INT;
	DECLARE	@ATSCRMTYPE varchar(3);
	DECLARE	@Product varchar(50)
	DECLARE @ReceiptStatus int;
	DECLARE	@Package_Type varchar(50);
	DECLARE	@Veh_Status int;
	DECLARE	@Skip int;
	DECLARE	@Take int;

	SET @TYPE = @m_Type
	SET	@FDate = @m_FDate
	SET	@TDate = @m_TDate
	SET	@CoID = @m_CoID
	SET	@ATSCRMTYPE = @m_ATSCRMTYPE
	SET @Product = @m_Product
	SET @ReceiptStatus = @m_ReceiptStatus
	SET @Package_Type = @m_Package_Type
	SET @Veh_Status = @m_Veh_Status
	SET @Skip = @m_Skip
	SET @Take = @m_Take

	DECLARE @CoID_m NVARCHAR(100);
	DECLARE @Veh_Status_m NVARCHAR(100);

	DECLARE @ATSCRMTYPE_m NVARCHAR(100);
	DECLARE	@Product_m NVARCHAR(100);
	DECLARE	@Package_Type_m NVARCHAR(100);
	DECLARE @ReceiptStatus_m NVARCHAR(100);

	DECLARE @QUERY_S_1 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_W_2 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @QUERY_O_3 NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @FetchOffsetQuery NVARCHAR(MAX);

	DECLARE @EXEC_QUERY NVARCHAR(MAX);



	BEGIN
		IF(@Type = 1 )
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
   					   SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, (ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, (CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT 
					   ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID			   
					   FROM (SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
								, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
								 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
								FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
								WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 				
							UNION ALL
								SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
								, 0 AS ATS_AMT, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS CRM_AMT
								 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
								FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
								WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
								) AS ABC
						WHERE (ATS_AMT > 0 OR CRM_AMT > 0)
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
   					   SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, (ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, (CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT 
					   ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID			   
					   FROM (SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
								, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
								 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
								FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
								WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 				
								) AS ABC
						WHERE (ATS_AMT > 0 OR CRM_AMT > 0)
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
   					   SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, (ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, (CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT 
					   ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID			   
					   FROM (	SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
								, 0 AS ATS_AMT, (ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS CRM_AMT
								 ,AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE,AO_VEHICLE_ID,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,PRODUCT,PACKAGE_TYPE,OBJECTID
								FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
								WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
								) AS ABC
						WHERE (ATS_AMT > 0 OR CRM_AMT > 0)
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
			END
		IF(@Type = 3 )
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, SUM(ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
							GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
						UNION ALL
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM(ISNULL([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT],0)) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between CONVERT(DATETIME, @FDate,102)  AND CONVERT(DATETIME, @TDate,102) 
								GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
							) AS ABC
					GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
					ORDER BY YR, MNTH
				END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
							GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) 
						) AS ABC
						GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD
							, 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND CONVERT(DATETIME, AAI_AI_DATE,102) between @FDate AND @TDate
								GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE))
						) AS ABC
						GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD
						ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
			END
		IF(@Type = 4 AND @CoID = 0)
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name  
							  UNION ALL
							  SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name 
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
			END
		IF(@Type = 4 AND @CoID > 0)
			BEGIN
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL')
					BEGIN
	--DECLARE @FDATE DATE = '2018-01-01' ;
	--DECLARE @TDATE DATE = '2023-12-31' ;
	--DECLARE @CoID INT = 3 ;
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate 
							AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name  
							  UNION ALL
							  SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate 
							AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'ATS')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							, CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS ATS_AMT, 0 AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'ATS' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE), CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name 
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END

				IF(@ATSCRMTYPE = 'CRM')
					BEGIN
						SELECT TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ATS_AMT) AS ATSAMT, SUM(CRM_AMT) AS CRMAMT FROM (
							SELECT TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Year(AAI_AI_DATE) AS YR
							  , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)) AS INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							  , 0 AS ATS_AMT, SUM([AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]) AS CRM_AMT
							FROM  AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
							WHERE TYPE = 'CRM' AND AAI_AI_DATE between @FDate AND @TDate AND AAI_CO_ID = @CoID
							  GROUP BY TYPE, MONTH(AAI_AI_DATE), Year(AAI_AI_DATE) , CONCAT(FORMAT(AAI_AI_DATE, 'MMM'), ' - ',  Year(AAI_AI_DATE)), CO_Company_Name
							  ) AS ABC
							GROUP BY TYPE, MNTH, YR, INV_PERIOD, CO_Company_Name
							ORDER BY YR, MNTH
					END
			END
		IF(@TYPE = 555)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [TYPE], [AAI_CO_ID] AS AI_CO_ID, [CO_Company_Name]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V]
				ORDER BY AAI_CO_ID
			END

		IF(@Type = 6)
			BEGIN
				SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, '' - '', YR) AS Period
										,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT])) AS ATS_CRM_AMT
										,SUM([ATS_INV_AMT]) AS [ATS_INV_AMT]
										,SUM([CRM_BOOK_AMT]) AS [CRM_BOOK_AMT]
										,SUM([ATS_ADJ_AMT]) AS [ATS_ADJ_AMT]
										,SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT] + [ATS_ADJ_AMT])) AS [OutStanding_Amt]
									FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1]
									WHERE 1 = 1 
									AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),AI_DATE,121)
									BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''')'
	
	
				SET @QUERY_O_3 = ' GROUP BY YR, MNTH, MNTH_NAME '

				SET @Veh_Status_m = CASE WHEN @Veh_Status = 2 Then '' WHEN @Veh_Status = 0 Then ' AND OBJECTID = 0 ' ELSE ' AND OBJECTID > 0 ' END
				SET @ATSCRMTYPE_m = CASE WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL' Then '' ELSE ' AND TYPE = ''' + @ATSCRMTYPE +'''' END
				SET @Product_m = CASE WHEN @Product = 'ALL' Then '' ELSE ' And Product = ''' + @Product +''''  END
				SET @Package_Type_m = CASE WHEN @Package_Type = 'ALL' THEN '' ELSE ' And Package_Type = ''' + @Package_Type  +'''' END
				
				SET @ReceiptStatus_m = CASE WHEN @ReceiptStatus = 0 THEN '' WHEN @ReceiptStatus = 1 THEN ' HAVING (SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT] + [ATS_ADJ_AMT]))) > 0 ' WHEN @ReceiptStatus = 2 THEN ' HAVING (SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT] + [ATS_ADJ_AMT]))) < 0 ' ELSE ' HAVING (SUM(([ATS_INV_AMT] + [CRM_BOOK_AMT] + [ATS_ADJ_AMT]))) = 0 '  END
				
				SET @QUERY_W_2 =  @ATSCRMTYPE_m + @Product_m + @Package_Type_m + @Veh_Status_m 

				SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 + @QUERY_O_3 + @ReceiptStatus_m + ' ORDER BY YR, MNTH '

				EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;
				--SELECT @EXEC_QUERY

			END

		IF(@Type = 7)
			BEGIN
				SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, '' - '', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
											AI_NO,
											CONVERT(nvarchar(24), AI_DATE, 121) AS AI_DATE_NVC,
											AI_DATE,
											Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
											Vehicle_EngineNo,
											AI_CO_ID,
											CustomerName,
											CO_Company_Name,
											PRODUCT, 
											PACKAGE_TYPE,
											FLEET_TYPE,
											TYPE,
											Fresh_Inv,
											Renewal_Inv,
											Debit_Memo,
											Credit_Memo,
											Payment_Receipt,
											Pending_Invoices,
											OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS,
											(CASE 
											WHEN OBJECTID = 0 THEN 0  
											WHEN OBJECTID >= 0 THEN 2  
											WHEN OBJECTID > 0 THEN 1  
											END) as VEH_STATUS_NO
									FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
									WHERE 1 = 1 
									AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),AI_DATE,121)
									BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''')'

				SET @QUERY_O_3 = ' ORDER BY AO_VEHICLE_ID '
				--Set m_RowCount = 'Select Count(AI_NO) from AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1'

				SET @Veh_Status_m = CASE WHEN @Veh_Status = 2 Then '' WHEN @Veh_Status = 0 Then ' AND OBJECTID = 0 ' ELSE ' AND OBJECTID > 0 ' END
				SET @CoID_m = CASE WHEN @CoID = 0 Then '' ELSE ' AND AI_CO_ID = ' + STR(@CoID) END
				SET @ATSCRMTYPE_m = CASE WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL' Then '' ELSE ' AND TYPE = ''' + @ATSCRMTYPE +'''' END
				SET @Product_m = CASE WHEN @Product = 'ALL' Then '' ELSE ' And Product = ''' + @Product +''''  END
				SET @Package_Type_m = CASE WHEN @Package_Type = 'ALL' THEN '' ELSE ' And Package_Type = ''' + @Package_Type  +'''' END

				SET @FetchOffsetQuery = ' OFFSET ' + Str(@Skip) + ' ROWS FETCH NEXT ' + Str(@Take) + ' ROWS ONLY '
				SET @QUERY_W_2 = @Veh_Status_m + @CoID_m + @ATSCRMTYPE_m + @Product_m + @Package_Type_m

				SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 + @QUERY_O_3 + @FetchOffsetQuery
				--select @EXEC_QUERY
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;
			END

		IF(@Type = 8)
			BEGIN
				SET @QUERY_S_1 = 'SELECT 	Count(*) as [TotalRecord], SUM(Fresh_Inv) AS [Fresh_Inv],
											SUM(Renewal_Inv) AS [Renewal_Inv],
											SUM(Debit_Memo) AS [Debit_Memo],
											SUM(Credit_Memo) AS [Credit_Memo],
											SUM(Payment_Receipt) AS [Payment_Receipt],
											SUM(Pending_Invoices) AS [Pending_Invoices]												
									FROM AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
									WHERE 1 = 1 AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),AI_DATE,121)
									BETWEEN ''' + CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @FDate, 121) +''' AND'''+ CONVERT(nvarchar(24), @TDate, 121) +''')'

				--SET @QUERY_O_3 = ' ORDER BY AO_VEHICLE_ID'

				SET @Veh_Status_m = CASE WHEN @Veh_Status = 2 Then '' WHEN @Veh_Status = 0 Then ' AND OBJECTID = 0 ' ELSE ' AND OBJECTID > 0 ' END
				SET @CoID_m = CASE WHEN @CoID = 0 Then '' ELSE ' AND AI_CO_ID = ' + STR(@CoID) END
				SET @ATSCRMTYPE_m = CASE WHEN @ATSCRMTYPE = 'ALL' Then '' ELSE ' AND TYPE = ''' + @ATSCRMTYPE +'''' END
				SET @Product_m = CASE WHEN @Product = 'ALL' Then '' ELSE ' And Product = ''' + @Product +''''  END
				SET @Package_Type_m = CASE WHEN @Package_Type = 'ALL' THEN '' ELSE ' And Package_Type = ''' + @Package_Type  +'''' END

				SET @QUERY_W_2 = @CoID_m + @ATSCRMTYPE_m + @Product_m + @Package_Type_m + @Veh_Status_m

				SET @EXEC_QUERY = @QUERY_S_1 + @QUERY_W_2 
				--select @EXEC_QUERY
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @EXEC_QUERY;
			END

		IF(@TYPE = 5)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [TYPE], [AI_CO_ID], [CO_Company_Name]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
				ORDER BY [CO_Company_Name]
			END
		IF(@TYPE = 9)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [PRODUCT]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
				ORDER BY [PRODUCT]
			END
		IF(@TYPE = 10)
			BEGIN
				SELECT DISTINCT [PACKAGE_TYPE]
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
				ORDER BY [PACKAGE_TYPE]
			END		
		IF(@TYPE = 11)
			BEGIN
				SELECT Count(*)
				FROM [ATS_GL].[dbo].AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
				WHERE 1 = 1 AND  (CONVERT(nvarchar(24),AI_DATE,121)
				BETWEEN CONVERT(nvarchar(24), '2018-11-26 00:00:00.000', 121) AND CONVERT(nvarchar(24), '2022-11-26 00:00:00.000', 121))
			END	
		if(@Type = 12)
		BEGIN
		SELECT MNTH, MNTH_NAME, YR, CONCAT(MNTH_NAME, ' - ', YR) AS Period, AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
		AI_NO,
		CONVERT(nvarchar(24), AI_DATE, 121) AS AI_DATE_NVC,
		AI_DATE,
		TYPE,
		Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
		Vehicle_EngineNo,
		AI_CO_ID,
		CustomerName,
		CO_Company_Name,
		PRODUCT, 
		PACKAGE_TYPE,
		FLEET_TYPE,
		Fresh_Inv,
		Renewal_Inv,
		Debit_Memo,
		Credit_Memo,
		Payment_Receipt,
		Pending_Invoices,
		OBJECTID AS VEH_STATUS,
		(CASE 
		WHEN OBJECTID = 0 THEN 0  
		--WHEN OBJECTID >= 0 THEN 2  
		WHEN OBJECTID > 0 THEN 1  
		END) as VEH_STATUS_NO,
		(CASE 
		WHEN Pending_Invoices > 0 THEN 1
		WHEN Pending_Invoices < 0 THEN 2  
		WHEN Pending_Invoices = 0 THEN 3
		ELSE
			0
		END) as Receipt_Status
		from AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1 --Where TYPE = 'ATS'
		ORDER BY YR, MNTH
		END
	END
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[sp_AR_Create_Invoice]
	@INV_Type INT,
	@AO_NO BIGINT,
	@PBI BIGINT,
	@AIT_DATE datetime


AS
BEGIN
	--SELECT @INV_Type, @AO_NO, @PBI

	Declare @strSQL as Nvarchar(Max)
	DECLARE @cursorIDList CURSOR 

	Declare @AO_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_NO_1 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_DATE DATETIME
	Declare @AO_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @AO_CO_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_VEHICLE_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PACKAGE_NAME VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @AO_MAFD BIT
	Declare @AO_DEACTIVE_DATE DATETIME
	Declare @AO_IM_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE1 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE2 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE3 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE4 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE5 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE6 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE7 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE8 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE9 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE10 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE11 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_PRICE12 BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV1_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV2_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV3_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV4_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV5_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV6_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV7_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV8_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV9_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV10_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV11_ID BIGINT
	Declare @AO_INV12_ID BIGINT
	Declare @IM_DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @CO_Company_Name VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Vehicle_Make VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Vehicle_Model VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Vehicle_EngineNo VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Vehicle_ChasisNo VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Vehicle_RegistrationNo VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Vehicle_PONo VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @CustomerName VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Address1 VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Address2 VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @TelephoneNo VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation DATETIME
	Declare @AO_MAFD_DATE DATETIME
	Declare @NIC VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @AO_BookingCat VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @InsuredBy VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @PRODUCT VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @CORPORATE_ID BIGINT
	Declare @PACKAGE_TYPE VARCHAR(200)
	Declare @CustomerId BIGINT
	Declare @vehid BIGINT
	Declare @Vehicle_Id BIGINT
	Declare @OBJECTID BIGINT
	Declare @Price BIGINT

	Declare @Cnt INT

	TRUNCATE TABLE AR_ORDER_V_TEMP

	SET @AO_DATE = GETDATE()

    IF @INV_Type = 1 
		Begin
        SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price1 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
	 IF @INV_Type = 2 
		Begin
		SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price2 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
	 IF @INV_Type = 3 
		Begin
		SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price3 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
	 IF @INV_Type = 4 
		Begin
		SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price4 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
	 IF @INV_Type = 5 
		Begin
		SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price5 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
	 IF @INV_Type = 6 
		Begin
		SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price6 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
	 IF @INV_Type = 7 
		Begin
		SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price7 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
	 IF @INV_Type = 8 
		Begin
		SET @strSQL = 'Select *,AO_price8 as Price from ar_order_v WITH (NOLOCK) where ao_no = ' + STR(@AO_NO)
		End
