CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_Pivot_Table]
	@Amount_Range_Type INT
	AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	DECLARE @columns NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @columnsSelectWithISNULL NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @columnsSum NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX);

	-- Step 1: Get pivot columns ordered by SortOrder
	SELECT @columns = STUFF((
		SELECT ',' + QUOTENAME(AgingBucket)
		FROM (
			SELECT DISTINCT AgingBucket, SortOrder
			FROM AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_V
			WHERE 
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 0 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 999999999) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 1 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 1000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 2 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1001 AND 10000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 3 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 10001 AND 100000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 4 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 100001 AND 500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 5 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 500001 AND 1000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 6 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1000001 AND 1500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 7 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1500001 AND 2000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 8 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 2000001 AND 3000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 9 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 3000001 AND 6000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 10 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 6000001 AND 10000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 11 AND TotalAdjusted >= 10000001)
		) AS Sub
		ORDER BY SortOrder
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE
	).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 1, '');

	-- Step 2: ISNULL(column, 0) list for SELECT (display zeros instead of NULL)
	SELECT @columnsSelectWithISNULL = STUFF((
		SELECT ', ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(AgingBucket) + ', 0) AS ' + QUOTENAME(AgingBucket)
		FROM (
			SELECT DISTINCT AgingBucket, SortOrder
			FROM AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_V
			WHERE 
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 0 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 999999999) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 1 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 1000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 2 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1001 AND 10000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 3 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 10001 AND 100000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 4 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 100001 AND 500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 5 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 500001 AND 1000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 6 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1000001 AND 1500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 7 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1500001 AND 2000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 8 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 2000001 AND 3000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 9 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 3000001 AND 6000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 10 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 6000001 AND 10000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 11 AND TotalAdjusted >= 10000001)
		) AS Sub
		ORDER BY SortOrder
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE
	).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

	-- Step 3: Row total: sum of ISNULL(...) values
	DECLARE @rowTotalExpr NVARCHAR(MAX);
	SELECT @rowTotalExpr = STUFF((
		SELECT ' + ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(AgingBucket) + ', 0)'
		FROM (
			SELECT DISTINCT AgingBucket, SortOrder
			FROM AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_V
			WHERE 
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 0 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 999999999) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 1 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 1000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 2 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1001 AND 10000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 3 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 10001 AND 100000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 4 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 100001 AND 500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 5 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 500001 AND 1000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 6 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1000001 AND 1500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 7 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1500001 AND 2000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 8 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 2000001 AND 3000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 9 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 3000001 AND 6000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 10 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 6000001 AND 10000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 11 AND TotalAdjusted >= 10000001)
		) AS Sub
		ORDER BY SortOrder
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE
	).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 3, '');

	-- Step 4: SUM(...) for each column (column totals)
	SELECT @columnsSum = STUFF((
		SELECT ', SUM(' + QUOTENAME(AgingBucket) + ') AS ' + QUOTENAME(AgingBucket)
		FROM (
			SELECT DISTINCT AgingBucket, SortOrder
			FROM AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_V
			WHERE 
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 0 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 999999999) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 1 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 1000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 2 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1001 AND 10000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 3 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 10001 AND 100000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 4 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 100001 AND 500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 5 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 500001 AND 1000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 6 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1000001 AND 1500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 7 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1500001 AND 2000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 8 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 2000001 AND 3000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 9 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 3000001 AND 6000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 10 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 6000001 AND 10000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 11 AND TotalAdjusted >= 10000001)
		) AS Sub
		ORDER BY SortOrder
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE
	).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

	-- Step 5: Final dynamic SQL
	SET @sql = '
	-- Pivot with NULLs converted to 0, plus row totals
	SELECT CO_Company_Name, ' + @columnsSelectWithISNULL + ', ' + @rowTotalExpr + ' AS Row_Total
	FROM (
		SELECT CO_Company_Name, AgingBucket, TotalAdjusted
		FROM AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_V
			WHERE 
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 0 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 999999999) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 1 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 1000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 2 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1001 AND 10000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 3 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 10001 AND 100000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 4 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 100001 AND 500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 5 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 500001 AND 1000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 6 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1000001 AND 1500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 7 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1500001 AND 2000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 8 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 2000001 AND 3000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 9 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 3000001 AND 6000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 10 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 6000001 AND 10000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 11 AND TotalAdjusted >= 10000001)
	) AS SourceTable
	PIVOT (
		SUM(TotalAdjusted)
		FOR AgingBucket IN (' + @columns + ')
	) AS PivotResult

	UNION ALL

	-- Column totals row
	SELECT ''TOTAL'' AS CO_Company_Name, ' + @columnsSum + ', SUM(' + @rowTotalExpr + ') AS Row_Total
	FROM (
		SELECT CO_Company_Name, ' + @columns + '
		FROM (
			SELECT CO_Company_Name, AgingBucket, TotalAdjusted
			FROM AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_V
			WHERE 
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 0 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 999999999) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 1 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1 AND 1000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 2 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1001 AND 10000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 3 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 10001 AND 100000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 4 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 100001 AND 500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 5 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 500001 AND 1000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 6 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1000001 AND 1500000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 7 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 1500001 AND 2000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 8 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 2000001 AND 3000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 9 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 3000001 AND 6000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 10 AND TotalAdjusted BETWEEN 6000001 AND 10000000) OR
				(@Amount_Range_Type = 11 AND TotalAdjusted >= 10000001)
		) AS SourceTable
		PIVOT (
			SUM(TotalAdjusted)
			FOR AgingBucket IN (' + @columns + ')
		) AS PivotResult
	) AS Totals;
	';

	-- Execute
	----EXEC sp_executesql @sql;
		EXEC sp_executesql @sql, N'@Amount_Range_Type INT', @Amount_Range_Type = @Amount_Range_Type;


END


--Exec sp_AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_Pivot_Table @Amount_Range_Type  = 1

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_AR_Prepared_Invoice] (
@Type int,
@m_Fr_AO_NO BIGINT, 
@m_To_AO_NO BIGINT, 
@m_COID BIGINT, 
@m_AO_BOOKINGCAT Varchar(20),
@m_OrderNos Varchar(20),
@AIT_AO_NO int,
@AIT_DATE datetime,
@AITCOL int
)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @Fr_AO_NO BIGINT ;
DECLARE @To_AO_NO BIGINT ;
DECLARE @COID BIGINT ;
DECLARE @AO_BOOKINGCAT Varchar(20) ;
DECLARE @OrderNos Varchar(20) ;
DECLARE @NOW DATETIME ;


SET @Fr_AO_NO = @m_Fr_AO_NO
SET @To_AO_NO = @m_To_AO_NO
SET @COID = @m_COID
SET @AO_BOOKINGCAT = @m_AO_BOOKINGCAT
SET @OrderNos = @m_OrderNos

--SET @NOW = '2023-12-18'

IF(@Type = 1)
BEGIN
SET @NOW = GETDATE()

TRUNCATE TABLE AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE

----IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Yearly')
----	BEGIN
----		SET ANSI_NULLS ON
----		SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON 

----		INSERT INTO AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE 
----		Execute sp_Get_Order_Invoice @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID

----		--SELECT * FROM AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE
----		--SELECT @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
----	END

IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Yearly' AND @OrderNos = 'Individual')
	BEGIN
		SET ANSI_NULLS ON
		SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON 

		INSERT INTO AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE 
		Execute sp_Get_Order_Invoice @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID

		--SELECT * FROM AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE
		--SELECT @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID, @OrderNos
	END

IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Yearly' AND @OrderNos = 'Selected')
	BEGIN
		SET ANSI_NULLS ON
		SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON 

		INSERT INTO AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE 
		Execute sp_Get_Order_Invoice_Selected @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID

		--SELECT * FROM AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE
		--SELECT @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID, @OrderNos
	END
IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Half Yearly')
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE
		Execute SP_GET_ORDER_SEMI_INVOICE @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
	END
IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Quarterly')
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE
		Execute SP_GET_ORDER_QTR_INVOICE @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
	END
IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Monthly')
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE
		Execute SP_GET_ORDER_MNTH_INVOICE @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
	END

DECLARE @cursorIDList CURSOR 
DECLARE @cursorIDList_1 CURSOR 
DECLARE @cursorIDList2 CURSOR 
DECLARE @AO_NO BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE1 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE2 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE3 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE4 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE5 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE6 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE7 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE8 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE9 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE10 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE11 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE12 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV1 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV2 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV3 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV4 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV5 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV6 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV7 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV8 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV9 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV10 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV11 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV12 BIGINT
DECLARE @AO_DATE1 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE2 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE3 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE4 DATETIME

DECLARE @PBI BIGINT

SET @PBI = 0

	TRUNCATE TABLE AR_INVOICE_TEMP

SET @cursorIDList = CURSOR FOR SELECT 
	AO_NO, PRICE1, PRICE2, PRICE3, PRICE4, PRICE5, PRICE6, PRICE7, PRICE8, PRICE9, PRICE10,	PRICE11, PRICE12,

 FROM AR_PREPARED_INVOICE_TABLE WITH (NOLOCK) ORDER BY AO_NO
 
OPEN @cursorIDList

FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList INTO 
	@AO_NO,	@PRICE1, @PRICE2, @PRICE3, @PRICE4,	@PRICE5, @PRICE6, @PRICE7, @PRICE8,	@PRICE9, @PRICE10, 
	@PRICE11, @PRICE12,	
	@INV1, @INV2, @INV3, @INV4,	@INV5, @INV6, @INV7, @INV8,	@INV9, @INV10, @INV11, @INV12,	
	@AO_DATE1, @AO_DATE2, @AO_DATE3, @AO_DATE4,	@AO_DATE5, @AO_DATE6, @AO_DATE7, @AO_DATE8,	@AO_DATE9, 
	@AO_DATE10,	@AO_DATE11,	@AO_DATE12,	@AO_MAFD, @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, @AO_MAFD_DATE, @AO_CO_ID

While @@fetch_status = 0
	Begin
		--SELECT 'PREPARED INVOICE'
		Declare @blnCreateInvoice BIT
		Declare @MNOS INT
		Declare @mDate datetime
		Declare @mPrice BIGINT

		SET @PBI = @PBI + 1

		--Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice 1, @AO_NO, @PBI

	--	SELECT 1, 'Prepared Invoice', @AO_BOOKINGCAT, @AO_NO, @MNOS, @mDate, @mPrice, @PBI,
	--	@AO_NO,	@PRICE1, @PRICE2, @PRICE3, @PRICE4,	@PRICE5, @PRICE6, @PRICE7, @PRICE8,	@PRICE9, @PRICE10, 
	--@PRICE11, @PRICE12,	
	--@INV1, @INV2, @INV3, @INV4,	@INV5, @INV6, @INV7, @INV8,	@INV9, @INV10, @INV11, @INV12,	
	--@AO_DATE1, @AO_DATE2, @AO_DATE3, @AO_DATE4,	@AO_DATE5, @AO_DATE6, @AO_DATE7, @AO_DATE8,	@AO_DATE9, 
	--@AO_DATE10,	@AO_DATE11,	@AO_DATE12,	@AO_MAFD, @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, @AO_MAFD_DATE, @AO_CO_ID

		
	    If @PRICE1 > 0 And (@INV1 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE1 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin	
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice 1, @AO_NO, @PBI, @AIT_DATE

			End
        Else
            If (@INV1 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 1
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE1
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE1
				End

		If @PRICE2 > 0 And (@INV2 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE2 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin

					SET @mPrice = @PRICE2

            If (@INV3 IS NOT NULL)

					SET @mPrice = @PRICE3
				End	

	    If @PRICE4 > 0 And (@INV4 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE4 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin

				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV4 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 4
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE4
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE4
				End		
				
	    If @PRICE5 > 0 And (@INV5 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE5 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice 5, @AO_NO, @PBI, @AIT_DATE

			End
        Else
            If (@INV5 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin

					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE5
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE5

					SET @mPrice = @PRICE6

			Begin

			End
        Else
            If (@INV7 IS NOT NULL)

					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE7
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE7
				End				

	    If @PRICE8 > 0 And (@INV8 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE8 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin

				End				

	    If @PRICE9 > 0 And (@INV9 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE9 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin

				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV9 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 9
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE9
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE9
				End				

	    If @PRICE10 > 0 And (@INV10 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE10 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice 10, @AO_NO, @PBI, @AIT_DATE

			End

            If (@INV10 IS NOT NULL)

					SET @mPrice = @PRICE10

	    If @PRICE11 > 0 And (@INV11 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE11 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin

				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV11 IS NOT NULL)

					SET @mPrice = @PRICE11
				End				

	    If @PRICE12 > 0 And (@INV12 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE12 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin

				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV12 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 12
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE12
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE12
				End				

       If @blnCreateInvoice = 0 And @AO_MAFD = 1
			Begin
				If @AO_MAFD_Date IS Null
					Begin
					SET @mDate = (@Vehicle_DateOfInstallation) + 335 + (365 * (@MNOS - 1))
					End
				Else
					Begin

				If @mDate <= GETDATE()

	End

Close @cursorIDList;
Deallocate @cursorIDList;

Select DISTINCT AIT_NO,AIT_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO,AIT_TYPE,AIT_AO_NO,co_company_name,AIT_col,AIT_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AIT_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_BookingCat 
from AR_INVOICE_TEMP_V WITH (NOLOCK) ORDER BY AIT_AO_NO

Declare @MaxNo int;
IF(@Type = 2)
BEGIN
	Update AR_INVOICE_TEMP SET AI_TEMP_POST = 1 Where AIT_AO_NO = @AIT_AO_NO AND AIT_COL = @AITCOL

IF(@Type = 4)
BEGIN
DECLARE @AIT_COL int;
DECLARE @strSQL nvarchar(MAX);

SET @cursorIDList2 = CURSOR FOR Select distinct AIT_AO_NO, AIT_COL from ar_Invoice_Temp_v WITH (NOLOCK) Where AI_TEMP_POST = 1

OPEN @cursorIDList2

FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList2 INTO 
	@AIT_AO_NO, @AIT_COL

While @@fetch_status = 0
	Begin
		SET @MaxNo = (Select (MAX(AI_no) + 1)from AR_INVOICE WITH (NOLOCK)) 

		Insert into AR_INVOICE (AI_no,AI_date,AI_ao_no,AI_package_name,AI_im_id,AI_amount,
		AI_vehicle_make,AI_vehicle_model,AI_vehicle_engineno,AI_vehicle_chasisno,
		AI_vehicle_registrationno,AI_vehicle_pono,AI_customer_name,AI_TYPE,AI_CO_ID,
		AI_VEHICLE_DOI,AO_BookingCat)

		Select @MaxNo,@AIT_DATE,AIT_ao_no,AIT_package_name,AIT_im_id,AIT_amount,
		AIT_vehicle_make,AIT_vehicle_model,AIT_vehicle_engineno,AIT_vehicle_chasisno,
		AIT_vehicle_registrationno,AIT_vehicle_pono,AIT_customer_name,AIT_TYPE,CO_ID,
		AIT_VEHICLE_DOI,AO_BookingCat from AR_INVOICE_TEMP_V WITH (NOLOCK)
		Where AIT_AO_NO = @AIT_AO_NO and AIT_COL  = @AIT_COL AND AI_TEMP_POST = 1


		SET @strSQL = CASE
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 1 THEN
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV1_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 2 THEN
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV2_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 3 THEN
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV3_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 4 THEN	 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV4_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 5 THEN		 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV5_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 6 THEN	 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV6_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 7 THEN		 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV7_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 8 THEN		 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV8_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 9 THEN		 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV9_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 10 THEN		 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV10_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 11 THEN	 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV11_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		WHEN @AIT_COL = 12 THEN		 
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_INV12_ID = ' + str(@MaxNo) +  ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		ELSE
			 'UPDATE AR_ORDER SET AO_MAFD_Date=' + CAST(GetDate() as varchar(50)) + ' WHERE AO_NO = ' + str(@AIT_AO_NO)
		END

		EXEC sp_executesql @strSQL;
			FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList2 INTO @AIT_AO_NO, @AIT_COL
	end

	--Delete from ar_Invoice_Temp Where AIT_AO_NO = @AIT_AO_NO
	
Close @cursorIDList2;
Deallocate @cursorIDList2;
	End


If(@Type = 5)
	Begin
			SELECT * FROM  AR_INVOICE_TEMP_V Where AIT_AO_NO = @AIT_AO_NO And AIT_COL = @AITCOL Order By AIT_AO_NO, AIT_COL
	End
END

-- Author:		Kamran Jamal Nasir
-- Create date: 26-Jun-2023
-- Description:	This procedure will Auto Create Posted Payables Records Into GL Entries From Payables.
-- ==================================================================================================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_AR_Prepared_Invoice_Test] (
@m_Fr_AO_NO BIGINT, 
@m_To_AO_NO BIGINT, 
@m_COID BIGINT, 
@m_AO_BOOKINGCAT Varchar(20)
)
AS
BEGIN

DECLARE @Fr_AO_NO BIGINT ;
DECLARE @To_AO_NO BIGINT ;
DECLARE @COID BIGINT ;
DECLARE @AO_BOOKINGCAT Varchar(20) ;
DECLARE @NOW DATETIME ;

SET @Fr_AO_NO = @m_Fr_AO_NO
SET @To_AO_NO = @m_To_AO_NO
SET @COID = @m_COID
SET @AO_BOOKINGCAT = @m_AO_BOOKINGCAT
--SET @NOW = '2023-12-18'

SET @NOW = GETDATE()

TRUNCATE TABLE TESTTABLE


IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Yearly')
	BEGIN
		SET ANSI_NULLS ON
		SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON

		INSERT INTO TESTTABLE
		Execute sp_Get_Order_Invoice @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID

		--SELECT @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
	END
IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Half Yearly')
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO TESTTABLE
		Execute SP_GET_ORDER_SEMI_INVOICE @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
	END
IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Quarterly')
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO TESTTABLE
		Execute SP_GET_ORDER_QTR_INVOICE @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
	END
IF (@AO_BOOKINGCAT = 'Monthly')
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO TESTTABLE
		Execute SP_GET_ORDER_MNTH_INVOICE @NOW, @Fr_AO_NO,@To_AO_NO, @COID
	END

DECLARE @cursorIDList CURSOR 
DECLARE @cursorIDList_1 CURSOR 
DECLARE @AO_NO BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE1 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE2 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE3 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE4 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE5 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE6 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE7 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE8 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE9 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE10 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE11 BIGINT
DECLARE @PRICE12 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV1 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV2 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV3 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV4 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV5 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV6 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV7 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV8 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV9 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV10 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV11 BIGINT
DECLARE @INV12 BIGINT
DECLARE @AO_DATE1 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE2 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE3 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE4 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE5 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE6 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE7 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE8 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE9 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE10 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE11 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_DATE12 DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_MAFD BIT
DECLARE @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_MAFD_DATE DATETIME
DECLARE @AO_CO_ID BIGINT

DECLARE @PBI BIGINT

	TRUNCATE TABLE AR_INVOICE_TEMP

SET @cursorIDList = CURSOR FOR SELECT 
	AO_NO, PRICE1, PRICE2, PRICE3, PRICE4, PRICE5, PRICE6, PRICE7, PRICE8, PRICE9, PRICE10,	PRICE11, PRICE12,
	INV1, INV2,	INV3, INV4,	INV5, INV6,	INV7, INV8,	INV9, INV10, INV11,	INV12, 
	AO_DATE1, AO_DATE2,	AO_DATE3, AO_DATE4,	AO_DATE5, AO_DATE6,	AO_DATE7, AO_DATE8,	AO_DATE9, AO_DATE10, 
	AO_DATE11, AO_DATE12, AO_MAFD, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID
 FROM TESTTABLE ORDER BY AO_NO


OPEN @cursorIDList

FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList INTO 
	@AO_NO,	@PRICE1, @PRICE2, @PRICE3, @PRICE4,	@PRICE5, @PRICE6, @PRICE7, @PRICE8,	@PRICE9, @PRICE10, 
	@PRICE11, @PRICE12,	
	@INV1, @INV2, @INV3, @INV4,	@INV5, @INV6, @INV7, @INV8,	@INV9, @INV10, @INV11, @INV12,	
	@AO_DATE1, @AO_DATE2, @AO_DATE3, @AO_DATE4,	@AO_DATE5, @AO_DATE6, @AO_DATE7, @AO_DATE8,	@AO_DATE9, 
	@AO_DATE10,	@AO_DATE11,	@AO_DATE12,	@AO_MAFD, @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, @AO_MAFD_DATE, @AO_CO_ID

While @@fetch_status = 0
	Begin
		Declare @blnCreateInvoice BIT
		Declare @MNOS INT
		Declare @mDate datetime
		Declare @mPrice BIGINT

		SET @PBI = @PBI + 1

		--Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 1, @AO_NO, @PBI

		--SELECT 1, 'Prepared Invoice', @AO_BOOKINGCAT, @AO_NO, @MNOS, @mDate, @mPrice, @PBI
	--	@AO_NO,	@PRICE1, @PRICE2, @PRICE3, @PRICE4,	@PRICE5, @PRICE6, @PRICE7, @PRICE8,	@PRICE9, @PRICE10, 
	--@PRICE11, @PRICE12,	
	--@INV1, @INV2, @INV3, @INV4,	@INV5, @INV6, @INV7, @INV8,	@INV9, @INV10, @INV11, @INV12,	
	--@AO_DATE1, @AO_DATE2, @AO_DATE3, @AO_DATE4,	@AO_DATE5, @AO_DATE6, @AO_DATE7, @AO_DATE8,	@AO_DATE9, 
	--@AO_DATE10,	@AO_DATE11,	@AO_DATE12,	@AO_MAFD, @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, @AO_MAFD_DATE, @AO_CO_ID

	    If @PRICE1 > 0 And (@INV1 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE1 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin	
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 1, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1				
			End
        Else
            If (@INV1 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 1
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE1
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE1
				End

		If @PRICE2 > 0 And (@INV2 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE2 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 2, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV2 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 2
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE2
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE2
				End

	    If @PRICE3 > 0 And (@INV3 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE3 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 3, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV3 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 3
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE3
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE3
				End	

	    If @PRICE4 > 0 And (@INV4 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE4 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 4, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV4 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 4
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE4
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE4
				End		
				
	    If @PRICE5 > 0 And (@INV5 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE5 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 5, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV5 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 5
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE5
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE5
				End				

	    If @PRICE6 > 0 And (@INV6 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE6 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 6, @AO_NO , @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV6 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 6
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE6
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE6
				End				

	    If @PRICE7 > 0 And (@INV7 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE7 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 7, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV7 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 7
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE7
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE7
				End				

	    If @PRICE8 > 0 And (@INV8 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE8 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 8, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV8 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 8
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE8
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE8
				End				

	    If @PRICE9 > 0 And (@INV9 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE9 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 9, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV9 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 9
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE9
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE9
				End				

	    If @PRICE10 > 0 And (@INV10 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE10 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 10, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV10 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 10
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE10
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE10
				End				

	    If @PRICE11 > 0 And (@INV11 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE11 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 11, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV11 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 11
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE11
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE11
				End				

	    If @PRICE12 > 0 And (@INV12 IS NULL) And @AO_DATE12 <= GETDATE() 
			Begin
				Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test 12, @AO_NO, @PBI
				SET @blnCreateInvoice = 1
			End
        Else
            If (@INV12 IS NOT NULL) 
				Begin
					SET @MNOS = 12
					SET @mDate = @AO_DATE12
					SET @mPrice = @PRICE12
				End				

       If @blnCreateInvoice = 0 And @AO_MAFD = 1
			Begin
				If @AO_MAFD_Date IS Null
					Begin
					SET @mDate = (@Vehicle_DateOfInstallation) + 335 + (365 * (@MNOS - 1))
					End
				Else
					Begin
						SET @mDate = (@AO_MAFD_Date + 335)
					End

				If @mDate <= GETDATE() 
					Begin
						Execute sp_AR_Create_Invoice_Test  12, @AO_NO, @PBI
						SET @blnCreateInvoice = 99
					End
			End
			


			--SELECT 	@AO_BOOKINGCAT, @AO_NO, @MNOS, @mDate, @mPrice, @PBI

		--SELECT 	@AO_NO,	@PRICE1, @PRICE2, @PRICE3, @PRICE4,	@PRICE5, @PRICE6, @PRICE7, @PRICE8,	@PRICE9, @PRICE10, 
		--@PRICE11, @PRICE12,	
		--@INV1, @INV2, @INV3, @INV4,	@INV5, @INV6, @INV7, @INV8,	@INV9, @INV10, @INV11, @INV12,	
		--@AO_DATE1, @AO_DATE2, @AO_DATE3, @AO_DATE4,	@AO_DATE5, @AO_DATE6, @AO_DATE7, @AO_DATE8,	@AO_DATE9, 
		--@AO_DATE10,	@AO_DATE11,	@AO_DATE12,	@AO_MAFD, @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, @AO_MAFD_DATE, @AO_CO_ID



	FETCH NEXT FROM @cursorIDList INTO 	@AO_NO,	@PRICE1, @PRICE2, @PRICE3, @PRICE4,	@PRICE5, @PRICE6, @PRICE7, @PRICE8,	@PRICE9, @PRICE10, 
		@PRICE11, @PRICE12,	
		@INV1, @INV2, @INV3, @INV4,	@INV5, @INV6, @INV7, @INV8,	@INV9, @INV10, @INV11, @INV12,	
		@AO_DATE1, @AO_DATE2, @AO_DATE3, @AO_DATE4,	@AO_DATE5, @AO_DATE6, @AO_DATE7, @AO_DATE8,	@AO_DATE9, 
		@AO_DATE10,	@AO_DATE11,	@AO_DATE12,	@AO_MAFD, @Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, @AO_MAFD_DATE, @AO_CO_ID
	End

Close @cursorIDList;
Deallocate @cursorIDList;
Select DISTINCT AIT_NO,AIT_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO,AIT_TYPE,AIT_AO_NO,co_company_name,AIT_col,AIT_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,AIT_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_BookingCat from AR_INVOICE_TEMP_V ORDER BY AIT_AO_NO

END

-- ==================================================================================================================
-- Author:		Kamran Jamal Nasir
-- Create date: 15-Mar-2023
-- Description:	This procedure will create Auto AR Payment Receipt from Accepted CRM Payment Receipt By Finance Dept.
-- ==================================================================================================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_Auto_AR_Payment_Receipt] 
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE @RefNo_Cursor cursor
	DECLARE @AI_No_Cursor cursor
	DECLARE @AI_No_Tax_Cursor cursor

	DECLARE @REFNO AS NVARCHAR(200)
	DECLARE @AI_CO_ID AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @AI_NO AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @Engine as VARCHAR(50)

	DECLARE @APR_NO AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @APT_APR_NO BIGINT

	DECLARE @CNT AS INT
	DECLARE @INV_AMT AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @NOOFTAXES AS INT

	DECLARE @TaxDetails NVARCHAR(MAX)

	DECLARE @DATA_EXIST AS INT

	DECLARE @APR_DESCRIPTION AS NVARCHAR(200)
	DECLARE @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 AS NVARCHAR(200)

	DECLARE @CO_COMPANY_NAME AS VARCHAR(15)	


	SET @DATA_EXIST = (SELECT COUNT(REFNO) From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
						Where 1 = 1 and (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL AND LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
						And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)


						--AND REFNO IN ('TID:050921536037.')						
						--AND AI_CO_ID = 34459
						--AND ATS_POST = 1
					)	

IF (@DATA_EXIST > 0)
	BEGIN
		SET @RefNo_Cursor = CURSOR FOR 
						Select RefNo, AI_CO_ID, COUNT(REFNO) AS CNT, SUM(AMOUNT) AS INV_AMT, MAX(NoOfTaxes) AS [NOOFTAXES]
						From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
						Where (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL And LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
						And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
						GROUP BY RefNo, AI_CO_ID
						Order By RefNo, AI_CO_ID

						--Where 1 = 1 -- and (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL AND LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
						----And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
						--AND REFNO IN ('TID:050921536037.')
						
						--AND AI_CO_ID = 34459
						--AND ATS_POST = 1
						--GROUP BY RefNo, AI_CO_ID
						--Order By RefNo, AI_CO_ID
  OPEN @RefNo_Cursor
  FETCH NEXT FROM @RefNo_Cursor INTO @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @CNT, @INV_AMT, @NOOFTAXES

    While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
    Begin
		SET @APR_NO = (SELECT (MAX(APR_NO) + 1) FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT)

		SET @APR_DESCRIPTION = ' Engine No :'
		SET @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 = SPACE(1)

		SET @CO_COMPANY_NAME = (SELECT CO_COMPANY_NAME FROM  AR_Companies WHERE CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID)

		INSERT INTO [AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT] (
				[APR_NO]
			  ,[APR_DATE]
			  ,[APR_DESCRIPTION]
			  ,[APR_CO_ID]
			  ,[APR_BANK_ID]
			  ,[APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT]
			  ,[APR_CHQ_NO]
			  ,[PostedBy]
			  )
			  SELECT Top (1)  @APR_NO AS APR_NO, 
						DepositDate AS APR_DATE, 
						'PR : ' + RTrim(LTrim(Mode)) + ' ' + Left(RTrim(LTrim(@CO_COMPANY_NAME)),22)  + ' Ref# : ' + RTrim(LTrim(RefNo)) AS APR_DESCRIPTION,
						 AI_CO_ID AS APR_CO_ID, 
						BankID AS APR_BANK_ID, @INV_AMT  AS APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, RTrim(LTrim(SUBSTRING(RefNo,1,50))) AS APR_CHQ_NO,
						PostedBy
				From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted INNER JOIN
								  Bank_Master_v ON CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.BankID = Bank_Master_v.BANK_ID
				WHERE RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID	

			--	+ ' ' + Left(RTrim(LTrim(Bank_Name)),12)
		
		DELETE FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP					
		SET @AI_No_Tax_Cursor = CURSOR FOR Select RefNo, AI_CO_ID, AI_NO, NoOfTaxes, TaxDetails
										From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
										Where RefNo = @REFNO 
										AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
										ORDER BY TRANSID

										--Where 1 = 1 
										--And RefNo = @REFNO
										--AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										--And ATS_Post = 1										 
										--Order By TransID
										
										
										--WHERE REFNO IN ('TID:050921536037.')						
										--AND AI_CO_ID = 34459
										--AND ATS_POST = 1
										--Order By TRANSID

		  OPEN @AI_No_Tax_Cursor
		  FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Tax_Cursor INTO @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @NoOfTaxes, @TaxDetails

			While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			Begin

				IF (@NOOFTAXES > 0)
					BEGIN
						DECLARE @CNT_TAX_ROW AS INT						

						EXEC sp_CRM_AR_TAX_NEW @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No 						
					END


			--		SELECT @APR_NO, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_DESCRIPTION_1, @CNT, @Engine
				Fetch Next From @AI_No_Tax_Cursor into @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @NoOfTaxes, @TaxDetails
			END




		SET @AI_No_Cursor = CURSOR FOR Select RefNo, AI_CO_ID, AI_NO, Engine
										From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
										Where RefNo = @REFNO 
										AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
										ORDER BY TRANSID

										--Where 1 = 1 AND (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL And LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
										--And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
										--And RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										--Order By TransID

										--WHERE REFNO IN ('TID:050921536037.')						
										--AND AI_CO_ID = 34459
										--AND ATS_POST = 1
										--Order By TRANSID

		  OPEN @AI_No_Cursor

		  DECLARE @TAX_AMT BIGINT

		  FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor INTO @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @Engine
			While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			Begin
				SET @TAX_AMT = 0
				SET @TAX_AMT = (SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP
								WHERE AI_No = @AI_No)

				IF @TAX_AMT IS NULL
					BEGIN
						SET @TAX_AMT = 0
					END

			INSERT INTO [AR_ADJUST_INVOICE] (
				   [AAI_APR_NO]
				  ,[AAI_AI_NO]
				  ,[AAI_AI_DATE]
				  ,[AAI_AI_AMOUNT]
				  ,[AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]
				  ,[AAI_ADJUST]
				  ,[AAI_CO_ID]
				  )	
				  Select @APR_NO AS AAI_APR_NO, AI_NO AS AAI_AI_NO, 
						AI_DATE AS AAI_AI_DATE,
						AI_AMOUNT AS AAI_AI_AMOUNT,
						AI_AMOUNT AS AAI_PEN_AMOUNT,
						(AMOUNT + @TAX_AMT) AS AAI_ADJUST,
						AI_CO_ID AS AAI_CO_ID
				FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted
				WHERE RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID And AI_NO = @AI_No
				ORDER BY AI_NO

				UPDATE CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
					SET ATS_POST = 1, ATS_POST_DATE = GETDATE(), APR_NO = @APR_NO
					WHERE RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID And AI_NO = @AI_No 

				IF (@CNT <= 4)
					BEGIN
						SET @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 = RTrim(LTrim(@APR_DESCRIPTION_1)) + ' : ' + @Engine
					END

				IF (@CNT > 4)
					BEGIN
						SET @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 = ' Adjust No of Engines : ' + CAST(@CNT AS VARCHAR(50))
					END
				
				SET @APR_DESCRIPTION = @APR_DESCRIPTION_1

			--		SELECT @APR_NO, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_DESCRIPTION_1, @CNT, @Engine
				Fetch Next From @AI_No_Cursor into @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @Engine
			END


						SET @CNT_TAX_ROW = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP)		

						IF (@CNT_TAX_ROW > 0)
							BEGIN
								INSERT INTO [AR_PAYMENT_TAX] (
									   [APT_APR_NO]
									  ,[APT_TD_ID]
									  ,[APT_TAX_AMOUNT]
										) 
										SELECT @APR_NO AS APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) 
										FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP
										GROUP BY  APT_TD_ID

										--SELECT AI_NO, APT_TD_ID, SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) AS TAX_AMT 
										--FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP_TEST
										--GROUP BY AI_NO, APT_TD_ID
										--ORDER BY AI_NO
								--SELECT @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @NoOfTaxes, @TaxDetails
							END
		
			
			IF (@CNT <= 4)
				BEGIN
					SET @APR_DESCRIPTION = ' Eng #' + @APR_DESCRIPTION
				END

			UPDATE AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT 
				SET APR_DESCRIPTION = APR_DESCRIPTION + @APR_DESCRIPTION
				WHERE APR_NO = @APR_NO

			--SELECT @APR_NO, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_DESCRIPTION_1, @CNT, @Engine

		FETCH NEXT FROM @RefNo_Cursor into @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @CNT, @INV_AMT, @NOOFTAXES
    END

    Close @AI_No_Tax_Cursor
    DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Tax_Cursor

    Close @AI_No_Cursor
    DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor

    CLOSE @RefNo_Cursor
    DEALLOCATE @RefNo_Cursor

	END
END

-- ==================================================================================================================
-- Author:		Kamran Jamal Nasir
-- Create date: 15-Mar-2023
-- Description:	This procedure will create Auto AR Payment Receipt from Accepted CRM Payment Receipt By Finance Dept.
-- ==================================================================================================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_Auto_AR_Payment_Receipt_Test] 
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE @RefNo_Cursor cursor
	DECLARE @AI_No_Cursor cursor
	DECLARE @AI_No_Tax_Cursor cursor

	DECLARE @REFNO AS NVARCHAR(200)
	DECLARE @AI_CO_ID AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @AI_NO AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @Engine as VARCHAR(50)

	DECLARE @APR_NO AS BIGINT
	DECLARE @APT_APR_NO BIGINT

	DECLARE @CNT AS INT
	DECLARE @INV_AMT AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @NOOFTAXES AS INT

	DECLARE @TaxDetails NVARCHAR(MAX)

	DECLARE @DATA_EXIST AS INT

	DECLARE @APR_DESCRIPTION AS NVARCHAR(200)
	DECLARE @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 AS NVARCHAR(200)

	SET @REFNO = 'Ch.#11502859.'
	SET @AI_CO_ID = 10703

	SET @DATA_EXIST = (SELECT COUNT(REFNO) From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
						Where 1 = 1 -- and (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL AND LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
						--And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
						AND REFNO IN (@REFNO)
						
						AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
						AND ATS_POST = 1
					)	

IF (@DATA_EXIST > 0)
	BEGIN
		SET @RefNo_Cursor = CURSOR FOR 
						Select RefNo, AI_CO_ID, COUNT(REFNO) AS CNT, SUM(AMOUNT) AS INV_AMT, MAX(NoOfTaxes) AS [NOOFTAXES]
						From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
				----		Where (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL And LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
				----		And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
				----		--WHERE REFNO IN ('442199 (36000)','440298 Total 70K','440298 Total 70K','440298 Total 70K')
				----		--AND REFNO IN ('574620 (48000)', '458023 (18000)', '21672686 (159)', '7690054187')
				------		AND REFNO IN ('7690054187')
						Where 1 = 1 -- and (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL AND LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
						--And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
						
						AND REFNO IN (@REFNO)
						
						AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
						AND ATS_POST = 1
						GROUP BY RefNo, AI_CO_ID
						Order By RefNo, AI_CO_ID
  OPEN @RefNo_Cursor
  FETCH NEXT FROM @RefNo_Cursor INTO @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @CNT, @INV_AMT, @NOOFTAXES

    While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
    Begin
		SET @APR_NO = (SELECT (MAX(APR_NO) + 1) FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT)

		SET @APR_DESCRIPTION = ' Engine No :'
		SET @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 = SPACE(1)


		--INSERT INTO [AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT] (
		--		[APR_NO]
		--	  ,[APR_DATE]
		--	  ,[APR_DESCRIPTION]
		--	  ,[APR_CO_ID]
		--	  ,[APR_BANK_ID]
		--	  ,[APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT]
		--	  ,[APR_CHQ_NO]
		--	  ,[PostedBy]
		--	  )
			  SELECT Top (1)  'AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT' AS APR, @APR_NO AS APR_NO, 
						DepositDate AS APR_DATE, 
						'Payment Receipt : ' + RTrim(LTrim(Mode)) + ' Bank : ' + RTrim(LTrim(Bank_Name)) + ' Ref No : ' + RTrim(LTrim(RefNo)) AS APR_DESCRIPTION,
						 AI_CO_ID AS APR_CO_ID, 
						BankID AS APR_BANK_ID, @INV_AMT  AS APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, RTrim(LTrim(SUBSTRING(RefNo,1,50))) AS APR_CHQ_NO,
						PostedBy
				From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted INNER JOIN
								  Bank_Master_v ON CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.BankID = Bank_Master_v.BANK_ID
				WHERE RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID	

				--SELECT @APR_NO, @INV_AMT, @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID
		
		DELETE FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP_TEST					
		SET @AI_No_Tax_Cursor = CURSOR FOR Select RefNo, AI_CO_ID, AI_NO, NoOfTaxes, TaxDetails, APR_NO
										From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
										--Where 1 = 1 
										--And RefNo = @REFNO
										--AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										--And ATS_Post = 1										 
										--Order By TransID
										WHERE REFNO IN (@REFNO)						
										AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										AND ATS_POST = 1
										Order By TRANSID

		  OPEN @AI_No_Tax_Cursor



		  FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Tax_Cursor INTO @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @NoOfTaxes, @TaxDetails, @APT_APR_NO

			While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			Begin

				IF (@NOOFTAXES > 0)
					BEGIN
						DECLARE @CNT_TAX_ROW AS INT						

						EXEC sp_CRM_AR_TAX_NEW_TEST @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No 						
					END


					--SELECT @APR_NO, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_DESCRIPTION_1, @CNT, @Engine
				Fetch Next From @AI_No_Tax_Cursor into @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @NoOfTaxes, @TaxDetails, @APT_APR_NO
			END

		SET @AI_No_Cursor = CURSOR FOR Select RefNo, AI_CO_ID, AI_NO, Engine
										From CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
										--Where 1 = 1 AND (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL And LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
										--And (ATS_Post is null OR ATS_Post = 0)
										--And RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										--Order By TransID
										WHERE REFNO IN (@REFNO)						
										AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID
										AND ATS_POST = 1
										Order By TRANSID



		  OPEN @AI_No_Cursor

		  DECLARE @TAX_AMT BIGINT

		  FETCH NEXT FROM @AI_No_Cursor INTO @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @Engine
			While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
			Begin
				SET @TAX_AMT = 0
				SET @TAX_AMT = (SELECT SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP_TEST
								WHERE AI_No = @AI_No)

			--INSERT INTO [AR_ADJUST_INVOICE] (
			--	   [AAI_APR_NO]
			--	  ,[AAI_AI_NO]
			--	  ,[AAI_AI_DATE]
			--	  ,[AAI_AI_AMOUNT]
			--	  ,[AAI_PEN_AMOUNT]
			--	  ,[AAI_ADJUST]
			--	  ,[AAI_CO_ID]
			--	  )	
				  Select 'AR_ADJUST_INVOICE' AS ADJ, @APR_NO AS AAI_APR_NO, AI_NO AS AAI_AI_NO, 
						AI_DATE AS AAI_AI_DATE,
						AI_AMOUNT AS AAI_AI_AMOUNT,
						AI_AMOUNT AS AAI_PEN_AMOUNT,
						AMOUNT AS RECEIPT_AMT,
						@TAX_AMT ,
						(AMOUNT + @TAX_AMT) AS AAI_ADJUST,
						AI_CO_ID AS AAI_CO_ID
				FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted
				WHERE RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID And AI_NO = @AI_No
				ORDER BY AI_NO

				--UPDATE CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
				--	SET ATS_POST = 1, ATS_POST_DATE = GETDATE(), APR_NO = @APR_NO
				--	WHERE RefNo = @REFNO AND AI_CO_ID = @AI_CO_ID And AI_NO = @AI_No 

				IF (@CNT <= 4)
					BEGIN
						SET @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 = RTrim(LTrim(@APR_DESCRIPTION_1)) + ' : ' + @Engine
					END

				IF (@CNT > 4)
					BEGIN
						SET @APR_DESCRIPTION_1 = ' Adjust No of Engines : ' + CAST(@CNT AS VARCHAR(50))
					END
				
				SET @APR_DESCRIPTION = @APR_DESCRIPTION_1

					--SELECT @APR_NO, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_DESCRIPTION_1, @CNT, @Engine

				Fetch Next From @AI_No_Cursor into @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @Engine
			END


						SET @CNT_TAX_ROW = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP_TEST)		

						IF (@CNT_TAX_ROW > 0)
							BEGIN
								--INSERT INTO [AR_PAYMENT_TAX] (
								--	   [APT_APR_NO]
								--	  ,[APT_TD_ID]
								--	  ,[APT_TAX_AMOUNT]
								--		) 
										SELECT @APR_NO AS APT_APR_NO, APT_TD_ID, SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) 
										FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP_TEST
										GROUP BY  APT_TD_ID

										SELECT AI_NO, APT_TD_ID, SUM(APT_TAX_AMOUNT) AS TAX_AMT 
										FROM CRM_AR_TAX_TEMP_TEST
										GROUP BY AI_NO, APT_TD_ID
										ORDER BY AI_NO
								--SELECT @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @AI_No, @NoOfTaxes, @TaxDetails
							END
		
			
			IF (@CNT <= 4)
				BEGIN
					SET @APR_DESCRIPTION = ' Eng #' + @APR_DESCRIPTION
				END

			--UPDATE AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT 
			--	SET APR_DESCRIPTION = APR_DESCRIPTION + @APR_DESCRIPTION
			--	WHERE APR_NO = @APR_NO

			--SELECT @APR_NO, @APR_DESCRIPTION, @APR_DESCRIPTION_1, @CNT, @Engine

		FETCH NEXT FROM @RefNo_Cursor into @REFNO, @AI_CO_ID, @CNT, @INV_AMT, @NOOFTAXES
    END

    Close @AI_No_Tax_Cursor
    DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Tax_Cursor

    Close @AI_No_Cursor
    DEALLOCATE @AI_No_Cursor

    CLOSE @RefNo_Cursor
    DEALLOCATE @RefNo_Cursor

	END
END

-- Create date: 18-JAN-2024
-- Description:	This procedure will create Auto AR Payment Receipt from Accepted CRM Payment Receipt By Finance Dept.
-- ==================================================================================================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_Auto_WHT_AP_INVOICE] (@m_APR_NO BIGINT, @m_Trn_Type INT)
AS
BEGIN

	DECLARE @WHT_Cursor cursor

	DECLARE @AI_NO AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @Trn_Type AS INT

	DECLARE @APR_NO AS BIGINT

	DECLARE @DATA_EXIST AS INT

	SET @APR_NO = @m_APR_NO

	SET @Trn_Type = @m_Trn_Type

	SET @DATA_EXIST = (SELECT COUNT(APT_APR_NO) FROM AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V 
						WHERE APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO 
						AND APT_TD_ID IN (SELECT DISTINCT TD_ID FROM TAX_DETAIL WHERE TD_WHT = 1) 
					)	
	--SELECT 1, @DATA_EXIST, @APR_NO

IF (@DATA_EXIST > 0)
	--SELECT 2, @DATA_EXIST, @APR_NO
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @APT_APR_NO AS BIGINT
		DECLARE @TD_AC_ID AS BIGINT
		DECLARE @APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS FLOAT
		DECLARE @APR_DATE AS DATETIME
		DECLARE @APR_AS_ID AS BIGINT
		DECLARE @AS_Supplier_Name AS VARCHAR(200)
		DECLARE @APR_CHQ_NO AS VARCHAR(200)

		SET @WHT_Cursor = CURSOR FOR 

		SELECT AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO, AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.TD_AC_ID, AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 
				AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_AS_ID, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.AS_Supplier_Name, 
				AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CHQ_NO
		FROM AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V INNER JOIN
						  AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V ON AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO
		WHERE (AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO = @APR_NO) AND (AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TD_ID IN
							  (SELECT DISTINCT TD_ID
							   FROM      TAX_DETAIL WHERE TD_WHT = 1))
  OPEN @WHT_Cursor
  FETCH NEXT FROM @WHT_Cursor INTO @APT_APR_NO, @TD_AC_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @APR_DATE, @APR_AS_ID, @AS_Supplier_Name, @APR_CHQ_NO

  		DECLARE @AI_DATE AS DATETIME
		DECLARE @AI_AS_ID AS BIGINT
		DECLARE @AI_REMARKS AS VARCHAR(200)
		DECLARE @ai_supplier_ref AS VARCHAR(200)
		DECLARE @AI_RMKS AS VARCHAR(200)
		DECLARE @AI_TYPE AS VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @AP_APR_NO AS BIGINT

		DECLARE @DELETE_AI_NO AS NVARCHAR(MAX)
		DECLARE @GET_AI_NO AS BIGINT

		SET @AI_DATE = @APR_DATE
		SET @AI_REMARKS = @AS_Supplier_Name
		SET @ai_supplier_ref = @APR_NO
		SET @AI_RMKS = @APT_APR_NO
		SET @AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL'
		SET @AP_APR_NO = @APR_NO

		------  For Single Invoice Against Multi WHT Elements

		----IF (@Trn_Type = 1)
		----	BEGIN
		----		SET @AI_NO = (SELECT (MAX(AI_NO) + 1) FROM AP_INVOICE)
		----	END

		----IF (@Trn_Type = 2)
		----	BEGIN
				
		----		SET @GET_AI_NO = (SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO FROM AP_INVOICE WHERE AP_APR_NO = @APR_NO)
		----		SET @DELETE_AI_NO = 'DELETE FROM AP_INVOICE WHERE AI_NO = ' +  STR(@GET_AI_NO)	
		----		SET @AI_NO = @GET_AI_NO
		----		EXECUTE sp_executesql @DELETE_AI_NO
		----	END
		
		----SET @AI_AS_ID = 333

    While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
    Begin
					--SELECT @Trn_Type, @GET_AI_NO, @APR_NO, @DELETE_AI_NO, @AI_NO

		IF (@Trn_Type = 1)
			BEGIN
				SET @AI_NO = (SELECT (MAX(AI_NO) + 1) FROM AP_INVOICE)
			END

		IF (@Trn_Type = 2)
			BEGIN				
				SET @GET_AI_NO = (SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO FROM AP_INVOICE WHERE AP_APR_NO = @APR_NO AND AI_AC_ID = @TD_AC_ID)
				SET @DELETE_AI_NO = 'DELETE FROM AP_INVOICE WHERE AI_NO = ' +  STR(@GET_AI_NO) + ' AND 	AI_AC_ID = ' + STR(@TD_AC_ID)
				SET @AI_NO = @GET_AI_NO
				EXECUTE sp_executesql @DELETE_AI_NO
			END
		
		SET @AI_AS_ID = 333

		IF (@AI_NO > 0)
			BEGIN
				INSERT INTO AP_INVOICE 
						(AI_NO,	AI_DATE, AI_AS_ID, AI_REMARKS, ai_supplier_ref,	AI_AC_ID, AI_RMKS, AI_AMOUNT, AI_TYPE, AP_APR_NO) 
				VALUES	(@AI_NO, @AI_DATE, @AI_AS_ID, @AI_REMARKS, @ai_supplier_ref, @TD_AC_ID,@AI_RMKS, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @AI_TYPE, @APR_NO)
			END
			--SELECT @AI_NO, @AI_DATE, @AI_AS_ID, @AI_REMARKS, @ai_supplier_ref, @TD_AC_ID,@AI_RMKS, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT,	@AI_TYPE

	FETCH NEXT FROM @WHT_Cursor into @APT_APR_NO, @TD_AC_ID, @APT_TAX_AMOUNT, @APR_DATE, @APR_AS_ID, @AS_Supplier_Name, @APR_CHQ_NO
    END

    CLOSE @WHT_Cursor
    DEALLOCATE @WHT_Cursor

	END
END

--EXEC sp_Auto_WHT_AP_INVOICE @m_APR_NO = 3946, @m_Trn_Type = 1

AS
BEGIN

	Drop Table CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_TBL

	SELECT APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_CO_ID, APR_BANK_ID, APR_POST, APR_GL, APR_Cancel, AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_vehicle_make, 
					  AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, CRM_TRANS_ID, BANK_NAME, CO_Company_Name, CRM_InsuredBy, CRM_CustomerName,

-- =============================================
-- Author:		Kamran Jamal Nasir
-- Create date: 10-Mar-2023
-- Description:	CRM Payment Receipt Data From View (CRM_PaymetReceivingPosted_v) 
--				Insert Into ATS CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted Table
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted] 
AS
BEGIN
	Insert Into CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted 
				([VehicleId]
				,[Engine]
				,[Chassis]
				,[Amount]
				,[Mode]
				,[PaymentFor]
				,[BankID]
				,[AI_NO]
				,[TaxDetails]
				,[NoOfTaxes]
				,[RefNo]
				,[LogTime]
				,[PostingTime]
				,[PostedBy]
				,[DepositDate]
				,[TransID]
				,[CustomerID]
				,[AI_CO_ID]
				,[AI_AMOUNT]
				,[AI_DATE])
	Select		[VehicleId]
				,[Engine]
				,[Chassis]
				,[Amount]
				,[Mode]
				,[PaymentFor]
				,[Bank]
				,[InvoiceNumber]
				,[TaxDetails]
				,[NoOfTaxes]
				,[RefNo]
				,[LogTime]
				,[PostingTime]
				,[PostedBy]
				,[DepositDate]
				,[TransID]
				,[CustomerID]
				,(SELECT DISTINCT AI_CO_ID FROM AR_INVOICE B WHERE b.AI_NO = [InvoiceNumber]) as AI_CO_ID 
				,[ATSInvoiceAmount]
				,[ATSInvoiceDate]
	FROM     CRM_PaymetReceivingPosted_v
	WHERE (RefNo <> '0' And RefNo IS NOT NULL AND LEN(REFNO) > 0) 
	AND [TransID] NOT IN (Select TransID from CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
	AND [InvoiceNumber] IS NOT NULL	
	AND [CustomerID] IS NOT NULL
	AND [ATSInvoiceAmount] IS NOT NULL
	AND [ATSInvoiceDate] IS NOT NULL
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_GET_ORDER_INVOICE]
@MDATE DATETIME, @ORDNO1 BIGINT, @ORDNO2 BIGINT, @COID AS INT 
AS
IF @COID=0 
	BEGIN
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV1 IS NULL AND PRICE1>0 AND AO_DATE1<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV2 IS NULL AND PRICE2>0 AND AO_DATE2<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV3 IS NULL AND PRICE3>0 AND AO_DATE3<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV4 IS NULL AND PRICE4>0 AND AO_DATE4<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV5 IS NULL AND PRICE5>0 AND AO_DATE5<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (		
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV6 IS NULL AND PRICE6>0 AND AO_DATE6<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV7 IS NULL AND PRICE7>0 AND AO_DATE7<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV8 IS NULL AND PRICE8>0 AND AO_DATE8<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV9 IS NULL AND PRICE9>0 AND AO_DATE9<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV10 IS NULL AND PRICE10>0 AND AO_DATE10<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2	
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV11 IS NULL AND PRICE11>0 AND AO_DATE11<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV12 IS NULL AND PRICE12>0 AND AO_DATE12<=@MDATE AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2							
		UNION ALL (	
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE AO_MAFD=1 AND AO_NO BETWEEN @ORDNO1 AND @ORDNO2
		)))))))))))) order by 1
	END
ELSE
	BEGIN
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV1 IS NULL AND PRICE1>0 AND AO_DATE1<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV2 IS NULL AND PRICE2>0 AND AO_DATE2<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV3 IS NULL AND PRICE3>0 AND AO_DATE3<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV4 IS NULL AND PRICE4>0 AND AO_DATE4<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV5 IS NULL AND PRICE5>0 AND AO_DATE5<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV6 IS NULL AND PRICE6>0 AND AO_DATE6<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV7 IS NULL AND PRICE7>0 AND AO_DATE7<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV8 IS NULL AND PRICE8>0 AND AO_DATE8<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV9 IS NULL AND PRICE9>0 AND AO_DATE9<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV10 IS NULL AND PRICE10>0 AND AO_DATE10<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V
		WHERE INV11 IS NULL AND PRICE11>0 AND AO_DATE11<=@MDATE AND AO_CO_ID=@COID		
		UNION ALL (
		SELECT * FROM AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_GetBillData 
	-- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here
	@GetDate Datetime
AS
BEGIN
	-- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from
	-- interfering with SELECT statements.
	SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Insert statements for procedure here
	select * from crm.dbo.vehicle_bill_detail_v
	where (vehicle_dateofinstallation+ ((nosinv*365)-30))<@GetDate
END

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_GetCodeCombination
@ACID INT
AS
SELECT CODE_COMBINATION  FROM CODE_COMBINATION_V WHERE COMBINATION_ID=@ACID

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_GetCombinationID
@ACC varchar(20)
AS
SELECT COMBINATION_ID  FROM CODE_COMBINATION_V WHERE CODE_COMBINATION=@ACC

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_GetCombinationName
@ACC varchar(20)
AS
SELECT NAME_COMBINATION  FROM CODE_COMBINATION_V WHERE CODE_COMBINATION=@ACC

CREATE PROCEDURE sp_GetMenuOption
AS
SELECT     dbo.Responsibilties.RESPNAME, dbo.Menu_option.menu_id, dbo.Menu_option.menu_option_name, dbo.Menu_option.menu_respid
FROM         dbo.Responsibilties INNER JOIN
                      dbo.Menu_option ON dbo.Responsibilties.RESPID = dbo.Menu_option.menu_respid
ORDER BY dbo.Responsibilties.RESPID

CREATE proc [dbo].[SP_GetOAmtintoCRM]

AS
BEGIN
	
-- Declare the return variable here

truncate table [CRM].dbo.[OustandingAMount2]
insert into [CRM].dbo.[OustandingAMount2]

--(select top 1 OustandingAmt from OustandingAMount where Vehicle_RegistrationNo = order by Vehicle_RegistrationNo desc)

SELECT VD.Vehicle_RegistrationNo , isnull((SELECT TOP (1) ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.ORG_AMT
 FROM ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE_V INNER JOIN ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V ON ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_NO = ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO 
WHERE ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = VD.Vehicle_RegistrationNo
ORDER BY ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_DATE DESC),0) as OustandingAmt
--into [CRM].dbo.[OustandingAMount2]
from [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblVehiclesDetails] VD
where (VD.Active IS NULL)  
AND   (NOT (VD.Vehicle_RegistrationNo IN
                             (SELECT     tr.VehicleNo
								FROM         [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblRemoval] tr where RemovalStatus <> '2'))) 
AND   (NOT (VD.Vehicle_RegistrationNo IN
                             (SELECT     cr.RegNo
								FROM         [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblCodeRed] cr where RecoverDateTime is not null))) 



END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_getPendingInvoices] 
	-- Add the parameters for the stored procedure here
	@coid INT
AS
BEGIN
	-- SET NOCOUNT ON added to prevent extra result sets from
	-- interfering with SELECT statements.
	SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Insert statements for procedure here
	SELECT     AI_NO, min(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, SUM(ORG_AMT) AS AI_AMT, SUM(ISNULL(PEN_AMT, 0)) AS AI_ADJUST,
		(SELECT TOP (1) AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO FROM AR_INVOICE_V WHERE AR_INVOICE_V.AI_NO = AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO) AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO
FROM         AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V
WHERE     (AI_CO_ID = @coid)
GROUP BY AI_NO
HAVING      (SUM(PEN_AMT) <> 0)
ORDER BY AI_NO
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_GL_Expenes_Pivot_Table]
	@Type INT,
	@FY_Period VARCHAR(9)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;

	DECLARE @columns NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @columnsWithISNULL NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @rowTotalExpr NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @columnTotalExpr NVARCHAR(MAX);
	DECLARE @sql NVARCHAR(MAX);

	-- Step 1: Generate month columns list for PIVOT
	SELECT @columns = STUFF((
		SELECT DISTINCT ',' + QUOTENAME(MNTHNAME)
		FROM JE_EXP_DETAIL_V
		WHERE FY_Period = @FY_Period
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 1, '');

	-- Step 2: Build ISNULL columns and total expressions
	SELECT 
		@columnsWithISNULL = STUFF((
			SELECT DISTINCT 
				',ROUND(ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(MNTHNAME) + ', 0), 0) AS ' + QUOTENAME(MNTHNAME)
			FROM JE_EXP_DETAIL_V
			WHERE FY_Period = @FY_Period
			FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 1, ''),

		@rowTotalExpr = STUFF((
			SELECT DISTINCT 
				' + ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(MNTHNAME) + ', 0)'
			FROM JE_EXP_DETAIL_V
			WHERE FY_Period = @FY_Period
			FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 3, ''),  -- remove first ' + '

		@columnTotalExpr = STUFF((
			SELECT DISTINCT 
				',SUM(' + QUOTENAME(MNTHNAME) + ') AS ' + QUOTENAME(MNTHNAME)
			FROM JE_EXP_DETAIL_V
			WHERE FY_Period = @FY_Period
			FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 1, '');

	-- Step 3: Build final dynamic SQL
SET @sql = '
SELECT *
FROM (
	SELECT *,
		CASE WHEN NA_NAME = ''TOTAL'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS SortOrder
	FROM (
		SELECT 
			NA_NAME,
			' + @columnsWithISNULL + ',
			ROUND((' + @rowTotalExpr + '), 0) AS Total
		FROM (
			SELECT 
				UPPER(NA_NAME) AS NA_NAME, 
				MNTHNAME, 
				JE_ENTERED_DR - JE_ENTERED_CR AS EXP_AMT
			FROM JE_EXP_DETAIL_V
			WHERE FY_Period = @P_FY_Period
		) AS SourceData
		PIVOT (
			SUM(EXP_AMT)
			FOR MNTHNAME IN (' + @columns + ')
		) AS PivotResult

		UNION ALL

		SELECT 
			''TOTAL'',
			' + @columnTotalExpr + ',
			SUM(' + @rowTotalExpr + ') AS Total
		FROM (
			SELECT 
				UPPER(NA_NAME) AS NA_NAME, 
				MNTHNAME, 
				JE_ENTERED_DR - JE_ENTERED_CR AS EXP_AMT
			FROM JE_EXP_DETAIL_V
			WHERE FY_Period = @P_FY_Period
		) AS SourceData
		PIVOT (
			SUM(EXP_AMT)
			FOR MNTHNAME IN (' + @columns + ')
		) AS PivotTotals
	) AS Combined
) AS Ordered
ORDER BY SortOrder, NA_NAME;
';


	-- Step 4: Execute
	EXEC sp_executesql @sql, N'@P_FY_Period VARCHAR(9)', @P_FY_Period = @FY_Period;
END

CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.sp_helpdiagrams
	(
		@diagramname sysname = NULL,
		@owner_id int = NULL
	)
	WITH EXECUTE AS N'dbo'
	AS
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @user sysname
		DECLARE @dboLogin bit
		EXECUTE AS CALLER;
			SET @user = USER_NAME();
			SET @dboLogin = CONVERT(bit,IS_MEMBER('db_owner'));
		REVERT;
		SELECT
			[Database] = DB_NAME(),
			[Name] = name,
			[ID] = diagram_id,
			[Owner] = USER_NAME(principal_id),
			[OwnerID] = principal_id
		FROM
			sysdiagrams
		WHERE
			(@dboLogin = 1 OR USER_NAME(principal_id) = @user) AND
			(@diagramname IS NULL OR name = @diagramname) AND
			(@owner_id IS NULL OR principal_id = @owner_id)
		ORDER BY
			4, 5, 1
	END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Fahad Zaheer>
-- Create date: <07-05-2011>
-- Description:	<Payments>
-- =============================================
--Exec sp_PaymentDetails '2012-09-01 00:00:00', '2012-09-18 23:59:59'
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_PaymentDetails] --'2011-05-01 00:00:00', '2011-05-07 23:59:59'
@FD datetime ,
@TD datetime

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

	SELECT dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, 
		dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, UPPER(dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME) 
		AS AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_AMOUNT AS ADJUSTED_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, 
		CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, SUM(dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT) AS AI_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, 
		dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_ID
	FROM CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails INNER JOIN
		CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN
		CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id RIGHT OUTER JOIN
		dbo.AR_INVOICE INNER JOIN
		dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
		dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO ON 
		dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO ON 
		CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO
	WHERE (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE IS NULL) 
	AND (dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel IS NULL)
	AND (dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE >= CONVERT(DATETIME, @FD, 102))
	AND (dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE <= CONVERT(DATETIME, @TD, 102))
	GROUP BY dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, 
	dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, 
	dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, 
	CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, 
	CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_ID
	ORDER BY CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch

END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Fahad Zaheer>
-- Create date: <07-05-2011>
-- Description:	<Payments>
-- =============================================
--Exec sp_PaymentDetails '2012-09-01 00:00:00', '2012-09-18 23:59:59'
Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_PaymentDetails_renewal] --'2011-05-01 00:00:00', '2011-05-07 23:59:59'
@VRN as varchar(50)

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

	SELECT     AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_AMOUNT AS ADJUSTED_AMOUNT, SUM(AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT) AS AI_AMOUNT, 
                      AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE
FROM         AR_INVOICE INNER JOIN
                      AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                      AR_ADJUST_INVOICE ON AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO ON AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO
WHERE     (AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE IS NULL) AND (AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel IS NULL) AND (AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = @VRN)
GROUP BY AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, 
                      AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_AMOUNT, 
                      AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE

END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Fahad Zaheer>
-- Create date: <28-03-2011>
-- Description:	<Pending Orders>
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_PendingOrders]

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

--		SUMMARY
	SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch,
	  SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE1) AS FirstYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE2) AS SecYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE3) AS ThirdYear,
	  SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE4) AS ForthYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE5) AS FifthYear
	FROM dbo.AR_ORDER INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.vehid INNER JOIN
	  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails ON CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId = CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	WHERE (NOT (dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO IN (SELECT AI_AO_NO FROM dbo.AR_INVOICE))) 
	AND (CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Active IS NULL) 
	AND (dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DEACTIVE_DATE IS NULL)
	GROUP BY CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch
	ORDER BY CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch

--		DETAIL
	SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DATE, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo, 
	  SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE1) AS FirstYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE2) AS SecYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE3) AS ThirdYear,
	  SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE4) AS ForthYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE5) AS FifthYear,
	  CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerName, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, 
	  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch
	FROM dbo.AR_ORDER INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.vehid INNER JOIN
	  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails ON CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId = CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	WHERE (NOT (dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO IN (SELECT AI_AO_NO FROM dbo.AR_INVOICE))) 
	AND (CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Active IS NULL) 
	AND (dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DEACTIVE_DATE IS NULL)
	GROUP BY dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DATE, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo, CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerName, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch
	ORDER BY dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DATE DESC, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_PendingOrdersDetail]

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

--		DETAIL
	SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DATE, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo, 
	  SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE1) AS FirstYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE2) AS SecYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE3) AS ThirdYear,
	  SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE4) AS ForthYear, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE5) AS FifthYear,
	  CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerName, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, 
	  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch
	FROM dbo.AR_ORDER INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID = CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.vehid INNER JOIN
	  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails ON CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId = CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN
	  CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	WHERE (NOT (dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO IN (SELECT AI_AO_NO FROM dbo.AR_INVOICE))) 
	AND (CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Active IS NULL) 
	AND (dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DEACTIVE_DATE IS NULL)
	GROUP BY dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DATE, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo, CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerName, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch
	ORDER BY dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DATE DESC, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo

END

BEGIN

	FROM dbo.AR_ORDER INNER JOIN

	  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_PendingReceivables]

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

--		SUMMARY

	SELECT tblCompanies.Company_Type, tblCompanies.Company_Name, tblCompanies.Company_Branch, Count(tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo) AS TotPending
	FROM CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails INNER JOIN CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails ON tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId = tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = tblCompanies.Company_Id
	WHERE  (NOT (tblVehiclesDetails.vehid IN (SELECT AO_VEHICLE_ID FROM ATS_GL.dbo.AR_ORDER))) 
	AND (NOT (tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation IS NULL)) 
	AND (tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation >= CONVERT(DATETIME, '2009-10-01 00:00:00', 102))
	GROUP BY tblCompanies.Company_Type, tblCompanies.Company_Name, tblCompanies.Company_Branch
	ORDER BY tblCompanies.Company_Type, tblCompanies.Company_Name, tblCompanies.Company_Branch

--		DETAIL

	SELECT TOP (100) PERCENT CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, 
		UPPER(CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerName) AS CustomerName, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Make, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Model, 
		CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_EngineNo, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_ChasisNo, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo,
		CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation
	FROM CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails INNER JOIN
		CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails ON CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId = CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId INNER JOIN
		CRM.dbo.tblCompanies ON CRM.dbo.tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id = CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Id
	WHERE (NOT (CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.vehid IN	(SELECT AO_VEHICLE_ID FROM dbo.AR_ORDER AS AR_ORDER_1))) 
	AND (NOT (CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation IS NULL)) 
	AND (CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation >= CONVERT(DATETIME, '2009-10-01 00:00:00', 102))
	ORDER BY CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Type, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Name, CRM.dbo.tblCompanies.Company_Branch, CRM.dbo.tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation

END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		Kamran Jamal Nasir
-- Create date: 10-Mar-2023
-- Description:	<Rebuild Indexing>
-- =============================================
CREATE PROCEDURE sp_Rebuild_Indexed

AS
	BEGIN
	DECLARE @Database NVARCHAR(255)   
	DECLARE @Table NVARCHAR(255)  
	DECLARE @cmd NVARCHAR(1000)  

	DECLARE DatabaseCursor CURSOR READ_ONLY FOR  
	SELECT name FROM master.sys.databases   
	--WHERE name NOT IN ('master','msdb','tempdb','model','distribution')  -- databases to exclude
	WHERE name IN ('ATS_GL') -- use this to select specific databases and comment out line above
	AND state = 0 -- database is online
	AND is_in_standby = 0 -- database is not read only for log shipping
	ORDER BY 1  

	OPEN DatabaseCursor  

	FETCH NEXT FROM DatabaseCursor INTO @Database  
	WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0  
		BEGIN  

		   SET @cmd = 'DECLARE TableCursor CURSOR READ_ONLY FOR SELECT ''['' + table_catalog + ''].['' + table_schema + ''].['' +  
		   table_name + '']'' as tableName FROM [' + @Database + '].INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE table_type = ''BASE TABLE'''   

		   -- create table cursor  
		   EXEC (@cmd)  
		   OPEN TableCursor   

		   FETCH NEXT FROM TableCursor INTO @Table   
		   WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0   
		   BEGIN
			  BEGIN TRY   
				 SET @cmd = 'ALTER INDEX ALL ON ' + @Table + ' REBUILD' 
				 PRINT @cmd -- uncomment if you want to see commands
				 EXEC (@cmd) 
			  END TRY
			  BEGIN CATCH
				 PRINT '---'
				 PRINT @cmd
				 PRINT ERROR_MESSAGE() 
				 PRINT '---'
			  END CATCH

			  FETCH NEXT FROM TableCursor INTO @Table   
		   END   

		   CLOSE TableCursor   
		   DEALLOCATE TableCursor  

		   FETCH NEXT FROM DatabaseCursor INTO @Database  
		END  
CLOSE DatabaseCursor   
DEALLOCATE DatabaseCursor
END

CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.sp_upgraddiagrams
	AS
	BEGIN
		IF OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.sysdiagrams') IS NOT NULL
			return 0;
	
		CREATE TABLE dbo.sysdiagrams
		(
			name sysname NOT NULL,
			principal_id int NOT NULL,	-- we may change it to varbinary(85)
			diagram_id int PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY,
			version int,
	
			definition varbinary(max)
			CONSTRAINT UK_principal_name UNIQUE
			(
				principal_id,
				name
			)
		);


		/* Add this if we need to have some form of extended properties for diagrams */
		/*
		IF OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.sysdiagram_properties') IS NULL
		BEGIN
			CREATE TABLE dbo.sysdiagram_properties
			(
				diagram_id int,
				name sysname,
				value varbinary(max) NOT NULL
			)
		END
		*/

		IF OBJECT_ID(N'dbo.dtproperties') IS NOT NULL
		begin
			insert into dbo.sysdiagrams
			(
				[name],
				[principal_id],
				[version],
				[definition]
			)
			select	 
				convert(sysname, dgnm.[uvalue]),
				DATABASE_PRINCIPAL_ID(N'dbo'),			-- will change to the sid of sa
				0,							-- zero for old format, dgdef.[version],
				dgdef.[lvalue]
			from dbo.[dtproperties] dgnm
				inner join dbo.[dtproperties] dggd on dggd.[property] = 'DtgSchemaGUID' and dggd.[objectid] = dgnm.[objectid]	
				inner join dbo.[dtproperties] dgdef on dgdef.[property] = 'DtgSchemaDATA' and dgdef.[objectid] = dgnm.[objectid]
				
			where dgnm.[property] = 'DtgSchemaNAME' and dggd.[uvalue] like N'_EA3E6268-D998-11CE-9454-00AA00A3F36E_' 
			return 2;
		end
		return 1;
	END
