-- =============================================

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[sp_VASPaymentDetails] --'2011-05-01 00:00:00', '2011-05-07 23:59:59'
--@FD datetime ,
--@TD datetime

AS

BEGIN

	SET NOCOUNT ON;

	SELECT AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, SUM(AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT) AS AI_AMOUNT, SUM(AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) AS APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT
	FROM AR_INVOICE INNER JOIN
		AR_ADJUST_INVOICE ON AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO INNER JOIN
		AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT ON AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO INNER JOIN
		AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID = AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID
	WHERE (AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL') AND (AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE IS NULL) 
	AND (AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION IN ('ALERT ON IGNITION' ,'IGNITION ON ALERT' ,'LOC. ON CALL_SMS_WEB TRACK' ,
													'LOCATION ON CALL' ,'Location on Call' ,'Ignition Alert, Web Track' ,
													'LOCATION ON SMS' ,'LOCATION VIA CALL' ,'Location Via Call, SMS & Web Track' ,
													'LOCATION VIA SMS' ,'WEB Track Via Poll' ,'WEB TRACK WITH POLL'))
	GROUP BY AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO
	ORDER BY AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO ASC

END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[SubAccount_sh]
	@Type int,
	@SAID varchar(50),
	@SAName varchar(50)
As
BEGIN
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		Insert into SUB_ACCOUNT(
		SA_ID,
		SA_NAME
		)
		Select @SAID,
			   @SAName

		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		Select SA_ID from SUB_ACCOUNT
		where SA_ID = @SAID
		)
		BEGIN
			Update SUB_ACCOUNT
			Set SA_ID = @SAID,
				SA_NAME = @SAName
				where SA_ID = @SAID
			Select @SAID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct SA_ID, SA_NAME from SUB_ACCOUNT
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		Select distinct SA_ID, SA_NAME from SUB_ACCOUNT
		Where SA_ID = @SAID
	END	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[TAX_DETAIL_sh]
	@Type int,
	@TDID int,
	@TDACTIVEON Datetime,
	@TDDESCRIPTION varchar(50),
	@TDACID int,
	@TDAGE Float,
	@TDTMID int,
	@TD_WHT BIT,
	@CCID varchar(100)
AS
BEGIN
	DECLARE @ComId AS VARCHAR(100)
	--DECLARE @TaxCategoryId AS VARCHAR(100)
	set @ComId = (Select COMBINATION_ID from CODE_COMBINATION_V where CODE_COMBINATION = @CCID)
	--set @TaxCategoryId = (Select TM_ID from TAX_MASTER where TM_DESCRIPTION = @CCID)
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO TAX_DETAIL(
		TD_ACTIVE_ON,
		TD_DESCRIPTION,
		TD_AC_ID,
		TD_AGE,
		TD_TM_ID,
		TD_WHT
		)
		SELECT @TDACTIVEON,
				@TDDESCRIPTION,
				@ComId,
				@TDAGE,
				@TDTMID,
				@TD_WHT

		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		SELECT TD_ID FROM TAX_DETAIL
		WHERE TD_ID = @TDID
		)
		BEGIN
			UPDATE TAX_DETAIL
			SET 
				TD_ACTIVE_ON = @TDACTIVEON,
				TD_DESCRIPTION = @TDDESCRIPTION,
				TD_AC_ID = @ComId,
				TD_AGE = @TDAGE,
				TD_TM_ID = @TDTMID,
				TD_WHT = @TD_WHT
				WHERE TD_ID = @TDID

			SELECT @TDID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT TD_ID
			  ,TD_ACTIVE_ON
			  ,TD_DESCRIPTION	
			  ,TD_AC_ID
			  ,TD_AGE
			  ,TD_TM_ID
			  ,TM_DESCRIPTION
			  ,CODE_COMBINATION
			  ,NAME_COMBINATION
			  ,TD_WHT
		  FROM TAX_DETAIL_V
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		select td.*, cc.CODE_COMBINATION, cc.NAME_COMBINATION, tm.TM_DESCRIPTION 
		from TAX_DETAIL td inner join CODE_COMBINATION_V cc on cc.COMBINATION_ID = td.TD_AC_ID
		inner join TAX_MASTER tm on tm.TM_ID = td.TD_TM_ID WHERE td.TD_ID = @TDID
	END	
END

CREATE Procedure [dbo].[TAX_MASTER_sh]
	@Type int,
	@TMID int,
	@TMDESCRIPTION varchar(50)
As
BEGIN
	IF (@Type = 1)
	BEGIN
		INSERT INTO TAX_MASTER(
		TM_DESCRIPTION
		)
		SELECT @TMDESCRIPTION

		select @@IDentity
	END

	IF (@Type = 2)
	BEGIN
		IF EXISTS(
		SELECT TM_ID FROM TAX_MASTER
		WHERE TM_ID = @TMID
		)
		BEGIN
			UPDATE TAX_MASTER
			SET TM_DESCRIPTION = @TMDESCRIPTION
				WHERE TM_ID = @TMID
			SELECT @TMID
		END
	END
	IF (@Type = 3)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT TM_ID, 
						TM_DESCRIPTION 
		FROM TAX_MASTER
	END
	IF (@Type = 4)
	BEGIN
		SELECT DISTINCT TM_ID, 
						TM_DESCRIPTION 
		FROM TAX_MASTER
		WHERE TM_ID = @TMID
	END	
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Update_Current_Month_Summary]
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

	DECLARE @cols NVARCHAR(MAX),
			@colsWithIsNull NVARCHAR(MAX),
			@totalExpr NVARCHAR(MAX),
			@sql NVARCHAR(MAX);

	-- Step 1: Build column list for dynamic pivot (LIMITED TO 3 BANKS)
	SELECT @cols = STUFF((
		SELECT DISTINCT ',' + QUOTENAME(BANK_NAME)
		FROM (
			SELECT BM.BANK_NAME
			FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
			INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
			WHERE 
				V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
				AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
				AND V.APR_DATE <= GETDATE()
				AND BM.BANK_NAME IN ('Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 'Meezan Bank Limited')
		) AS BankNames
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 1, '');

	-- Step 2: ISNULL columns
	SELECT @colsWithIsNull = STUFF((
		SELECT DISTINCT ', ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(BANK_NAME) + ', 0) AS ' + QUOTENAME(BANK_NAME)
		FROM (
			SELECT BM.BANK_NAME
			FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
			INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
			WHERE 
				V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
				AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
				AND V.APR_DATE <= GETDATE()
				AND BM.BANK_NAME IN ('Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 'Meezan Bank Limited')
		) AS BankNames
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

	-- Step 3: Total expression
	SELECT @totalExpr = STUFF((
		SELECT DISTINCT ' + ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(BANK_NAME) + ', 0)'
		FROM (
			SELECT BM.BANK_NAME
			FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
			INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
			WHERE 
				V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
				AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
				AND V.APR_DATE <= GETDATE()
				AND BM.BANK_NAME IN ('Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 'Meezan Bank Limited')
		) AS BankNames
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

	-- Step 4: Create/Truncate target table
	IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.CurrentMonthSummary') IS NULL
	BEGIN
		-- Create table via SELECT INTO (first time only)
		SET @sql = '
		SELECT ATS_Date, ' + @colsWithIsNull + ', (' + @totalExpr + ') AS Total
		INTO dbo.CurrentMonthSummary
		FROM (
			SELECT CAST(V.APR_DATE AS DATE) AS ATS_Date, BM.BANK_NAME, V.AAI_ADJUST
			FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
			INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
			WHERE 
				V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
				AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
				AND V.APR_DATE <= GETDATE()
				AND BM.BANK_NAME IN (''Bank Islami Pakistan Limited'', ''Dubai Islamic Bank Limited'', ''Meezan Bank Limited'')
		) AS SourceData
		PIVOT (
			SUM(AAI_ADJUST)
			FOR BANK_NAME IN (' + @cols + ')
		) AS PivotedData';
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		-- Truncate and insert
		SET @sql = '
		TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.CurrentMonthSummary;

		INSERT INTO dbo.CurrentMonthSummary (ATS_Date, ' + @cols + ', Total)
		SELECT ATS_Date, ' + @colsWithIsNull + ', (' + @totalExpr + ') AS Total
		FROM (
			SELECT CAST(V.APR_DATE AS DATE) AS ATS_Date, BM.BANK_NAME, V.AAI_ADJUST
			FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
			INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
			WHERE 
				V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
				AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
				AND V.APR_DATE <= GETDATE()
				AND BM.BANK_NAME IN (''Bank Islami Pakistan Limited'', ''Dubai Islamic Bank Limited'', ''Meezan Bank Limited'')
		) AS SourceData
		PIVOT (
			SUM(AAI_ADJUST)
			FOR BANK_NAME IN (' + @cols + ')
		) AS PivotedData';
	END

	-- Step 5: Execute
	EXEC sp_executesql @sql;

END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Update_Last_Month_Summary]
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

	DECLARE @cols NVARCHAR(MAX),
			@colsWithIsNull NVARCHAR(MAX),
			@totalExpr NVARCHAR(MAX),
			@sql NVARCHAR(MAX);

	-- Step 1: Build column list for dynamic pivot
	SELECT @cols = STUFF((
		SELECT DISTINCT ',' + QUOTENAME(LTRIM(RTRIM(BM.BANK_NAME)))
		FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
		INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
		WHERE 
			V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
			AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE())-1, 1)
			AND V.APR_DATE < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
			AND BM.BANK_NAME IN ('Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 'Meezan Bank Limited')
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 1, '');

	-- Debug: Check if @cols is populated
	IF @cols IS NULL OR @cols = ''
	BEGIN
		RAISERROR ('No bank data found for the specified criteria.', 16, 1);
		RETURN;
	END
	PRINT 'Columns: ' + @cols;

	-- Step 2: ISNULL columns
	SELECT @colsWithIsNull = STUFF((
		SELECT DISTINCT ', ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(LTRIM(RTRIM(BM.BANK_NAME))) + ', 0) AS ' + QUOTENAME(LTRIM(RTRIM(BM.BANK_NAME)))
		FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
		INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
		WHERE 
			V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
			AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE())-1, 1)
			AND V.APR_DATE < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
			AND BM.BANK_NAME IN ('Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 'Meezan Bank Limited')
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

	PRINT 'Columns with ISNULL: ' + @colsWithIsNull;

	-- Step 3: Total expression
	SELECT @totalExpr = STUFF((
		SELECT DISTINCT ' + ISNULL(' + QUOTENAME(LTRIM(RTRIM(BM.BANK_NAME))) + ', 0)'
		FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
		INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
		WHERE 
			V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
			AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE())-1, 1)
			AND V.APR_DATE < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
			AND BM.BANK_NAME IN ('Bank Islami Pakistan Limited', 'Dubai Islamic Bank Limited', 'Meezan Bank Limited')
		FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE).value('.', 'NVARCHAR(MAX)'), 1, 2, '');

	PRINT 'Total Expression: ' + @totalExpr;

	-- Step 4: Drop and recreate target table
	IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.LastMonthSummary') IS NOT NULL
		DROP TABLE dbo.LastMonthSummary;

	-- Step 5: Create dynamic SQL
	SET @sql = '
	SELECT ATS_Date, ' + @colsWithIsNull + ', (' + @totalExpr + ') AS Total
	INTO dbo.LastMonthSummary
	FROM (
		SELECT CAST(V.APR_DATE AS DATE) AS ATS_Date, BM.BANK_NAME, CAST(V.AAI_ADJUST AS DECIMAL(18,2)) AS AAI_ADJUST
		FROM CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V V
		INNER JOIN Bank_Master BM ON V.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
		WHERE 
			V.APR_NO NOT IN (SELECT APR_NO FROM CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted)
			AND V.APR_DATE >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE())-1, 1)
			AND V.APR_DATE < DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR(GETDATE()), MONTH(GETDATE()), 1)
			AND BM.BANK_NAME IN (''Bank Islami Pakistan Limited'', ''Dubai Islamic Bank Limited'', ''Meezan Bank Limited'')
	) AS SourceData
	PIVOT (
		SUM(AAI_ADJUST)
		FOR BANK_NAME IN (' + @cols + ')
	) AS PivotedData';

	-- Debug: Print SQL
	--PRINT @sql;

	-- Step 6: Execute with error handling
	BEGIN TRY
		EXEC sp_executesql @sql;
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
		SELECT 
			ERROR_NUMBER() AS ErrorNumber,
			ERROR_MESSAGE() AS ErrorMessage;
	END CATCH
END

CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[Update_PaymentReceipts_For_Dashboard]
AS
BEGIN
    SET NOCOUNT ON;

    -- Step 1: Create the target table if it doesn't exist
    IF NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES
        WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'PaymentReceipts_For_CRM_Dashboard'
    )
    BEGIN
        CREATE TABLE dbo.PaymentReceipts_For_CRM_Dashboard (
            APR_NO VARCHAR(50),
            APR_DATE DATETIME,
            APR_DESCRIPTION NVARCHAR(255),
            APR_CO_ID INT,
            APR_BANK_ID INT,
            APR_POST BIT,
            APR_GL BIT,
            APR_Cancel BIT,
            AAI_AI_NO VARCHAR(50),
            AAI_AI_DATE DATETIME,
            AAI_AI_AMOUNT DECIMAL(18,2),
            AAI_PEN_AMOUNT DECIMAL(18,2),
            AAI_ADJUST DECIMAL(18,2),
            AO_VEHICLE_ID VARCHAR(50),
            AI_vehicle_make NVARCHAR(100),
            AI_VEHICLE_MODEL NVARCHAR(100),
            AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO NVARCHAR(100),
            AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO NVARCHAR(100),
            AI_VEHICLE_DOI DATETIME,
            AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO NVARCHAR(100),
            CRM_TRANS_ID INT,
            BANK_NAME NVARCHAR(100),
            CO_Company_Name NVARCHAR(200),
            CRM_InsuredBy NVARCHAR(200),
            CRM_CustomerName NVARCHAR(200)
        );
    END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	 DELETE FROM ATS_GL.dbo.PaymentReceipts_For_CRM_Dashboard
	END
    -- Step 2: Insert or merge data
    INSERT INTO dbo.PaymentReceipts_For_CRM_Dashboard (
        APR_NO, APR_DATE, APR_DESCRIPTION, APR_CO_ID, APR_BANK_ID, APR_POST, APR_GL, APR_Cancel,
        AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST,
        AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,
        AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, CRM_TRANS_ID, BANK_NAME, CO_Company_Name,
        CRM_InsuredBy, CRM_CustomerName
    )
    SELECT  
        PR.APR_NO, 
        CASE WHEN ISDATE(PR.APR_DATE) = 1 THEN CONVERT(datetime, PR.APR_DATE) ELSE NULL END,
        PR.APR_DESCRIPTION, 
        PR.APR_CO_ID, 
        PR.APR_BANK_ID, 
        PR.APR_POST, 
        PR.APR_GL, 
        PR.APR_Cancel,
        AI.AAI_AI_NO,  
        CASE WHEN ISDATE(AI.AAI_AI_DATE) = 1 THEN CONVERT(datetime, AI.AAI_AI_DATE) ELSE NULL END,
        AI.AAI_AI_AMOUNT, 
        AI.AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, 
        AI.AAI_ADJUST,
        V.AO_VEHICLE_ID, 
        V.AI_vehicle_make, 
        V.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
        V.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
        V.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,
        CASE WHEN ISDATE(V.AI_VEHICLE_DOI) = 1 THEN CONVERT(datetime, V.AI_VEHICLE_DOI) ELSE NULL END,
        V.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
        CPP.TransID, 
        BM.BANK_NAME, 
        C.CO_Company_Name,
        V.InsuredBy, 
        V.CustomerName
    FROM ATS_GL.dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT PR
    INNER JOIN ATS_GL.dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE AI ON PR.APR_NO = AI.AAI_APR_NO
    INNER JOIN ATS_GL.dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO V ON AI.AAI_AI_NO = V.AI_NO
    INNER JOIN ATS_GL.dbo.Bank_Master BM ON PR.APR_BANK_ID = BM.BANK_ID
    INNER JOIN ATS_GL.dbo.AR_Companies C ON PR.APR_CO_ID = C.CO_ID
    LEFT OUTER JOIN ATS_GL.dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted CPP 
        ON AI.AAI_AI_NO = CPP.AI_NO AND PR.APR_NO = CPP.APR_NO AND AI.AAI_APR_NO = CPP.APR_NO
    WHERE PR.APR_Cancel IS NULL;

    SET NOCOUNT OFF;
END;

CREATE VIEW AC_BALANCE_V AS 
SELECT dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT1, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT2, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT3, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT4, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, 
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, ISNULL(SUM(dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_DR - dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_CR), 0) AS BALANCE, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID, 
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME, CASE WHEN ISNULL(SUM(dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_DR - dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_CR), 0) 
                  > 0 THEN ISNULL(SUM(dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_DR - dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_CR), 0) ELSE 0 END AS DEBIT, 
                  CASE WHEN ISNULL(SUM(dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_DR - dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_CR), 0) < 0 THEN ISNULL(SUM(dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_DR - dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_ENTERED_CR), 0) 
                  * - 1 ELSE 0 END AS CREDIT
FROM     dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V RIGHT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V.JE_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID
GROUP BY dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT1, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT2, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT3, 
dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT4, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, 
dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.AP_ADJUST_INVOICE.*, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE
FROM         dbo.AP_ADJUST_INVOICE INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT ON dbo.AP_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO = dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_NO, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_DATE, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_AI_NO, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_NAME, 
                      dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_CC_ID, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_AMOUNT, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_TYPE, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_POST, 
                      dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_INV_GL, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_AS_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_Supplier_Name, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_AC_ID, 
                      dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_strno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_ntnno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_address, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_opbal_r, 
                      dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.CODE_COMBINATION AS AS_CCode, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.NAME_COMBINATION AS AS_CCNAME, 
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_TM_ID, 
                      dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION,
                          (SELECT     TD_AC_ID
                            FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V
                            WHERE      (TD_ID =
                                                       (SELECT     MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                                         FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_3
                                                         WHERE      (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_CC_id,
                          (SELECT     TD_AGE
                            FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_2
                            WHERE      (TD_ID =
                                                       (SELECT     MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                                         FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1
                                                         WHERE      (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_age
FROM         dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V ON dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_AS_ID = dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_CC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE.ACN_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_INVOICE_AGEING_V
AS
SELECT AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AS_ID, SUM(AI_AMOUNT) AS ORG_AMT, Round(SUM(AI_AMOUNT), 2) AS PEN_AMT
FROM     dbo.AP_INVOICE_V
WHERE  AI_CANCEL IS NULL
GROUP BY AI_DATE, AI_NO, AI_AS_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, APR_DATE AS AI_DATE, AAI_AS_ID AS AI_AS_ID, 0 AS ORG_AMT, Round((AAI_ADJUST * - 1), 2) AS PEN_AMT
FROM     dbo.AP_ADJUST_INVOICE_V

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_INVOICE_DETAIL_V
AS
SELECT     'Invoice' AS Status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, AI_POST, AI_TYPE, AI_AMOUNT, 0 AS ACN_AI_NO
FROM         dbo.AP_INVOICE_V
WHERE     (AI_CANCEL IS NULL)
UNION ALL
SELECT     ACN_NAME AS Status, ACN_NO AS AI_NO, ACN_DATE AS AI_DATE, ACN_AS_ID AS AI_AS_ID, AS_Supplier_Name, ACN_POST AS AI_POST, 
                      ACN_TYPE AS AI_TYPE, ACN_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT, ACN_AI_NO
FROM         dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_INVOICE_V
AS
SELECT dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_DATE, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_REMARKS, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_AC_ID, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_RMKS, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_TYPE, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_POST, 
                  dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_AS_ID, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_INV_GL, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_CAN_GL, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, 
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_Supplier_Name, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_SUPPLIER_REF, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_AC_ID, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_PAY_TO, 
                  dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_TM_ID, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION,
                      (SELECT TD_AC_ID
                       FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_3
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_ac_id,
                      (SELECT TD_AGE
                       FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_2
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_age, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_strno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ntnno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_address, 
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.ORG_NAME, dbo.AP_INVOICE.AP_APR_NO
FROM     dbo.AP_INVOICE INNER JOIN
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AP_SUPPLIER ON dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_AS_ID = dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AP_INVOICE.AI_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

CREATE VIEW AP_LEDGER_TRANS_V AS
SELECT AI_AS_ID AS as_id, AI_DATE AS trans_date, AI_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS debit, CASE WHEN td_age IS NULL THEN AI_AMOUNT ELSE ROUND(AI_AMOUNT / (td_age / 100 + 1), 0) END AS credit, AI_REMARKS AS remarks, 
                  AS_Supplier_Name AS Descr, '' As APR_CHQ_NO
FROM     dbo.AP_INVOICE_V
WHERE  (AI_CANCEL IS NULL)
UNION ALL
(SELECT ACN_AS_ID AS as_id, ACN_DATE AS trans_date, ACN_NO AS jv_no, CASE WHEN td_age IS NULL THEN ACN_AMOUNT ELSE ROUND(ACN_AMOUNT / (td_age / 100 + 1), 0) END AS debit, 0 AS credit, 
                   ACN_NAME + ' Against Invoice : ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ACN_AI_NO) AS remarks, AS_Supplier_Name AS Descr, '' As APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V
 WHERE   Acn_name = 'Debit Memo'
UNION ALL
(SELECT ACN_AS_ID AS as_id, ACN_DATE AS trans_date, ACN_NO AS jv_no, ACN_AMOUNT - ROUND(ACN_AMOUNT / (td_age / 100 + 1), 0) AS debit, 0 AS credit, TM_DESCRIPTION AS remarks, AS_Supplier_Name AS Descr, '' As APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V
 WHERE   Acn_name = 'Debit Memo' AND NOT td_age IS NULL
UNION ALL
(SELECT ACN_AS_ID AS as_id, ACN_DATE AS trans_date, ACN_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS debit, CASE WHEN td_age IS NULL THEN ACN_AMOUNT ELSE ROUND(ACN_AMOUNT / (td_age / 100 + 1), 0) END AS credit, 
                   ACN_NAME + ' Against Invoice : ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), ACN_AI_NO) AS remarks, AS_Supplier_Name AS Descr, '' As APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_DEBIT_NOTE_V
 WHERE   Acn_name = 'Credit Memo'
UNION ALL
(SELECT AI_AS_ID AS AS_id, AI_DATE AS trans_date, AI_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS Debit, AI_AMOUNT - ROUND(AI_AMOUNT / (td_age / 100 + 1), 0) AS Credit, TM_DESCRIPTION AS Remarks, AS_Supplier_Name AS Descr, '' As APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_INVOICE_V AS AP_INVOICE_V_1
 WHERE   (NOT (td_age IS NULL)) AND (AI_CANCEL IS NULL)
UNION ALL
(SELECT APR_AS_ID AS co_id, APR_DATE AS trans_date, APR_NO AS jv_no, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS debit, 0 AS credit, APR_DESCRIPTION AS Remarks, AS_Supplier_Name AS Descr, APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
UNION ALL
(SELECT AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_AS_ID AS co_id, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_DATE AS trans_date, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO AS jv_no, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS debit, 0 AS credit, 
                   dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.TD_DESCRIPTION AS remarks, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.AS_Supplier_Name AS descr, APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V INNER JOIN
                   dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1 ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO
UNION ALL
(SELECT APR_AS_ID AS co_id, APR_DATE AS trans_date, APR_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS debit, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS credit, 'REVERSAL OF PAYMENT' AS Remarks, AS_Supplier_Name AS Descr, APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
 WHERE   dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.apr_cancel = 1
UNION ALL
(SELECT AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_AS_ID AS co_id, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_DATE AS trans_date, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS debit, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS credit, 
                   'REVERSAL OF PAYMENT' AS remarks, AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.AS_Supplier_Name AS descr, APR_CHQ_NO
 FROM      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V INNER JOIN
                   dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1 ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO = AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO
 WHERE   AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.apr_cancel = 1))))))))

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V
AS
SELECT        dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_AS_ID AS CO_ID, 
                         dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_Supplier_Name AS Company_name, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_address AS co_address, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID, dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_NAME, 
                         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS apr_receipt_amount, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TAX_AMOUNT, 
                         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CHQ_NO
FROM            dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                         dbo.Bank_Master ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID = dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_ID INNER JOIN
                         dbo.AP_SUPPLIER ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_AS_ID = dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         dbo.TAX_MASTER INNER JOIN
                         dbo.TAX_DETAIL ON dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID = dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_TM_ID INNER JOIN
                         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX ON dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_ID = dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_APR_NO

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
AS
SELECT        dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_AS_ID, 
                         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_POST, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_GL, 
                         dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_Supplier_Name, dbo.Bank_Master_v.BANK_NAME, dbo.Bank_Master_v.BANK_AC_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_AC_ID, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel, 
                         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.apr_Can_date, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.apr_can_GL, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CHQ_NO
FROM            dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                         dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_AS_ID = dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V.AS_ID INNER JOIN
                         dbo.Bank_Master_v ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID = dbo.Bank_Master_v.BANK_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_ID, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_APR_NO, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID, 
                      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TAX_AMOUNT, dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V.TD_DESCRIPTION, dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V.TD_AC_ID, 
                      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.AS_AC_ID
FROM         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX INNER JOIN
                      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID = dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V.TD_ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_APR_NO = dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO

CREATE VIEW dbo.ap_pre_ledger_v
AS
SELECT     AS_ID, AS_opbal_r AS Amount, '01/01/2007' AS MM
FROM         dbo.AP_SUPPLIER
WHERE     (AS_opbal_r > 0)
UNION ALL
(SELECT     AI_AS_ID AS as_id, AI_AMOUNT * - 1 AS amount, AI_DATE AS mm
 FROM         dbo.AP_INVOICE_V
UNION ALL
(SELECT     APR_AS_ID AS as_id, APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT AS amount, APR_DATE AS mm
 FROM         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
UNION ALL
SELECT     dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_AS_ID AS as_id, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS amount, 
                      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE AS MM
FROM         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.AP_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_APR_NO))

CREATE VIEW dbo.AP_SUPPLIER_V
AS
SELECT dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_Supplier_Name, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_AC_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_strno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ntnno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_address, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_opbal_r, 
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.CRDays
FROM     dbo.AP_SUPPLIER INNER JOIN
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
AS
SELECT dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_ID, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_DATE, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_AMOUNT, 
                  dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_ADJUST, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_CO_ID, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE
FROM     dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT ON dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO = dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING
AS
SELECT 'ATS' AS TYPE, [AAI_AI_NO], [AAI_AI_DATE], [AAI_AI_AMOUNT], [AAI_PEN_AMOUNT], [AAI_ADJUST], [AAI_CO_ID], [CO_Company_Name], [AO_VEHICLE_ID], [AI_vehicle_make], [AI_VEHICLE_MODEL], [AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO], 
                  [AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO], [AI_VEHICLE_DOI], [AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO], [PRODUCT], [PACKAGE_TYPE], [OBJECTID]
FROM     [ATS_GL].[dbo].[AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1] WHERE [OBJECTID] <> 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CRM' AS TYPE, 0 AS AAI_AI_NO, CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME), 101) AS [AAI_AI_DATE], (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE) AS AAI_AI_AMOUNT, (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE) 
                  AS AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST, CASE WHEN CORPORATE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN CORPORATE_ID ELSE CUSTOMERID END AS AAI_CO_ID, CASE WHEN INSUREDBY IS NOT NULL 
                  THEN INSUREDBY ELSE CUSTOMERNAME END AS CO_COMPANY_NAME, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_MAKE, VEHICLE_MODEL, Vehicle_ChasisNo, VEHICLE_ENGINENO, CONVERT(VARCHAR, 
                  CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME), 101) AS [AI_VEHICLE_DOI], Vehicle_RegistrationNo, PRODUCT, PACKAGE_TYPE, OBJECTID
FROM     CRMVehiclesDetails_V
WHERE  OBJECTID <> 0 AND VEHICLE_ID NOT IN
                      (SELECT DISTINCT AO_VEHICLE_ID
                       FROM      AR_INVOICE_V
                       WHERE   AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NOT NULL)

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_ATS_CRM_OUTSTANDING_V
AS
SELECT 'ATS' AS TYPE, AAI_AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, AAI_ADJUST, AAI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, 
             AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, PRODUCT, PACKAGE_TYPE, OBJECTID, Amount, CommissionValue
FROM   AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1
WHERE OBJECTID <> 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'CRM' AS TYPE, 0 AS AAI_AI_NO, CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME), 101) AS [AAI_AI_DATE], (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE) AS AAI_AI_AMOUNT, (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE) AS AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST, 
             CASE WHEN CORPORATE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN CORPORATE_ID ELSE CUSTOMERID END AS AAI_CO_ID, CASE WHEN INSUREDBY IS NOT NULL THEN INSUREDBY ELSE CUSTOMERNAME END AS CO_COMPANY_NAME, VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_MAKE, VEHICLE_MODEL, 
             Vehicle_ChasisNo, VEHICLE_ENGINENO, CONVERT(VARCHAR, CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME), 101) AS [AI_VEHICLE_DOI], Vehicle_RegistrationNo, PRODUCT, PACKAGE_TYPE, OBJECTID, Amount, CommissionValue
FROM   CRM_VehiclesDetails
WHERE Vehicle_DateOfInstallation IS NOT NULL AND OBJECTID <> 0 AND VEHICLE_ID NOT IN
                 (SELECT DISTINCT AO_VEHICLE_ID
                 FROM    AR_INVOICE_V
                 WHERE AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NOT NULL)

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V
AS
SELECT        dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID, dbo.AR_Companies.CRDays, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Id, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_AC_ID, dbo.AR_Companies.co_strno, 
                         dbo.AR_Companies.co_ntnno, dbo.AR_Companies.co_address, dbo.AR_Companies.co_opbal_r, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION
FROM            dbo.AR_Companies WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.AR_Companies.CO_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_NO, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_DATE, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_AI_NO, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_CO_ID, 
                      dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Id, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_AC_ID, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_IM_ID, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_NAME, 
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_AC_ID, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_AMOUNT, 
                      dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_TYPE, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_POST, dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_INV_GL, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID, 
                      dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION,
                          (SELECT     TD_AC_ID
                            FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V
                            WHERE      (TD_ID =
                                                       (SELECT     MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                                         FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_3
                                                         WHERE      (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) 
                      AS td_ac_id,
                          (SELECT     TD_AGE
                            FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_2
                            WHERE      (TD_ID =
                                                       (SELECT     MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                                         FROM          dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1
                                                         WHERE      (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) 
                      AS td_age, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, dbo.AR_Companies.co_strno, dbo.AR_Companies.co_ntnno, dbo.AR_Companies.co_address, 
                      dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_DESCR, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO
FROM         dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE.ACN_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

CREATE VIEW AR_CUSTOMER_AGING_V AS
SELECT AAI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN 'd0_30' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN 'd31_60' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, 
                  GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN 'd61_90' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN 'd91_120' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 
                  150 THEN 'd121_150' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 180 THEN 'd151_180' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN 'd181_210' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) 
                  BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN 'd211_240' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 270 THEN 'd241_270' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 
                  300 THEN 'd271_300' ELSE 'd301' END AS AgingBucket, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN 1 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN 2 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, 
                  AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN 3 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN 4 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 150 THEN 5 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, 
                  GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 180 THEN 6 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN 7 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN 8 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, 
                  GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 270 THEN 9 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 300 THEN 10 ELSE 11 END AS SortOrder, COUNT(*) AS InvoiceCount, SUM(AI_ADJUST) AS TotalAdjusted
FROM     dbo.CRM_AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V
WHERE  (AI_ADJUST > 0)
GROUP BY AAI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN 'd0_30' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN 'd31_60' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, 
                  GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN 'd61_90' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN 'd91_120' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 
                  150 THEN 'd121_150' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 180 THEN 'd151_180' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN 'd181_210' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) 
                  BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN 'd211_240' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 270 THEN 'd241_270' WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 300 THEN 'd271_300' ELSE 'd301' END, 
                  CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN 1 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN 2 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 
                  90 THEN 3 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN 4 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 150 THEN 5 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 
                  180 THEN 6 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN 7 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN 8 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 
                  270 THEN 9 WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 300 THEN 10 ELSE 11 END
HAVING (SUM(AI_ADJUST) > 50)

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_DEAL_DETAIL_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.AR_DEAL_DETAIL.*, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, 
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name
FROM         dbo.AR_DEAL_DETAIL INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_DEAL_DETAIL.DD_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.AR_DEAL_DETAIL.DD_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AR_DEAL_DETAIL.DD_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

Create view AR_INV_DM_CM_DTL AS
SELECT 1 AS ETYPE, 'INVOICE' AS ENTTYPE, CO_Company_Name,IM_DESCRIPTION,td_ac_id,td_age,TM_DESCRIPTION,AI_NO,AI_DATE,AI_AO_NO,
AI_PACKAGE_NAME,AI_IM_ID,AI_AMOUNT,AI_vehicle_make,AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,
AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,AI_VEHICLE_PONO,AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO,AI_CUSTOMER_NAME,AI_TYPE,AI_POST,
AI_CO_ID,AI_VEHICLE_DOI,AI_CANCEL,AI_CANCEL_DATE,AI_INV_GL,AI_CAN_GL,CO_AC_ID,IM_AC_ID,AO_DESCR,
co_strno,co_ntnno,co_address,IM_EXP_DAYS,IM_EXP_ON,IM_TM_ID,INV1,INV2,INV3,INV4,INV5,nos_inv,
AI_CUSTOMER_NIC
FROM AR_INVOICE_V 
WHERE ai_no>0 
UNION 
(SELECT 2 AS ETYPE, ACN_NAME AS ENTTYPE,CO_Company_Name,IM_DESCRIPTION,td_ac_id,td_age,TM_DESCRIPTION,ACN_AI_NO As AI_NO,
ACN_DATE AS AI_DATE,ACN_NO AS AI_AO_NO,'' AS AI_PACKAGE_NAME,ACN_IM_ID AS AI_IM_ID,ACN_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT,
'' AS AI_vehicle_make,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,
'' AS AI_VEHICLE_PONO,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO,'' AS AI_CUSTOMER_NAME,ACN_TYPE AS AI_TYPE,
ACN_POST AS AI_POST,ACN_CO_ID AS AI_CO_ID,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI,'' AS AI_CANCEL,'' AS AI_CANCEL_DATE,
ACN_INV_GL AS AI_INV_GL,'' AS AI_CAN_GL,CO_AC_ID,ACN_IM_ID AS IM_AC_ID,ACN_DESCR AS AO_DESCR,co_strno,
co_ntnno,co_address,'' AS IM_EXP_DAYS,'' AS IM_EXP_ON,IM_TM_ID,0 AS INV1,0 AS INV2,0 AS INV3,0 AS INV4,
0 AS INV5,0 AS nos_inv,'' AS AI_CUSTOMER_NIC
FROM AR_Credit_note_V
where ACN_NAME = 'Debit Memo'
UNION
(SELECT 3 AS ETYPE, ACN_NAME AS ENTTYPE, CO_Company_Name,IM_DESCRIPTION,td_ac_id,td_age,TM_DESCRIPTION,ACN_AI_NO As AI_NO,
ACN_DATE AS AI_DATE,ACN_NO AS AI_AO_NO,'' AS AI_PACKAGE_NAME,ACN_IM_ID AS AI_IM_ID,(ACN_AMOUNT*-1) AS AI_AMOUNT,
'' AS AI_vehicle_make,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_MODEL,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO,
'' AS AI_VEHICLE_PONO,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO,'' AS AI_CUSTOMER_NAME,ACN_TYPE AS AI_TYPE,
ACN_POST AS AI_POST,ACN_CO_ID AS AI_CO_ID,'' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI,'' AS AI_CANCEL,'' AS AI_CANCEL_DATE,
ACN_INV_GL AS AI_INV_GL,'' AS AI_CAN_GL,CO_AC_ID,ACN_IM_ID AS IM_AC_ID,ACN_DESCR AS AO_DESCR,co_strno,
co_ntnno,co_address,'' AS IM_EXP_DAYS,'' AS IM_EXP_ON,IM_TM_ID,0 AS INV1,0 AS INV2,0 AS INV3,0 AS INV4,
0 AS INV5,0 AS nos_inv,'' AS AI_CUSTOMER_NIC
FROM AR_Credit_note_V
where ACN_NAME = 'Credit Memo'))

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V
AS
SELECT     AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, SUM(Invoice_amount) AS ORG_AMT, SUM(Invoice_amount) AS PEN_AMT, MAX(AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO) AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, 
                      MAX(AI_VEHICLE_DOI) AS VEHICLE_DOI,Inv_Type
FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V
WHERE     (Status = 'Invoice')
GROUP BY AI_DATE, AI_NO, AI_CO_ID,Inv_Type
UNION ALL
SELECT     AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, APR_DATE AS AI_DATE, AAI_CO_ID AS AI_CO_ID, 0 AS ORG_AMT, AAI_ADJUST * - 1 AS PEN_AMT, '' AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, 
                      '' AS VEHICLE_DOI,'' as Inv_Type
FROM         dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V
UNION ALL
SELECT     ACN_AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, 0 AS ORG_AMT, SUM(Invoice_amount * - 1) AS PEN_AMT, '' AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS VEHICLE_DOI,'' as Inv_Type
FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V AS AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V_1
WHERE     (Status = 'Credit Memo')
GROUP BY AI_DATE, ACN_AI_NO, AI_CO_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT     ACN_AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, 0 AS ORG_AMT, SUM(Invoice_amount * 1) AS PEN_AMT, '' AS VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS VEHICLE_DOI,''  as Inv_Type
FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V AS AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V_1
WHERE     (Status = 'Debit Memo')
GROUP BY AI_DATE, ACN_AI_NO, AI_CO_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_INVOICE_COUNT_V
AS
SELECT     AI_AO_NO, COUNT(*) AS nos_inv
FROM         (SELECT DISTINCT AI_AO_NO
                       FROM          dbo.AR_INVOICE) AS dvrtbl
GROUP BY AI_AO_NO

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V
AS
SELECT 'Invoice' AS Status, AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_POST, AI_TYPE, CASE WHEN td_age IS NULL THEN ai_amount ELSE ai_amount + ROUND((ai_amount * (td_Age / 100)), 0) END AS Invoice_amount, 0 AS ACN_AI_NO, 
                  AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, CASE WHEN ai_no = inv1 THEN 'Fresh' ELSE 'Renewal' END AS Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID
FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_V WITH (NOLOCK)
WHERE  (AI_CANCEL IS NULL)
UNION ALL
SELECT ACN_NAME AS Status, ACN_NO AS AI_NO, ACN_DATE AS AI_DATE, ACN_CO_ID AS AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, ACN_POST AS AI_POST, ACN_TYPE AS AI_TYPE, CASE WHEN td_age IS NULL 
                  THEN acn_amount ELSE acn_amount + ROUND((acn_amount * (td_Age / 100)), 0) END AS Invoice_amount, ACN_AI_NO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, '' AS AI_VEHICLE_DOI, '' AS Inv_Type, '' AS AO_VEHICLE_ID
FROM     dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V WITH (NOLOCK)

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V
AS
SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AO_VEH_ID, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name
FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_V

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_AC_ID, 
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_EXP_DAYS, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_EXP_ON, 
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION
FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

CREATE VIEW AR_INVOICE_NOOFYEARS AS 
SELECT DISTINCT AI_NO, INV1, INV2, INV3, INV4, INV5, INV6, INV7, INV8, INV9, INV10, INV11, INV12, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AO_VEHICLE_ID,
Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
(CASE WHEN AI_NO = INV1 THEN 1 
WHEN AI_NO = INV2 THEN 2 
WHEN AI_NO = INV3 THEN 3 
WHEN AI_NO = INV4 THEN 4 
WHEN AI_NO = INV5 THEN 5 
WHEN AI_NO = INV6 THEN 6 
WHEN AI_NO = INV7 THEN 7 
WHEN AI_NO = INV8 THEN 8 
WHEN AI_NO = INV9 THEN 9 
WHEN AI_NO = INV10 THEN 10
WHEN AI_NO = INV11 THEN 11 
WHEN AI_NO = INV12 THEN 12 
ELSE 0 END) AS NOOFYEAR,
 (CASE 
        WHEN AI_NO = INV1 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 1, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV2 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 2, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV3 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 3, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV4 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 4, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV5 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 5, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV6 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 6, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV7 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 7, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV8 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 8, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV9 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 9, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV10 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 10, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV11 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 11, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        WHEN AI_NO = INV12 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 12, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103))
        ELSE CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)
     END) AS Vehicle_Expiry_Date
FROM     AR_INVOICE_V LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  CRMVehiclesDetails_V ON AR_INVOICE_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID = CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_Id
WHERE AO_BookingCat = 'Yearly'
--AND  LEN(AI_VEHICLE_DOI) > 0
--AND AI_NO BETWEEN 1 AND 10000000
--ORDER BY AI_NO

CREATE VIEW AR_INVOICE_TEMP_V AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_DATE, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_AO_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_PACKAGE_NAME, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_IM_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_AMOUNT, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_vehicle_make, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_VEHICLE_MODEL, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_VEHICLE_PONO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_CUSTOMER_NAME, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_TYPE, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_COL, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_VEHICLE_DOI, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION,
                      (SELECT TD_AGE
                       FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS TD_AGE, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_CUSTOMER_NIC, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AO_BookingCat, dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AI_TEMP_POST, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID
FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_ORDER ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_TEMP.AIT_AO_NO = dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

CREATE VIEW AR_INVOICE_V AS 
SELECT AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name, AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION,
                      (SELECT TD_AC_ID
                       FROM      TAX_DETAIL_V WITH (NOLOCK)
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_3 WITH (NOLOCK)
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID) AND (AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_ac_id,
                      (SELECT TD_AGE
                       FROM      TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_2 WITH (NOLOCK)
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1 WITH (NOLOCK)
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID) AND (AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_age, TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION, AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, 
                  AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO, AR_INVOICE.AI_PACKAGE_NAME, AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID, AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT, AR_INVOICE.AI_vehicle_make, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, 
                  AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_PONO, AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE, AR_INVOICE.AI_POST, AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID, 
                  AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL, AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE, AR_INVOICE.AI_INV_GL, AR_INVOICE.AI_CAN_GL, AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_AC_ID, AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_AC_ID, 
                  ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_DESCRIPTION, '') AS AO_DESCR, AR_COMPANIES_V.co_strno, AR_COMPANIES_V.co_ntnno, AR_COMPANIES_V.co_address, AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_EXP_DAYS, AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_EXP_ON, 
                  AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV1_ID, 0) AS INV1, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV2_ID, 0) AS INV2, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV3_ID, 0) AS INV3, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV4_ID, 0) AS INV4, 
                  ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV5_ID, 0) AS INV5, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV6_ID, 0) AS INV6, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV7_ID, 0) AS INV7, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV8_ID, 0) AS INV8, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV9_ID, 0) AS INV9, 
                  ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV10_ID, 0) AS INV10, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV11_ID, 0) AS INV11, ISNULL(AR_ORDER.AO_INV12_ID, 0) AS INV12, AR_INVOICE_COUNT_V.nos_inv, AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NIC, 
                  AR_INVOICE.AO_BookingCat, CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL' AND dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NULL) THEN dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO ELSE dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID END IS NULL) 
                  THEN
                      (SELECT DISTINCT AO_VEHICLE_ID
                       FROM      AR_ORDER AO
                       WHERE   AO.AO_NO = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO) ELSE (CASE WHEN (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL' AND dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NULL) 
                  THEN dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO ELSE dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID END) END AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID AS AO_VEH_ID, CASE WHEN (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL' AND 
                  dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NULL) THEN dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO ELSE dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID END AS AO_VEHICLE_ID_NULL, AR_INVOICE.AI_BILL_POST
FROM     AR_ORDER RIGHT OUTER JOIN
                  AR_INVOICE WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN
                  AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID = AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
                  AR_COMPANIES_V ON AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID = AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_ID INNER JOIN
                  AR_INVOICE_COUNT_V ON AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO = AR_INVOICE_COUNT_V.AI_AO_NO ON AR_ORDER.AO_NO = AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO AND AR_ORDER.AO_IM_ID = AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  TAX_MASTER ON AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID = TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[AR_INVOICE_V2] AS 
SELECT dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION,
                      (SELECT TD_AC_ID
                       FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V WITH (NOLOCK)
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_3 WITH (NOLOCK)
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_ac_id,
                      (SELECT TD_AGE
                       FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_2 WITH (NOLOCK)
                       WHERE   (TD_ID =
                                             (SELECT MAX(TD_ID) AS Expr1
                                              FROM      dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V AS TAX_DETAIL_V_1 WITH (NOLOCK)
                                              WHERE   (TD_TM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID) AND (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE >= TD_ACTIVE_ON)))) AS td_age, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_PACKAGE_NAME, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_PONO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_POST, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CANCEL_DATE, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_INV_GL, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CAN_GL, dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_AC_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_AC_ID, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_DESCRIPTION, '') AS AO_DESCR, dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.co_strno, 
                  dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.co_ntnno, dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.co_address, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_EXP_DAYS, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_EXP_ON, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID, 
                  ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV1_ID, 0) AS INV1, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV2_ID, 0) AS INV2, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV3_ID, 0) AS INV3, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV4_ID, 0) AS INV4, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV5_ID, 
                  0) AS INV5, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV6_ID, 0) AS INV6, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV7_ID, 0) AS INV7, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV8_ID, 0) AS INV8, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV9_ID, 0) AS INV9, 
                  ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV10_ID, 0) AS INV10, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV11_ID, 0) AS INV11, ISNULL(dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_INV12_ID, 0) AS INV12, dbo.AR_INVOICE_COUNT_V.nos_inv, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NIC, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE.AO_BookingCat, 

				  CASE WHEN (CASE WHEN (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL' AND dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NULL) THEN dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO ELSE dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID END IS NULL) THEN
				  (SELECT DISTINCT AO_VEHICLE_ID FROM AR_ORDER AO WHERE AO.AO_NO = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO) ELSE
				  (CASE WHEN (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL' AND dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NULL) THEN dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO ELSE dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID END) END AS AO_VEHICLE_ID,

				  dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID AS AO_VEH_ID,		
				  
				  CASE WHEN (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL' AND dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NULL) THEN dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO ELSE dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID END AS AO_VEHICLE_ID_NULL 
 
FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V ON dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID = dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_COUNT_V ON dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO = dbo.AR_INVOICE_COUNT_V.AI_AO_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_ORDER ON dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO = dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_NO AND dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID = dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_IM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID
				  --WHERE
				  --(CASE WHEN (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_TYPE = 'MANUAL' AND dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NULL) THEN dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO ELSE dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_VEHICLE_ID END)  IS NULL


 --AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = 11266
	--			  AND

CREATE VIEW dbo.ar_ledger_trans_v
AS
SELECT     AI_CO_ID AS co_id, AI_DATE AS trans_date, AI_NO AS jv_no, AI_AMOUNT AS debit, 0 AS credit, RTRIM(AI_CUSTOMER_NAME) 
                      + '  ' + RTRIM(AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO) + ' ' + RTRIM(IM_DESCRIPTION) AS remarks, CO_Company_Name AS Descr
FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE_V
WHERE     (AI_CANCEL IS NULL)
UNION ALL
(SELECT     ACN_CO_ID AS co_id, ACN_DATE AS trans_date, ACN_NO AS jv_no, ACN_AMOUNT AS debit, 0 AS credit, RTRIM(ACN_NAME) 
                        + ' : ' + RTRIM(IM_DESCRIPTION) AS remarks, CO_Company_Name AS Descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V
 WHERE     (ACN_NAME = 'Debit Memo')
UNION ALL
(SELECT     ACN_CO_ID AS co_id, ACN_DATE AS trans_date, ACN_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS debit, ACN_AMOUNT AS credit, RTRIM(ACN_NAME) 
                        + ' : ' + RTRIM(IM_DESCRIPTION) AS remarks, CO_Company_Name AS Descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V AS AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V_3
 WHERE     (ACN_NAME = 'Credit Memo')
UNION ALL
(SELECT     AI_CO_ID AS co_id, AI_DATE AS trans_date, AI_NO AS jv_no, ROUND(AI_AMOUNT * (td_age / 100), 0) AS Debit, 0 AS Credit, 
                        TM_DESCRIPTION AS Remarks, CO_Company_Name AS Descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE_V AS AR_INVOICE_V_1
 WHERE     (NOT (td_age IS NULL)) AND (AI_CANCEL IS NULL)
UNION ALL
(SELECT     ACN_CO_ID AS co_id, ACN_DATE AS trans_date, ACN_NO AS jv_no, ROUND(ACN_AMOUNT * (td_age / 100), 0) AS Debit, 0 AS Credit, 
                        TM_DESCRIPTION AS Remarks, CO_Company_Name AS Descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V AS AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V_2
 WHERE     (NOT (td_age IS NULL)) AND (ACN_NAME = 'Debit Memo')
UNION ALL
(SELECT     ACN_CO_ID AS co_id, ACN_DATE AS trans_date, ACN_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS Debit, ROUND(ACN_AMOUNT * (td_age / 100), 0) AS Credit, 
                        TM_DESCRIPTION AS Remarks, CO_Company_Name AS Descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V AS AR_CREDIT_NOTE_V_1
 WHERE     (NOT (td_age IS NULL)) AND (ACN_NAME = 'Credit Memo')
UNION ALL
(SELECT     APR_CO_ID AS co_id, APR_DATE AS trans_date, APR_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS debit, APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT AS credit, APR_DESCRIPTION AS Remarks, 
                        CO_Company_Name AS Descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
UNION ALL
(SELECT     AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_CO_ID AS co_id, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_DATE AS trans_date, 
                        AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO AS jv_no, 0 AS debit, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS credit, 
                        dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V.TD_DESCRIPTION AS remarks, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.CO_Company_Name AS descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V INNER JOIN
                        dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1 ON 
                        dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V.APT_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO
UNION ALL
(SELECT     APR_CO_ID AS co_id, apr_Can_date AS trans_date, APR_NO AS jv_no, APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT AS debit, 0 AS credit, 
                        'REVERSAL OF RECEIPT' AS Remarks, CO_Company_Name AS Descr
 FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_2
 WHERE     (APR_Cancel = 1)
UNION ALL
SELECT     AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_CO_ID AS co_id, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.apr_Can_date AS trans_date, 
                      AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO AS jv_no, AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V_1.APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS debit, 0 AS credit, 
                      'REVERSAL OF RECEIPT' AS remarks, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.CO_Company_Name AS descr
FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V AS AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V_1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1 ON 
                      AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V_1.APT_APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_NO
WHERE     (AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1.APR_Cancel = 1)))))))))

create view AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_MNTH_V as 
SELECT AO_NO, SUM(AO_PRICE1) AS PRICE1, SUM(AO_PRICE2) AS PRICE2, SUM(AO_PRICE3) AS PRICE3, SUM(AO_PRICE4) AS PRICE4, SUM(AO_PRICE5) AS PRICE5, SUM(AO_PRICE6) AS PRICE6, SUM(AO_PRICE7) AS PRICE7, 
                  SUM(AO_PRICE8) AS PRICE8, SUM(AO_PRICE9) AS PRICE9, SUM(AO_PRICE10) AS PRICE10, SUM(AO_PRICE11) AS PRICE11, SUM(AO_PRICE12) AS PRICE12, MAX(AO_INV1_ID) AS INV1, MAX(AO_INV2_ID) AS INV2, MAX(AO_INV3_ID) 
                  AS INV3, MAX(AO_INV4_ID) AS INV4, MAX(AO_INV5_ID) AS INV5, MAX(AO_INV6_ID) AS INV6, MAX(AO_INV7_ID) AS INV7, MAX(AO_INV8_ID) AS INV8, MAX(AO_INV9_ID) AS INV9, MAX(AO_INV10_ID) AS INV10, MAX(AO_INV11_ID) AS INV11, 
                  MAX(AO_INV12_ID) AS INV12, MAX(AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 25 AS AO_DATE2, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 55 AS AO_DATE3, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 85 AS AO_DATE4, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 115 AS AO_DATE5, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 145 AS AO_DATE6, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 175 AS AO_DATE7, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 205 AS AO_DATE8, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 235 AS AO_DATE9, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 265 AS AO_DATE10, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 295 AS AO_DATE11, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 325 AS AO_DATE12, AO_MAFD, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
                  AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID
FROM     dbo.AR_ORDER_V
WHERE  (AO_BookingCat = 'Monthly')
GROUP BY AO_NO, AO_MAFD, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID

create view AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_QTR_V as 
SELECT AO_NO, SUM(AO_PRICE1) AS PRICE1, SUM(AO_PRICE2) AS PRICE2, SUM(AO_PRICE3) AS PRICE3, SUM(AO_PRICE4) AS PRICE4, SUM(AO_PRICE5) AS PRICE5, SUM(AO_PRICE6) AS PRICE6, SUM(AO_PRICE7) AS PRICE7,

                  AS INV3, MAX(AO_INV4_ID) AS INV4, MAX(AO_INV5_ID) AS INV5, MAX(AO_INV6_ID) AS INV6, MAX(AO_INV7_ID) AS INV7, MAX(AO_INV8_ID) AS INV8, MAX(AO_INV9_ID) AS INV9, MAX(AO_INV10_ID) AS INV10, MAX(AO_INV11_ID) AS INV11, 
                  MAX(AO_INV12_ID) AS INV12, MAX(AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 75 AS AO_DATE2, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 165 AS AO_DATE3, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 255 AS AO_DATE4, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 345 AS AO_DATE5, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 435 AS AO_DATE6, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 525 AS AO_DATE7, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 615 AS AO_DATE8, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 705 AS AO_DATE9, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 795 AS AO_DATE10, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 885 AS AO_DATE11, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 975 AS AO_DATE12, AO_MAFD, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 
                  AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID
FROM     dbo.AR_ORDER_V

create view AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_SEMI_V as 
SELECT AO_NO, SUM(AO_PRICE1) AS PRICE1, SUM(AO_PRICE2) AS PRICE2, SUM(AO_PRICE3) AS PRICE3, SUM(AO_PRICE4) AS PRICE4, SUM(AO_PRICE5) AS PRICE5, SUM(AO_PRICE6) AS PRICE6, SUM(AO_PRICE7) AS PRICE7, 
                  SUM(AO_PRICE8) AS PRICE8, SUM(AO_PRICE9) AS PRICE9, SUM(AO_PRICE10) AS PRICE10, SUM(AO_PRICE11) AS PRICE11, SUM(AO_PRICE12) AS PRICE12, MAX(AO_INV1_ID) AS INV1, MAX(AO_INV2_ID) AS INV2, MAX(AO_INV3_ID) 
                  AS INV3, MAX(AO_INV4_ID) AS INV4, MAX(AO_INV5_ID) AS INV5, MAX(AO_INV6_ID) AS INV6, MAX(AO_INV7_ID) AS INV7, MAX(AO_INV8_ID) AS INV8, MAX(AO_INV9_ID) AS INV9, MAX(AO_INV10_ID) AS INV10, MAX(AO_INV11_ID) AS INV11, 
                  MAX(AO_INV12_ID) AS INV12, MAX(AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 165 AS AO_DATE2, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 345 AS AO_DATE3, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 525 AS AO_DATE4, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 705 AS AO_DATE5, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 885 AS AO_DATE6, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1065 AS AO_DATE7, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1245 AS AO_DATE8, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1425 AS AO_DATE9, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1605 AS AO_DATE10, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1785 AS AO_DATE11, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1965 AS AO_DATE12, AO_MAFD, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID
FROM     dbo.AR_ORDER_V
WHERE  (AO_BookingCat = 'Half Yearly')
GROUP BY AO_NO, AO_MAFD, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID

                  MAX(AO_INV12_ID) AS INV12, MAX(AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 320 AS AO_DATE2, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 685 AS AO_DATE3, MAX(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1050) AS AO_DATE4, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1415 AS AO_DATE5, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1780 AS AO_DATE6, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2145 AS AO_DATE7, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2510 AS AO_DATE8, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2875 AS AO_DATE9, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3240 AS AO_DATE10, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3605 AS AO_DATE11, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3970 AS AO_DATE12, AO_MAFD, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID

                      MAX(AO_INV10_ID) AS INV10, MAX(AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 335 AS AO_DATE2,

CREATE view AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V_SELECTED_ORDER_NO as 
SELECT dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_NO, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE1) AS PRICE1, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE2) AS PRICE2, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE3) AS PRICE3, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE4) AS PRICE4, 
                  SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE5) AS PRICE5, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE6) AS PRICE6, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE7) AS PRICE7, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE8) AS PRICE8, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE9) 
                  AS PRICE9, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE10) AS PRICE10, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE11) AS PRICE11, SUM(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE12) AS PRICE12, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV1_ID) AS INV1, 
                  MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV2_ID) AS INV2, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV3_ID) AS INV3, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV4_ID) AS INV4, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV5_ID) AS INV5, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV6_ID) AS INV6, 
                  MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV7_ID) AS INV7, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV8_ID) AS INV8, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV9_ID) AS INV9, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV10_ID) AS INV10, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV11_ID) 
                  AS INV11, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV12_ID) AS INV12, MAX(dbo.AR_ORDER_V.AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 320 AS AO_DATE2, 
                  dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 685 AS AO_DATE3, dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1050 AS AO_DATE4, dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1415 AS AO_DATE5, 
                  dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1780 AS AO_DATE6, dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2145 AS AO_DATE7, dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2510 AS AO_DATE8, 
                  dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2875 AS AO_DATE9, dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3240 AS AO_DATE10, dbo.AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3605 AS AO_DATE11,

CREATE VIEW AR_ORDER_CREATE_INVOICE_V_TEST AS 
SELECT AR_ORDER_V.AO_NO, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE1) AS PRICE1, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE2) AS PRICE2, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE3) AS PRICE3, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE4) AS PRICE4, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE5) 
                  AS PRICE5, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE6) AS PRICE6, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE7) AS PRICE7, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE8) AS PRICE8, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE9) AS PRICE9, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE10) 
                  AS PRICE10, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE11) AS PRICE11, SUM(AR_ORDER_V.AO_PRICE12) AS PRICE12, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV1_ID) AS INV1, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV2_ID) AS INV2, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV3_ID) AS INV3, 
                  MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV4_ID) AS INV4, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV5_ID) AS INV5, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV6_ID) AS INV6, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV7_ID) AS INV7, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV8_ID) AS INV8, 
                  MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV9_ID) AS INV9, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV10_ID) AS INV10, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV11_ID) AS INV11, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_INV12_ID) AS INV12, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, 
                  AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 335 AS AO_DATE2, AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 700 AS AO_DATE3, MAX(AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1065) AS AO_DATE4, 
                  AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1430 AS AO_DATE5, AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1795 AS AO_DATE6, AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2160 AS AO_DATE7, 
                  AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2525 AS AO_DATE8, AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2890 AS AO_DATE9, AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3255 AS AO_DATE10, 
                  AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3620 AS AO_DATE11, AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3985 AS AO_DATE12, AR_ORDER_V.AO_MAFD, AR_ORDER_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AR_ORDER_V.AO_MAFD_DATE, 
                  AR_ORDER_V.AO_CO_ID, AVG(update_Ar_Order_Price.SEQNO) AS SQNO

                  dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE5, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE6, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE7, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE8, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE9, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE10, dbo.AR_ORDER.AO_PRICE11,

                  dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_Make, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_Model, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_EngineNo, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_ChasisNo,
