CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_PACKAGE_DETAIL_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.AR_PACKAGE_DETAIL.*, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION
FROM         dbo.AR_PACKAGE_DETAIL LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.TAX_MASTER ON dbo.AR_PACKAGE_DETAIL.PD_TM_ID = dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_PRINT_V
AS
SELECT dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, 
                  dbo.AR_Companies.co_address, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID, dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_NAME, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID, 
                  dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TAX_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CHQ_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.PostedBy
FROM     dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                  dbo.Bank_Master ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID = dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_MASTER INNER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_DETAIL ON dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID = dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_TM_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX ON dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_ID = dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_APR_NO

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
                  dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID, 
                  dbo.Bank_Master_v.BANK_NAME, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_Company_Name, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_POST, dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_AC_ID, 
                  dbo.Bank_Master_v.BANK_AC_ID, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_GL, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.apr_Can_date, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.apr_can_GL, 
                  dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CHQ_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.PostedBy
FROM     dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID = dbo.AR_COMPANIES_V.CO_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.Bank_Master_v ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID = dbo.Bank_Master_v.BANK_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX_V
AS
SELECT dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_ID, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_APR_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TAX_AMOUNT, dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V.TD_DESCRIPTION, dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V.TD_AC_ID
FROM     dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TD_ID = dbo.TAX_DETAIL_V.TD_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_Pending_Assign_v
AS
SELECT     dbo.AR_VEHICLE.*
FROM         dbo.AR_VEHICLE
WHERE     (AV_DD_ID IS NULL) AND (AV_PD_ID IS NULL)

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V
AS
SELECT 'ATS' AS TYPE, AI_NO, MIN(AI_DATE) AS AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, SUM(ORG_AMT) AS Fresh_Inv, SUM(R_AMT) AS Renewal_Inv, SUM(DM_AMT) AS Debit_Memo, SUM(CM_AMT) AS Credit_Memo, SUM(ADJ_AMT) 
                  AS Payment_Receipt, SUM(ORG_AMT) + SUM(R_AMT) + SUM(DM_AMT) + SUM(CM_AMT) + SUM(ADJ_AMT) AS Pending_Invoices, MAX(AO_VEHICLE_ID) AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, SUM(ORG_AMT) + SUM(R_AMT) + SUM(DM_AMT) 
                  + SUM(CM_AMT) AS ATS_INV_AMT, SUM(ADJ_AMT) AS ATS_ADJ_AMT
FROM     (SELECT AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, SUM(Invoice_amount) AS ORG_AMT, 0 AS R_AMT, 0 AS DM_AMT, 0 AS CM_AMT, 0 AS ADJ_AMT, Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID
                  FROM      dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V WITH (NOLOCK)
                  WHERE   (Status = 'Invoice') AND (Inv_Type = 'Fresh')
                  GROUP BY AI_DATE, AI_NO, Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name
                  UNION ALL
                  SELECT AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, 0 AS ORG_AMT, SUM(Invoice_amount) AS R_AMT, 0 AS DM_AMT, 0 AS CM_AMT, 0 AS ADJ_AMT, Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID
                  FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V AS AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V_2 WITH (NOLOCK)
                  WHERE  (Status = 'Invoice') AND (Inv_Type = 'Renewal')
                  GROUP BY AI_DATE, AI_NO, Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name
                  UNION ALL
                  SELECT ACN_AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, 0 AS ORG_AMT, 0 AS R_AMT, SUM(Invoice_amount * 1) AS DM_AMT, 0 AS CM_AMT, 0 AS ADJ_AMT, 'Debit Memo' AS Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID
                  FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V AS AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V_1 WITH (NOLOCK)
                  WHERE  (Status = 'Debit Memo')
                  GROUP BY AI_DATE, ACN_AI_NO, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name
                  UNION ALL
                  SELECT ACN_AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, 0 AS ORG_AMT, 0 AS R_AMT, 0 AS DM_AMT, SUM(Invoice_amount * - 1) AS CM_AMT, 0 AS ADJ_AMT, 'Credit Memo' AS Inv_Type, AO_VEHICLE_ID
                  FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V AS AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V_1 WITH (NOLOCK)
                  WHERE  (Status = 'Credit Memo')
                  GROUP BY AI_DATE, ACN_AI_NO, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_DATE, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name
                  UNION ALL
                  SELECT dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.APR_DATE AS AI_DATE, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_CO_ID AS AI_CO_ID, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, 0 AS ORG_AMT, 
                                    0 AS R_AMT, 0 AS DM_AMT, 0 AS CM_AMT, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_ADJUST * - 1 AS ADJ_AMT, 'Adjust' AS Inv_Type, 0 AS AO_VEHICLE_ID
                  FROM     dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN
                                    dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V.AAI_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID) AS ABC
GROUP BY AI_NO, AI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V_1
AS
SELECT MONTH(AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.AI_DATE) AS MNTH, Left(DATENAME(month,ai_date),3) AS MNTH_NAME, YEAR(AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.AI_DATE) AS YR, 
                  AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.TYPE, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.AI_NO, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.AI_DATE, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.AI_CO_ID, 
                  AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.CO_Company_Name, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.CustomerName, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.NIC, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.Fresh_Inv, 
                  AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.Renewal_Inv, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.Debit_Memo, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.Credit_Memo, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.Payment_Receipt, 
                  AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.Pending_Invoices, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.Vehicle_EngineNo, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.Vehicle_ChasisNo, 
                  CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS. PRODUCT, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.PACKAGE_TYPE, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.FLEET_TYPE, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.OBJECTID, 
                  AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.ATS_INV_AMT, AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.ATS_ADJ_AMT, 0 AS CRM_BOOK_AMT, 
                  (AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.ATS_INV_AMT + AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.ATS_ADJ_AMT) AS OutStanding_Amt
FROM     AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS ON AR_PENDING_INVOICES_DASHBOARD_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID = CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.Vehicle_Id
WHERE  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT MONTH(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME)) AS MNTH, FORMAT(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME), 'MMM', 'en-US') AS MNTH_NAME, YEAR(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME)) AS YR, 
                  'CRM' AS TYPE, 0 AS AI_NO, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS AI_DATE, CASE WHEN CORPORATE_ID IS NOT NULL THEN CORPORATE_ID ELSE CUSTOMERID END AS AI_CO_ID, CASE WHEN INSUREDBY IS NOT NULL 
                  THEN INSUREDBY ELSE CUSTOMERNAME END AS CO_COMPANY_NAME, CustomerName, CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.NIC, (IIF(AMOUNT = 0, IIF(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME) <= '2022-08-31', 15000, 17000), 
                  (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE))) AS Fresh_Inv, 0 AS Renewal_Inv, 0 AS Debit_Memo, 0 AS Credit_Memo, 0 AS Payment_Receipt, (IIF(AMOUNT = 0, IIF(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME) <= '2022-08-31', 15000, 17000), 
                  (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE))) AS Pending_Invoices, VEHICLE_ID AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, VEHICLE_ENGINENO, Vehicle_ChasisNo, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, PRODUCT, PACKAGE_TYPE, FLEET_TYPE, OBJECTID, 0 AS ATS_INV_AMT, 
                  0 AS ATS_ADJ_AMT, (IIF(AMOUNT = 0, IIF(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME) <= '2022-08-31', 15000, 17000), (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE))) AS CRM_BOOK_AMT, IIF(AMOUNT = 0, 
                  IIF(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME) <= '2022-08-31', 15000, 17000), (IIF(AMOUNT = 0, IIF(CAST(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS DATETIME) <= '2022-08-31', 15000, 17000), (AMOUNT - COMMISSIONVALUE)))) 
                  AS OutStanding_AMT
FROM     CRM_VehiclesDetails WITH (NOLOCK)
WHERE  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation IS NOT NULL AND OBJECTID <> 0 AND VEHICLE_ID NOT IN
                      (SELECT DISTINCT AO_VEHICLE_ID
                       FROM      AR_INVOICE_V WITH (NOLOCK)
                       WHERE   AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NOT NULL)

CREATE VIEW AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V AS 
SELECT DISTINCT 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO, MIN(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_DATE) AS AI_DATE, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_CO_ID, SUM(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.ORG_AMT) AS AI_AMT, SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.PEN_AMT, 0)) AS AI_ADJUST, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, 
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.PRODUCT, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.PACKAGE_TYPE, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.OBJECTID, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.Amount, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.CommissionValue
FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO = dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_NO
WHERE  (1 = 1)
GROUP BY dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_CO_ID, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, 
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.PRODUCT, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.PACKAGE_TYPE, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.OBJECTID, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.Amount, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.CommissionValue
HAVING (SUM(ISNULL(dbo.AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.PEN_AMT, 0)) <> 0)

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1
AS
SELECT '' AS AAI_ID, 0 AS AAI_APR_NO, AI_NO AS AAI_AI_NO, AI_DATE AS AAI_AI_DATE, AI_ADJUST AS AAI_AI_AMOUNT, AI_ADJUST AS AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, 0 AS AAI_ADJUST, AI_CO_ID AS AAI_CO_ID, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_vehicle_make, 
                  AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, CO_Company_Name, '' AS APR_NO, '' AS APR_DATE, '' AS APR_DESCRIPTION, AI_CO_ID AS APR_CO_ID, 
                  '' AS APR_BANK_ID, AI_AMT AS APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, '' AS APR_CHQ_NO, PRODUCT, PACKAGE_TYPE, OBJECTID, Amount, CommissionValue
FROM     dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V

CREATE VIEW dbo.ar_pre_ledger_v
AS
SELECT     CO_ID, co_opbal_r AS Amount, '01/01/2007' AS MM
FROM         dbo.AR_Companies
WHERE     (co_opbal_r > 0)
UNION ALL
(SELECT     AI_CO_ID AS co_id, Invoice_amount AS amount, AI_DATE AS mm
 FROM         dbo.AR_INVOICE_DETAIL_V
UNION ALL
(SELECT     APR_CO_ID AS co_id, APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT * - 1 AS amount, APR_DATE AS mm
 FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V
UNION ALL
SELECT     dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID AS co_id, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_TAX_AMOUNT * - 1 AS amount, 
                      dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE AS MM
FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX.APT_APR_NO
UNION ALL
(SELECT     APR_CO_ID AS co_id, APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT AS amount, apr_Can_date AS mm
 FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1
 WHERE     (APR_Cancel = 1)
UNION ALL
SELECT     AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_1.APR_CO_ID AS co_id, AR_PAYMENT_TAX_1.APT_TAX_AMOUNT AS amount, 
                      AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_1.apr_Can_date AS MM
FROM         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT AS AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_PAYMENT_TAX AS AR_PAYMENT_TAX_1 ON AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_1.APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_TAX_1.APT_APR_NO
WHERE     (AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_1.APR_Cancel = 1))))

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_UE_MSTR_LGR_V
AS
SELECT CAST(dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO AS VARCHAR(50)) + ' - ' + CAST(dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID AS VARCHAR(2)) AS mUID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.ENTRYTYPEID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.ENTRYNO, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_HEADER_ID, 
                  dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_DATE, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.VCHSTATUS, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_AC_ID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_DR, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_CR, 
                  dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.CLOSE_FLAG, dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, 
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_VOUCHER_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AO_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE AS AIDT
FROM     dbo.AR_UE_MSTR INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE ON dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO AND dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL ON dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_HEADER_ID = dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_HEADER_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID

CREATE VIEW AR_UE_MSTR_PENDING_ADJUST_V AS 
SELECT CONCAT(AI_NO,'-', AI_IM_ID, '-', JE_AC_ID) AS AINO_AIIMID_JEACID, AI_NO, AI_DATE,
AI_IM_ID, JE_AC_ID, JE_ENTERED_DR From AR_UE_MSTR
WHERE ENTRYTYPEID = 2 
AND CLOSE_FLAG IS NULL

CREATE VIEW AR_UE_MSTR_V AS 
SELECT DISTINCT 
                      TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.ENTRYTYPEID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.ENTRYNO, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_HEADER_ID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO, 
                      dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_DATE, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.VCHSTATUS, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_AC_ID, 
                      dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_DR, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_CR, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.CLOSE_FLAG, 
                      dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_VOUCHER_NO, dbo.AR_UE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION_E, dbo.AR_UE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID_UE, 
                      dbo.AR_UE_ELEMENTS.IM_DESCRIPTION_UE, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_PONO, 
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID, 
                      dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name
FROM         dbo.AR_UE_MSTR INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE ON dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO AND dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL ON dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_HEADER_ID = dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_HEADER_ID INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_UE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID = dbo.AR_UE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID_E INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID
ORDER BY dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_NO, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.AI_IM_ID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.ENTRYTYPEID, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.ENTRYNO, 
                      dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_DR, dbo.AR_UE_MSTR.JE_ENTERED_CR

CREATE VIEW dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_AO_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.PRODUCT, dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.PACKAGE_TYPE, 
                  dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.OBJECTID, dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.Amount, dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.CommissionValue, dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.InsuredBy, dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.CustomerName
FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_V LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID = dbo.CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS.Vehicle_Id

CREATE VIEW dbo.Bank_Master_v
AS
SELECT     dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_ID, dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_NAME, dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_AC_ID, 
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION AS BANK_GL_NAME
FROM         dbo.Bank_Master INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V
AS
SELECT        dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.COMBINATION_ID, dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT1, dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT2, dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT3, dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT4, 
                         dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.ACTIVE, 
                         dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT1 + '.' + dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT2 + '.' + dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT3 + '.' + dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT4 AS CODE_COMBINATION, 
                         LTRIM(dbo.Organizational_Unit.ORG_NAME) + '.' + LTRIM(dbo.COST_CENTER.CC_NAME) + '.' + LTRIM(dbo.NATURAL_ACCOUNT.NA_NAME) + '.' + LTRIM(dbo.SUB_ACCOUNT.SA_NAME) AS NAME_COMBINATION, 
                         dbo.NATURAL_ACCOUNT.NA_NAME, dbo.Organizational_Unit.ORG_NAME, dbo.COST_CENTER.CC_NAME, dbo.SUB_ACCOUNT.SA_NAME, dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.NoteID
FROM            dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION INNER JOIN
                         dbo.Organizational_Unit ON dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT1 = dbo.Organizational_Unit.ORG_ID INNER JOIN
                         dbo.COST_CENTER ON dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT2 = dbo.COST_CENTER.CC_ID INNER JOIN
                         dbo.NATURAL_ACCOUNT ON dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT3 = dbo.NATURAL_ACCOUNT.NA_ID INNER JOIN
                         dbo.SUB_ACCOUNT ON dbo.ACCOUNT_COMBINATION.SEGMENT4 = dbo.SUB_ACCOUNT.SA_ID

CREATE VIEW CRM_AR_INVOICE_AGT_AR_ORDER_V AS 
SELECT AO_NO,  MAX(AO_INV1_ID) AS INV1, MAX(AO_INV2_ID) AS INV2, MAX(AO_INV3_ID) 
                  AS INV3, MAX(AO_INV4_ID) AS INV4, MAX(AO_INV5_ID) AS INV5, MAX(AO_INV6_ID) AS INV6, MAX(AO_INV7_ID) AS INV7, MAX(AO_INV8_ID) AS INV8, MAX(AO_INV9_ID) AS INV9, MAX(AO_INV10_ID) AS INV10, MAX(AO_INV11_ID) AS INV11, 
                  MAX(AO_INV12_ID) AS INV12, MAX(AO_DATE) AS AO_DATE1, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 335 AS AO_DATE2, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 700 AS AO_DATE3, MAX(Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1065) AS AO_DATE4, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1430 AS AO_DATE5, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1795 AS AO_DATE6, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2160 AS AO_DATE7, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2525 AS AO_DATE8, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2890 AS AO_DATE9, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3255 AS AO_DATE10, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3620 AS AO_DATE11, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3985 AS AO_DATE12, AO_MAFD, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID, AO_VEHICLE_ID, Vehicle_EngineNo, Vehicle_ChasisNo,
				  Vehicle_RegistrationNo, CO_Company_Name
FROM     dbo.AR_ORDER_V
WHERE  (AO_DEACTIVE_DATE IS NULL) AND (AO_BookingCat = 'Yearly')
GROUP BY AO_NO, AO_MAFD, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, AO_MAFD_DATE, AO_CO_ID, AO_VEHICLE_ID, Vehicle_EngineNo, Vehicle_ChasisNo,
				  Vehicle_RegistrationNo, CO_Company_Name

/*select * from ar_invoice_v*/
CREATE VIEW dbo.CRM_AR_INVOICE_NOOFYEARS_V
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_CO_ID, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.CO_Company_Name, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.CustomerName, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV1, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV2, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV3, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV4, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV5, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV6, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV7, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV8, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV9, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV10, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV11, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.INV12, 
                  dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, (CASE WHEN AI_NO = INV1 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 
                  365 * 1, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV2 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 2, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV3 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 3, 
                  CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV4 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 4, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV5 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 5, CONVERT(DATETIME, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV6 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 6, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV7 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 7, CONVERT(DATETIME, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV8 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 8, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV9 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 9, CONVERT(DATETIME, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV10 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 10, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV11 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 11, CONVERT(DATETIME, 
                  Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) WHEN AI_NO = INV12 THEN DATEADD(DAY, 365 * 12, CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103)) ELSE CONVERT(DATETIME, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 103) END) AS Vehicle_Expiry_Date, 
                  dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.PRODUCT, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.PACKAGE_TYPE, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.FLEET_TYPE, (CASE WHEN INV1 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV2 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 
                  + (CASE WHEN INV3 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV4 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV5 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV6 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV7 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 
                  + (CASE WHEN INV8 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV9 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV10 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV11 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN INV12 > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) 
                  AS NoOfYears, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation AS AO_DATE1, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 335 AS AO_DATE2, 
                  dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 700 AS AO_DATE3, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1065 AS AO_DATE4, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1430 AS AO_DATE5, 
                  dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 1795 AS AO_DATE6, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2160 AS AO_DATE7, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2525 AS AO_DATE8, 
                  dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 2890 AS AO_DATE9, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3255 AS AO_DATE10, dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3620 AS AO_DATE11, 
                  dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation + 3985 AS AO_DATE12, dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_DOI
FROM     dbo.AR_INVOICE_V LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID = dbo.CRMVehiclesDetails_V.Vehicle_Id
WHERE  (dbo.AR_INVOICE_V.AO_BookingCat = 'Yearly')

CREATE VIEW CRM_AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS 
SELECT AAI.AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI.AAI_AI_DATE	AS AI_DATE, AAI.AAI_AI_AMOUNT AS AI_AMOUNT, 
AAI.AAI_APR_NO AS APR_NO, AAI.APR_DATE, AAI.AAI_ADJUST AS RECEIPT_AMT, AAI.AAI_CO_ID AS CO_ID, 
ACV.CO_COMPANY_NAME,
(select Distinct AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO from ar_invoice  where ar_invoice.ai_no= AAI.AAI_AI_NO) AS EngineNo, 
(select Distinct AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO from ar_invoice where ar_invoice.ai_no= AAI.AAI_AI_NO) AS CHASSISNo
From dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE_V AAI, dbo.AR_Companies_V ACV
WHERE AAI.AAI_CO_ID = ACV.CO_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.CRM_AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V
AS
SELECT DISTINCT 
                  AAI_AI_NO AS AI_NO, AAI_AI_DATE AS AIDATE, AAI_AI_AMOUNT AS AI_AMT, AAI_PEN_AMOUNT AS AI_ADJUST, CASE WHEN dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1.AO_VEHICLE_ID IS NOT NULL 
                  THEN dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1.AO_VEHICLE_ID ELSE
                      (SELECT DISTINCT MAX(VEHICLE_ID)
                       FROM      CRM_VEHICLESDETAILS CRM_V
                       WHERE   LTRIM(RTRIM(CRM_V.Vehicle_EngineNo)) = LTRIM(RTRIM(dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO))) END AS AO_VEHICLE_ID, AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
                  AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AAI_CO_ID, CO_Company_Name
FROM     dbo.AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V_1
WHERE  (AAI_PEN_AMOUNT > 0)

CREATE VIEW CRM_ATS_AUTO_PaymentReceiptPosted_V AS 
SELECT CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.VehicleId, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.Engine, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.Chassis, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.Amount, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.Mode, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.PaymentFor, 
                  CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.BankID, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.AI_NO, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.TaxDetails, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.NoOfTaxes, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.RefNo, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.LogTime, 
                  CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.PostingTime, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.PostedBy, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.DepositDate, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.ATS_Post_Date, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.ATS_Post, 
                  CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.TransID, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.CustomerId, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.AI_CO_ID, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.AI_Amount, CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.AI_Date, 
                  CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.APR_NO, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DATE, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_DESCRIPTION, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_CO_ID, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_BANK_ID, 
                  AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.BANK_NAME, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.CO_Company_Name
FROM     CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted INNER JOIN
                  AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V ON CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.APR_NO = AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V.APR_NO
WHERE CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.ATS_POST = 1

CREATE VIEW CRM_ATS_Payment_Receipt_Daily_Trans_V as
SELECT AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_LOG.APR_NO, AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_LOG.LOG_DATETIME_INSERT, AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V.AO_VEHICLE_ID, AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V.AO_VEH_ID
FROM AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_LOG INNER JOIN
AR_ADJUST_INVOICE ON AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_LOG.APR_NO = AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO INNER JOIN
AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V ON AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO = AR_INVOICE_DISTINCT_LIST_V.AI_NO

CREATE VIEW CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V AS 
SELECT dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID, 
                  dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_POST, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_GL, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_DATE, 
                  dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_ADJUST, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_vehicle_make, 
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, 
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.TransID AS CRM_TRANS_ID, dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_NAME, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, 
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.InsuredBy AS CRM_InsuredBy, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.CustomerName AS CRM_CustomerName, dbo.Data_Entry_LOG.LOG_DATETIME_INSERT, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Corporate 
FROM     dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO ON dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO = dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_NO INNER JOIN
                  dbo.Bank_Master ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID = dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.Data_Entry_LOG ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.Data_Entry_LOG.VCH_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted ON dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO = dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.AI_NO AND dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.APR_NO AND 
                  dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO = dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.APR_NO
WHERE  (dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel IS NULL) AND (dbo.Data_Entry_LOG.VCH_TYPE = 'AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT' OR
                  dbo.Data_Entry_LOG.VCH_TYPE IS NULL)

CREATE VIEW dbo.CRM_ATS_PAYMENT_RECEIPT_V_1
AS
SELECT        dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID, 
                         dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_POST, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_GL, dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_DATE, 
                         dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_PEN_AMOUNT, dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_ADJUST, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_vehicle_make, 
                         dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_DOI, 
                         dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.TransID AS CRM_TRANS_ID, dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_NAME, dbo.AR_Companies.CO_Company_Name, 
                         dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.InsuredBy AS CRM_InsuredBy, dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.CustomerName AS CRM_CustomerName
FROM            dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                         dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO INNER JOIN
                         dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO ON dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO = dbo.AR_VEHICLE_INFO.AI_NO INNER JOIN
                         dbo.Bank_Master ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_BANK_ID = dbo.Bank_Master.BANK_ID INNER JOIN
                         dbo.AR_Companies ON dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_CO_ID = dbo.AR_Companies.CO_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                         dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted ON dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_AI_NO = dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.AI_NO AND dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO = dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.APR_NO AND 
                         dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE.AAI_APR_NO = dbo.CRM_PaymentReceiptPosted.APR_NO
WHERE        (dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_Cancel IS NULL)

--Customer Aging
--==============
CREATE VIEW CUSTOMER_AGING_V
AS
SELECT     AAI_CO_ID,
    CO_Company_Name, 
    CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN '0 - 30'
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN '31 - 60'
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN '61 - 90'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN '91 - 120'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 150 THEN '121 - 150'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 180 THEN '151 - 180'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN '181 - 210'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN '211 - 240'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 270 THEN '241 - 270'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 300 THEN '271 - 300'
        ELSE '301 +'
    END AS AgingBucket,
     --  Add sort order
    CASE 
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN 1
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN 2
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN 3
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN 4
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 150 THEN 5
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 180 THEN 6
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN 7
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN 8
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 270 THEN 9
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 300 THEN 10
        ELSE 11
    END AS SortOrder,

    COUNT(*) AS InvoiceCount,
    SUM(AI_ADJUST) AS TotalAdjusted
FROM CRM_AR_PENDING_INVOICES_V
WHERE 
    AIDATE BETWEEN '2024-07-01' AND '2026-01-31'
    AND AI_ADJUST > 0
GROUP BY AAI_CO_ID,
    CO_Company_Name, 
    CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN '0 - 30'
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN '31 - 60'
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN '61 - 90'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN '91 - 120'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 150 THEN '121 - 150'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 180 THEN '151 - 180'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN '181 - 210'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN '211 - 240'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 270 THEN '241 - 270'
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 300 THEN '271 - 300'
        ELSE '301 +'
    END,
	 CASE 
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 0 AND 30 THEN 1
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 31 AND 60 THEN 2
        WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 61 AND 90 THEN 3
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 91 AND 120 THEN 4
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 121 AND 150 THEN 5
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 151 AND 180 THEN 6
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 181 AND 210 THEN 7
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 211 AND 240 THEN 8
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 241 AND 270 THEN 9
		WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY, AIDATE, GETDATE()) BETWEEN 271 AND 300 THEN 10
        ELSE 11
    END 
--ORDER BY SortOrder

              dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_LINE_ID,

CREATE VIEW dbo.INV_BOM_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.INV_BOM.IB_ID, dbo.INV_BOM.FIN_ITEM_ID, dbo.INV_BOM.RAW_ITEM, dbo.INV_BOM.QTY, dbo.INV_ITEM.product_name
FROM         dbo.INV_BOM INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM ON dbo.INV_BOM.RAW_ITEM = dbo.INV_ITEM.product_id

CREATE VIEW dbo.INV_Configuration_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.INV_Configuration.Config_No, dbo.INV_Configuration.Config_Date, dbo.INV_Configuration.Remarks, dbo.INV_Configuration.D_Product_ID, 
                      dbo.INV_ITEM.product_name AS D_Product_Name, dbo.INV_Configuration.Serial_No, dbo.INV_Configuration.S_Product_ID, 
                      INV_ITEM_1.product_name AS S_Product_Name, dbo.INV_Configuration.Voice_No, dbo.INV_Configuration.TGDID, dbo.INV_LOCATION.GDNAME, 
                      dbo.INV_Configuration.SeqNo, dbo.INV_Configuration.TGDID AS Expr1
FROM         dbo.INV_Configuration LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM ON dbo.INV_Configuration.D_Product_ID = dbo.INV_ITEM.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM_1 ON dbo.INV_Configuration.S_Product_ID = INV_ITEM_1.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_LOCATION ON dbo.INV_Configuration.TGDID = dbo.INV_LOCATION.GDID

CREATE VIEW dbo.INV_Entry_Harness_Bal_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.INV_ENTRY.JV_NO, dbo.INV_ENTRY.TYPE, dbo.INV_ENTRY.DATE, dbo.INV_ENTRY.REMARKS, dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM, INV_ITEM_2.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM_2.Type AS Status, ' ' AS Serial_No, ' ' AS Voice_No, dbo.INV_ENTRY.QTY AS BalQty, dbo.INV_ENTRY.TGDID, dbo.INV_ENTRY.FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM_2 ON dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM = INV_ITEM_2.product_id
WHERE     (dbo.INV_ENTRY.TYPE = 'RPR')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_1.JV_NO, INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE, INV_ENTRY_1.DATE, INV_ENTRY_1.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM, INV_ITEM_1.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM_1.Type AS Status, ' ' AS Serial_No, ' ' AS Voice_No, INV_ENTRY_1.QTY * - 1 AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_1.TGDID, INV_ENTRY_1.FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM_1 ON INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM = INV_ITEM_1.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE = 'IPR')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_1.JV_NO, INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE, INV_ENTRY_1.DATE, INV_ENTRY_1.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM, INV_ITEM_1.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM_1.Type AS Status, INV_ENTRY_1.Item_Serial_Voice_No AS Serial_No, ' ' AS Voice_No, INV_ENTRY_1.QTY AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_1.TGDID, 
                      INV_ENTRY_1.FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM_1 ON INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM = INV_ITEM_1.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE = 'RPD')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_1.JV_NO, 'RPD1' AS Type, INV_ENTRY_1.DATE, INV_ENTRY_1.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM, INV_ITEM_1.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM_1.Type AS Status, INV_ENTRY_1.Item_Serial_Voice_No AS Serial_No, ' ' AS Voice_No, INV_ENTRY_1.QTY AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_1.TGDID, 
                      INV_ENTRY_1.FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM_1 ON INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM = INV_ITEM_1.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE = 'RPD') AND (INV_ENTRY_1.Item_Serial_Voice_No NOT IN
                          (SELECT     Serial_No
                            FROM          dbo.INV_Configuration))
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_1.JV_NO, INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE, INV_ENTRY_1.DATE, INV_ENTRY_1.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM, INV_ITEM_1.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM_1.Type AS Status, ' ' AS Serial_No, INV_ENTRY_1.Item_Serial_Voice_No AS Voice_No, INV_ENTRY_1.QTY AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_1.TGDID, 
                      INV_ENTRY_1.FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM_1 ON INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM = INV_ITEM_1.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE = 'RPS')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_4.JV_NO, INV_ENTRY_4.TYPE, INV_ENTRY_4.DATE, INV_ENTRY_4.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_4.ITEM, INV_ITEM.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM.Type AS Status, INV_ENTRY_4.SerialNo, INV_ENTRY_4.VoiceNo, INV_ENTRY_4.QTY * - 1 AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_4.FGDID, 
                      INV_ENTRY_4.TGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_4 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM ON INV_ENTRY_4.ITEM = INV_ITEM.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_4.TYPE = 'IPL')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_4.JV_NO, INV_ENTRY_4.TYPE, INV_ENTRY_4.DATE, INV_ENTRY_4.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_4.ITEM, INV_ITEM.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM.Type AS Status, INV_ENTRY_4.SerialNo, INV_ENTRY_4.VoiceNo, INV_ENTRY_4.QTY * - 1 AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_4.FGDID, 
                      INV_ENTRY_4.TGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_4 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM ON INV_ENTRY_4.ITEM = INV_ITEM.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_4.TYPE = 'IPI')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_3.JV_NO, INV_ENTRY_3.TYPE, INV_ENTRY_3.DATE, INV_ENTRY_3.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_3.ITEM, INV_ITEM.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM.Type AS Status, INV_ENTRY_3.SerialNo, INV_ENTRY_3.VoiceNo, INV_ENTRY_3.QTY AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_3.TGDID, 
                      INV_ENTRY_3.FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_3 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM ON INV_ENTRY_3.ITEM = INV_ITEM.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_3.TYPE = 'IPL')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_ENTRY_1.JV_NO, INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE, INV_ENTRY_1.DATE, INV_ENTRY_1.REMARKS, INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM, INV_ITEM_1.product_name, 
                      INV_ITEM_1.Type AS Status, ' ' AS Serial_No, ' ' AS voice_No, INV_ENTRY_1.QTY AS BalQty, INV_ENTRY_1.TGDID, INV_ENTRY_1.FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_1 INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM AS INV_ITEM_1 ON INV_ENTRY_1.ITEM = INV_ITEM_1.product_id
WHERE     (INV_ENTRY_1.TYPE = 'RPH')
UNION ALL
SELECT     INV_Configuration_2.Config_No AS Jv_No, 'CFG' AS Expr1, INV_Configuration_2.Config_Date AS Date, INV_Configuration_2.Remarks, 
                      INV_Configuration_2.D_Product_ID, b.product_name, b.Type AS Status, INV_Configuration_2.Serial_No, INV_Configuration_2.Voice_No, 1 AS BalQty, 
                      INV_Configuration_2.TGDID, '' AS FGDID
FROM         dbo.INV_ITEM AS b INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_Configuration AS INV_Configuration_2 ON b.product_id = INV_Configuration_2.D_Product_ID
WHERE     (INV_Configuration_2.Serial_No NOT IN
                          (SELECT     SerialNo
                            FROM          dbo.INV_ENTRY AS INV_ENTRY_2
                            WHERE      (TYPE = 'IPL')))

CREATE VIEW dbo.inv_entry_v
AS
SELECT     dbo.INV_ENTRY.IE_ID, dbo.INV_ENTRY.JV_NO, dbo.INV_ENTRY.TYPE, dbo.INV_ENTRY.DATE, dbo.INV_ENTRY.IE_TYPE, dbo.INV_ENTRY.CO_ID, 
                      dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_Supplier_Name, dbo.INV_ENTRY.REMARKS, dbo.INV_ENTRY.HarRcpt, dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM, dbo.INV_ITEM.product_name, 
                      dbo.INV_ENTRY.Item_Type, dbo.INV_ENTRY.Item_Serial_Voice_No, dbo.INV_ENTRY.RecDate, dbo.INV_ENTRY.Status, dbo.INV_ENTRY.QTY, 
                      dbo.INV_ENTRY.Others, dbo.INV_ENTRY.TGDID, dbo.INV_ENTRY.FGDID, dbo.INV_ENTRY.SeqNo, dbo.INV_ENTRY.SerialNo, dbo.INV_ENTRY.VoiceNo, 
                      dbo.INV_LOCATION.GDNAME AS LocationTo, INV_LOCATION_1.GDNAME AS LocationFr, dbo.INV_ENTRY.ReceiverName, 
                      dbo.INV_ENTRY.RegistrationNo, dbo.INV_ENTRY.EngineNo, dbo.INV_ENTRY.ChasisNo, dbo.INV_ENTRY.ModelNo
FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_LOCATION AS INV_LOCATION_1 ON dbo.INV_ENTRY.FGDID = INV_LOCATION_1.GDID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_LOCATION ON dbo.INV_ENTRY.TGDID = dbo.INV_LOCATION.GDID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM ON dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM = dbo.INV_ITEM.product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.AP_SUPPLIER ON dbo.INV_ENTRY.CO_ID = dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.INV_ITEM_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.INV_ITEM.product_id, dbo.INV_ITEM.product_name, dbo.INV_ITEM.product_um, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, 
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.INV_ITEM.Type
FROM         dbo.INV_ITEM INNER JOIN
                      dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.INV_ITEM.product_ac_id = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID

CREATE VIEW dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN_V
AS
SELECT     dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN.ILIO, dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN.GDID, dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN.ITEM, dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN.OP_BAL_Q, 
                      dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN.OP_RATE, dbo.INV_ITEM_V.product_name
FROM         dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ITEM_V ON dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN.ITEM = dbo.INV_ITEM_V.product_id

CREATE VIEW dbo.INV_Pending_Device_Configuration
AS
SELECT     dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM, b.product_name, dbo.INV_ENTRY.Item_Serial_Voice_No
FROM         dbo.INV_ITEM AS b INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ENTRY ON b.product_id = dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM
WHERE     (dbo.INV_ENTRY.Item_Serial_Voice_No NOT IN
                          (SELECT     Serial_No
                            FROM          dbo.INV_Configuration)) AND (dbo.INV_ENTRY.TYPE = 'RPD')

create view INV_Pending_SIM_Configuration_V as 
SELECT     dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM, b.product_name, dbo.INV_ENTRY.Item_Serial_Voice_No
FROM         dbo.INV_ITEM AS b INNER JOIN
                      dbo.INV_ENTRY ON b.product_id = dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM
WHERE     (dbo.INV_ENTRY.Item_Serial_Voice_No NOT IN
                          (SELECT     Voice_No
                            FROM          dbo.INV_Configuration)) AND (dbo.INV_ENTRY.TYPE = 'RPS')

CREATE VIEW dbo.INV_STOCK_DATA_V
AS
SELECT     GDID AS FGDID, ITEM, '2009-01-01' AS [Date], OP_BAL_Q AS RP_QTY, 0 AS IS_QTY
FROM         dbo.INV_LOC_ITEM_OPEN
UNION ALL
(SELECT     FGDID, ITEM, [DATE], QTY AS RP_QTY, 0 AS IS_QTY
 FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY
 WHERE     (TYPE = 'RPS')
UNION ALL
(SELECT     FGDID, ITEM, [DATE], 0 AS RP_QTY, QTY AS IS_QTY
 FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY
 WHERE     (TYPE = 'IPS')
UNION ALL
(SELECT     '002' AS FGDID, dbo.INV_BOM.RAW_ITEM, dbo.INV_ENTRY.[DATE], 0 AS RP_QTY, dbo.INV_BOM.QTY * dbo.INV_ENTRY.QTY AS IS_QTY
 FROM         dbo.INV_BOM INNER JOIN
                        dbo.INV_ENTRY ON dbo.INV_BOM.FIN_ITEM_ID = dbo.INV_ENTRY.ITEM
 WHERE     (dbo.INV_ENTRY.TYPE = 'RPS') AND (dbo.INV_ENTRY.IE_TYPE = 'Finished Product')
UNION ALL
(SELECT     TGDID AS FGDID, ITEM, [DATE], QTY AS RP_QTY, 0 AS IS_QTY
 FROM         dbo.INV_ENTRY
 WHERE     (TYPE = 'IPS')))))

create view INV_Stock_Ledger_V as 
SELECT     JV_NO, TYPE, Status, DATE, REMARKS, ITEM, product_name, Serial_No, Voice_No, TGDID, FGDID, BalQty AS Rcpt, 0 AS Issue
FROM         dbo.INV_Entry_Harness_Bal_V
WHERE     (BalQty > 0)
UNION ALL
SELECT     JV_NO, TYPE, Status, DATE, REMARKS, ITEM, product_name, Serial_No, Voice_No, TGDID, FGDID, 0 AS Rcpt, ABS(BalQty) AS Issue
FROM         dbo.INV_Entry_Harness_Bal_V AS INV_Entry_Harness_Bal_V_1
WHERE     (BalQty < 0)

CREATE VIEW INVOICES 
AS
SELECT     AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_CO_ID, SUM(CASE AI_IM_ID WHEN 1 THEN (AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * 6) / 100) WHEN 2 THEN (AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * 19.5) 
                      / 100) WHEN 3 THEN (AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * 16) / 100) WHEN 4 THEN (AI_AMOUNT + (AI_AMOUNT * 16) / 100) ELSE AI_AMOUNT END) AS AMOUNT, 
                      AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, AI_CUSTOMER_NAME
FROM         ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE AS C
WHERE     (AI_CANCEL IS NULL) AND (AI_NO =
                          (SELECT     TOP (1) AI_NO
                            FROM         ATS_GL.dbo.AR_INVOICE AS B
                            WHERE      (B.AI_AO_NO = C.AI_AO_NO) AND (B.AI_CO_ID = C.AI_CO_ID)
                            ORDER BY B.AI_DATE DESC))
GROUP BY AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_AO_NO, AI_CO_ID, AI_vehicle_make, AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, 
                      AI_CUSTOMER_NAME

CREATE VIEW dbo.je_detail_v
AS
SELECT dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_HEADER_ID, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_VOUCHER_NO, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_DESCRIPTION, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_TYPE, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_POST_FLAG, 
                  dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_CREATED_BY, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_CREATED_DATE, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_UPDATED_BY, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_UPDATED_DATE, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_NAME, 
                  dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_LINE_ID, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_AC_ID, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_ENTERED_DR, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_ENTERED_CR, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, 
                  dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_DATE
FROM     dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL ON dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_HEADER_ID = dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_HEADER_ID
WHERE  (dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_TYPE <> 'Adjust UE')

/*WHERE        (dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_TYPE <> 'Adjust UE')*/

AS

                  dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_CREATED_BY, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_CREATED_DATE, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_UPDATED_BY, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_UPDATED_DATE, dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_NAME, 
                  dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_LINE_ID, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_AC_ID, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_ENTERED_DR, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_ENTERED_CR, dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, 
                  dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_DATE
FROM     dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL INNER JOIN
                  dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL ON dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_HEADER_ID = dbo.GL_JE_LINES_ALL.JE_HEADER_ID
WHERE  (dbo.GL_JE_HEADER_ALL.JE_TYPE <> 'Adjust UE1')

create view JE_EXP_DETAIL_UnPosted_V as
SELECT AI_NO, AI_DATE, AI_REMARKS, AI_AMOUNT,
 MONTH(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) AS MNTH, 
YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) AS YR, FORMAT(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') AS YR_MNTH, FORMAT(CAST(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE AS DATE), 'MMMM') AS MnthName,
CASE WHEN MONTH(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-07-01' AS DATE) ELSE CAST(CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-07-01' AS DATE) END AS FY_SDT, 
CASE WHEN MONTH(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-06-30' AS DATE) ELSE CAST(CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-06-30' AS DATE) 
END AS FY_EDT, CASE WHEN MONTH(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) 
END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(AP_INVOICE_V.AI_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) END AS FY_Period, 

CODE_COMBINATION, NA_NAME, ORG_NAME 
FROM AP_INVOICE_V 
WHERE AI_INV_GL IS NULL
AND (SUBSTRING(CODE_COMBINATION, 10,1) = '6')
--ORDER BY AI_DATE

CREATE VIEW JE_EXP_DETAIL_V AS
SELECT        dbo.je_detail_v.JE_HEADER_ID, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_VOUCHER_NO, CAST(dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DATE AS DATE) AS JE_DATE, MONTH(dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DATE) AS MNTH, YEAR(dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DATE) AS YR, FORMAT(dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') AS YR_MNTH, 
                         FORMAT(CAST(dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DATE AS DATE), 'MMMM') AS MnthName, CASE WHEN MONTH(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-07-01' AS DATE) 
                         ELSE CAST(CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-07-01' AS DATE) END AS FY_SDT, CASE WHEN MONTH(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                         + '-06-30' AS DATE) ELSE CAST(CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) + '-06-30' AS DATE) END AS FY_EDT, CASE WHEN MONTH(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
                         ELSE CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) - 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) END + '-' + CASE WHEN MONTH(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) >= 7 THEN CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) + 1 AS VARCHAR(4)) ELSE CAST(YEAR(je_detail_v.JE_DATE) 
                         AS VARCHAR(4)) END AS FY_Period, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_AC_ID, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME, 
                         dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.ORG_NAME, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DESCRIPTION, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_ENTERED_DR, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_ENTERED_CR
FROM            dbo.je_detail_v INNER JOIN
                         dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V ON dbo.je_detail_v.JE_AC_ID = dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.COMBINATION_ID
WHERE        (LEFT(dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT3, 1) = '6')

create view JV_Detail_KJN_080921 AS SELECT
A.JE_HEADER_ID, 
A.JE_VOUCHER_NO, 
replace(replace(A.JE_DESCRIPTION, char(10), ''), char(13), '') AS JE_DESCRIPTION_1, 
replace(replace(A.JE_TYPE, char(10), ''), char(13), '') AS JE_TYPE_1, 
A.JE_POST_FLAG, 
A.JE_CREATED_BY, 
A.JE_CREATED_DATE, 
A.JE_UPDATED_BY, 
A.JE_UPDATED_DATE, 
replace(replace(A.JE_NAME, char(10), ''), char(13), '') AS JE_NAME_1, 
A.JE_LINE_ID, 
A.JE_AC_ID, 
A.JE_ENTERED_DR, 
A.JE_ENTERED_CR, 
replace(replace(A.JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, char(10), ''), char(13), '') AS JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE_1, 
A.JE_DATE, 
B.CODE_COMBINATION, 
replace(replace(B.NAME_COMBINATION, char(10), ''), char(13), '') AS Account_Descr_1, 
replace(replace(B.NA_NAME, char(10), ''), char(13), '') AS NA_NAME_1
FROM je_detail_v A, CODE_COMBINATION_V B
WHERE A.JE_AC_ID = B.COMBINATION_ID
and  a.JE_Date between '2020-01-01' and '2020-01-01'

CREATE VIEW KJN001 AS

                  Vehicle_TrackingPassword, Vehicle_TrackingAverageKmPerDay, Vehicle_TrackingSpecialInstructions, Vehicle_DeviceSerial, Vehicle_SIM, Vehicle_SalesPersonName, Vehicle_SalesCode, Vehicle_IMEINo, Vehicle_SalesOk, 
                  Vehicle_CICOk, Vehicle_DataCenterOk, Vehicle_SecurityOk, Vehicle_CallCenterOk, Vehicle_FinanceOk, Vehicle_AgreementDate, Vehicle_AgreementFiePath, CONVERT(datetime, Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, 105) 
                  AS Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, Vehicle_BonnetLock, Vehicle_MName, Vehicle_Installation_location, Vehicle_PONo, Vehicle_Technician, FirstInstallment, SecInstallment, ThirdInstallment, ForthInstallment, FifthInstallment, SixthInstallment, 
                  LNL, Vehicle_Policy, First_DueDate, Second_DueDate, Third_DueDate, Forth_DueDate, Fifth_DueDate, Sixth_DueDate, First_Closing, Sec_Closing, Third_Closing, Forth_Closing, Fifth_Closing, Sixth_Closing, Vehicle_Device, 
                  CustomerName, Address1, Address2, TelephoneNo, CellNo, vehid, NIC, InsuredBy, [Product Segment] AS PRODUCT, [Corporate Id] AS CORPORATE_ID, B_ID, [Package Type] AS PACKAGE_TYPE, FLEET_TYPE, BRANCH_NAME,
				   PO_SPECIAL_INSTRUCTIONS, OBJECTID, Amount, CommissionValue

CREATE VIEW  ORDERS
AS
SELECT     AO_NO, AO_DATE, AO_DESCRIPTION, AO_CO_ID, AO_VEHICLE_ID, SUM(Price1) AS Price, SUM(CASE AO_IM_ID WHEN 1 THEN (Price1 + (Price1 * 6) / 100) 
                      WHEN 2 THEN (Price1 + (Price1 * 19.5) / 100) WHEN 3 THEN (Price1 + (Price1 * 16) / 100) WHEN 4 THEN (Price1 + (Price1 * 16) / 100) ELSE Price1 END) AS Tax_Price, 
                      PRICE2, PRICE3, PRICE4, PRICE5
FROM         (SELECT     AO_NO, AO_DATE, AO_DESCRIPTION, AO_CO_ID, AO_VEHICLE_ID, AO_IM_ID, AO_PRICE1 AS Price1, AO_PRICE2 AS PRICE2, AO_PRICE3 AS PRICE3, 
                                              AO_PRICE4 AS PRICE4, AO_PRICE5 AS PRICE5
                       FROM          ATS_GL.dbo.AR_ORDER
                       WHERE      (AO_DEACTIVE_DATE IS NULL)) AS O
GROUP BY AO_NO, AO_DATE, AO_DESCRIPTION, AO_CO_ID, AO_VEHICLE_ID, PRICE2, PRICE3, PRICE4, PRICE5

WHERE     (AV_DD_ID IS NULL) AND (AV_PD_ID IS NULL)

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[PI_INVOICE_V]
AS
SELECT dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_NO, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_DATE, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_PAY_TO, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_REMARKS, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_SUPPLIER_REF, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AS_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_Supplier_Name, 
                  dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_AC_ID, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_strno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ntnno, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_address, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_Item_Combination_ID, dbo.INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, dbo.INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr, 
                  dbo.INV_Item_Mstr.IC_AC_ID, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_RMKS, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_QTY, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_RATE, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AMOUNT, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_GST, dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_DESCRIPTION AS PI_GST_TD_DESCR, 
                  dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_AC_ID AS PI_GST_TD_AC_ID, dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_AGE AS PI_GST_TD_AGE, CASE WHEN (dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_AGE > 0) THEN ((dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AMOUNT * dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_AGE) / 100) 
                  ELSE 0 END AS PI_GST_AMT, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AST, TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_DESCRIPTION AS PI_AST_TD_DESCR, TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_AC_ID AS PI_AST_TD_AC_ID, TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_AGE AS PI_AST_TD_AGE, 
                  CASE WHEN (TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_AGE > 0) THEN ((dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AMOUNT * TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_AGE) / 100) ELSE 0 END AS PI_AST_AMT, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AMOUNT + (CASE WHEN (dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_AGE > 0) 
                  THEN ((dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AMOUNT * dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_AGE) / 100) ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN (TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_AGE > 0) THEN ((dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AMOUNT * TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_AGE) / 100) ELSE 0 END) AS PI_NET_AMOUNT, 
                  dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_TYPE, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_POST, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_CANCEL, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_CANCEL_DATE, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_INV_GL, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_CAN_GL, dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_Pur_Type
FROM     dbo.PI_INVOICE INNER JOIN
                  dbo.INV_Item_Mstr ON dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_Item_Combination_ID = dbo.INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Combination_ID INNER JOIN
                  dbo.AP_SUPPLIER ON dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AS_ID = dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_DETAIL ON dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_GST = dbo.TAX_DETAIL.TD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN
                  dbo.TAX_DETAIL AS TAX_DETAIL_1 ON dbo.PI_INVOICE.PI_AST = TAX_DETAIL_1.TD_ID

create view [dbo].[PI_ISSUANCE_Diag_V] as SELECT dbo.PI_Issuance_Diag.IDSRM_No, dbo.PI_Issuance_Diag.IDSRM_Date, dbo.PI_Issuance_Diag.Item_Type, dbo.PI_Issuance_Diag.IDSRM_Remarks, dbo.PI_Issuance_Diag.PI_Item_Combination_ID, dbo.INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Code, dbo.INV_Item_Mstr.Item_Descr,

CREATE VIEW dbo.PRE_LEDGER_V
AS
SELECT        dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DATE, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_AC_ID, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT1, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT2, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT3, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.SEGMENT4, 
                         dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.CODE_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NAME_COMBINATION, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NA_NAME, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_ENTERED_DR, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_ENTERED_CR, 
                         dbo.je_detail_v.JE_DESCRIPTION_LINE, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_VOUCHER_NO, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_NAME, dbo.je_detail_v.JE_LINE_ID, dbo.CODE_COMBINATION_V.NoteID

Create View VW_ALL_Vehicles
as
SELECT     '' AS Expr1, tblCompanies.Company_Name,tblCustomerDetails.Insurance_Branch ,
 tblCompanies.Company_Branch, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo,
                       tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_EngineNo, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_ChasisNo, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_PONo, tblCompanies.Company_Id, 
                      tblCompanies.Company_Type, tblCompanies.CustomerTypeId, tblVehiclesDetails.PackageID, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Installation_location, 
                      tblRemoval.Rdate AS Removal_Date, tblVehiclesDetails.vehid, dbo.VW_MIS.AO_DATE, dbo.VW_MIS.Ord_Amt, dbo.VW_MIS.AI_DATE, dbo.VW_MIS.AMOUNT, 
                      dbo.VW_MIS.Inv_Amt, dbo.VW_MIS.APR_DATE, dbo.VW_MIS.Rec_Amt, tblCodeRed.IncedientDateTime, tblCodeRed.RecoverDateTime, tblRemoval.TestingDate, 
                      UPPER(tblCustomerDetails.CustomerName) AS CustomerName, tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId, tblRemoval.DeviceNo, tblRemoval.RemovalStatus, 
                      dbo.VW_RI.EntryDate, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Lessee AS Bank, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Model, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Make, 
                      tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_InsuranceValue, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DeviceSerial, tblDeactivate.VehicleNo AS DeactivateVRN, 
                      CASE JPS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE 'No' END AS JPS_STATUS, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Device, dbo.VW_SPs.AName, dbo.VW_RI.Status, 
                      tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_SIM, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Year, tblCustomerDetails.NIC  , lkptCustomerType.NewName
FROM				  [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblCompanies] AS tblCompanies INNER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblCustomerDetails] AS tblCustomerDetails ON tblCompanies.Company_Id = tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id INNER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblVehiclesDetails] AS tblVehiclesDetails ON tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId = tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId LEFT OUTER JOIN
					  [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[lkptCustomerType] AS lkptCustomerType ON  lkptCustomerType.CustomerTypeId = tblCustomerDetails.CustomerTypeId LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.VW_SPs ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_SalesPersonName = dbo.VW_SPs.AName LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.VW_RI ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo = dbo.VW_RI.VehicleNo LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.VW_MIS ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_EngineNo = dbo.VW_MIS.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblCodeRed] AS tblCodeRed ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo = tblCodeRed.RegNo LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblRemoval] AS tblRemoval ON tblRemoval.VehicleNo = tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblDeactivate] AS tblDeactivate ON tblDeactivate.VehicleNo = tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo

create view VW_ALL_Vehicles
as
SELECT     '' AS Expr1, tblCompanies.Company_Name, tblCompanies.Company_Branch,tblCustomerDetails.Insurance_Branch , tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo,
                      tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_EngineNo, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_ChasisNo, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_PONo, tblCompanies.Company_Id, 
                      tblCompanies.Company_Type, tblCompanies.CustomerTypeId, tblVehiclesDetails.PackageID, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Installation_location, 
                      tblRemoval.Rdate AS Removal_Date, tblVehiclesDetails.vehid, dbo.VW_MIS.AO_DATE, dbo.VW_MIS.Ord_Amt, dbo.VW_MIS.AI_DATE, dbo.VW_MIS.AMOUNT, 
                      dbo.VW_MIS.Inv_Amt, dbo.VW_MIS.APR_DATE, dbo.VW_MIS.Rec_Amt, tblCodeRed.IncedientDateTime, tblCodeRed.RecoverDateTime, tblRemoval.TestingDate, 
                      UPPER(tblCustomerDetails.CustomerName) AS CustomerName, tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId, tblRemoval.DeviceNo, tblRemoval.RemovalStatus, 
                      dbo.VW_RI.EntryDate, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Lessee AS Bank, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Model, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Make, 
                      tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_InsuranceValue, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_DeviceSerial, tblDeactivate.VehicleNo AS DeactivateVRN, 
                      CASE JPS WHEN 1 THEN 'Yes' WHEN 0 THEN 'No' ELSE 'No' END AS JPS_STATUS, tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_Device, dbo.VW_SPs.AName, dbo.VW_RI.Status, 
                      tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_SIM
FROM         [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblCompanies] AS tblCompanies INNER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblCustomerDetails] AS tblCustomerDetails ON tblCompanies.Company_Id = tblCustomerDetails.Company_Id INNER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblVehiclesDetails] AS tblVehiclesDetails ON tblCustomerDetails.CustomerId = tblVehiclesDetails.CustomerId LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.VW_SPs ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_SalesPersonName = dbo.VW_SPs.AName LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.VW_RI ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo = dbo.VW_RI.VehicleNo LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.VW_MIS ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_EngineNo = dbo.VW_MIS.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblCodeRed] AS tblCodeRed ON tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo = tblCodeRed.RegNo LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblRemoval] AS tblRemoval ON tblRemoval.VehicleNo = tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblDeactivate] AS tblDeactivate ON tblDeactivate.VehicleNo = tblVehiclesDetails.Vehicle_RegistrationNo

CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_AP_Payments
AS
SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_NO, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DATE, dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION, 
                      dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_PAYMENT_AMOUNT, dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_Supplier_Name
FROM         dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AP_SUPPLIER ON dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_AS_ID = dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_ID
WHERE     (dbo.AP_SUPPLIER.AS_Supplier_Name = 'TELTONIKA PAKISTAN PRIVATE LIMITED')
ORDER BY dbo.AP_PAYMENT_RECEIPT.APR_DESCRIPTION

CREATE VIEW dbo.VW_InvoiceWithTax
AS
SELECT     TOP (100) PERCENT dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_DATE, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, 
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_AMOUNT, dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_DESCRIPTION
FROM         dbo.TAX_MASTER INNER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS ON dbo.TAX_MASTER.TM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_TM_ID RIGHT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.AR_INVOICE ON dbo.AR_INVOICE_ELEMENTS.IM_ID = dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_IM_ID
WHERE     (dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = 20675)
ORDER BY dbo.AR_INVOICE.AI_NO

CREATE VIEW VW_MIS
AS

SELECT     dbo.ORDERS.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.ORDERS.AO_NO, dbo.ORDERS.AO_DATE, dbo.ORDERS.Price AS PriceWithoutTax, dbo.ORDERS.Tax_Price AS Ord_Amt, 
                      dbo.INVOICES.AI_DATE, dbo.INVOICES.AMOUNT, AAI.AAI_AI_AMOUNT AS Inv_Amt, APR.APR_DATE, SUM(APR.APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT) AS Rec_Amt, 
                      dbo.INVOICES.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, 
                      dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.INVOICES.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, dbo.INVOICES.AI_NO, APR.APR_NO
FROM         ATS_GL.dbo.AR_ADJUST_INVOICE AS AAI INNER JOIN
                      ATS_GL.dbo.AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT AS APR ON AAI.AAI_APR_NO = APR.APR_NO RIGHT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.INVOICES ON AAI.AAI_AI_NO = dbo.INVOICES.AI_NO RIGHT OUTER JOIN
                      dbo.ORDERS ON dbo.INVOICES.AI_AO_NO = dbo.ORDERS.AO_NO
GROUP BY dbo.ORDERS.AO_VEHICLE_ID, dbo.ORDERS.AO_NO, dbo.ORDERS.AO_DATE, dbo.ORDERS.Price, dbo.ORDERS.Tax_Price, dbo.INVOICES.AI_DATE, 
                      dbo.INVOICES.AMOUNT, AAI.AAI_AI_AMOUNT, APR.APR_DATE, dbo.INVOICES.AI_vehicle_make, dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_MODEL, 
                      dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO, dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_CHASISNO, dbo.INVOICES.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO, dbo.INVOICES.AI_CUSTOMER_NAME, 
                      dbo.INVOICES.AI_NO, APR.APR_NO

CREATE VIEW VW_RI
As
SELECT     IntimationID, VehicleNo, Reason, EntryUser, EntryDate, Status, Revert_Comments, Revert_By, Revert_On
FROM          [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblRemovalIntimation] tblRemovalIntimation
WHERE     (NOT (VehicleNo IN
                          (SELECT     VehicleNo
                            FROM     [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblRemoval] tblRemoval)))

CREATE VIEW VW_SPs
AS

SELECT     UPPER(Name) AS AName
FROM       [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblDealerMOAgents] AS da
WHERE     (Type_ID = 3)

CREATE FUNCTION dbo.fn_diagramobjects() 
	RETURNS int
	WITH EXECUTE AS N'dbo'
	AS
	BEGIN
		declare @id_upgraddiagrams		int
		declare @id_sysdiagrams			int
		declare @id_helpdiagrams		int
		declare @id_helpdiagramdefinition	int
		declare @id_creatediagram	int
		declare @id_renamediagram	int
		declare @id_alterdiagram 	int 
		declare @id_dropdiagram		int
		declare @InstalledObjects	int

		select @InstalledObjects = 0

		select 	@id_upgraddiagrams = object_id(N'dbo.sp_upgraddiagrams'),
			@id_sysdiagrams = object_id(N'dbo.sysdiagrams'),
			@id_helpdiagrams = object_id(N'dbo.sp_helpdiagrams'),
			@id_helpdiagramdefinition = object_id(N'dbo.sp_helpdiagramdefinition'),
			@id_creatediagram = object_id(N'dbo.sp_creatediagram'),
			@id_renamediagram = object_id(N'dbo.sp_renamediagram'),
			@id_alterdiagram = object_id(N'dbo.sp_alterdiagram'), 
			@id_dropdiagram = object_id(N'dbo.sp_dropdiagram')

		if @id_upgraddiagrams is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 1
		if @id_sysdiagrams is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 2
		if @id_helpdiagrams is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 4
		if @id_helpdiagramdefinition is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 8
		if @id_creatediagram is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 16
		if @id_renamediagram is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 32
		if @id_alterdiagram  is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 64
		if @id_dropdiagram is not null
			select @InstalledObjects = @InstalledObjects + 128
		
		return @InstalledObjects 
	END

CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[fn_GetInvoiceSummary] (
    @Type NVARCHAR(10),
    @PeriodValue NVARCHAR(10)  -- 'yyyy-MM-dd' for days, 'yyyy-MM' for month, 'yyyy' for year
)
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
(
    -- Last 7 Days (Datewise) or Specific Day
    SELECT 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(AIDATE AS DATE), 120) AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(InvAmt, 0)) AS total_invoice_amount,
        SUM(ISNULL(IncTaxAMT, 0)) AS total_invoice_incl_tax
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            AI_NO, 
            MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0)) AS InvAmt,
            SUM(ROUND((ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) + (ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) * ISNULL(td_age, 0) / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT
        FROM AR_Invoice_V 
        GROUP BY AI_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'days'
        AND AIDATE >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
        AND (@PeriodValue = '' OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(AIDATE AS DATE), 120) = @PeriodValue)
    GROUP BY CAST(AIDATE AS DATE)

    UNION ALL

    -- Monthly
    SELECT 
        FORMAT(AIDATE, 'yyyy-MM') AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(InvAmt, 0)) AS total_invoice_amount,
        SUM(ISNULL(IncTaxAMT, 0)) AS total_invoice_incl_tax
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            AI_NO, 
            MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0)) AS InvAmt,
            SUM(ROUND((ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) + (ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) * ISNULL(td_age, 0) / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT
        FROM AR_Invoice_V 
        GROUP BY AI_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'month'
        AND (@PeriodValue = '' OR FORMAT(AIDATE, 'yyyy-MM') = @PeriodValue)
    GROUP BY FORMAT(AIDATE, 'yyyy-MM')

    UNION ALL

    -- Yearly
    SELECT 
        CAST(YEAR(AIDATE) AS VARCHAR) AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(InvAmt, 0)) AS total_invoice_amount,
        SUM(ISNULL(IncTaxAMT, 0)) AS total_invoice_incl_tax
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            AI_NO, 
            MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0)) AS InvAmt,
            SUM(ROUND((ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) + (ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) * ISNULL(td_age, 0) / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT
        FROM AR_Invoice_V 
        GROUP BY AI_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'year'
        AND (@PeriodValue = '' OR CAST(YEAR(AIDATE) AS VARCHAR) = @PeriodValue)
    GROUP BY YEAR(AIDATE)

    UNION ALL

    -- Today's Invoices
    SELECT 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(AIDATE AS DATE), 120) AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(InvAmt, 0)) AS total_invoice_amount,
        SUM(ISNULL(IncTaxAMT, 0)) AS total_invoice_incl_tax
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            AI_NO, 
            MAX(AI_DATE) AS AIDATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0)) AS InvAmt,
            SUM(ROUND((ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) + (ISNULL(AI_AMOUNT, 0) * ISNULL(td_age, 0) / 100)), 0)) AS IncTaxAMT
        FROM AR_Invoice_V 
        GROUP BY AI_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'today'
        AND CAST(AIDATE AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    GROUP BY CAST(AIDATE AS DATE)
);

CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[fn_GetOrderSummary] (
    @periodType VARCHAR(10),
    @periodValue VARCHAR(10)
)
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
(
    WITH FilteredOrders AS (
        SELECT DISTINCT AO_NO, CAST(AO_Date AS DATE) AS OrderDate
        FROM AR_ORDER
        WHERE 
            (
                @periodType = 'days'
                AND AO_Date >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
            )
            OR 
            (
                @periodType = 'month'
                AND (@periodValue = '' OR FORMAT(AO_Date, 'yyyy-MM') = @periodValue)
            )
            OR 
            (
                @periodType = 'year'
                AND (@periodValue = '' OR CAST(YEAR(AO_Date) AS VARCHAR(4)) = @periodValue)
            )
            OR
            (
                @periodType = 'today'
                AND CAST(AO_Date AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
            )
            OR 
            (@periodType NOT IN ('days', 'month', 'year', 'today'))  -- fallback
    )
    SELECT
        CASE 
            WHEN @periodType = 'year' THEN CAST(YEAR(OrderDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
            WHEN @periodType = 'month' THEN FORMAT(OrderDate, 'yyyy-MM') 
            WHEN @periodType IN ('days', 'today') THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), OrderDate, 120)
            ELSE NULL
        END AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records
    FROM FilteredOrders
    GROUP BY
        CASE 
            WHEN @periodType = 'year' THEN CAST(YEAR(OrderDate) AS VARCHAR(4)) 
            WHEN @periodType = 'month' THEN FORMAT(OrderDate, 'yyyy-MM') 
            WHEN @periodType IN ('days', 'today') THEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), OrderDate, 120)
        END
);

CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[fn_GetReceiptSummary] (
    @Type NVARCHAR(10),
    @PeriodValue NVARCHAR(10)
)
RETURNS TABLE
AS
RETURN
(
    -- Today's Summary
    SELECT 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE), 120) AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(RAmt, 0)) AS total_receipt_amount
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            APR_NO, 
            MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0)) AS RAmt
        FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
        GROUP BY APR_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'today'
        AND CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE) = CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)
    GROUP BY CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE)

    UNION ALL

    -- Daily Summary (last 7 days or specific day)
    SELECT 
        CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE), 120) AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(RAmt, 0)) AS total_receipt_amount
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            APR_NO, 
            MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0)) AS RAmt
        FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
        GROUP BY APR_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'days'
        AND APR_DATE >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE))
        AND (@PeriodValue = '' OR CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE), 120) = @PeriodValue)
    GROUP BY CAST(APR_DATE AS DATE)

    UNION ALL

    -- Monthly Summary
    SELECT 
        FORMAT(APR_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(RAmt, 0)) AS total_receipt_amount
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            APR_NO, 
            MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0)) AS RAmt
        FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
        GROUP BY APR_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'month'
        AND (@PeriodValue = '' OR FORMAT(APR_DATE, 'yyyy-MM') = @PeriodValue)
    GROUP BY FORMAT(APR_DATE, 'yyyy-MM')

    UNION ALL

    -- Yearly Summary
    SELECT 
        CAST(YEAR(APR_DATE) AS VARCHAR) AS record_date,
        COUNT(*) AS no_of_records,
        SUM(ISNULL(RAmt, 0)) AS total_receipt_amount
    FROM (
        SELECT 
            APR_NO, 
            MAX(APR_DATE) AS APR_DATE, 
            SUM(ISNULL(APR_RECEIPT_AMOUNT, 0)) AS RAmt
        FROM AR_Payment_Receipt_V 
        GROUP BY APR_NO
    ) AS ABC
    WHERE 
        @Type = 'year'
        AND (@PeriodValue = '' OR CAST(YEAR(APR_DATE) AS VARCHAR) = @PeriodValue)
    GROUP BY YEAR(APR_DATE)
);

CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[Get_EngineNo]
(
@AI_NO BIGINT
)
RETURNS varchar(50)
AS
BEGIN
	
-- Declare the return variable here
DECLARE @EngineNo varchar(50)

SET @EngineNo = (SELECT TOP (1) AR_INVOICE.AI_VEHICLE_ENGINENO
FROM AR_INVOICE 
WHERE (AR_INVOICE.AI_NO = @AI_NO) )

	-- Return the result of the function
	
	RETURN @EngineNo
END

-- =============================================
-- Author:		<Author,,Name>
-- Create date: <Create Date, ,>
-- Description:	<Description, ,>
-- =============================================
CREATE FUNCTION GetOAmt
(
	-- Add the parameters for the function here
	--<@Param1, sysname, @p1> <Data_Type_For_Param1, , int>
@VRN varchar(50)
)
RETURNS varchar(50)
AS
BEGIN
	
-- Declare the return variable here
DECLARE @Lessee varchar(200)

SELECT @Lessee = (SELECT TOP (1) AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.ORG_AMT
FROM AR_INVOICE_V INNER JOIN AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V ON AR_INVOICE_V.AI_NO = AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_NO 
WHERE (AR_INVOICE_V.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = @VRN) 
ORDER BY AR_INVOICE_AGEING_V.AI_DATE DESC)

	-- Return the result of the function
	RETURN @Lessee

END

--select dbo.[GetRenewalDays]('RWP4230910')
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[GetRenewalDays] (@VRN varchar(50))

RETURNS int

AS

BEGIN

DECLARE @Days int

Declare @Rec_Date as Datetime
Declare @Ins_Date as Datetime

SELECT  Top 1 @Rec_Date = apr.APR_DATE 
FROM         AR_PAYMENT_RECEIPT AS apr LEFT OUTER JOIN
                      payment_sms AS ps ON apr.APR_NO = ps.APR_NO INNER JOIN
                      AR_ADJUST_INVOICE AS adj ON apr.APR_NO = adj.AAI_APR_NO INNER JOIN
                      AR_INVOICE AS ai ON adj.AAI_AI_NO = ai.AI_NO INNER JOIN
                      [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblVehiclesDetails] AS VD ON VD.Vehicle_RegistrationNo = ai.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO
WHERE   (apr.APR_Cancel is NULL) AND (apr.APR_POST = 1) AND (ai.AI_VEHICLE_REGISTRATIONNO = @VRN)
ORDER BY apr.APR_DATE DESC


SELECT  Top 1  @Ins_Date =  VD.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation 
from   [192.168.0.20].[CRM].[dbo].[tblVehiclesDetails] AS VD
WHERE   (VD.Vehicle_RegistrationNo = @VRN)
ORDER BY VD.Vehicle_DateOfInstallation DESC


If (@Rec_Date IS NULL OR @Rec_Date = '')
Begin
	
select @Days = datediff(d,@Ins_Date,getdate())
End

If (@Rec_Date = @Ins_Date)
Begin
	
select @Days = datediff(d,@Ins_Date,getdate())
End

If (@Rec_Date > @Ins_Date)
Begin
select @Days = datediff(d,@Rec_Date,getdate()) 
End

If (@Rec_Date < @Ins_Date)
Begin
select @Days = datediff(d,@Ins_Date,getdate())
End


RETURN @Days

END

create function [dbo].[InitCap] (@value varchar(max))
returns varchar(max) as
begin

    declare
        @separator char(1) = ' ',
        @result varchar(max) = '';

    with r as (
        select value, cast(null as varchar(max)) [x], cast('' as varchar(max)) [char], 0 [no] from (select rtrim(cast(@value as varchar(max))) [value]) as j
        union all
        select right(value, len(value)-case charindex(@separator, value) when 0 then len(value) else charindex(@separator, value) end) [value]
        , left(r.[value], case charindex(@separator, r.value) when 0 then len(r.value) else abs(charindex(@separator, r.[value])-1) end ) [x]
        , left(r.[value], 1)
        , [no] + 1 [no]
        from r where value > '')

    select @result = @result +
    case
        when ascii([char]) between 97 and 122 
            then stuff(x, 1, 1, char(ascii([char])-32))
        else x
    end + @separator
    from r where x is not null;

    set @result = rtrim(@result);

    return @result;
end
